phyi rol shing la sogs pa dang / /dur khrod brgyad kyis rnam par brgyan/ /'jigs par byed pa'i ro langs dang / /lce spyang drag po'i sgra yang sgrogs/ /de ltar rim pa ji bzhin pas/ /gong ma lta bus yang dag bri/ /dbang bskur gnas skabs gang yin pas/ /mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor

yongs su bri/ /de yi bar du mi gzhan la/ /bris sku bstan par mi bya'o/ /brgyang shing rus pa nyid la ni/ /byas pas thang ka yongs su brgyangs/ /gur dag sngon po phub byas la/ /mkha' la yongs su bstan mi bya/ /gal te

bstan par byas pa na/ /dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba med/ /de bas mnyam par bzhag pa yis/ /sbyor ba legs par brtsam par bya/ /glegs bam nges par bri bar bya/ /gro ga dag la sor dag ni/ /dkyus su bcu gnyis

zheng du bzhi/ /de yi tshad du bya ba la/ /khrag dang bdud rtsi lnga rnams kyis/ /yongs su byug par byas pa la/ /me long ur gyis mnan byas te/ /mthing shun nyid kyis legs par bri/ /'dri mkhan sbyor ba rab ldan pas/ /smyu gu

lcags las byas pa yi/ /snod ni thod par yang dag ldan/ /gtor ma yang dag bshams byas la/ /hU~M gi ngag gis rtags tu brjod/ /gos dag sngon po bgos byas nas/ /rgyan cha lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /mi gzhan la ni mi bstan

cing / /glegs shing rus pa'am glang chen gyi/ /ba so dag la nges par bya/ /thag pa bram ze mo yi ni/ /skra yis yongs su bsdam par bya/ /yang na yid ches lpags pa la/ /mnyen par bya bas yongs su bsdam/ /der ni

lag g.yon stod kyi bar/ /de nyid bdag gi yongs su spa/ /sangs rgyas lnga yi bdag po mchog /nges par rdo rje rnon po nyid/ /sdang ba thams cad 'dul byed cing / /dngos su dpa' bo rab 'bar ba/ /chen po yi ni chen po nyid/ /
kun la mkha' 'gro chen po ste/ /sku chen rab drag 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /mkha' ltar mnyam la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /las la 'jug par snang ba nyid/ /kun bsdus pas ni de brjod bya/ /lag na rdo rje
gos sngon po can rdo rje me lce'i rgyud las bris sku dang glegs bam gyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // lag na rdo rje gos sngon gyis/ /bcom ldan mgon la 'di skad gsol/ /gang zhig rgyud 'di las
sbyor bas/ /thabs kyi yan lag sna tshogs pa/ /yang dag rgyas par gsung du gsol/ /bde gshegs mchog gis bka' stsal pa/ /dad pa'i rang bzhin can gyi mis/ /'di nyid la ni mngon par bsgrub/ /

klu gdug 'bar bas zin pa ni/ /nub mo na bar gyur pa dang / /yan lag drag par na ba dang / /smin ma la sogs byi ba dang / /lus la sha ro khol bar gnas/ /tshigs su na zhing chags par ldan/ /snying mi dga' dang

dkar la dga'/ /klu yi nad du shes par bya/ /ba lang dmar po mthong ba dang / /sbal pa nya sogs mtshan mo rmi/ /bu mo gzhon nu mthong ba dang / /skyes pa skra ser rmi ba dag /klu yi mtshan smra bstan pa

yin/ /khrus la dga' zhing skud pa 'khal/ /chang la yongs su dad che ba/ /tshangs pa'i nad du shes par bya/ /smra log mang dang lag sgyur dang / /tho rangs na ba gang yin pa/ /zas mi za dang snying 'phar

ba/ /tshangs pa'i gdon du rigs par bya/ /rked pa brkyang dang nyal la dga'/ /sen mo byi dor byed pa dag /tshangs pa'i nad du shes par bya/ /nub mo sbur ba rmi ba dang / /spre'u byi la mthong gyur na/ /tshangs pa'i

mtshan mar bstan pa yin/ /mi rgan rib pa mthong ba dang / /shar phyogs ri la 'dzeg pa dag /tshangs pa'i rtags su bstan pa yin/ /dbugs dgas nang du 'dren pa dang / /glal zhing spyi bor lag pa 'dud/ /skyug par byed cing sha la dga'/ /gshin rje yi ni gdon du bstan/ /

rkang pa sa la brdab pa dang / /mkhal sogs g.yas pa'am g.yon pa na/ /gshin rje'i nad du rig par bya'o/ /tshig pa za dang gzhan la rgol/ /mi gzhan la ni mngon par sdang / /sdur dag rab tu mi bde dang / /thag pa dag

las mdud pa 'dor/ /gshin rje'i gdon du shes par bya/ /glang dang sha ba rmis pa dang / /gos dag sngon po lus la gyon/ /gshin rje yi ni mtshan ma yin/ /shing la 'dzegs pas phyir lhung dang / /gru na zhugs pa gang rmi ba/ /

de ni gshin rje'i mtshan ma yin/ /mig rtsa rgod cing lbu ba skyug /'khur ba 'bud cing brang la rdung / /gnod sbyin gdon du shes par bya/ /yang yang ldang zhing rngam pa rgod/ /kha nas lce ni rkyong ba dang / /lus la bsku byug byed pa ni/ /

gnod sbyin gdon du shes par bya'o/ /lto ba na zhing zas la dga'/ /rgyab du gzer ba gang yin pa/ /gnod sbyin nad du shes par bya/ /rta sngon dag la zhon pa dang / /bong bu la zhon rmi ba rnams/ /gnod sbyin mtshan
ma yin par bshad/ /bya rog lag par thogs pa dang / /thag pas lus 'khyud nyal bar rmis/ /gnod sbyin mtshan mar rig par bya'o/ /spos chu la ni sngags btab nas/ /byin na len par mi byed pa/ /tshang pa'i
gdon du shes par bya/ /yungs kar nyid la rab bsngags nas/ /lag par byin pas mig mi lta/ /gshin rje'i gdon du shes par bya/ /sha la sngags kyis rab bsngags nas/ /kha ru byin pas sna 'gags pa/ /de ni

klu gdon nges par gsal/ /skud pa sngon po nyid la ni/ /rab sngags mdud pa bdun bor ba/ /mgul du bcings pas skad ngan 'don/ /gnod sbyin gdon du yin par bshad/ /chom po dag ni phrad pa na/ /sbyor ba 'di yis

yang dag sbyor/ /dur khrod mi gang bsregs pa yi/ /sna tshogs thal ba blang byas la/ /chang dang nges par sbrus byas te/ /sbrul gyis lpags pas gtums byas la/ /til gyi gang bu grags pa la/ /'bum du yang dag bzlas byas te/ /

bdag nyid gos la yang dag gtum/ /de nas de dang phrad pa na/ /drag po las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /de nyid la ni phog par gtor/ /de yis de la gtor ba yis/ /de ni rengs dang rmongs par 'gyur/ /oM ma nu Sha duSh+Ta staM b+ha na hU~M/ /

sgyu ma dbang du sdud byed na/ /sbyor ba 'di nyid brtsam par bya/ /ngos 'jam rdul dang zla ba dang / /bgegs kyi gnyen po'i khu ba dang / /sgog chen las kyi khu bas su/ /byed pa gnyis ka bar sbrus la/ /de la 'thun pa nyid la ni/ /yongs

su bskul bas sbyin par bya/ /de nas nges pa dus btab la/ /kha sbyor ba yis yang dag bsngags/ /oM na ma kA ma de ba ya ya ya ka ya ka kA la siny+tsa b+ha g+ha bi bar ta na swA hA/ a mu kaM/ 'bum du dang por bsnyen pa yis/ /

sbyor ba nges par spyad par bya/ /nor dag bsgrub par 'dod pa na/ /nor 'dzin lha mo yongs su bri/ /kha dog ser po nyid la ni/ /phyag bzhi par ni bri bar bya/ /zhal gcig nu ma 'bur ba la/ /g.yas kyi dang po ting 'dzin pa/ /

gnyis pa 'bras kyi snye ma 'dzin/ /g.yon gyi dang po nyid na ni/ /rin chen 'bar ba yang dag bsnams/ /gnyis pa ne la'i rkyal pa bsnams/ /de lta bu yi gzugs byas la/ /sna tshogs dri yis yang dag mchod/ /

mchod pa rnam pa lnga dag dang / /nam bza' dar la sogs pa yis/ /yang dag pa ru mchod par bya/ /zhag grangs brgya rtsa brgyad pa ru/ /yongs su bsnyen pas sngags bzlas bya/ /de nas grub par gyur pa'i rtags/ /de

nyid g.yo bar gyur pa yin/ /de grub rten ni rnyed par ni/ /de yis lung ni ston par 'gyur/ /de nas dbyig ni mi bzad pa'i/ /bdag por mi de nges par 'gyur/ /ma rungs pa dag smyor gzhug na/ /sbyor ba 'di dag nges par

brtsam/ /de yis kun grags nyid dang ni/ /khu chen sa la sogs pa la/ /sngags 'di yis ni 'bum du bzlas/ /de nas bsnyen pa yongs rdzogs pas/ /yid chen dung la sbu gu can/ /sor bdun dag la dug blugs te/ /

skud pa sngon po'i rab bcings la/ /nub phyogs dag tu nges par gdags/ /de ni 'byung bas bskyod pa na/ /mi de nges par smyo bar 'gyur/ /oM ma hA kA la ya staM b+ha u na ma ta ya/ a mu kaM sany+tsa la swA hA/
mi rnams nges par mi gsal bas/ /rdo rje mo ni yongs su bsgrub/ /sa la phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad du/ /re'u mig bcu gnyis bris byas la/ /ma rig la sogs rtags kyi ni/ /dngos po yang dag 'dri bar bya/ /
de nas sngags pas rab bsngags la/ /bsam pa rab tu rdzogs byas la/ /de nyid dngos po gang yin pas/ /bsam pa sbyar bas me tog bor/ /gang du bab pa der gnas la/ /shes rab can gyis rnam par dpyod/ /

bzang ngan ltas rnams yongs su bshad/ /rig pa legs par sbas pa yis/ /ba yi lci bas rab btum la/ /dang por gnyis su shes par bya/ /ring du bye brag med pa yis/ /bcom ldan sngon du bzhag byas te/ /dang por
mchod pas yang dag mchod/ /dmod dag yongs su btsugs pa yis/ /shes rab bcu gsum bdag nyid can/ /dmar po gos kyis brgyan byas te/ /khrus dag legs par byas pa dang / /dri yis legs par
byugs byas la/ /dpral bar thig le dmar po gdab/ /me tog dri zhim dmar po nyid/ /de yi lag tu sbyin par bya/ /de yis de la blang bar bya/ /de nyid dngos po gsal bya ste/ /bzang ngan ltas su
nges par ston/ /spyir na sna tshogs gdon la ni/ /'bar ba chen po'i sngags bzlas bya/ /gu gul nag po'i dud pa dag /de yi sna ru bdug byas la/ /yungs kar gu gul me tog dang / /de yi
snying pos sregs par bya/ /de yis nad pa gang yin pa/ /bgegs dang nges par bral bar 'gyur/ /srin lag nyid la skud pa ni/ /sngon pos yang dag bsdam par bya/ /spyi bo'i skra la srad bu gang / /
bcing pas sngags ni nges par bzlas/ /'khrug pa'i sde dag rgyal 'dod na/ /khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po yis/ /'bum du bzlas pas bsnyen pa bya/ /de nas a mra'i lo ma las/ /yung
bas yongs su bris byas la/ /'gi wang gis ni rab tu bku/ /cod pan spyi bor btums byas la/ /rang nyid sku ru bsgom byas la/ /lag pa g.yas pas yungs kar dang / /ske tshe thal bar
sbyar byas la/ /sngags bzlas sdig mdzub phyar ba yis/ /yongs su bris bar sde rgyal 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bdag nyid la/ /'chi bab bslu ba yang dag bya/ /bdag gis rgyud la 'chi ltas ni/ /
phyi nang bcu gnyis yang dag ldan/ /bdag gis brang la sha mtshan dag /dmar po byung bar gyur pa na/ /sum bcu gnyis zhag 'chi 'gyur bas/ /rig pa'i rgyal po'i sngags kyis su/ /til la bsreg

blugs stong du ni/ /tshang bar byas pas de bzlog 'gyur/ /de dang cha mthun gang yin pa/ /rkan la 'brum bu gsum pa dang / /lce yi rtse mor sme ba dang / /rdo rje'i lam nas khrag 'dzag dang / /'dzag gnyis dbugs dag gsum pa dang / /ri yi rtse mor

shu ba byung / /nang gi 'chi ltas nges pa ste/ /stag dang byi ba 'brug dag dang / /rtsangs pa bya gag nag po ru/ /yongs su sbyor bas rig pa bzlas/ /'gi wang 'ug pa ru sbal dang / /tsam pa ka dang ud pal dang / /seng ldeng

phur bu gang yin dang / /'ug pa'i sgro la sbyor ba dang / /bya rog mkha' la 'phur ba yi/ /dkar pos bdag la phog pa ni/ /phyi yi 'chi bltas yin pas na/ /gong du grags pa'i sar song la/ /rig pa la sogs sbyor

ba yis/ /yongs su bzlog par bya ba yin/ /mkha' la sna lnga mthong ba dang / /chu la mi gzugs mthong gyur na/ /shin tu sdig pa'i bltas su bstan/ /rmi lam la ni stag zhon la/ /mchod rten nyid la 'dzeg pa dang / /
seng ge'i khar ni zhugs rmis pa/ /yongs su sdig pa'i ltas yin pas/ /logs shig sor mo rtse gsum dang / /bse ru'i phyogs dang kun da'i 'dab/ /yon tan rgya mtsho'i mtshan bzang dang / /skye mched 'phags

laMm chu srin sor/ /lo gsum zhag bzhi zla ba lngar/ /mi de nges par 'chi bas na/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /rten 'brel yi ge brgya pa yis/ /sngags kyis sman la bsrung ba bya/ /khams gsum rnam

rgyal 'jig rten mgon/ /de dag gi ni snying po yis/ /stag sogs gsob la nges par bzlas/ /rma bya chen mo'i sngags dag gis/ /'ug pa'i sgro sogs nges par bsngags/ /phyag na rdo rje 'jam dbyangs dang / /stobs chen khro bo

gang dag gi/ /sngags kyis seng ldeng 'ug sgro dang / /ku sha byi la la sogs dang / /gsob la bsngags pa yongs su bzlog /gtor ma sbyin sreg las kyis ni/ /yongs su bzlog par bya ba yin/ /shin tu dpa' dang dad par

ldan/ /shes rab che dang thos pa bsags/ /bla ma la gus gtong bar phod/ /ltung ba ma gos gtsang ma la/ /rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur nas/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo lnga byas la/ /shes rab ldan la bstan bya ba'i/ /

gsang ba drag po'i rgyud rgyal 'di/ /gzhan la bshad par bya ba min/ /gsang ba bdag po khyod kyis ni/ /phan dang gnod bya gang yin la/ /rim pa bzhin du shes pa yis/ /legs par sba dang bshad pa ni/ /gnas

skabs du ma dang ldan zhing / /kun la nges par zhugs pa yis/ /rgyud 'di la ni nges par brtag /rgyud 'di gang na gnas pa na/ /sa phyogs de yi gdug pa rnams/ /ring du bsrings pas gnas mi byed/ /gal te gnas par

byed pa na/ /de rnams kun gyi rgyud tshig 'gyur/ /drag po rgyud kyi rgyal po la/ /gang zhig zhugs par gyur pa la/ /dug gsum sku la rab brgyan nas/ /btsun mo'i b+ha ga la gnas te/ /nyon mongs 'khor gyis rab bskor
nas/ /bde ba chen po'i rol pas gnas/ / / / /lag na rdo rjes de nyid du/ / / / /skad cig tsam gyis bskor ba ni/ / / /
'bum phrag gsum du rab bskor nas/ / // /bde bar gshegs la 'di skad gsol// //bdag gis rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di/ / / //
nges pa'i don dang rab sbyar nas// //gsang ba nyid du sba bar bgyi/ // /lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gnod sbyin drag po rdo rje me lce'i
rgyud las las sna tshogs kyi le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o/ / / / / / //phyag na rdo rje gos sngon po can/ gnod sbyin drag po chen po rdo rje me
lce'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs s+ho// / / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po rata na kIr ti dang // //bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge tshul
khyung grags kyis bka' drin mnos nas rgya dpe bod du spyan drangs te bsgyur ba lags so// //rgyud 'bum snga ma kha cig na bzhugs pa'i phyag na rdo rje me
lce'i rgyud le'u bcu gnyis pa ni/ // // / // /rgyud 'di nyid kyi le'u bdun pa brgyad pa dgu pa rnams dor nas/ / / le'u bcu
gnyis par ming btags par yin gyi/ // //'di dang mi 'dra ba'i brgyud 'bum logs pa min no/ // // // // / /

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra pa Ni a bI tan trA nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud/ dpal gsang ba'i bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag
gis thos pa dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas lcang lo can gyi pho brang na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po la/ rig sngags kyi lha tshogs kyis bskor te bzhugs so/ /de nas dpa' mo'i dbang
phyug mas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po 'di sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pa ji lta bu cig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snying rjer ldan zhing shes rab che/ /
bzod dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus che/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob cing / /bslab pa gsum la rab tu gnas/ /des ni dpa' bo yang dag 'grub/ /gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las bsgrub pa po
gang zag bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // yang dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo 'di bsgrub pa'i gnas ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dben
pa nyams dga' yid 'ong ba/ /bkra shis dpal 'phel dbang yang 'dzin/ /dur khrod chen po 'jigs gnas pa/ /ri gsum rtse 'am brag ri sngo/ /khro bo'i cha byad 'dra ba'i
gnas/ /de ni dpa' bo bsgrub la shis/ /gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las sgrub pa'i gnas bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //

yang dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo 'di bskyed pa'i dmigs pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dang po stong zhing bdag med de/ /snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun/ /ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag /

de lta bu yi chos nyid la/ /sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med pas/ /mi sgom mi rtog snang la gsal/ /nam mkha' mtha' med mkha' mnyam dbu ma'i don/ /sems kyi rang bzhin de lta bu/ /de ltar ma rtogs sems can la/ /

sdug bsngal kun dang bral ba yi/ /thugs rje phyogs med bsgom par bya/ /sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /rang gi sems ni yi ge hU~M/ /yi ge hU~M gi 'phro 'du las/ /gzhal yas khang dang lha yi gdan/ /lha yi sa bon

yi ge las/ /rims bzhin du bskyed par bya/ /gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las bskyed pa'i dmigs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // yang dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi bdag po 'di'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dmigs pa

ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bskyed pa'i dmigs pa thob nas ni/ /rang gi snying gar ye shes sems dpa' bsgom/ /ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar ni/ /pad ma 'dab bzhi rgya sran tsam/ /dbus su nyi zla'i gzhal yas

khang / /gzhal yas khang gi nang du ni/ /a shad mar me'i rtse ltar sgom/ /de la dmigs pa thob nas ni/ /ci yang bsam par mi bya ste/ /bsam gyis mi khyab de bsam nas/ /de la ye shes thob par 'gyur/ /gsal la rtog med rig pa'i sku/ /

ye shes zhes ni de la bya'o/ /gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dmigs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // yang dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po 'di'i 'khor ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ dpa' bo chen po 'di'i 'khor ni/ /thugs kyi 'khor ni bzhi'o/ /bsung gi 'khor ni brgyad do/ /sku'i 'khor lnga brgyar nges so/ /gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// //

yang dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po 'di'i rig pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ \u0f00 badzra pA Ni hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha n-I lA~M ba ra d+ha badzra pA ni hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ \u0f00 badzra pA Ni

kro d+ha ma hA tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ 'khor bzhi'i rig pa phul ba ni/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha ma hA kA la ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT tsit+ta kro tsi dun dza/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha trai lokya bi dza ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ ma ra ya tsit+ta rbad rbad/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha nA ga spu sha

hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ ma ra ya rag ta rngubs rngubs rbad/ \u0f00 badzra kro d+ha ku bai ra hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ ma ra ya ke tsha~M tsha~M rbad/ dpa' bo'i 'khor lha srin sde brgyad kyi rig pa phul ba/ ma hA de bar mA ra ya sod sod/ ma hA nA ga mA ra ya sod sod dza dzaHma hA

de wi mA ra ya/ ha na ha na/ ma hA ma ni mA ra ya rtubs rtubs/ ma hA sid d+ha mA ra ya tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA yak+Sha mA ra ya b+hin da b+hin da/ ma hA dri za mA ra ya khas khas/ ma hA ma ni bin d+ha mA ra ya nan/ ma hA badzra hU~M phaT mA ra ya ru d+ha ru d+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/

gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las rig pa phul ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // yang dpa' mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo 'di'i phrin las mjug sbyin bsreg gis bsdu 'tshal lam mi 'tshal ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ sbyin bsreg ni rnam pa gsum ste/ phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum/ /re re la ni bzhi bzhir bstan/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas par bstan/ /dbang dang drag po'i sbyin bsreg go gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud las sbyin bsreg gi le'u ste bdun pa'o// //
bcom ldan 'das dpal chen pos/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma dang / rigs kyi lha tshogs rnams dga' mgu yi rangs te/ dpal chen pos gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //

dpal phyag na rdo rje gtum po gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi paN Di ta wa la tsan dra dang / lo ts+tsha ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /zhus dag //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga bAn badzra pA Ni gu h+ya a b+hi de sha tan tra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ zhes bya ba/ dpal gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la phyag

'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lcang lo can gyi pho brang na/ sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i tshogs dang byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang rig

pa'i khro bo'i tshogs dpag tu med pa dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs dang / gnod sbyin lnga brgya dang bcas te thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud thams cad 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /de nas byang

chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te/ phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dzin/ /ting 'dzin rgyal po mi g.yo las/ /cig car bzhengs te gsang ba'i mchog /ye shes lnga yi spyod yul gyi/ /sku

gsung thugs kyi gsang ba mchog /ji ltar bsgrub pa'i rim pa dang / /las kyi bya ba mdor bsdus te/ /gang zag ji lta bus sgrub cing / /rig pa'i rgyal po mchog gyur pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs zhes zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mnyam par bzhags pa las

langs te/ thugs kar ye shes lnga mi phyed pa'i rdo rje lan gsum du gsor bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'gul ba dang / ldeg pa la sogs pa kun du 'khrugs te/ gdug pa can 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye nas slar thugs kar thim pa las

rdo rje'i lte ba nas yum dpa' mo rdo rje bde ma zhes bya ba byung ste/ rang gi ston pa la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ phyag byas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /khyod kyi sku gsung thugs kyi n-i/ /gsang ba'i dam pa gang yin pa/ /rdo rje 'dzin

pas legs par gsungs/ /'di ni rnyed dka' rgyud chen te/ /rin chen lta bur 'dod 'byung ba/ /grangs med tshogs las byung ba 'di/ /thugs rje'i rang bzhin stong pa las/ /bcom ldan khyod kyis bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / zhal 'dzum pa

mdzad nas byams pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyis 'jig rten khyab par byas te/ tshur 'dus nas rang gi zhal du thim pa dang / dpa' mo rdo rje bde ma khyod/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin bdag med mas/ /ji ltar zhus bzhin bshad

par bya/ /gus par nyon la legs par zung / /rdo rje 'chang gi sku gsung thugs/ /mi phyed stong pa'i rang bzhin las/ /thugs rje sna tshogs thabs tshul te/ /'di ni rab tu rtogs dka' bas/ /'das dang da ltar bzhugs pa dang / /ma 'ongs sangs rgyas spyod yul

yin/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rnam par dag /brjod med mi g.yo 'dus ma byas/ /nam mkha' dri med chos kyi sku/ /dus gsum dus med rtogs pa'i mchog /'di la ji ltar bstan du yod/ /'on kyang snying rje'i rang bzhin pas/ /

thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin ni/ /gnyis med gnyis kyi thabs tshul rig /'di n-i gsang ba dam pa ste/ /de nyid gzhan la mngon bstan pas/ /gdul bya tshim 'gyur rgyal po bzhin/ /rang 'dod 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur bas/ /gsang ba mngon par bstan

pa yi/ /rgyud chen rgyal po bshad par bya/ /e ma ho/ mi phyed rdo rje gsang ba'i mchog /e ma ho/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /sna tshogs nor bu rgyud chen 'di/ /rang gi gsang ba dam pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i

rgyud kyi rgyal po las rab tu dga' ba'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po khyod bsgrub pa'i gang zag ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /

zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /nga nyid sgrub pa'i gang zag ni/ /snying rje ldan zhing shes rab che/ /bzod ldan brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs/ /bslab pa gsum ldan dad pas brgyan/ /

dpa' zhing gsang ba'i spyod pa shes/ /gus shing g.yo med skyabs gnas gsum/ /rtag tu mchod cing yengs pa med/ /lhag pa'i lha la yid ches shing / /phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob la/ /dam tshig brda don nges par 'dzin/ /de ltas sgrub pa byas gyur na/ /
yun mi ring bar nga nyid kyi/ /gsang gsum la ni mkhas 'gyur te/ /'bad pas thob pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /skal ldan de yi snying la gnas zhes gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par

bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sgrub pa po'i gang zag bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang sgrub pa'i gnas ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /nga nyid sgrub pa'i gnas mchog ni/ /dur khrod brgyad dam nye ba'i gnas/ /dur khrod nags kyi

nang du ni/ /ri rtse brag ri sngon po'i mdog /khros pa'i gzugs 'dra byang lta ba/ /me tog sngon po mdzes pa dang / /ne'u sing dang ut+pal nag / /dben zhing yid 'ong nyams dga' ba/ /bkra shis dpal 'phel dbang yang 'dzin/ /lcang lo can dang ming mthun pa/ /sna

tshogs sgrub pa'i gnas su shis/ /tshwa sgo chu med u ma'i gnas/ /brgyal po'i pho brang tshong dus dang / /nyan thos la sogs 'dug gnas su/ /nga nyid sgrub par mi bya'o/ /smin pa'i gang zag rnams la ni/ /gnas sogs brtags pas ci zhig bya/ /thams

cad bde chen sangs rgyas kyi/ /zhing khams rol pas gnas pa yin/ /de bas rigs kyis brtag par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyal po las sgrub pa'i gnas bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // dpa' mo

rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang khyod/ sgrub pa'i thabs ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yin

mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /nga nyid sgrub pa'i rim pa ni/ /snying rje chen pos sngon 'gro zhing / /gzhan gyi don la bslab par bya/ /nam mkha' rdo rje can dmigs la/ /bde ba chen po rnam par mchod/ /rgyud sbyang sangs rgyas tshogs dag la/ /'gyod pa spangs te rjes yid rang / /

mya ngan 'das la gsol bar bya/ /dam pa'i don la bskul bya zhing / /rigs kyi sa bon cher bskyed la/ /kun la khyab bya gzhan don bsgrub/ /bdag gi sdug bsngal mi blta zhing / /gzhan don bde la dgod par bya/ /me 'obs lta bur

gnas pa yi/ /sems can kun la snying rje bsgom/ /spros bral gnyis 'dzin spangs pa yi/ /tshul la yang dag bslab par bya/ /sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med cing / /dang po stong zhing bdag dang bral/ /snang zhing srid pa'i chos rnams kun/ /

ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag /'thab bral mkha' 'dra dbu ma'i don/ /de lta bu yi chos nyid la/ /sems kyi rang bzhin gnyis su med/ /ma rtogs log pa'i sems can la/ /sdug bsngal kun dang dbral ba'i phyir/ /snying rje chen po

bsgom par bya/ /rang gi sems nyid yi ge hU~M/ /sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i ma/ /chu skyes thabs dang shes rab ldan/ /mtha' gnyis spangs pa gdan dang bcas/ /gnyis med rdo rje'i rang bzhin te/ /snying rjes sbyangs nas gsum pa rdzogs/ /sku mdog

nag po zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis g.yas pa rdo rje 'dzin/ /snun pa'i stobs can rdo rje 'bar/ /g.yon pas dril bu kur sten te/ /sgeg pa'i tshul can nam mkhar gdengs/ /rin chen chu 'dzin rgyan dang ldan/ /stag lpags dar gyis sku la rgyan rba/ /

g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang bdud la brdzis/ /spyan gsum gdug pa'i mche ba gtsigs/ /bskal pa'i me 'od nang du bzhugs/ /yi ge gsum gyi gnas gsum po/ /lhar byas skye mched byin gyis brlab/ /gnas su khro bo'i yig 'bru

bskyed/ /sprul pa dpag med phyogs bcur 'gyed/ /yi ge bzhi yis yed shes dbab/ /rigs bdag la sogs sangs rgyas kyis/ /dbang bskur byin brlabs cod pan bsam/ /de yi ting 'dzin 'byung ba'i rgyu/ /cho ga gsum pa'i sems dpa' yis/ /

gzhan don rgyun mi 'chad par bsgom/ /yang na gsung gi yig 'brus mtshan/ /phrin las thogs med rnal 'byor bzlas/ /'di ni rnam dag rig pa ste/ /rtag tu ma nyams 'bras bur ldan/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i

rgyud kyi rgyal po las dpa' bo gcig pa bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa'i thabs ji lta bu lags bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma'i mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /skad cig ma yis lhar bsam nas/ /snying kar nyi ma'i rig pa hU~M/ /'od kyi rang bzhin

snod bcud rnams/ /sbyangs te sangs rgyas sa la gzhag /'od zer gnyis pas sangs rgyas dang / /byang sems dkyil 'khor dgug bya ste/ /phyag bya hU~M las lha mo bsam/ /me tog la sogs pas mchod la/ /tha dad pa yi mchod pa che/ /de 'od dpag med

lha mo yis/ /reg bya tha mi dad pas mchod/ /sdig bshags rjes su yi rang dang / /gsol zhing skyabs 'gro bdag lus dbul/ /sems bskyed dge ba bsngo bar bya/ /de rjes dang po byam pa ste/ /gnyis pa snying rje gsum pa dga'/ /kun gyi mtha' la btang snyoms

so/ /sbyangs gzhi sngags kyis phyi nang kun/ /stong par byas te rang lus kyang / /dbang po'i gzhu 'dra srid 'dzin gyi/ /gnas su hU~M bsam de 'od bcas/ /tsam las byung ba'i 'khor lo ste/ /rtsibs bcu la ni nyi ma bsam/ /dbus su hU~M las gnod mdzes bskyed/ /

de las hU~M 'phros khro bcu yang / /rang rang sa la gsal bar bskyed/ /sngags pas bgegs med gyis shig par/ /de la bka' lung bsgo bar bya/ /zhal bzhi'i gsang sngags dran pa yis/ /mthe bong sdigs 'dzub sbyar nas ni/ /phyogs bcur brda ni bstan par bya/ /

oM su~M b+ha ni su~M b+ha ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM grIh+NA pa ya grIh+NA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM A na ya ho b+ha ga bA ne bi d+yA rA dzA ya hU~M hU~M phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brjod pas/ /lus ngag sems las byung ba yi/ /bgegs kun gyi ni

mgo stengs su/ /rdo rje phur pa gzugs par bya/ /oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba duSh+Tan big+h+nAn hU~M hU~M phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya sarba pA pa~M A dz+nyA pa ya ti kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ rdo rje tho bas brdung bya ste/ /oM badzra mud ga ra badzra kI la ya

A ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/ spyi bor btab pas nges par rlag /slar 'dus phyogs mtshams ma lus par/ /sa gzhi ra ba dra ba dang / /gur bcing ba dang bla re dang / /mda' dang me yi 'od 'bar bsgom/ /oM badzra me di ni badzri b+hA ba badzra ban d+ha ban d+ha hU~M oM badzra

pa~M tsa ra hU~M la~M` hUM o~M` badzra bi tA na hU~M khaM hUM/ oM sha ra dzA la tra~M sa~M tra~M/ oM badzra dz+wA la a na lArka hU~M hU~M hU~M/ rim pas brjod la snying rje yi/ /bdag nyid gzhan la phan 'dod pa/ /smon lam las 'byung rdzu 'phrul mchog /yang las byung ba gzhu 'dra ba/ /

sngon po ba dan ldan pa bsam/ /de steng ram byung rgod ma'i kha/ /gru gsum dmar po 'od 'bar ba/ /bam las skyes pa zlum po ste/ /dkar po 'khyil pa'i tshul du bsam/ /de las skyes pa dbang chen te/ /lam skyes ser po rdo rje'i rgyu/ /gru bzhi 'od

zer 'bar ba bsam/ /de steng tsa~M las chos kyi 'khor/ /lte bar brum las gzhal yas khang / /gru bzhi sgo dang rta bab bcas/ /dra ba phyed dang dra bas brgyan/ /phreng ba rin chen rdo rje dang / /mdzes pa'i ba dan bcas pa bsam/ /de nang pam las chu skyes ni/ /

ge sar 'dab mar bcas pa'i steng / /nyi ma kA li 'od 'bar tshe/ /steng du zla ba A li bsil/ /kha sbyar bar du hU~M dang A/ /nag cing dmar ba'i rnam pa la/ /de las pad ma rdo rje bsam/ /slar yang yi ges 'gro ba sbyangs/ /hU~M gis mi bskyod thugs rnams bsdu/ /

a yis 'od dpag gsung bsdus la/ /gnyis med zhu bas sprul pa bsdu/ /rdo rje las ni khro bo ste/ /pad mas khro mo'i rnam par bskyed/ /khro bo mthing ga zhal gcig pa/ /rang 'od las byung phyag gnyis 'khyud/ /rdo rje dril bu thabs shes rab/ /g.yas dang

g.yon du bsam par bya/ /dbu rgyan la sogs rin chen ldan/ /dbu skra kham ser gyen du 'bar/ /nag po sbrul lus klu chen rgyad/ /sku smad stag gi lpags pas dkris/ /chos gos sngon pos bstod dkris ste/ /mche ba gtsig shing spyan gsum dmar/ /'dod dgur sgyur zhing brkyang bskum zhabs/ /

mtha' gnyis spang pas steng du bzhug /de yum rdo rje bde ma khro/ /dmar ljang zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /g.yas pa gri gug yab la 'khyud/ /g.yon pa thod pa bde ba ster/ /gnyis med g.yon gyi phyogs nas 'khril/ /de rjes sbyor ba'i sgras bskul te/ /shar phyogs pad mar nyi zla la/ /hU~M las khams gsum rnam par rgyal/ /dkar po zhal

gcig phyag bzhi pa/ /g.yas pa rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin/ /g.yon pa dril bu be con te/ /khro bo'i rgyan ldan bsams nas kyang / /'byung po'i nus pa 'joms par byed/ /lho phyogs nyi ma ro stengs su/ /hU~M las byung ba'i

legs ldan gnag /g.yas pa gri gug g.yon thod pa/ /zhabs gnyis brgyang bskum thod phreng ldan/ /dgra bo gsod pa'i las la brtson/ /nub tu klu 'dul bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /ljang gu zhal gcig phyag bzhi khro/ /g.yas

pa rdo rje bya khyung dang / /g.yon pa dbyug to phur bu bsnams/ /sa 'og klu sogs zas su gsol/ /byang du k+Sha las rnam thos bu/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis bum stengs su/ /mdog ser g.yas pa rgyal mtshan bsnams/ /g.yon pas nor

sbyin bzung ba ste/ /dbul ba sel ba'i don la brtson/ /sgo mtshams lha yi rang bzhin la/ /ye shes spyan drangs mchod la gzhug /de ni yi ge bzhi sbyor yin/ /lus ngag sems la yi ge yi/ /lha yi mtshan ma gdab par bya/ /skye mched

lhar byas ting 'dzin gyi/ /nus pa mi shigs lhar bltas la/ /ye shes lnga 'dus yi ge bsam/ /de yi 'od kyis spyan drangs pa'i/ /rig lnga snyoms 'jug byin brlabs kyis/ /mi bskyod rdo rje dbang bskur te/ /

gsang ba shes rab ye shes kyis/ /rgyas gdab rigs la bzhi pa yi/ /phyag rgya che la rigs med do/ /'di ni gsang chen sku sgrub pa/ /rim gyis gsal zhing rnam par dag /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku thob pa/ /tshe gcig
nyid la 'gyur ba yin/ /rtag tu gom pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /sa sogs 'jig rten ma lus kun/ /skad cig nyid la dbang du 'gyur/ /gtsug na rin chen la sogs pa'i/ /gdug pa can rnams snying yang 'byin/ /dga'
bo la sogs klu chen rnams/ /R+tag tu de la 'dud par 'gyur/ /nad kyi rigs kun ma lus 'joms/ /gnod sbyin ma lus bka' nyan cing / /lha srin ma lus bran du 'gyur/ /'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste/ /
mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi don ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag
med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /gsang ba mchog gi gsang ba ste/ /phrin las thams cad rdzogs byed cing / /sdug bsngal kun las skyob byed pa'i/ /A li

kA li mnyam sbyor las/ /thabs dang shes rab mnyam med pa'i/ /sngags kyi don ni rnam pa lnga/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rigs pa dang / /phrin las sna tshogs rig pa dang / /'khor gyi las kyi rig pa dang / /'byung po dgug dang

gsad pa dang / /gtor ma gtang ba'i rim pa'o/ /oM badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT/ swA hA/ oM badzra kro d+ha na nI la~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni Da hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM badzra tsan Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M phaT swA hA/ tad ya thA b+ho b+ho pAn nA ga a d+hi pa ta ye/ i dan

nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra sha rI ra~M/ badzra pA Ni hr-I da yaM/ yaHsa mA tri kra ma tha/ ku ud sAd ni/ b+ha bi Sh+yan+ti/ tad ya thA bud d+ha bud d+ha/ bi bud d+ha bud+d+ha ma hi prA pa ta/ ha ra ha ra nA gA nA~M/ prA ha ra nA~M gA NaM/ ha nA ts+tshin da ts+tshin da nA ga hr-i da yA ni/ b+hin da b+hin da nA

ga d+ha ma ni/ bi si ma d+ha nA ga sha ri rA~M/ bi s+pho Ta ya nA ga nA ni/ tad ya thA/ oM AHhU~M phaT/ nA ga bi dA ra NA ya hU~M nA go ta sA da nA ya hU~M phaT/ nI lA~M bA sa nA ya hU~M phaT/ a pra ti ha ta ba la par kra mA ya hU~M phaT/

kr-i tAn tA ya phaT/ kr-i tAn ta rU pA ya phaT/ ro Sha NA ya phaT/ trA sa nA ya phaT/ kusmaN D+rod sA da nA ya phaT/ pre ta pi shA tsa bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ yak+Sha a pa smar bi nA sha /ka rA ya phaT/ ha sa ha sa/ da ra da ra/ mA ra ya

mA ra ya/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ sarba big+h+ran bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ sarba sha trU~M saM g+ha bi nA sha ka rA ya phaT/ nI lAM ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni rA dz+nya pa ya ti swA hA/ oM badzra trai lokya bi dza ya hU~M phaT/ oM trai lokya bi dza ya

bisma swA hA/ mA ra ya tsit+ta rbad rbad/ oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA kA lA ya hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA kA la gu na hr-i da hU~M phaT/ tsit+ta kro d+hi dun dza dza/ oM badzra kro d+ha a mr-i ta nA ga hU~M phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kuN Da li si kha~M ku ru hU~M phaT/

mA ra ya rak+ta rngubs rngubs/ oM badzra kro d+ha ku be rA dza ya hU~M phaT/ oM Ar+ya dzaM b+ha la dza len drA ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ mA ra ya ke chom cho~Mm/ ma hA de ba mA ra ya sod/ ma hA nA ga mA ra ya dza dzaH/ ma hA de bi mA ra ya ha na ha na/

ma hA ma nu mA ra ya gtubs gtubs/ ma hA grub pa mA ra ya tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ma hA yak+Sha mA ra ya b+hin da b+hin da ma hA gan d+harba mA ra ya khas khas/ ma hA ma ri ni mA ra ya nA~M/ ma hA nI lA~M ba ra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni yak+Sha hU~M/ mu ru

ta mu ru ta hU~M phaT/ mA ra Na sod sod/ mA ra Na bying bying / mA ra Na rmugs rmugs/ mA ra Na ha la ha la/ mA ra Na myos myos/ mA ra Na myos bying / mA ra Na thum ril dza dza/ ka ka rak+Sha~M hU~M hU~M s+t+wa~M b+h+yo dzA kha khA/ t-i rak+Sha

hU~M hU~M s+t+wa~Mb+h+yo dzA kha khA/ tsa pa rak+Sha hU~M hU~M s+t+wa~M b+h+yo dzA kha khA/ tsa ka rak+Sha hU~M hU~M s+t+wa~M b+h+yo dzA kha khA/ mun du rak+Sha hU~M hU~M s+t+wa~M b+h+yo dzA kha khA/ ka ka rak+Sha sa ma ya bud d+ha ya spu ta ra tsa pa rak+Sha sa ma ya bud d+ha ya spu ta ra/ tsa ka rak+Sha sa ma ya bud d+ha ya spu ta ra/ tsa ka rak+Sha sa ma

ya bud d+ha ya spu ta ra/ mun+Ta du du rak+Sha sa ma ya bud d+ha ya spu ta ra/ hU~M hU~M hril hril/ dim dim/ phob phob/ sha ra sha ra/ di ri di ri rbad rbad/ kha tha~M kha tha~M/ thu~M/ sa/ dza re dza re b+h+yo/ ha sa ha sa/ te pa te pa/ kri ta ha

kri ta ha/ kri khug kri khug /tshal pa tshal pa/ rbad ling rbad ling / srog tshig nan rbad/ lus dul mA ra ya rbad/ ra~M ra~M dz+wa la dz+wa la shi shi/ rdul bun rbad sod/ nA ga ma ra ya hU~M phaT/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hA~M/ d+ha ma ka gi ti ra/

d+harma te sha sa mun dza/ d+harma te sha ta ka ra/ d+harma te sha tsa ka ra/ d+harma te sha sa ma ya/ bud d+ha ya pu ta ra/ te pa te pa kha khA ra~M/ te pa te pa ka tsa ri/ te pa te pa mun du ri/ te pa te pa bu s+t+wa~M ta ra/ te pa te pa sa dza

sa mu~M dza/ tsi ka ra mun du ra khe/ badzra tsa man ran dzA dzA/ te sha ra~M/ mun du nan/ badzra dzu ru dzu ru ra~M/ dzu ru dzu ru sa mu~M dza dzA hA~M/ badzra g+he ne khe dza/ badzra pur+Ni khe dza/ badzra mun d+ha re khe dza/ kha dza rA dza mun du ra khe/ kha dza

R+dzA mun du ra sa mu~M khe/ pad ma ra Ni kha dza rA dzA mun du rA dzA khe/ kha dza rA dza mun du ra sa mun dza ra khe dzu dzu dza dza khA hi dza/ oM kA ya wA ka tsit+ta i da~M ba ling / buny+dza dzi g+h+ra phul+la d+hu pa mA~M sa se/ sa khan+ti khun

Ni phaT ga ta/ oM a mri ta pra ta dza ga sa ka ru pU dzA khA hI/ raka ta pi ba ta ka sa ru pU dza khA hi/ d+hU pe/ puSh+pe/ a lo ke/ gan d+he nai bi d+ye/ ka sa ka ru pU dza khA hi/ oM a kA ro mu kha~M` sarba d+harmA NA~M/ Ad+ya nud pan na

twAta oM AHhU~M/ 'di ni rin chen sngags kyi mchog /ma lus dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i dpal/ /gzungs ma khyod la nyer bshad pas/ /'di ni mi 'da'i dam tshig yin/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud

kyi rgyal po las gsang sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi 'khor ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa

legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /nga yi 'khor ni bsam mi khyab/ /'di tsam grangs ni sangs rgyas kyis/ /bskal par grangs kyang shes

mi 'gyur/ /de bas nam mkha'i tshad dang mtshungs/ /mdor bsdus nas ni bshad par bya/ /sku yi 'khor ni khro bo bcu/ /rigs lnga'i ngo bo sku gsung thugs/ /mi 'gyur gdug pa 'dul ba yin/ /thugs kyi 'khor ni rigs brgya ste/ /

mdor bsdus sprul pa'i khro bo bzhi/ /gsung gi 'khor ni dpag med kyang / /rigs drug 'dus pa'i khyung chen yin/ /sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab bo/ /gdul bya'i 'khor ni klu chen brgyad/ /gsung gis de rigs
'dul ba yin/ /gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i tshogs/ /lnga brgya rigs bsdus sku yis 'dul/ /thugs kyis lha srin gdug pa 'dul/ /byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul/ /'di la 'dis 'dul sprul

pa'i tshogs/ /smon lam dbang gis byung ba ste/ /bsam gyis mi khyab des 'dul ba/ /rigs la brjod par ga la nus/ /mdor bsdus mdzes ma khyod la bstan/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las
'khor nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang las sgrub pa'i rim pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul 'dod pa'i/ /rdo rje khyung

chen stobs chen 'dul/ /nga yi gsung gi sprul pa ste/ /mche ba rno dbal drag po gtsigs/ /ba~M las rgya mtsho'i ri rab steng / /yi ge hU~M las byung ba yi/ /dpa' bo klu 'dul sgom par bya/ /sku mchog nag po zhal dgur ldan/ /

rtsa zhal mthing nag g.yas pa dkar/ /g.yon pa dmar po de steng du/ /dbus dmar g.yas pa ljang ba ste/ /g.yon pa btso ma gser dang 'dra/ /de steng dbus dkar g.yas pa gnag /g.yon pa bai dur+ya ltar sngo/ /

thams cad spyan gsum rdo rje'i mchu/ /spyi gtsug rin chen rdo rje rwa/ /phyag ni bcwo brgyad g.yas pa na/ /rdo rje ral gri dgra sta zhags/ /mdung dang lcags kyu mda' dang ni/ /rtse gsum las kyi bya khyung bsnams/ /

rim bzhin chu bdag mtha' yas dang / /nor rgyal stobs rgyu dung skyong dang / /pad ma pad chen rigs ldan dang / /'jog po klu dgur ro stod lha/ /thal sbyor gtso la rin chen stob/ /mjug ma phyag la dkris mdzad de/ /kun kyang rang rang kha dog 'dzin/ /

sbrul mgo bdun pa sprin bzhin gtibs/ /g.yon pa dril bu be con dang / /'khor lo rgya gram thod dbyug che/ /sbrul gyi rgyal mtshan gzhu dang ni/ /gtum chung phur dang khyung phur ro/ /rim bzhin rlung 'byin dga' ma dang / /mdzes ldan dpa' mo

'od byed ma/ /grub ma brtan ma dge ma dang / /gsal byed rim bzhin yab dang 'dra/ /thal sbyar gtso la pad ma 'bul/ /gdengs ka gsum gyis 'dud byed ma/ /g.yon du rim bzhin bsam par bya/ /zhabs bzhi chu srin

ru sbal dang / /phag dang lto 'phye'i steng na bzhugs/ /gshog pa rig bzhi'i rdo rje ste/ /mjug ma ral gri rigs bzhir ldan/ /sder chen lpags la me 'bar bas/ /rab tu gtum zhing sa bdag dang / /klu rigs ma lus brlag mdzad pa/ /

'og min gnas su sleb par bsam/ /de rjes gnas gsum yi ges brgyan/ /oM AHhU~M dkar dmar zhing gnag /sprul pa go cha'i sngags bsam pa/ /oM hU~M trA~M hrI A/ spyi bo mgrin pa snying ka dang / /lte ba gsang gnas

bsam par bya/ /e ba~M ma yA dpung ba dang / /dpyi'i stengs su bsam par bya/ /hU~M swa hI a brang dang ni/ /sogs dprag ltong mo lte lkog bsam/ /dzaHhU~M ba~M hoHsgo bzhir bsam/ /staM dza ya a sprul pa dang / /yang sprul bsam gyis mi khyab

bsam/ /de nas gsang ba'i sngags bstan pa/ /las kyi khyung chen drag po'i sngags/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu bsdus pa/ /oM badzra khyung kar khyung kar badzra ga ru Da tsa le tsa le hU~M phaT/ sku yi gsang ba'i sngags su bstan/ /

oM badzra ga ru Da hU~M` srog tshig nan rbad/ lus dul nA ga mA ra ya phaT/ raM raM dz+wa la dz+wa la zhi zhi rdul bun rbad phaT/ gsung gi rig pa dam pa'o/ /oM badzra tsaN Da ga ru Da hU~M mA ra ya mA ra ya/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ badzra ba ti ga ru Da be ge hU~M dza dza ri dza pri ja
hU~M phaT/ thugs gsang rdo rje gtum po'i sngags/ /drag byed thams cad rlag par byed/ /klu rnams snying khrag 'thig pa yin/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig 'di/ /rin chen bzhin du rnyed dka'
bas/ /'di la rtag tu 'bad par bya/ /'thun pa'i rdzas kyi gtor ma sbyin/ /de yi nang du gnod pa dgug /oM badzra shrI ma mA na ga sa b+h+yi ta cho ga khug ma~M ling d+hing swA hA/ 'dis ni bkug la lha
la 'bul/ /gal te gsad par 'dod pas na/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rig pa la/ /phur bu gnyis pa'i drag sngags dang / /gsad pa spyi yi sham bur gdags/ /gzugs brnyan phur

bus btab par bya/ /tshangs pa yin yang nges par brlag /oM badzra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na badzra kI la ya sarba big+h+nan mung+ga ra kI la ya A ko Ta ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra tsaN Da ga ru Da kI li kI la ya sarba bag+h+ni
na mud ga ra kI la ya A kro Ta ya hU~M phaT/ gtum chung phur bus btab pa'i sngags/ /de rjes gzugs brnyan ma lus pa/ /drag po'i thab tu bsregs par bya/ /tsher ma can gyi me sbar la/ /khyung chen gtum

po'i nga rgyal gyis/ /nA ga b+hu mi pa ti sarba kA ya bA ka tsit+ta badzra dz+wa lAn la a na la hU~M/ ci rigs sngags kyis bsreg pa dang / /thal ba dkar gsum sbyar bya ste/ /rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu la dor/ /de ltar las kyi

sbyor ba de/ /lan bdun byas par gyur na ni/ /klu chen dug gis snying la zin/ /nges par sos par 'gyur ba yin/ /gal te mi gtong klu chen gyi/ /lus dang khang par bcas pa la/ /me dang rdo rje'i char pa yis/ /
skad cig nyid la 'tshig par 'gyur/ /de bas dam tshig mi 'da' bas/ /las 'di myur bar mi bya'o/ /las kyi gtum po khyung sgrub pa/ /mdzes ma khyod la bstan pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das

phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sgrubs pa'i lha rdo rje gtum po khyung gi bsgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi sku'i

sprul pa/ pho nya gnod sbyin nag po'i sgrub pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs

par nyon/ /nga yi gnod sbyin nag po 'di/ /bya ba'i las kun thog pa med/ /khyad par drag po'i phrin las 'grub/ /dur khrod brag rdzong nags phug tu/ /nag po'i sa la dkyil 'khor bya/ /pad ma 'dab brgyad sgo dang bcas/ /

mthing nag gru gsum me 'od ldan/ /su~M las ri rab steng du hU~M/ /'od zer 'phro 'dus rdo rjer bsam/ /de las gnod sbyin nag po ni/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs gsum ldan/ /g.yas pa 'jigs pa stag gi zhal/ /
g.yon pa stobs chen seng ge ste/ /phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'dzin/ /gnyis pa rtse gsum gsum pa phur/ /g.yon pa dril chen lcags kyu dang / /thod pa khrag gis bkang ba yin/ /g.yas pa gtum pas

bdud mo brdzis/ /g.yon pas bdud pho nyi gdong mnan/ /phur zhabs dmar po me 'bar bas/ /gnod byed bgegs kyi mgo la btab/ /thod phreng mi'i pags pa gyon/ /dur khrod rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan/ /dbu skra dmar po thur

du 'phyang / /spyan gsum mche ba rab tu gtsigs/ /har har dgod cing gdug pa 'dul/ /sprul pa'i gnod sbyin stong dang bcas/ /rdo rje 'chang gi bka' bzhin sgrub/ /de yis rig pa phul ba ni/ /oM badzra yak+Sha kA la tsaN Da nI lA~M ba ra

d+ha ra sha rI ra hU~M phaT/ rtsa ba'i gsang sngags 'bum du bzlas/ /grub par gyur nas gang dmigs la/ /rjes tsha ba'i 'bru dang ni/ /tshwa las ling gar 'khor lo gzhug /dmigs pa bstibs la 'grub gnas gzhug /de steng yungs

kar zi ra dang / /dug gi rigs kyis brab par bya/ /gsang ba drag po'i sngags 'di zlas/ /oM badzra yak+Sha kA la tsaN Da nI lA~M ba ra d+ha da ra sarba sha trU~M bi d+ha rA ya phaT/ ha ra ha ra phaT/ pra ha ra pra ha ra

phaT/ ts+tshin da ts+tshin da phaT/ b+hin da b+hin da phaT/ bi s+pho Ta ya bi s+pho Ta ya phaT/ sarba sha trU~M kA ya bAka tsit+ta bi nA sha ka ra ya phaT/ ji srid ma shi'i bar du brab/ /grub nas rigs med thod par gzhug /tse ti chen po'i

'og tu sba/ /steng du ri rab rdo rje yis/ /mnan pa byas pas nges par rlag /yang na gnod sbyin chen po te/ /dur khrod ras la bris byas la/ /de yi snying gar sngags 'di bri/ /e yi nang du chud par ni/ /oM badzra yak+Sha kA

la tsaN Da sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sid d+hi hU~M/ phyag la yak+Sha pa ta li/ /zhabs la ka~M ma~M b+ha ra bri/ /de nyid gtor ma chen po la/ /bcug ste sngon po'i dar gyis dgab/ /de steng ras sam shing lo la/ /gnod sbyin srog gi 'khor lo ni/ /

lte ba rtsibs bcu mu khyud bcas/ /yang brtsibs bcu dang mu khyud ldan/ /me 'od ldan pa bri byas te/ /sngags kyi 'khrul 'khor bkod nas kyang / /las kyi ming dang spel ba bri/ /'di ni gnod sbyin srog yin te/ /mi 'da'

bka' yi dam tshigs yin/ /las rnams gang bcol sku yis byed/ /yang na rgyal rigs thod pa la/ /gnod sbyin bris la tsha ba'i mar/ /chang dang bsres la byug bya ste/ /nyin re gang 'dod las dang sbyar/ /me tog kha dog mthun

pas brab/ /bsgo ba'i phrin las 'grub par 'gyur/ /chu dar sngon po'i gzhi ma la/ /gser gyis 'khor lo bri bar bya/ /lte ba rtsibs brgyad mu khyud ldan/ /phyi ma re'u mig bcu drug par/ /sa bon sngags dang

spel byas te/ /kun gyi mtha' ru phrin las sngags/ /bris pa mgul du btags pa yis/ /mi mthun phyogs rnams bsrung 'gyur te/ /bung ba me la bya ba bzhin/ /khyi sha btags pa'i ri lu'i nang / /dgra yi gzugs bris sngags dang spel/ /

nyi nub bya rog la byin te/ /sngags bzlas phyir zhing lan grangs ni/ /brgya 'am stong du byas gyur na/ /gang yin gnas nas bskrad par 'gyur/ /khyi 'brel spu la srad bu byas/ /mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas te/ /sngags re zhing

yang gnod sbyin re/ /'bras kyi nang du bskyur ba na/ /phub ma 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin khyim du bcangs pa na/ /mi phyugs la sogs 'khrigs pa na/ /khyim dang 'dra bar 'brel par 'gyur/ /khyi nag snying du gnod sbyin gyis/ /

snying dang sku dang sngags bcug nas/ /bcings pa tsam gyis gnod sbyin nyid/ /lus dang grib mar 'dre bar 'gyur/ /skad cig tsam yang sgrub pa po/ /de yis stong par mi byed do/ /de las sogs pa'i las kyi rim/ /mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa

yin/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gnod sbyin nag po sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rnal 'byor bsam

gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzogs pa'i rim pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis

legs par nyon/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rdzogs pa che/ /lha yi bya ba sngon song ste/ /bskyed la dmig pa thob nas ni/ /snying gar ye shes sems dpa' bsam/ /de'i rang bzhin snying nang du/ /pad ma 'dab bzhi'i thigs les

brgyan/ /nyi zla'i bar du rgya sran tshad/ /de yi nang du gnas pa'i srog /a shad mar me'i rtse ltar sgom/ /de la dmigs pa brtan pa dang / /ci yang bsam par mi bya ste/ /bsam gyis mi khyab de bsams na/ /de las ye
shes skye bar 'gyur/ /gsal zhing mi rtog rig pa'i sku/ /ye shes zhes ni de la bya/ /rten med rnam dag gsal ba yin/ /rtog pa rten can bsgom 'dod pas/ /sku yi gnas su 'khor lo ni/ /dkar po rtsa 'dab
sum bcu gnyis/ /mtshan gyi thabs gyis chas brgyan pa/ /gsung gi gnas su rtsa 'dab ni/ /bcu drug dmar po shes rab ste/ /de la thabs kyis nges par brgyan/ /thugs kyi gnas su dus sbyor brgyad/ /gtso

bo'i yi ge brgyad gnas pa/ /phrin las bya ba'i gnas dag tu/ /dbyug gu'i grangs kyi rtsa gnas pa/ /shes rab gnyis 'gyur kha dog dmar/ /de dbus gnyis med g.yas dang g.yon/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam par dbye/ /

gtog pa sad pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /thabs la drug dang shes rab drug /tha ma bde ba 'dzin pa yis/ /mi rtog dpa' bo gnas pa yin/ /yi ge bzhi yis rgyan mdzad de/ /bde 'dzin 'khor lor yi ge med/ /brjod pa thams cad spangs pa ste/ /
'dus ma byas pa'i rang bzhin mchog /khu ba khrag dang chu ser gnas/ /'di ni lam gsum 'jom byed pa'o/ /skad cig rlung gi rta yis ni/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis bskul nas/ /gnyis med ye shes skye bar
'gyur/ /ye shes kyis ni tog pa bsreg /thal ba'ang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'i/ /rtags lnga rim par 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas dpal gyi yon tan te/ /yang nas yang du goms par bya/ /sde pa bzhi yi longs

spyod ni/ /gnas su yang dag skye bar 'gyur/ /gnyis med bde ba'i gnas thob nas/ /skye 'chi la sogs rgyun chad de/ /'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i gnas/ /thob par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/ /'di ltar rnam par dag pa ni/ /

nyin mtshan cha yi dbye ba yis/ /dbyug gu chu tshod dus sbyor sogs/ /brtsi ba'i rnal 'byor ngal ba'i rgyu/ /thams cad gcig tu bsdom gyur na/ /mi rtog mnyam nyid nam khar dag /'bad med ye shes lhun gyis grub/ /

dang po'i sangs rgyas ye shes che/ /khams gsum thams cad sgrol mdzad ma/ /shes rab yum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mi gnas spros bral 'dus ma byas/ /legs rtogs bla ma mchog la 'dud/ /brjod par dka' ba'i rnal 'byor 'di/ /

mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin/ /dpa' bo brtan par ma gyur na/ /yi ge hU~M gi sbyor ba yis/ /'jig rten khams kun 'jig par 'gyur/ /me yis bud shing bsreg mdzad de/ /shing med me yang ji ltar gnas/ /rtan g.yo

nyams par gyur pa na/ /mi shigs yi ge rnam par dag /'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste/ /gsang ba bla na med pa 'di/ /bdag med rtog pa khyod la bshad/ /gzhan du gang ga'i bye ma dang / /mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas rnams

kyis kyang / /brjod par nus pa ga la yod/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las bsam gyis mi khyab pa rdzogs pa'i rim pa/ bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// //

dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi rigs dag la dbang bskur ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /

bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /dang por slob dpon mtshan nyid kyang / /mdzes shing dul la byams sems ldan/ /sngags dang rgyud kyi de nyid mkhas/ /snyan par smra zhing gtong la

dga'/ /bstan zhing bden smra byams sems ldan/ /bsam pa shes shing gsong por smra/ /dam tshig ldan zhing sngags tshul khas/ /phyag rgya dkyil 'khor brda rnams mkhas nyid bcu shes pa snying rjer ldan/ /

'jig rten pa rnam spangs pa/ /mkhas pas de nyid shes nas kyang / /de ni sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /byang chub sems dang dgra bcom dang / /nyan thos rang rgyal gong na med/ /de lta'i bla ma srog ltar bstan/ /
gal te slob dpon smod pa la/ /dngos grub rmi lam du yang med/ /de bas bla ma mnyes byas la/ /bla gos phrag pa la g.yogs te/ /pus btsugs thal sbyar me tog thogs/ /dkyil 'khor bri bar gsol bar bya/ /

grong dang tshong 'dus dur khrod dang / /tshal dang lha khang grong khyer te/ /byang shar dngos grub gzhan gnyis spangs/ /ro hi ta sogs zla ba yi/ /lto 'phye'i lto bar shes par yin/ /gzhan du gnyis par

'byung bar 'gyur/ /mkhas pas nyes pa med par bya/ /sa snang ba dang brtag pa ni/ /rim bzhin gtsug lag khang pa dang / /tshal dang rdo leb khang bzangs te/ /kun la brtag pa spangs bar bya/ /slob dpon smin pas
slob ma rnams/ /phung po lnga po dag par bya/ /sa yi nyes pa kun bsal nas/ /laM las byung ba'i lha mo ni/ /rgyan ldan bum pa phyag na bsnams/ /de la mchod cing gsol bar bya/ /oM
tshur spyon tshur spyon sa i ni/ /lha mo chen mo 'jig rten yum/ /rin chen kun gyis rab gang ma/ /bzang po'i rgyan gyi rnam brgyan ma/ /do shal rkang gdub sgra ldan ma/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
rab mchod par/ /mchod yon 'di ni bzhes nas kyang / /dkyil 'khor las ni legs sgrub mdzad/ /oM hi hi hi hi hU~M swA hA/ /gnas pa'i sa la slar thim bsam/ /slar sbyangs bsung zhing
gtso bo la/ /dri yi gdan chen gru bzhi ste/ /'khor lo sum cha dor bas bzlum/ /me tog sngon po'i gdan la bsam/ /rin po che 'am sa yang rung / /bum pa nag po'i skyon sbangs te/ /bya g+h+raM sangs dri
dbyug pa yi/ /uta pal gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /ha sa de bas nad rnams sbyong / /dngul dang mu tig mu men dang / /byi ru gser gyis ye shes 'phel/ /nas gro til bsran ma dang / /mud ka yis ni

lam lnga dag /ga pur gur gum dzA ti dang / /tsan dan a ga ru yis ni/ /gzhan don phrin las lnga 'grub bo/ /chu dang snying po lnga yis ni/ /rnal 'byor phun sum tshogs gyur pas/ /mgrin pa gos kyis dkris pa

dang / /'bras ldan shing gis kha yang brgyan/ /ku sha la 'dug la mtshan ma can/ /rang rang phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /bdug spos thogs la gsol ba gdab/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i brgyal/ /bdag la dgongs
nas gzigs su gsol/ /slob ma rnams kyi don phyir dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dri bar 'tshal/ /rin po che yi mthu bzhin du/ /bka' drin rjes su gnang ba yis/ /
sang ni byon par mdzad du gsol/ /lan gsum bar du gsol bar bya/ /slobs ma rnams la rjes brtse bas/ /sdom gzung gsol zhing srung ba dang / /slob dpon rdo rje can dmigs la/ /gang yang

gsang sngags lha kun dang / /'jig rten skyong ba ma lus pa/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub la zhugs dang / /sangs rgyas bstan dga'i 'byung po dang / /gang dag rdo rje'i spyan ldan rnams/ /rdo rje 'chang gi dkyil
'khor mchog /deng bdag 'dri bar 'gyur ba la/ /bdag dang skal ldan slob ma la/ /byin gyis brlabs phyir bsrung bar mdzod/ /srad bu ye shes lnga yi dngos/ /re re'ang rigs lnga rnam dag ste/ /

chos kun ngo bo nyid med pas/ /phan tshun sngags bzlas bsgril bar bya/ /dkyus su 'khor lo'i nyis 'gyur la/ /sboms su sgo yi bcu gnyis tshad/ /hU~M brjod bdud rtsi lnga byugs la/ /dz+dza dz+dza sgra brjod lte bar
gzung / /slar yang de bzhin ye shes kyi/ /thig chen nam mkhar gdab par bya/ /de bzhin cha ldan gnyis pa yis/ /gtsang zhing rdo rje 'dzin bsam te/ /tshangs pa'i thig chen gdab par bya/ /
gnyis pa zur thig la sogs par/ /nub dang lhor ni slob dpon la/ /byang shar slob ma'i gnas sa ste/ /g.yas kyis bskor bar ma gtogs par/ /g.yon du nam yang ma yin no/ /
de ltar cha yis rnam par byed/ thig skud chad na bla ma 'chi/ /dman dang lhag pas nad du 'gyur/ /phyogs 'khrul na ni slob ma rmongs/ /de bas mkhas pas skyon med bya/ /
rin chen lnga'am 'bru yi phye/ /yang na 'byung khungs las byung ba/ /yi ge bcu yis byin brlabs te/ /rigs lnga rnam par dag pa las/ /dkar ser dmar ljang nag po dang / /dbang ldan phyogs nas
bri bar bya/ /gal te tshon rtsi mi mnyam zhing / /yo dang dma' bar gyur na ni/ /dngos grub med cing rtsod la bdung / /sbom pas nad 'byung phra bas ni/ /nor nyams gal te chad pas ni/ /'chi 'gyur g.yas

bskor ma bris na/ /phur bus btab pa yin zhes bya/ /shar phyogs dkar la lho nub byang / /ser dmar ljang khur bri bar bya/ /dbus ni bai dUr+ya lta bu/ /pad ma phyogs kyi rnam pa ste/ /mtshams ni mdzes tshon

bum pas brgyan/ /sgo la sogs pa'i rgyan rnams dang / /dur khrod ra ba'i nang du bri/ /gtum drag la sogs phyogs mtshams dgod/ /dbus mtho shar dang byang gzhol zhing / /mtho zhing ma 'dres dran bar bri/ /
de nas rdo rje 'dzin dmigs la/ /gus pas me tog dang bcas nas/ /gsol ba 'di ltar gdab par bya/ /dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa che/ /byang chub chen po'i tshul bstan pa/ /mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal
lo/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems mchog bdag la stsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te/ /skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol/ /thar pa chen po'i grong
mchog tu/ /mgon pos bdag ni gzhug par mdzod/ /ces pa lan gsum bar du bya/ /bu tshur theg pa chen po yi/ /tshul chen snod ni khyod yin te/ /gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga mchog /
khyod la yang dag bshad par bya/ /rdo rje mi phyed mthu yis ni/ /mnyam med pa yi ye shes 'thob/ /de bas kun mkhyen thob 'dod pas/ /bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig /bla ma sangs rgyas kun mchod
cing / /rtsa ba yan lag nyes pa spong / /ma grol 'khor ba'i sems can la/ /snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas/ /bsgral zhing grol ba'i lam la dgod/ /bde bar dbugs ni dbyung bar bya/ /de dag rim dang
rim min pa/ /slob ma'i rim pa rnam par brtag /khrus bya so shing sbyin par bya/ /phrin las phyogs dang dngos grub kyi/ /rim par rnam par brtag par bya/ /bsrung skud gdags dang ku sha sbyin/ /rmi lam
brtags la ngan pa na/ /zhi ba'i me yis bzlog par bya/ /gdong g.yogs bcings la ye shes dbab/ /dkyil 'khor dam par gzhug pa'i phyir/ /sngon bsags sdig pa ma lus las/ /dkyil 'khor mthong

ba tsam gyis 'byang / /bu khyod su yin ci dga' ba/ /bdag ni skal bzang rigs yin pas/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa khyod la dga'/ /mig dbye dkyil 'khor lha yang bstan/ /dam tshig chu sbyin mna' yang bsgag /me tog dor la

lha ngo bstan/ /gang dang gang du bab gyur pa'i/ /rigs kyis de la spro bar bya/ /chu dang cod pan rdo rje de/ /dril bu ming gis dbang bskur te/ /rigs lnga'i bdag nyid ye shes lnga/ /brtul zhugs lung bstan rjes gnang sbyin/ /
dbugs dbyung rdo rje slob dpon bsgrub/ /gsang ba shes rab ye shes dang / /bzhi pa brjod med dbang bskur ba/ /gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor du/ /mchog tu rab zhugs mthong bas na/ /deng khyod sdig pa
ma lus las/ /rnam grol rigs su skyes pa na/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam gsungs pa'i/ /rjes su gnang bas dbugs phyin 'gyur/ /dngos grub rgyu yi dam tshig ni/ /bu yis rtag tu bsrung bar
gyis/ /slob mas bla ma la btud nas/ /gtso bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ /de ltar bdag gis bsgrub par bgyi/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa ltar/ /rgyan dang na bza' rin chen
dang / /rgyal srid bu dang chung ma dang / /rang gi lus kyang bla ma la/ /bsnyen bkur tshim pa med par bya/ /deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod/ /bdag ni gson pa 'bras bu che/ /de ring sangs rgyas
rigs su skyes/ /sangs rgyas sras su bdag gyur pas/ /sems can don ni mnyam med bya/ /zhi ba'i sbyin sreg dngos grub grogs/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo dge 'dun mchod/ /nad pa'am mgon med
phongs pa kun/ /kha zas kyis ni tshim par bya/ /zhing skyong gtor mas mnyes byas la/ /rang 'dod 'bras bu gsol ba gdab/ /rjes su dam tshig spyod pa dang / /skyed pa la sogs rgyun mi chad/ /
rnal 'byor pas ni bsam par bya/ /'di ni rigs mchog dbang bskur bla na med/ /mdzes ma khyod la skal ldan bsgrub phyir bstan/ /gzhan du rigs med dug la de yis slar zhing gnod/ /de
phyir 'di ni dam tshig rdo rje'i bkod pa yin/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las slob ma dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // dpa'
mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi 'khor klu sgrub pa'i thabs ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag
med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /gdul bya'i rigs su skyes pa yi/ /gdug pa'i klu chen rnam pa brgyad/ /rigs bsdus
chu bdag ba ru na/ /dam tshig la gnas sog ma med/ /'di dag bsgrub par 'dod pas ni/ /mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam lngas byug /pad ma lha rnam sgo dang bcas/ /sgo rgyan ltos 'gros rab tu mdzes/ /
lte bar rdo rje 'dzin pa bsam/ /mdun du las kyi bka' nyan bskyed/ /pad ma brgyad la klu chen brgyad/ /gdengs ka bdun ldan thal sbyar bsam/ /lha rnams rigs bzhi'i sa bdag ste/ /sgo dang gru chad

rigs kyi rim/ /mchod rdzas klu yi rtsi sman bsam/ /de rjes rdo rje 'dzin bsams la/ /klu chen gnas nas spyan drangs te/ /e h+ya hi nA ga rA dza sa pa ri bA ra sa ma ya dza dza/ rang rang stan la bzhugs par bya/ /
pad ma'i lte bar chu bdag dang / /dam tshig sog med dkar dang ser/ /thal sbyar sbrul gyi zhabs su 'khyil/ /gtso bo rdo rje 'chang la 'dud/ /shar phyogs mtha' yas sngon po ste/ /lho phyogs nor
rgyas ser po che/ /nub phyogs 'jog po kha dog dmar/ /byang phyogs stobs rgyu nag po ste/ /shar lhor pad ma dung dang 'dra/ /lho nub pad chen ser ba ste/ /nub byang dung skyong btsod dang 'dra/ /
byang shar rigs ldan dur ba'i mdog /mjug ma 'khyil bas gtso la 'dud/ /sna tshogs gzugs ni rigs bzhi dang / /sa bdag sna tshogs gzugs kyis bskor/ /de dag sngags kyi rim

pa ni/ /oM badzra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na badzra pA Ni hri da ya~M/ nA ga yaHsa mA ti krA ma tha ud sA d+ha na~M b+ha bi Sh+ya ti swA hA/ rdo rje 'chang gis klu dam tshig la gzhag pa'o/ /oM ma ru ShA ya hU~M phuH
swA hA/ oM s+phu Ta s+phu Ta ma hA nA/ ga rA dza kro d+ha hU~M/ sid d+hi sid d+hi s+pho Ta ya hU~M phu swA hA/ oM a nan ta hU~M phuHswA hA/ oM ba su ki hU~M phu swA hA/ oM tak+Sha ka hU~M phu swA hA/

oM kar ko Ta hU~M phuHswA hA/ oM pad ma hU~M phuHswA hA/ oM ma hA pad ma hU~M phuHswA hA/ oM sha~M kha pA la hU~M phuHswA hA/ oM ku li ka hU~M phuHswA hA/ 'di dag klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi sngags so/ /
rim pas mchod cing gso ba bya/ /mdzes pa'i rgya mtsho gtor ma yis/ /klu rnams tshim pas gdug sems zhi/ /de rjes bstod pa brjod par bya/ /hU~M chu bdag chen po sprul pa'i dam tshig can/ /mtha'
yas nor rgyas la sogs klu dbang rnams/ /rgya mtsho chu gter zab pa'i 'jing chen gnas/ /rin chen sna tshogs yid 'ong spras pa yi/ /gzhal yas 'byor pa phun sum gnas na bzhugs/ /sbrul mgo'i gdengs
ka rab 'bar rin chen gsal/ /yid 'ong nor bu 'dod pa kun sgrub pa/ /rang gzhan phun tshogs don rnams ster ba'i dpal/ /'od 'bar sa 'og mun pa ma lus sel/ /du ma'i bskal par
yon tan sbyangs pa yis/ /klu rgyal 'byor pa mchog la mnga' brnyes pa/ /bsam gyis mi khyab rdzu 'phrul mchog brnyes pa'i/ /yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab khyod la bstod/ /sangs rgyas bka' thob dad pa'i
stobs 'phel ba/ /sangs rgyas sar gnas sgrub la nan tan byed/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel bas gzhan don mdzad/ /bdag gzhan don sgrub khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bde gshegs spyan sngar khas blangs
dam bcas te/ /bstan pa bsrung zhing 'gro rnams bskyangs ba'i phyir/ /khas blangs mna' phul dam tshig dran gyis la/ /phrin las don gyis bdag gzhan don grub mdzod/ /gzhan yang 'jig

rten pa rnams la/ /oM mtha' yas dang ni 'jog po dang / /stobs kyi rgyu dang rigs ldan dang / /nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang / /pad ma dang ni chu lha dang / /rgya mtsho rgya mtsho chen po dang / /
dpal gyi 'od dang 'od po che/ /gzugs che lto 'phye sbrul chen po/ /klu chen 'khor dang bcas pa la/ /'thun pa'i dam rdzas yid 'ong ba/ /dkar gsum mngar gsum gso ba'i sman/ /
rin chen dar dang za 'og dang / /dpag bsam shing dang 'dod 'jo'i ba/ /sna tshogs khyed la phul ba yis/ /klu yi nad rnams med par mdzod/ /phyis kyang mi phyed dam chos la/ /so so'i
gnas su 'gro bar gyis/ /'di ni rdo rje 'chang gi bka'/ /'di las 'das na klu rgyal rnams/ /snying 'tshig mgo bo 'gas 'gyur te/ /lus la bskal pa'i me 'bar nas/ /sdug bsngal gyur na ma legs pas/ /

dam las 'da' bar ma byed cig /nA ga rA dza sa ma ya a b+hi shiny+tsa badzra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na badzra pA Ni hU~M phaT/ klu rnams dam tshig sgrub pa'o/ /de bzhin byas na klu nad rnams/ /skad cig nyid la byang 'gyur te/ /
sgrub po bde bar 'gyur ba yin/ /de bas 'di la brtson par gyis/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa bzhin/ /gtan la phab pas rab tu bshad/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i

rgyud kyi rgyal po las klu sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi 'khor klu gdug pa can rnams kyi nad 'byung ba'i rtags ji lta bu lags/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /klu la rigs drug

la sogs pa/ /sna tshogs rigs su yod gyur kyang / /'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin te/ /nor rgyal dung skyong rgyal rigs yin te mthong ba'i dug /ser po sa la dbang ste lci 'thibs lus po sbo/ /sha babs ra ba bzhi

la khyad par na ba yin/ /bcwo lnga nyin gung rgyu ba'i dus la na/ /nad kyi gnas ni la spyi bor nges par 'bab/ /rlung rtsa babs la sha rus bar du na/ /skra 'byi sa brlang thabs byas nas na ste rna ba dang / /
glo bar 'brel bas sha ro glo lu 'byung ba yin/ /dga' bo rigs ldan bram ze yin te bltasas pa'i dug /dmar po me la dbang ba yin ste tsha zhing gdung / /lus dmar skyi chung thang la mig rtsa
lus po skam/ /'bring po babs sa nyi nub dgongs mo'i dus su na/ /gnam stong bcwa lnga rgyu ba'i dus te de la na/ /snying gar bsabs pa snying mi dga' zhing dran pa nyams/ /mjug tu mgo dang lus la
babs te na tsha che/ /sha ro snying la 'ong bas lce yis ro mi tshor/ /pad ma 'jog po rje rigs yin te kha rlangs dug /dkar po chu la dbang bas grang zhing bsil bar na/ /lus mdog dkar la
lpags pa'i spris ma 'chags/ /tha chungs babs pa yin te tshes brgyad bcwa brgyad na/ /snga dro tho rangs mi bde ske dang dpung pa g.yas/ /brang na tha ma mchin par babs pa'i sa yin no/ /pho bas zas
mi 'ju zhing mig gis gzugs mi 'dzin/ /sha brul tshor ba med de cung zad sha lpags dmar/ /pad chen stobs rgyu dmangs rigs yin te reg pa'i dug /nag po rlung la dbang bas yang zhing
g.yo/ /lus 'dar sems rgod sha 'phar phu shus 'debs/ /yan lag tshigs bzhi na zhing pho 'dang bad kan skye/ /sgregs dang ro stod na zhing sna khrag dag kyang 'byung / /'byang zhing ba lus ngal dgongs
dang srog la na/ /tha chungs zhag la 'bas te tshes gsum bcu gsum na/ /'di ni 'gong rigs rtsub pas smyo 'bog btsan thabs gsod/ /tha ma mkhal mar 'bab ste rna bas sgra mi thos/ /khu chu nyams pas
chu sri sor mo phra/ /chu lha dam tshig nam mkha' yin pas kun la khyab/ /gong ma ci rigs 'byung zhing dus med shes pa zhum/ /lus kyi shed nyams bral te sna tshogs ston pa ste/ /'di ni bcos par
dka' ste gtan la phebs par bya/ /khyad par mtsher ba na zhing gdong la sme ba 'byung / /lus la shig mang ko dri rA gzhob mnam pa dang / /thur sel rlung la rul ba'i dri ma bro gyur la/ /'di ni mtsher
bar 'bab ste chu la khrag kyang 'byung / /so so'i rtags su mkhas pas shes par gyis/ /spyir ni lnga ga gang zhugs kyang / /rim pas 'di ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /me dang grog po phugs rdugs dang / /

ri phug dog pa'i sgo dang dong / /lha khang 'dam rdzab mi sdug gzugs/ /dud 'gro'i tshogs dang mtsho ri gzar/ /snying mi dga' zhing 'tshigs pa ni/ /dang po 'byung bar shes par bya/ /glu len nub mo na dang
shes pa lci/ /yan lag mi bde shu ba g.yan pa dang / /bas ldags 'brum chung dmar sib 'ong / /'khrug cing za 'phrug sha mdog nyams/ /me ris chu grang blugs ltar grang / /grang sib tsha thig sha bkra
che chung byed/ /sha 'phrigs bem dang sbrid cing 'khol/ /mig zlum tsha zhing smin ma byi/ /lag sor sen mo nyams pas phra/ /lus la dri nga chu bur dang / /nya sgangs gnag chu rul dri mnam/ /stod gzer
smad du 'khru bar byed/ /phyi'i sha skams mdog nyams dri ma bral/ /bug pa'i sgo yo bdud rtsi dus med pa/ /yang cig mdor bsdus bshad pa ni/ /dbang po gsal ba'i 'bras bu ni/ /mchin pa'i sgo yin
mig la brtag /rgyal mo 'khor lo g.yang ra yin/ /gnas pa rus pa'i 'bras bu ni/ /mdzes pa so yi mkhar yin pas/ /kha dog rkang bu nus pa blta/ /nus pa chu ba'i 'bras bu ni/ /zangs mdog sen mo'i tshogs
yin pas/ /skye lugs kha dog rtsa ba brtag /mdongs dang sha yi 'bras bu ni/ /khyab pa dreg pa yin pas na/ /chags lugs kha dog 'gyur ba blta/ /drod brten khrag gi 'bras bu ni/ /bud
med gsang sgo'i chu yin pas/ /kha dog ku ya gzugs la brtag /rkang mar bcud kyi 'bras bu ni/ /rtsa ba gnas lugs skye sa brtag /de rnams thams cad rtags ldan na/ /ngas kyang gso bar ga la nus/ /

gsum bzhi lnga la sogs pa yi/ /rim pa rnams dang ldan pa na/ /sngags dang sman gyis gso bar bya/ /phyi nang 'brel ba'i babs sa yis/ /legs par brtags te gso bar bya/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang

ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las klu'i nad zhugs pa brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gi klu'i nad gso ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /byol song klu yis zin pa la/ /'tsho

dang mi 'tsho gnyis yin te/ /nges pa'i rtags chen drug tshang na/ /de la mkhas pas ci byar yod/ /rnams smin las las byung ba yin/ /gzhan rnams gso bar 'dod pa la/ /dka' dang sla ba gnyis yin te/ /dang po sngags

kyi rim pa yin/ /gnyis pa rdzas dang 'brel pa yin/ /dang po sngags kyi sbyor ba ni/ /dbang bskur tshogs bsags rgyud sbyangs la/ /rim pa gsum gyis bsnyen par bya/ /kha cig de tsam gyis kyang zhi/ /gal te
nus pa che ba na/ /gsad pa drag po'i sham bu gdags/ /kha cig de yis 'tsho ba yin/ /gal te gnod tshabs che ba na/ /klu yi rang gshed bzlas pa tsam/ /nam mkha'i klu yis snying nas gzir/ /
rig pa gnyis pa gsham du sbrel/ /rdo rje lte bar 'khor lo bri/ /de la dmigs te bsgrub par bya/ /dug rigs gsal bar gyur na ni/ /sa dug ngos zin rdo rje'i nang / /dga' bo rigs ldan me yi sngags/ /

bram ze'i 'khrul 'khor shis pa yin/ /me la chu yi 'khrul 'khor te/ /de yi sngags kyis gsad par bya/ /pang chen stobs rgyu rlungs yin pas/ /sa yi 'khrul 'khor lte bar bcas/ /pad ma 'jog po chu yin pas/ /

rlung gi 'khor los gsad par bya/ /rang rang kha dog gshed du sbyar/ /gzhi snying sngags rnams dri la bzlas/ /gnyen po mi mthun rdzas dang sbyar/ /gnyen po gang yin lha yi gshed/ /man ngag bzhin du shes par bya/ /

'khrul 'khor tshar nas sem bde na/ /rgyal po'i sdong zla dbye bar bya/ /dus tshod zhag grangs rim pa ni/ /brtags dang sbyar la shes par bya/ /rtags rjes rjes su log pa na/ /sbyin bsreg ci rigs mkhas par

bya/ /phyi rjes drag pos bcad pa dang / /lha dang rdzas kyi sngags kyis gcad/ /mnan pas las mtha' brtul bar bya/ /zhi ba drag po'i rim pa ni/ /mkhas pas brtags la brten par bya/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na

rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las klu'i nad bsal ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi gtor ma bya ba'i rim pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan

'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs pa/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /dkyil 'khor bri dang sbyin sregs dang / /bzlas pa
mthun tshams rab gnas dang / /dbang bskur bskrad cing gsad pa dang / /'byung po khyung dang gnod sbyin dang / /klu dang gnas skyong mchod pa na/ /gtor ma med par gang spyad pa/ /las de 'bras bu
med pa 'am/ /bar chad nye bar skye 'gyur bas/ /gtor ma'i cho ga bstan par bya/ /lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i 'byor pa bsag /gtor ma'i 'og tu rlung lha yi/ /sa bon las

skye kha dog sngo/ /g.yo ba'i rlung yab dang bcas pa/ /de stengs rgod ma'i kha bsams te/ /dmar po rlung las skyes pa bsam/ /gru gsum hU~M las rdo rje gsum/ /sku gsung thugs kyis brtan por bya/ /de steng
a las pad ma che/ /yangs la dkar zhing cung zad dmar/ /chos dbyings snod kyi gzhal yas yin/ /de nas sbyang ba'i sa bon las/ /bru~M a~M dzra~M kha~M hU~M bsams slar yang sha lnga sbyangs pa las/ /mA~M

lA~M pA~M tA~M bA~M bsams te/ /yum lnga'i ye shes rnam par dag /bdud rtsi ye shes rnam dag 'di/ /sbyang dang sbar rtogs sbyor ba yis/ /yi ge gsum gyi sgra ldan pa/ /bde ba'i ro cher nyi mar gsal/ /'char ba'i

kha dog 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje las byung dngul chu'i mdog /gnyis med thabs dang shes rab yin/ /sa bon las byung pad ma'i gdan/ /yangs par rdo rje 'dzin bar dang / /phyogs skyong la sogs bkug la bstim/ /

mdzub mdud gung mo rtse mo sbyor/ /mthe bong rdo rje brtan par gnas/ /rang 'dod dngos grub sar bzhag la/ /hU~M sgra ldan pas sngags 'dis sbyin/ /oM in da dza ma dza la dzak+kha b+hu ta ba h+ni ba u rak+kha tsan da su th+dza/ ma da

pa pa/ ta pa la pa ta la/ aR+tha sap+pa swA hA/ i dam ba ling b+hu~M dzi g+ha phul+la d+hU pa ma~M sa pa~M ga /am+b+ha ka dza/ sap+pa sA ha khan ti khu Ni phe Da ga da swA hA/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA NA~M/ Ad+yA nud pan na twAd

oM AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ 'khor rnams rtogs par bya ba'o/ /lhag par khyung chen mchod pa ni/ /nya sha b+h+reng gi la du dang / /'o ma sbrul gyi sha yis mchod/ /gnod sbyin dag la sha rlon dang / /chang ni med du mi rung ngo / /
ra khrag shing thog rnams kyis so/ /klu la dkar gsum mngar gsum dang / /rtsi sman dar zab sna tshogs mchod/ /rang gi rig pa phul byas la/ /bstod cing gsol ba gang yin bya/ /hU~M khyod kyis sems
can don kun mdzad/ /rjes su 'thun pa'i dngos grub stsol/ /rang gi gnas su gshegs nas kyang / /slar yang spyan drangs tshe na spyon/ /oM badzra sa ma ya muHzhes brjod/ /mchod sbyin 'di dang ma bral
na/ /zhi sogs grub pa brgyad gang yin/ /mchog gi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba las gtor ma'i cho ga bstan pa'i
le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi zhu ba gsol ba bdag gi sgrub pa'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod
kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas bskyed pa'i ma/ /rdo rje bde chen stong pa nyid/ /khyod

kyi sgrub pa bzang po ni/ /'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad/ /da ltar byung ba 'ang de 'chad de/ /ma 'ongs rnams kyang 'chad 'gyur la/ /nga yis kyang ni 'dir bshad de/ /byang chub sems ldan gang zag gi /

rab dben pa yi sa yi char/ /mchod cing bstan dga' bsnyen byas la/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod bya/ /rim pas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud d+hAHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85 ha~M/

rang bzhin rnam par dag pa bsgom/ /oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 ha~M/ brjod med ye shes dag par bsgom/ /bsrung zhing gzhal yas khang pa der/ /mdzes pa'i pad ma la gnas pa/ /chos 'byung
rnam dag pho brang du/ /nyi ma zla ba rnam dag dpal/ /ba~M las byung ba'i lha mo ni/ /sku mdog dmar ljang zhal gcig ma/ /phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ /gar stabs brgyan gyis mdzes ma ste/ /

thod pa skam po'i phreng bas brgyan/ /shar du mA ma kI bsams te/ /sngon mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma/ /g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon thod pa/ /g.yas su sangs rgyas spyan ser te/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis g.yas pa na/ /

rin chen g.yon pas thod pa 'dzin/ /g.yon du dam tshig sgrol ma ljang / /g.yas pa ut+pal thod pa 'dzin/ /rgyab tu gos dkar dmar ser te/ /pad ma thod pa bsnams pa'i phyag /kun kyang khro zhing gar stabs
bzhugs/ /rus pa rin chen rgyan dang ldan/ /mchog sgrub nad rnams sbyang ba dang / /bsrung zhing 'dod pa zhi rgyas dang / /rang gi srog 'dzin phrin las dbang / /rtag tu ye shes pa yang mchod/ /rigs pa

nges par bstan pa ni/ /oM badzra su khA bud d+ha sar+b+ba sh+Ta~M ku ru su ra ka hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM shang ka re shAn ting ka re/ g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ti ni g+hA ta ya/ g+hA ta ya/ g+huT+Ti ni swA hA/ oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni

swA hA/ oM a ka Te bi ka Te ni Te/ ka Ta~M ka Te ka ro Ta~M bI r+ye+e swA hA/ oM tA re tut+t+wa re tu re ma ma A yu Sh+She swA hA/ rang rang las dang 'brel pa ni/ /'bum 'gyur sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /las gzhan dngos grub ma

bsgrubs par/ /lha mo khyod kyis byed pa yin/ /'di ni gsang ba dam pa ste/ /ches gsang bas kyang mchog yin no/ /de bas mdzes ma khyod la bshad/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi

rgyal po las yum bsgrub par rnam par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi las sna tshogs pa sgrub pa ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus

pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /sgrub po phun sum tshogs 'dod pas/ /nga nyid thog mar mnyes bya ste/ /'dod pa'i rdzas la 'khor lo bri/ /de

yi nang du chud pa yi/ /longs spyod ming dang spel bris nas/ /dgug la bcug la sngags 'di bzlas/ /oM tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha na/ tad ya thA/ oM tsa le pra tsa le la lA lu te yA de ba kA ma hA kA la a na tsa ra ya ba sI swA hA/

khri bzlas pas rang ci 'dod pa 'ong bar 'gyur te/ gong bu dgug pa'o/ /rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin du bsams la ta la'i lo ma la ri rab kyi 'khor lo byas te/ zur du hU~M dang hrI'i bar du bsgrub bya'i ming bri'o/ /lte bar

sngags bri/ rtsibs la yang sngags bris te/ rkang pa g.yon pas mnan cing / o~M` tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha na tsan muN+Ti du ma ke sha hrI/ ha na ha na hriHpa tsa pa tsa hriHde ba dad ta che ge mo me pa shi ri swA hA/ zhes khri bzlas pas

rkang pa dgug pa'o/ /oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha na a ri garka tha ta ri swA hA/ sngags 'di bzlas la kha bkrus la/ khyu mchog gi lci ba dang / ldong ros bsres la rdo rje'i gzugs byas te/ lte bar 'khrul 'khor bcug la dgra'i

sgor sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ /bklags pas 'grub 'gyur nus pa 'di/ /rdo rje 'dzin par rab zhugs nas/ /rdza mkhan lag pa'i 'dag pa la/ /rdo rje'i rnam par 'khrul 'khor bca'/ /oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na che ge mo mu kha te thAn ti sa g+ha tshA na ting g+han da na ting la~M g+hA~M

mu tra mu rI she naM che ge mo b+hun d+ha mi swA hA/ sngags 'di khri bzlas khang par mnan/ /nges par shags las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /oM badzra tsaN+Da ma ha ro Sha Na na ma ni kha be rA ya tsi ri tsi ri kam+nya tu be na mu shi tun te ban d+ha si ri kha li swA hA/ rdo rje la ni khrag gis bri/ /gang gis

phyogs mtshams sbas pa na byi ba kha ni 'ching ba yin/ /tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na naM tu na te si ri si ri khi li khi li swA hA/ stag gi lpags pa la bris te/ /gang la btags pa'i spyang ki bsrung / /oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na ma~M ra rak+sha to na sha kar ya swA hA/ shing thog la

bcangs na gdon thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /byi khung shar bltas sa dang ni/ /'ug chung rus pa lang ka'i rtswa/ /sgo lcags khung bur blugs byas te/ /oM badzra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na kur tri sa nA kar ti tshums dang

phuT phuT swA hA/ sngags de brgya dang brgyad bzlas na/ /smyig mas yang yang dkrog pa ni/ /sgo lcags 'bye bar the tshom med/ /dur khrod sol bas bsregs pas ni/ /slar yang snga ma dag tu 'gyur/ /rgya gram nang du chud pa yi/ /

dmag gi gtso bo bri bya ste/ /sngags dang spel nas snying ga ru/ /seng ldeng phur pa btab na ni/ /nges par de nyid rengs par 'gyur/ /byi ba nag po'i rtug pa dang / /sha can ra yi rwa dang ni/ /khyi nag spu dag bsregs gyur na/ /'bru yi rnam

pa 'phel bar 'gyur/ /de sogs las kyi rim pa ni/ /bsam gyis mi khyab ji snyed pa/ /khyod la bstan par mi nus pas/ /sngags grub de yis rtogs par 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i

rgyud kyi rgyal po las las sna tshogs bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi char dbab pa'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod

kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /chu bdag gnas pa'i sa yi char/ /dkyil 'khor pad ma brgyad pa la/ /sgo dang rta babs

sbrul gyis brgyan/ /me tog mchod pas mnyes bya ba/ /bram ze'i thod pa gtsang ma gnyis/ /chu bdag dam tshig klu yi gzugs/ /gur gum bzang pos bri bar bya/ /kha sbyar bar du rdo rje 'dzin/ /zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa/ /
bai dUr+ya ltar gnas pa ni/ /chu dar yang na ras la bri/ /rtsa ba khro bo g.yas g.yon rgyab/ /dkar dmar de bzhin ljang khu ste/ /rtsa ba khyung chen zil gyis gnon/ /g.yas kyi phyag na rim pa ltar/ /

rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri dang / /lcags kyu rigs ldan pad ma dang / /pad chen dung skyong yum dang bcas/ /g.yon pa dril bu rtse gsum dang / /phur bu sprin gyi zhags pa ste/ /mtha' yas nor rgyas 'jog po dang / /stobs rgyu yum

gyis bcings pa ni/ /thams cad gtso la thal sbyar te/ /sbrul mgo sprin chen bzhin du gtibs/ /'dab mar klu chen brgyad bskyed la/ /spyan drangs mchod pa byas nas kyang / /char gyi rgyun chen 'bab par bsam/ /klu chen rtsa ba'i sngags

rnams la/ /b+ha ri sha ya btags te bzlas/ nges par char rgyun 'bab par 'gyur/ /gal te 'bab par ma gyur na/ /gu gul dud pas gzir byas nas/ /phrin las sngags kyis srog kyang g.yo/ /gal te ma bab na rdo rje 'dzin pa

phyung la tsha ba'i mar nag gis/ blugs la sngags bzlas na 'bab par 'gyur/ /yang na kham phor la sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i khrag dang shas sngar ltar byas la skyer ba'i sol ba'i me la sngar ltar bsro bar bya ste/ des nges par 'bab

par 'gyur ro/ /yang na gtum pa'i 'bras bu la/ /sngags kyis btab te klu'i khyim/ /sbyin sreg byas pas 'bab par 'gyur/ /des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na/ /yungs kar skye tshe sbrang rgod dang / /bra ma'i me tog phye mar byas/ /

ra yi 'o ma'i ri lu sbyar/ /sngags bzlas mtsho 'am chu mig tu/ /rgya dang brgyad du bskyur na 'bab/ /des kyang 'bab par ma gyur na/ /rta ru'i khu bas ri lu byas/ /mtshor bskyur nges par 'bab pa yin/ /gal te des

kyang ma bab na/ /pad ma uta pal sngon po dang / /yungs kar zangs phye ba bla dang / /dbang po lag pa rgya skyegs shing / /bur ram ra yi 'o mas bsdus/ /rgya shug 'bru tsam ri lu la/ /lan bdun bsngags te mtshor
bskyur na/ /char rgyun mtshungs pa med par 'bab/ /mi 'bebs klu rnams mgo gas te/ /lus ni bskams te 'tshig par 'gyur/ /nga yi bka' las gang 'da' ba/ /skad cig nyid la brlag par 'gyur/ /
