bzlas ra bar sbas/ /spre'u'i gnod pa bzlog par 'gyur/ /oM tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha na sarba sta~M b+ha ya du ma b+he swA hA/ sbrang rtsi bu ram khu ba la/ /'di bzlas byugs pas dom 'bros so/ /oM tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na

bar ta d+hin dra~M dra~M d+he swA hA/ dug dang lan tshwa ske tshe dang / /yungs kar la phug sa bon dang / /d+ha du ra dang kal bi dang / /ma he phag dang ce spyang khrag /sbrul la rdo rje brgyad byas la/ /phyogs mtshams sbas na gnod pa zhi/ /mtshams

bcad pa yi dam pa yin/ oM badzra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na b+hi d+ha hI ni ka~M b+he swA hA/ sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ /bsrung ba 'di yang mtshams gcad yin/ /aM bi ti pa na hI b+h+ri bi Ta bi Ta hU~M hU~M swA hA/ sngags 'di gang yin lci ba la/ /
bzlas te ma he 'thungs ba'i chu/ /nang bcug zho rnams brlag par 'gyur/ /gser me ma la reg pa/ g.yu mig ma phug pa/ mu tig mu men/ gser gyis bris pa'i khra~M/ ba bla mu zi/ btsan dug gu gul gi

wang spre'u'i spus gtums la/ oM badzra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na ga ru Da tsa le tsa le bdud ru tra mA ra ya/ badzra b+ha ti ga ru Da be ge hU~M ri dza pri dza nA ga rA dza mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ sngags khri bzlas te lus la bcangs na klu

thams cad 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /oM pad mAk+Sha pad mAk+Sha ba ru ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ chu gtsang ma la bzlas te mig bkrus na mig nad thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sug smel dang / 'dzA tI dang / nA ga ge sar dang / a sho ta ka'i 'bras

bu rnams la sngags 'di bzlas te dpral bar shu tras thig le byas na kun gyi yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /oM badzra tsaN Da mA ha ro Sha Na dzam b+he mo ha ya hrI swA hA/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so/ /byis pa gsar btsas srung ba na/ /kham phor

nang du rdo rgyus kyis/ /rdo rje rgya gram lte ba'i nang / /oM badzra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na che ge mo la rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ hU~M bcu bris te lha bstims la/ /mchod basbyin gtor ma sbyin byas te/ /de yi steng du sbyang bar bya/ /lus la gur gum

chus bris pa'i/ /'khor lo gnyis pas bsrung bar bya/ /oM badzra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na ba sa ha do lA yi swA hA/ sA e sa ba dzi hA yi na mA ta yi swA hA/ sngags 'di me tog dang / gos dang / zas dang / rgyan la mngon par bsngags te byin na dbang du

'gyur ro/ /oM badzra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na na ma sa ra nA ma tad ya thA/ d+ha ra da ma hA d+ha na d+ha d+ha Da du De de swA hA/ bye ma dang thal chen la bsngags te zhing la gtor na srogs chags kyis za bar mi 'gyur ro/ /oM badzra su kha d+he b+hi shud

d+ha a l+lI ba ra tsu li tse ra sa ga gan d+ha sA pa mi ha ban d+ha li sa swA hA/ sngags 'di rdo rje'i shing dang / da lis dang / arga gsum la lan bdun bdun bzlas te/ rna ba'i 'og tu bcug na tsau ra ba thams cad kyis gnod par bya bar

mi nus so/ /mi rus la byas phur bu ni/ /bgegs kyi lus can zhal gcig pa/ /phyag bzhi tho ba zhags pa dang / /dgra sta rtse gsum bsnams pa ste/ /dug khrag lan tshwa ske tshe dang / /rgya tshwa mar nag nang du btso/ /

stobs chen sngags bris ras mas btum/ /khyim sgor sbas na 'chi bar 'gyur/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha ba tsa bi d+h+wan+sa ya/ ud sa mA ra ya hA~M phaT/ sbrul mgo gnyis pa'i thod par khyi smyon pa'i lce la dgra'i ling

ga bris te rta'i rmig pa'i 'og tu bcug la sngags 'di bzlas nas gang gi sgor sbas na bskrad pa'am smyo bar 'gyur ro/ /oM badzra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na che ge mo mu pa ta ya phaT ces khri bzlas so/ /shing lo dang stag pa la

rdo rje'i rnam par byas la lte bar las kyi rig pa bcug /dpa' bo g.yul du shi ba'i skra'i thi gus rked par btags la glad la bskor na bgegs 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /gro ga'i 'dab ma la rdo rje'i nang du chud pa'i lte bar sku

gsung thugs kyi sngags dang bsrung bya bri/ de'i mtha' mar las rab 'byam bri/ de'i nye bar bstan pa'i 'khor gyi sngags bri/ de'i mtha' mar shes rab kyi sngags bri/ de'i mtha' mar me'i tshogs bris te dril la lus la
bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las char 'bab pa'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/
rdo rje 'chang gi kri sbyin bsreg gi cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi

mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /thabs dang rdzas dang lha dang ni/ /sngags kyi rim pa phan yon rnams/ /rim pas mdzes ma khyod la bstan/ /sbyang ba'i las ni sngon 'gro ba'i/ /sor ni nyi shu rtsa

brgyad dang / /bcu drug bcu bzhi bcu gnyis dang / /bcu dang brgyad las chung ba spang / /rim bzhin nad rnams zhi zhing nor 'phel dang / /rims rnams zhi zhing zhi las 'grub/ /dbang du bsdu dang rgyas pa

dang / /gsod pa'i thabs su shes par bya/ /thur du rko ba sum gnyis te/ /kha khyer brgyad cha mtho ba'o/ /rim bzhin phyed phyed rdo rjes mtshan/ /dkar ser dmar nag ljang khu ste/ /las dang 'brel ba shes par bya/ /

mchod pa'i rdzas dang yam shing dang / /dur ba la sogs sreg pa'i rdzas/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi rim pa yin/ /rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin par bskyed/ /rgyas la dga' dang zhi la zhi/ /dbang la chags pa khro la
bsad/ /gzhan rtsub bskrad pa la sogs yin/ /dmar ba me phyogs gdung ba'i las/ /bskrad pa rlung ste gnon pa ni/ /bden bral dbang dang dgug pa yang / /lho yi phyogs su lta ba yin/ /gsad dang bye ba'ang
de bzhin te/ /shar zhi byang phyogs rgyas pa yin/ /hU~M las skyes pa kha dog dmar/ /mdzes pa'i zhal gdangs cung zad gnag /dbyug gu ril ba spyi blugs dang / /bgrang phreng g.yon dang g.yas su bsam/ /
ral pa'i cod pan gsus po che/ /rgyan dang ldan pa bsams la bstim/ /bsang gtor 'thor 'thung mchod yon dang / /zhabs bsil la sogs dbul bar bya/ /me tog la sogs rim pa ste/ /gzar bu gnyis kyi

dgang glugs dbul/ /oM ag na ye swA hA/ de rjes me yi mtshan ma brtag /mdog dang sgra dang dri dang ro/ /dbyibs dang kha dog blta bar bya/ /me ni rtse gcig 'bar gyur na/ /bsam pa thams cad 'grub par ston/ /

gnyis 'bar rtse gsum mi g.yo na/ /'bar ba'i 'bras bu thams cad 'dzin/ /rtse bzhi mnyam nyid brtan pa ste/ /rgyas pa'i las la 'bras bu yod/ /zla 'dra snum la dri ma med/ /du be med cing be dUr+ya 'dra/ /nad med

rigs rnams rgyas par byed/ /chu shel nor bu spung ba dang / /pad ma rA ga gsal ba ni/ /sdig pa ma lus zad par 'gyur/ /dmar ser puN Da ri ka dang / /ban du kha dog gsal ba na/ /rgyal srid dpal rnams 'byor pa

yin/ /uta pal ma li u shi'i dri/ /tsam pa ka dang sig kar dri/ /ga phur a ga ru yi dris/ /dge zhing tshe ring dpal gyi gnas/ /zab pa'i skad dang dung dang ni/ /rdza rnga pi wang Da ma ru/ /de yi sgras ni bde ba 'phel/ /
dpal be'u bkra shis gzugs su 'char/ /rgyal mtshan rnga yab phyag mtshan rnams/ /rin chen gdugs kyi dbyibs su 'char/ /dge ba me yi dbyibs su bstan/ /ngan pa de las ci rigs bzlog /de rjes

rdzas kyi rim pa ni/ /oM ag na ye a mu ka s+ya shAn ting ku ru ye swA hA/ bsreg blugs so/ /oM bo d+hi br-ik+ShA ya swA hA/ a shwad tha'i'o/ /oM badzra ta lA ya swA hA/ blag sha'i 'o/ /oM badzra ku be ra ye swA hA/ 'o ma

can gyi shing gi'o/ /oM badzra sham dzra ya swA hA/ u dum wA ri'o/ /oM sarba pA pa~M` da ha na badzra swA hA/ til gyi'o/ /oM badzra puSh+Ta ye swA hA/ 'bras so ba'i'o/ /oM badzra sa~M b+ha de swA hA/ zho dang zan gyi'o/ /oM badzra A yu she swA hA/
dur ba'o/ /oM badzrA pra ti ha ta badzra ya swA hA/ ku sha'i'o/ /rdzas rnams rang sngags ci rigs dbul/ /bstod cing gsol ba'i las bya ste/ /me yi snying gar dkyil 'khor mchod/ /bsad la sogs pa rim pa

bzhin/ /sngar bstan pa las shes par bya/ /de rjes lhag mas ci rigs mchod/ /zhu ba la sogs rdzas rnams ni/ /lha yi zhal du mchod par bya/ /yam shing ku sha la sogs pa/ /'od la mchod par bya ba yin/ /phyag tu zhal
zas 'thor 'thung dbul/ /me tog bdug pa dbu dang 'od/ /thig le snying ga bsang gtor yang / /sku la phul te zhabs bsil zhabs/ /mar me la sogs rim bzhin gnas/ /dkyil 'khor bsdu gshegs rim pa rnams/ /

mkhas pas nye bar brtag te bya/ /dkyil 'khor lhas ni mchog ster la/ /me yis 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed/ /lag pan gyis ni bde ba 'byin/ /'o ma sbrang rtsis rig pa 'phel/ /gro dang sran mas nad kun sel/ /dur bas

srog ni 'dzin par byed/ /nas kyis brtson 'grus la dbang ste/ /stobs 'phel ma sha ka yin no/ /'bru 'phel gso ba'i las yin te/ /sdig pa 'dag pa til yin no/ /'bras kyis nus pa 'phel byed pa/ /zhi la yungs kar

ku shas bsrung / /dpal bskyed pa ni bud shing ste/ /yam shing gzi byin ster bar byed/ /'byor pa 'phel ba mar yin no/ /sbyin bdag bkra shis thab yin te/ /dngos grub kun ster mchod pa'i rdzas/ /thabs dang shes

rab gzar bu ste/ /bdud rtsi mar gyis tshim byed pa/ /mchod pa gzhan gyis ci zhig bya/ /'di ni mdzes ma'i yul yin gyis/ /gzhan gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par

bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sbyin bsreg gi cho ga bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi khyod kyi gsang ba'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bstod pa ji lta bu
lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /nga yi ming

ni nyi shu gcig /dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsung / /mi 'gyur g.yung drung dbang bskur te/ /'di dag mdzes ma khyod la bstan/ /na mo nI lAM ba ra d+ha badzra pA Ni tsaN Da badzra/ na mo g+ha dza kar no b+ho tsaN Da badzra na maH

su b+hu sha ni sa b+h+yo tsaN Da badzra/ na mo rat+na gu Na ka ra si tsaN Da badzra/ na mo b+ha ga ban pradz+nyA d+ha sI ra tsaN Da badzra/ na ma Ar+ya g+ho shi sI na tsaN Da badzra/ na ma sa pra sa rA yi to sI tsaN Da badzra/ na mo badzra la ar tsi shi swI tsaN

Da badzra/ na ma sa su rU pa no pha la tsaN Da badzra/ na mo dur dA ta da ma kam ba raHtsaN Da badzra/ na ma b+he ra ba b+has twa ru pa b+hi tsaN Da badzra/ na mo dro mo kro d+ha bi gra ha rU pi b+hi tsaN Da badzra/ na ma tsa tuHsmA rA rI sha sa Na tsaN Da

badzra/ na mo ma hA ba la pa ra kra ma tsaN Da badzra na mo nai rAd+ma sid+ha nir tA tsaN Da badzra na ma na mo a mo g+ha dza ga dar+tha kr-id tsaN Da badzra/ na mo da sha dig bi shwa nir mA Na~M tsaN Da badzra/ na mo ha hA satwa so nir g+ho sho tsaN Da badzra/ na mo a

tsa lo hi ka dza ta to tsaN Da badzra/ na ma pany+tsa bud d+ha ta ma mu ku Ta tsaN Da badzra/ na mo badzra ma hA b+he sha yud d+ha rod tsaN Da badzra/ rdo rje gtum po'i mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig po 'di 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang yid la byed pa dang

'dri ba dang 'drir 'jug pa dang / glegs bam du byas te 'chang ba la ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /srung bar 'gyur ro/ /sbed par 'gyur ro/ /skyob par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan 'di rnams 'dzin pa

de mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa yang byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig tsam brjod pas kyang bskal pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i bar du sems can dmyal ba rnams su mi skye'o/ /ngan 'gro gzhan yang spangs pa yin no/ /

tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje 'chang lnga brgya yang rtag tu mtshan 'di 'dzin pa'i phyi bzhin rjes su 'brang ngo / /gdug pa can gyi klu rnams kyis mi 'tshe zhing slar longs spyod sna tshogs sbyin no/ /

'chi ba'i dus su yang bai dur+ya lta bu'i sku lus bstan te/ rang gi gnas su khrid par 'gyur ro/ /mtshan 'di gnas pa'i sa de ni lcang lo can dang mtshungs pa yin no/ /mi dang mi ma yin pa gdug pa can rnams kyis nam yang

gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /grub pa brgyad dang sangs rgyas kyang ster bar byed na/ gzhan lta yang ci smos te/ mtshan 'di dag rin po che dang 'dra bar lta bar bya'o/ /'di ni dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis ched du
rjod pa rin po che gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed/ /dpal dang gzi brjid 'phel ba yin/ /phrin las sgo rnams thogs pa med/ /'di ni rdo rje 'chang yin pas/ /nyin mtshan dus gsum klog pa yi/ /phyi

bzhin rtag tu srung bar byed/ /nad dang gdon rnams kun las thar/ /sman chen nyes pa thams cad 'joms/ 'byung po kun gyis bkur ba ste/ /mdzes ma khyod la bstan pa yin/ /'di ni rnam dag legs pa'i lam/ /su 'chang

lag na dpal gnas te/ /rtag tu mtshan 'di brjod par gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las mtshan nyi shu rtsa gcig gis bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// //

dpa' mo rdo rje bde mas gsol pa/ rdo rje 'chang gi rgyud 'di bshad pa dang / sba ba dang / ji ltar gzung ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /mdzes ma khyod kyis zhus pa legs/ /zag med bde ba'i

rgyu 'byung ma/ /bdag med shes rab ma yi mchog /khyod la bshad kyis legs par nyon/ /phyi ma'i dus su nga yi rgyud/ /gsang ba sku gsung thugs kyi gter/ /bla med rgyud rgyal rin chen 'di/ /byang chub sems ldan snying rje che/ /

thos mang shes rab mchog tu gsal/ /dad pa che zhing lha la gus/ /bla ma bsten cing dbang bskur thob/ /dam tshig sdom pa ma lus ldan/ /brtson 'grus che la gzhan don dpa'/ /'jig rten bde la ma chags pas/ /
rgyud 'di mnyan dang bshad par bya/ /de las bzlog pa'i gang zag la/ /ming tsam bstan par mi bya'o/ /gal te bstan par gyur pa na/ /sngags pa dam tshig nyams gyur te/ /nad gdon 'byung po ma lus pas/ /

nye bar gtses te 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de nas mnar med sdug bsngal ni/ /grangs med 'das kyang thar mi 'gyur/ /de bas gsang ba sku gsung thugs/ /snying po dam pa 'di dag la/ /rgya yis btab ste mchod pa dang / /bstod cing sba ba byas gyur na/ /

yid la re ba kun rdzogs shing / /'jig rten thams cad bde bar 'gyur/ /glegs bam sor ni bcu drug la/ /rim bdun brgya yis btab nas kyang / /rtag tu spyi bo'i gtsug tu gzung / /'di dang bral bar ma gyur na/ /snyen pa de yin

bsgrub pa de/ /sgrub pa chen po'ang de yin te/ /sngags kyang de yin lha yang de/ /bla ma de yin slob dpon yang / /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun yang / /de yin bskyed dang rdzogs pa de/ /ma lus dbang yang de yin te/ /
'jig rten bya ba kun spang nas/ /'di la mchod par gyur pa ni/ /tshogs gzhan ci yod rmongs pa'i rgyu/ /cis phyir 'di la 'bad mi byed/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te/ /yum la rjes su

gtad pa'i don bstan pa ni/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo/ /rdo rje bde ma bde ster ma/ /rtog pa gcod mdzad yum khyod la/ /rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung / /gzungs ma yid 'ong rgyal ba'i sa/ /rnam dag

mchod cing sdug bsngal 'joms/ /ma lus 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal/ /rdo rje bde ma phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhes bstod nas rgyud gtad do/ /de nas yum gyis rjes bzung ste/ /dus gsum bde gshegs ma lus pa'i/ /thugs kyi
sras po sde dpon che/ /'jig rten thams cad 'dul mdzad pa/ /dpa' bo khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gtum po dpa' bo 'jig par byed/ /klu 'dul gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /drag po
'jigs par byed pa'i lha/ /rdo rje gtum po khyod phyag 'tshal/ /zhes bstod nas phyag dang bskor bas mnyes par byas nas/ slar yab kyi thugs ka'i rdo rje'i lte bar thim par gyur to/ /de nas 'khor thams
cad kyis mchod pas mchod cing bstod pas bstod de/ gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po gsungs pa legs so legs so/ /zhes mngon par mgrin gcig tu ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/
rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas yi rangs te mngon par bstod par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba mngon par bstan pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
las rgyud ji ltar bstan cing sba ba dang rjes su yi rangs ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// //bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsang ba
mngon par bstan pa'i/ rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ /rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po wa la tsan dra gu ru chen po dang /
bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba glan chung dar ma tshul khrims kyis byang phyogs sham b+ha la'i dpe dang bstun te bsgyur ba'o/ /slad kyis yul dbus kyi dpe dang /

kha che nas byung ba dang bstun nas legs par gtan la phab pa'o/ /rgyud 'di dang gsang ba bstan pa'i rgyud gnyis po gang du zhig la rten nas ci 'byung bar snang zhing sngags rnams shin tu dag par bcos su 'dod na 'ang yid ches pa'i phyi mo ma snyad do// //
This is a blank page without image

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra hri da ya badzra dzi hwI na la nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ rdo rje snying po rdo rje lce dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzung / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugs te/ de na 'khor nye ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /

lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / klu rnams dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ thugs ka nas 'od zer rab tu bkye

bar gyur te/ 'od zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas nas sems can thams cad kyi nad dang mi bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byas nas slar bcom
ldan 'das kyi thugs su zhugs so/ /de nas drang srong chen po nyes 'dor langs te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can thams cad

la nad dang / dug dang / rims dang / dgra dang / gdon dang / byad stems dang / sbod gtong dang / char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / lo tog ma rungs par byed pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad sdug bsngal

zhing nyam thag par gyur na de la ji ltar bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang sba bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen po nyes 'dor nga la rdo rje snying po rdo rje lce dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/

des sems can thams cad la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar byed do/ /de ngas bshad kyis legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis badzra badzra hU~M zhes gsungs pas rdo rje snying po khro
zhing gtum gdug pa'i cha lugs can 'thon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs na 'khod par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mgrin gcig tu gzungs 'di bka' stsal to/ /nyi ma sa zla nan/

klad pa nan/ kun zhi tsi ta ku li nan/ yag sha zlog byed de/ de nas gzungs 'di gsungs ma thag tu bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad 'jigs shing skrag nas kha sbub tu 'gyel te lbu bar skyug cing brgyal bar gyur to/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po

mtha' yas kyang 'jigs skrag nas lus 'dar zhing bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dgra dang gdon thams cad brlag par byed pa'i gzungs 'di brjod par bgyis

bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ na mo bud d+hA ya/ tsi tra mu drA yag sha zlog byer/ de nas gzungs 'di smras ma thag tu sa chen po g.yos par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kha sbub tu 'gyel

te/ gdon dang log 'dren thams cad kha sbub tu 'gyel te/ khrag tu skyug cing dbugs dang bral bar gyur to/ /de nas yang klu mtha' yas kyis 'di skad ces brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can thams cad la bsrung ba dang / /

bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bgyi'o/ /char dus su dbab cing lo tog thams cad bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /nad dang dgra dang gdon thams cad gzhom par bgyi'o/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar bka' stsal pa ltar bgyid pa las bzlog par mi bgyid do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ legs so legs so/ /klu'i rgyal po mtha' yas khyod kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa ltar gyis shig /dam tshig rjes su bsrung shig /

ji ltar nga'i bka' bcag na ngan song du lhung bar gyur ta re/ nga'i ji ltar bsgo ba thams cad gyis shig /de nas gsang ba'i bdag pos rdo rje lce dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs klags pas 'grub pa drag po rab tu mi bzad pa 'di smras so/ /nA ga shig /nA ga byer/ nA ga nAn/

nA ga go la nAn/ nA ga ha na ha na mA ra ya rbad nAn/ sa gdon nag po sod/ sa gdon nag po sod/ sa gdon nag po nAn/ phyu ga tsi phaT/ tsi ga phyu phaT/ lce ba ti phaT/ e ga ra ba tse 'di nA da ga bor ma ma hA pa la sa ta/ ye go de sad te nAn/

thum ril rbad che ge mo mA ra ya/ dza rbad nAn/ nA ga hril hril/ nA ga phra~M phra~M/ nA ga pho ba/ badzra pra be sha ya sa 'di srungs shig byer ya/ b+h+yor ma mA hA a hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas gzungs 'di gsungs ma thag tu nam mkha' la gnam lcags

drag po'i rdo rje'i thog phab nas dgra dang / gdon dang / lo tog ma rungs par byed pa thams cad kyi lus dum bur dum bur gtubs nas rdul phra rab bzhin du brlag par byas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis cho ga bka' stsal pa/ drang srong chen

po sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byi dor byas nas ba'i rnam lngas byug par bya'o/ /tsan dan dang rgya spos dri zhim pos byug par bya'o/ /me tog sil ma dgram mo/ /bum pa gang ba gzhag go/ mar me bud do/ /gtor ma bzang po gzhag go /

lcags sam seng ldeng gi phur pa gzugs so/ /dbus su rdo rje snying po gzhag par bya'o/ /de'i mdun du klu mtha' yas gzhag go/ de nas mchod par 'dod na me tog la sogs pa mchod pa lnga bya'o/ /klu mchod par 'dod na 'khar

ba'i snod du 'o ma dang / klu sman sna tshogs dang / rtsi sman sna tshogs kyis bya'o/ /nad dang dug bsrung bar 'dod na tshil chen dang / gla rtsi dang / skud pa sngon po dang / rma bya'i sgros bya'o/ /klu nag po chen po la ni tshil chen dang / gla rtsi dang / mtshon skud sna lnga

dang / seng ldeng gi phur pas bya'o/ /'byung po thams cad la ni phur pa dang / yungs kar gyis bya'o/ /skya reng 'char ka'i gdon la ni phur pa dang / yungs kar dang / yungs nag dang / ske tshe dang thal chen gyis bya'o/ /'byung po kun du rgyu ba la ni phur

bu lnga dang / thod pas bya'o/ /gzhan dag gsad par 'dod na phur pa dang / gzugs dang / thod pas bya'o/ /gnon par 'dod na thod pa dang / dug dang / yungs kar gyis bya'o/ /lo tog gzhom par 'dod na thod pa dang / dug dang yungs kar dang /

tshil chen dang / khrag sna tshogs la bya'o/ /lo thog bsrung bar 'dod na thal chen dang / ske tshe dang / phur bus bya'o/ /kun du bsrung ba zhes bya ba gzhan gyi sbod gtong bzlog par 'dod na mchod rten dang gzugs dang / thod pa dang / yungs kar

dang / phur pas bya'o/ /thams cad zhi bar 'dod na thab khung rnying par tsan dan nam rgya shug la me btang la/ dkar gsum dang / mngar gsum dang / 'bras dang / til dang / mar dkar la sbyin sreg bya zhing / che ge mo mA ra ya shAn ting

ku ru swA hA zhes bzlas na thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /gang dag gsad par 'dod na sla nga'i nang du seng ldeng ngam gdug pa'i shing la me btang la/ gdug pa'i rdzas sna tshogs dang / ske tshe dang / til dang / mar nag dang / tshil chen

dang / ming byang spel te/ sbyin sreg bya zhing / che ge mo ra sha mA ra ya rbad ces bzlas na dgra dang / gdon thams cad brlag par 'gyur ro/ /bdag dang gzhan bsrung bar 'dod na rma bya'i mkhris pa dang ka ra dang / sa'i bdud rtsi lo lnga

brgya lon pas bya'o/ /klu sa bdag bsrung bar 'dod na spos dang / gu gul nag po dang / gla rtsi dang / mu zi dang / ldong ros dang / dri chen dang / sbrang rtsis bya'o/ /mchog tu bsrung bar 'dod na 'bras bu gsum dang / bu chung gi rang byung dang /

dri chus bya'o/ /khyad par dam pa bsrung ba chen po ni a ru ra rnam par rgyal ba bcang zhing gzungs 'di brjod par bya'o/ /shig byer nAn/ 'go nan ha na ha na mA ra ya rbad nAn/ drang srong chen po nyes 'dor gzungs 'di yid la rab tu zung shig /

sems can thams cad la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar gyis shig /nga'i bstan pa rjes su srungs shig /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ drang srong chen po nyes 'dor dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag

dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// //rdo rje snying po rdo rje lce dbab pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// //

'di dang po ska cog gis bsgyur zhing / phyis gnyan lo ts+tsha ba d+harma grags kyis kyang bsgyur ro/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra su kha kro d+ha tan tra rA dza/ bod skad du/ rdo rje bde khros rgyud kyi rgyal po/ sangs rgyas dang byang

chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bdud las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba 'og min gyi gnas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi pho brang na bzhugs so/ /de'i

tshe 'dus pa rnams kyi dang po sems dpa' chen po yid cher g.yos te/ gus pas bkur sti dang / rim gro dang phu dud dang bsti stang du byas de/ e ma'o byam mgon thugs rje can/ /'gro ba'i sems can thams cad kun/ /me yis tshig

cing mtshon gyis phog /mun par 'khyams nas ri yis non/ /rlung gis khyer ba snying re rje/ /skyabs kyi dam pa bka' stsal 'tshal/ /zhes zhus pas/ der ni mgon pos sku bstan te/ /zhal gyi pad ma rab phye nas/ /spyan gyi gzi mdangs

kun la gzigs/ /ljags kyi dkyil nas bka' stsal pa/ /skyob pa'i dam pa 'di yin gyis/ /rdo rje bde dang khros pa yi/ /dum bu gsum pa ngas bshad kyis/ /legs par nyon la yid la zung / /zhes gsungs so/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud

las gtam rgyud kyi rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /bkra shis maN+Dal legs byas la/ /tshul dang 'thun pa'i bum pa dgod/ /de yang chu gtsang sna bdun blugs/ /gzhan yang shing tog 'bras

bu dang / /mngar gyi rnam pa dang / dri'i rnam pa dang / rin po che'i mchog dang / 'bru'i bye brag dang / /sman rnams blugs so/ /bum pa de'i mgrin pa dar sngon pos dkris te/ /steng du bla re phub la gzhag go/ rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las

sgrub rdzas kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /sgrub byed rang rgyud dag pa yis/ /bskyed tshul rgyas sam bsdus kyang rung / /hU~M las phyag na rdo rje ni/ /dbu gsum mthing nag phyag bzhi mdzes/ /sku ni che zhing mtshungs

pa med/ /zhabs kyis rgya mtsho'i nang du yang / /chu srin sbal ba'i steng du brdzis/ /g.yas g.yon dang po'i phyag gnyis kyis/ /rdo rje gsor zhing dril chen rdung / /mtha' gnyis drug pa zhal du 'dren/ /dbu gsum g.yas dkar rigs

lngas brgyan/ /dbu g.yon dmar po sbrul gyis mdzes/ /zhal dbus mthing nag lcags mchu can/ /steng du mkha' lding tshangs pa sprul/ /dpa' bo gdug pa dpung pa'i rgyan/ /rin chen lhun po'i ri rab la/ /stegs bcas zhum

pa med par bzhugs/ /de ltar lha dang rab sbyar nas/ /de nyid bstan pa'i yan lag gis/ /rang lus tshagasu gzhug par gyis/ /rdo rje bde ba khros pa'i rgyud las lha bsgom pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas mngon

par bshad bya ba/ /sgo gsum sbyor ba shes pa yis/ /gsang ba'i snying po 'bum du bzlas/ /oM badzra tsaN Da sar+b+ba duSh+Ta~M ta ka ha na/ da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ bcwa brgyad sngags kyi rgyal po 'di/ /ma byung mi 'byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /

'di bzlas sngon du grub par 'gyur/ /rtag tu mtshan ma bzang po 'byung / /gzhan gyi sbyor ba 'ong mi 'ong / /rang la nges par ston par 'gyur/ /bsnyen pa'i rim pas thub mi thub/ /'bad pas legs par brtag par bya/ /de nas

gtor ma'i sbyin pa ni/ /oM AHhU~M zhes rgyun du gtang ngo / /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las gsang ba'i snying po dang mtshan ltas bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /sten ni rdo rje'i 'od du 'bar/ /bstan

pa 'phro tshad hU~M du 'bar/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer kun du 'phro/ /'jig rten ma lus sbyangs nas kyang / /slar la thig le nyid la 'dus/ /dgra dang bcas te rang gsal 'bar/ /brten par gyur na spro bsdu bya/ /rdo rje bde khros

kyi rgyud las me'i bsam gtan gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /mthing gi shog gu sngon po la/ /gser gyi 'khor lo bris pa'i steng / /bsrung ba'i snying po legs bkod de/ /gang ming rak+Sha sbyar
bar gyis/ /de yang tri yis yongs bgos te/ /sangs rgyas sems can nyid la bstim/ /de nyid bum par legs bzhugs la/ /mchod cing bzlas brjod gsol ba gdab/ /de nas tshes pa'i dus bzang la/ /

rang ngam gzhan la btags gyur na/ /bar chad thams cad nyer zhi nas/ /tshe dpal bsod nams rgyas par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las bsrung ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /'gro ba dug gis gdungs pa la/ /gdug

pa'i dbang chen la sogs pa/ /'tshe ba 'di ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi dga' sems 'phyo 'gro snying 'dod/ /nyams chung 'thibs dang ltas kyang ngan/ /yang yang na zhing gtam bsnol 'ong / /de ni klu yi gnod pa ste/ /tshor nas legs par

bcos na bzlog /sa srin mi la 'di ltar gnod/ /lus sbrid sha 'phrig sha ro 'byung / /sha bkra thor bu ngo yang 'gyur/ /de yang tshor nas bcos na bzlog /sa bdag gnod na 'di ltar 'gyur/ /gdon yang shin du ldog 'gyur che/ /na tsha'i

zug rngu drag por 'gyur/ /res 'ga' bde ba ltar yang byed/ /skabs su thig le kho nar na/ /de yang bcos dka' shes pas bzlog /gnyan gyi gnod pa 'di yin te/ /shin du na tsha'i tshabs kyang che/ /rkang lag na 'khums dri ma ldog /

sha khrag lud nas mig kyang sle/ /kha yo sna yo chu ser za/ /kha yang mi thub gnod pa za/ /chu bur byur na 'tshang yang che/ /tshor bar mi chog bsgrim pa gces/ /gdon tshogs gzhan yang yun mi rtag /phra mo tsam la sogs pa

zlog /kun la bsgrims te bcos na 'tsho/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las gzhan gyi gnod pa brtag pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /dbang chen la sogs thams cad la/ /mchod dang gtor mas mgu

bar bya/ /ci 'dod pa yi rdzas rnams sbyin/ /rten yod gnas su legs par sba/ /snyan pa'i tshig gi bsgo byas la/ /bum par nor bu rin chen gzhug /mdzes pa'i dar sna 'bru yi mdzod/ /gang gi rten la sbas gyur na/ /gnod

pa rags pa zhi bar 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las zhi byed mchod thabs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /btsan dug gu gul gla rtsi dang / /shu dag shing kun mu zi drug /gsang sngags btab ste lus la byug /gu gul nya

mkhris gla rtsi dang / /sgog pa shu dag dri chen rnams/ /bdug pa byas te yang na bkru/ /gser g.yu byi ru mig ma phug /btsan dug rma bya'i mkhris par bcas/ /bcangs na bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las rten 'brel rdzas

kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// //rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las dum bu dang po bstan pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir/ /drag sngags 'di dag brjod par bya'o/ /oM mA ra Na sod sod/ mA ra Na bying bying / mA ra Na rmugs rmugs/

mA ra Na ha la ha la/ mA ra Na dun dun/ mA ra Na myos myos/ mA ra Na myos bying thum ril dzaH/ mi tshig spangs te drag sngags 'di/ /dbugs ma shor bar sbub mas drangs/ /bum par bstim nas rtags thob nas/ /'thungs sam bkrus na dngos

grub 'thob/ /sngags la gang ming sbyar byas nas/ /yungs kar gdug pa'i phur pa la/ /brjod de las la sbyar gyur na/ /gang la bzlas pa brlag par 'gyur/ /ma bsgrubs lan cig brjod pas kyang / /dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur/ /

ma byung mi 'byung 'byung mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las drag sngags khros pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bskyed drag sngags bzlas/ /dgos pa tshang ba'i bum pa ste/ /mi dmigs ba~M las

rin po che'i/ /bum pa tshul dang 'thun par bsam/ /de nas ba~M dang la~M las ni/ /chu dang sa yi dkyil 'khor bsam/ /lha bsgoms khyad par bum pa 'dzin/ /mchu ni rdo rje'i sbu gu ste/ /de nas sngags kyi 'od zer 'phros/ /phyir 'phros

gdug pa ma lus bsreg /'od zer lcags kyi sbub mar drangs/ /bum par khro chu khol mar gyur/ /de 'thungs bkrus pas gang gnod pa/ /rdul du brlag ste dag par bsam/ /brtsams pa'i las la the tshom med/ /rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud

las bum pa khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bsgom 'khor lo bskor/ /ro ras byi dug bya rog sgros/ /khru gang tsam gyi mtshan nyid la/ /'chi bar byed pa'i snag tsha la/ /'ug pa'i

sgro rtsa g.yas pa yis/ /drag sngags mnyam pa'i re'u mig bri/ /de nas mtshan mar gang dmigs gzugs/ /kha dog rigs bzhi nyid du bya/ /de snying drag sngags re re dgod/ /maN Dal gtsang ma dris byugs te/ /dkar dang dmar dang ser

dang ljang / /rma bya'i sgro yis brgyan byas te/ /lha bsgom khyad par 'khor lo 'dzin/ /'khor lo bskor ba'i rim pa ni/ /drags sngags mnyam pa'i 'khor lo bskor/ /sngags ni/ nA ga tsakra mA ra Na hU~M phaT/ gang bsams 'di la the tshom med/ /

rdo rje khros pa'i rgyud las 'khor lo khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bsgom phur pa gdab/ /lcags sam seng ldeng dug shing la/ /sngags grangs mnyam pa'i phur pa bsham/ /'khor

lo'i mtha' ma bskor te dgod/ /lha bsgom khyad par phur bu 'dzin/ /drag sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa ni/ /nA ga badzra kI la ya mA ra Na hU~M phaT/ /sngags grangs mnyam pa'i phur pa bsham/ /brtsam pa'i las la the tshom med/ /rdo rje bde khros

pa'i rgyud las phur pa khros pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bsgom sbyin sreg bya/ /gdug pa'i shing bu khru gang tshad/ /sngags kyi grangs kyang mnyam par bya/ /sngon dmar skud pas rim gsum dkri/ /

bar der 'khor lo'i srog rtsa gcad/ /lag tu gri thog drag sngags brjod/ /nA ga tik+Sh+Na che ge mo mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ /rim par bgrangs te g.yang gzhi'i khud/ /byang shar mtshams su rnam par gzhag /de nas maN Dal dbus nyid du/ /hom

khung bris te dug khrag byug /nang du hom du gzugs par bya/ /'khor lo gris gtub thogs nas ni/ /grangs dang mnyam par bsreg par bya/ /me de yugs sa'i khyim nas bslang / /lha bsgom khyad par me dpung 'dzin/ /gsang sngags

bzlas pa'i rim pa 'di/ /nA ga tsita ta dz+wa la ra~M/ mA ra ya phaT/ /bsregs nas las brtsams 'grub par 'gyur/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las me dpung khros pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /rdzas bsag lha bsgom mnan

sngags bzlas/ /chu srin sram mam byi ba'i mgor/ /bsreg pa'i thal ba bsdus byas la/ /gang yin nyid kyi sbyor ba bcas/ /lha bsgom khyad par ri rab 'dzin/ /drag sngags bzlas pa'i rim pa ni/ /nA ga stam b+ha ya nAn/ /mnan byas chu srin kha ru

bsgom/ /'di byas gang la bzlas pa brlag /'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las ri rab khros pa'i le'u ste bcwa lnga pa'o// //rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las dum bu gnyis pa'o// // de nas mngon par bshad bya ba/ /glang po'i lpags par

'brug bris nas/ /gang ming bcug ste drag sngags bzlas/ /gnam lcags 'bab pa bzlog par 'gyur/ /'bru yi pad ma 'dab brgyad la/ /klu yi gzugs rnams bris pa la/ /bstim nas drag sngags rgyab gyur na/ /gnam chu dus su phebs par 'gyur/ /

thod par e bris sngags kyis bskor/ /gang yin bcug la bstim pa la/ /drag sngags gang yin bzlas byas na/ /myur du 'grub par gdon mi za/ /srog chags 'jigs par gyur pa la/ /'chi ba'i chu yis drag sngags bri/ /'jigs byed

bkug ste de la mchod/ /de nyid yungs kar thum por 'debs/ /gang la btags pa bsrung ba'i mchog /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las las phra mo'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas de dag la 'khor rnams mngon par dga' ste/

bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bstod nas rjes su yi rang ba phul te mi snang bar gyur to/ /mnyam pa chen po la bzhag pa'o/ /rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// //rdo rje bde khros kyi rgyud las dum bu
gsum pa'o// //rdzogs s+ho// //mchog tu gsang ba'o/ /dz+nyA na kA ras bsgyur ro// // // // // // // //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ mA yA dzA la ma hA tan tra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa

dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i steng na/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po bkod pa/ rdo rje'i ka bas brgyan pa shin du mdzes pa'i rin po che bkod pas rnam par bkra ba/ rdo rje

dril bu 'khrol ba/ yid las byung ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par chen pos brgyan pa/ rdo rje'i 'khor los spras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i cha byad sna tshogs 'chang ba rnams kyis don gyi bya ba byas pa/ rnam par snang mdzad

kyi snying po las yang dag par 'byung ba'i spyod pa bskyod nas zhal bzhi'i sgo'i go skabs nas byung ba sna tshogs dang rdo rje dang / rin po che chen po dang 'od dpag med dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs

dang / rig sngags kyi lha mo rnams kyis brgyan pa/ khro bo'i rgyal po dang / bran dang bran mo dang / pho nya dang pho nya mo dang phyag brnyan dang / phyag brnyan mo du ma'i 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi ye

shes kyi bde ba de'i bdag nyid dang / dmigs pa dang ma bral ba thugs rje chen pos mnyes gshin pa/ sems can thams cad bsgral ba la brtson par mdzad pa/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha'

lding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa mang pos brgyan pa na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs so/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor

gyi khyams kyi dbus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'dug pa la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do/ /'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu

gzar nas 'gying bag can du bltas nas rdo rje gsor te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dgongs pa

ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gang gi slad du gzigs pa dang 'dzum pa mdzad/ des na bdag dang 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur pa lags na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis

seng ge chen po'i sgra dbyangs kyis bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de skad du gsol ba btab ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul

dra ba ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa/ rgyud thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma'i thabs bde ba rdo rje'i ye shes bsgrub pa rol pas mnyes par bya ba'i thabs de kho na nyid thams cad kyi 'byung gnas stang stabs kyis rnam par

rgyal ba'i thabs dang shes rab bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes sgrol ba/ rol pas bzhad cing bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor

dang ri mo'i gzugs dang / bsgom pa dang bzlas brjod dang stang stabs dang / sbyor ba dgongs pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang dbab pa dang / bskrad pa dang dbrog pa dang dgug pa dang bcing ba dang brdeg pa dang bsdigs pa dang

nyam thag par bya ba dang bcad pa dang bsreg pa dang / bkang ba dang bskrun pa dang dbang bskur ba dang sbyin pa dang / slob dpon dang slob ma gzung ba dang / gsang sngags mang po'i 'jog tshul rnams ngas bshad par bya'o/ /

de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin mchog la snyoms par zhugs la nyon cig /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / gzhan yang gang dag 'khor du 'dus pa
de dag thams cad kyis chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam mnyan par brtsams so/ /de la re shig dang po dngos grub ni slob dpon chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin pas/ slob dpon med par gyur na ni/ /dngos grub thob

par mi 'gyur bas/ /slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad par bya/ /ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig /brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan/ /bzod ldan drang zhing g.yo sgyu med/ /gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor shes pas/ /dkyil
'khor bri ba'i las bya'o/ /de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing / /sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin/ /theg pa che la rtag dga' ba/ /de ni slob dpon yin par gsungs/ /phyi rol bstan bcos yongs shes shing / /

nyan thos rnams kyis lam 'gro dang / /gsang ba de nyid bsdu ba dang / /theg pa chen po mi shes pa/ /snying rje yod pa ma yin dang / /dad med brtson 'grus mi ldan la/ /rtag tu ngan pa'i tshul spyod dang / /bstan bcos

rnams la smod pa min/ /gong du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang / /ldan na slob dpon yin par gzung / /de yi dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / /de nyid kyis ni rgyud rnams bstan/ /de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags dang / /'grub

'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /dge dang sdom la dga' ba dang / /rtag tu bla ma la gus dang / /rgyun du lha rnams mchod byed pa'i/ /yon tan ldan na slob ma yin/ /slob dpon ci 'dra blta zhe na/ /bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam/ /

de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang / /de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog /de ni ye shes rgya mtsho che/ /yid bzhin nor bu rin chen bzhin/ /slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung / /skyon rnams nam yang ma yin no/ /yon tan

bzung bas dngos grub cing / /skyon rnams kyis ni dngos grub nyams/ /de yi grib ma mi 'gom ste/ /mchod rten bshig dang 'dra bar gsungs/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang ba yi/ /dam pa gang yin spangs par 'gyur/ /

slob dpon smod par byed pa dag /rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya/ /slob dpon smod pa gang yin te/ /bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis gzung / /ngan pa gtum po las byed pa/ /mkhas pas rtag tu spangs bar bya/ /

mnar med shin du skyi g.ya' ba'i/ /dmyal ba bstan pa gang yin pa/ /der ni slob dpon smod byed pa/ /gnas par 'gyur zhes rab tu gsungs/ /de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrims te/ /bsam yas 'bras bu smin byed pa'i/ /
sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod byed pa'i/ /sems can dad pa ldan pas mchod/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ 'di ni 'jug pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen po ye shes bsgyings pa gsang ba'i byin brlabs kyi mchog rdo rje

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs nas kyang rdo rje 'chang la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi

phyi ma'i yang phyi ma ye shes chen po'i snying po 'bar ba rdo rje bsnyen bkur byed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur na/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur bas phyag na rdo rje sems can gang la las tshon rtsi mthong

ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang / mchod pa byas par 'gyur ba la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas nyid kyi grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur

ba de nyon cig /dang po kho nas yongs su gzung ba byas te/ slob dpon gyis lha nyid kyi stang stabs su 'dug la/ lag pa g.yas pa bsgrims te rdo rje gsor zhing / lag pa g.yon pas dril bu gsil nas rdo rje 'gros kyis

yongs su bskor bar bya'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis hU~M zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi brjid pa gis bskor nas kyang khro bo'i skur bsgom nas sdang ba'i lha dang / lha ma yin

dang gsang ba pa rnams la tshig 'di rab tu brjod par bya'o/ /slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma che ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya

ba'i phyir/ sa phyogs 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po ming 'di zhes bya ba bri yis/ lha dang lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang srin po dang yi dags dang / sha za dang rjed byed dang 'byung po dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang gnon po dang /

nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang / rig sngags grub pa dang / rgan po'am/ rgan mo g.yog dang 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig /'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du dengs

shig /gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni phyag na rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba rab tu khros pa'i bzhin 'bar ba can gyis ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba kun du 'bar bas mgo tshal pa rgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro zhes lan gsum brjod nas/ stang stab

la gnas bzhin du sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /g.yas brkyang ba dang / g.yon brkyang ba dang / sa ga'i 'dug stangs dang zlum po'i 'dug stangs dang / 'thun pa'i rkang stabs dang rus sbal gyi rkang

stabs dang / rdo rje gdegs pa dang / rdo rje 'jo tshul dang rkang pa ya gcig gi stangs dang seng ge'i stabs dang seng ge glal ba dang / bung ba'i 'phur ba'i stang stabs dang rdo rje sgrog dang / rdo rje gsor ba dang rdo rje'i stang stabs dang /

rdo rje dgug pa dang rdo rje gar dang / rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang / rdo rje ro langs ma dang rdo rje tho ba dang / rdo rje'i byin brlabs dang / rdo rje'i gdu bu dang bud med kyi sgyu 'phrul stang stabs dang / rdo rje'i dra ba dang /

stobs po che'i 'degs pa dang / rdo rje mche ba dang / rdo rje gad mo dang / rdo rje sgra dang / ral gri'i thabs dang / rdo rje'i thabs dang / 'khor lo'i tshul dang / gtun shing gi tshul dang / ba dan gyi tshul dang / zhags

pa'i tshul dang / pad ma'i tshul dang / be con gyi tshul dang / mi 'jigs pa'i tshul dang lcags kyu'i tshul dang / 'bras bu'i tshul dang mdung thung gi tshul dang / gzhu'i tshul dang mda' bzung ba'i tshul dang / mda' 'phang

ba'i tshul dang / thag mdung bskor ba'i tshul dang / mchog sbyin pa'i tshul dang mdung gi tshul dang / mtshon rtse gcig pa'i tshul dang phyag 'tshal ba'i tshul dang rdo rje'i 'dug stangs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi 'dug stangs dang /

rdo rje skyil mo dkrung dang / pad ma'i 'dug stangs dang / sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung dang dpa' bo'i 'dug stangs dang / bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang tsog pu'i 'dug stangs dang / rtse ba'i 'dug stangs dang mdun du dgu pa dang / phyir

dgye ba dang mtha' yas dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang sprin sgra dang / gsus po che dang / rgyal ba'i phur bus gnas pa'i bcing ba dang phur bu brdung ba dang / dra ba dang ra bas mtshams gcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba de lta bus/

sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'od 'bar ba'i 'khrigs par bsgom te/ gtan la dbab par bya'o/ /rang gi ming nas smos te/ hU~M zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi sgra brjod na 'khor lo thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur ro/ /

de nas sa'i lha mo sta gon du gnas par bya ba ni/ skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /dngos grub thams cad thob bya'i phyir/ /

bdag gis dkyil 'khor 'dri bar bya zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sta gon du gnas par bya ste/ thugs brtser gnas pa'i dgongs pa can/ /sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs

su gsol/ /sras dang lhan cig gshegs nas kyang / /sa gzhi yongs su gzung bar mdzod/ /de nas 'khor lo'i dbus su chos kyi dkyil 'khor byas la/ mtha' kun du yang mtshan nas smos te thig ler bya'o/ /de ltar

spyan drangs te mchod pas mnyes par byas nas phyir byung ste phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin no/ /de nas sems can sta gon du gnas par bya ste spos chus spyi bor bsang gtor byas nas/ lag pa snying gar bkram nas su/ /rtse mo lnga pa rgya gram bya/ /
g.yas pas bsrung skud bcings nas su/ /g.yas lag so shing ku sha sbyin/ /de nas 'dug ste gsum la skyabs su btang ba dang / sdig pa kun du bshags pa dang / bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang /
bdag nyid dbul ba dang byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la 'di ni skyabs su 'gro ba yin te/ dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi/ /sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi/ /'gro ba'i dge

la yi rang ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung / /zhes lan gsum brjod do/ /de nas ci nus kyis ci 'dod pa'i chos bshad par bya'o/ /de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin du mnyes par 'gyur bas mchod pa'i cho ga

bzang po bya ste/ slar yang gshegs su gsol bar bya'o/ /de nas nang du zhugs la dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhir glo g.yas pas nyal te/ rmi lam bzang ngan bltas nas phyi de nyin dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /tshon dang thig las

sangs rgyas lnga'i/ /ngo bo dag kyang sprul par bya/ /'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste/ /sems can rnams ni rnam grol mdzad/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas/ /rnam par snang mdzad rgyal bdag ste/ /nyes pa

thams cad rnam spangs pa'i/ /tshon rtsi dgye ba brtsams par bya/ /dang po slob dpon nyid kyi bgyi/ /de nas kun du slob mas bya/ /dang po sa gzhi yongs gzung ba/ /gnyis pa sta gon gnas pa ste/ /nub gsum pa ni 'jug

pa yin/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i sras bu yis/ /khru stong pa 'am lnga brgya bar/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab bo/ /yang na khru lnga khru do pa 'am khru gang ba'i bar du bya'o/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs
bzhis ni brgyan pa yi/ /dbus su 'khor lo legs par bri/ /dkyil du rnam par snang mdzad gzhag /shar phyogs su ni mi 'khrugs pa/ /lho phyogs su ni rin chen 'byung / /nub phyogs su ni 'od dpag med/ /

byang phyogs su ni don grub rnams/ /'khor lo grwar ni lha mo bzhi/ /dngos grub sbyin par mdzad par bri/ /dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni spyan no/ /me'i phyogs su ni mA ma kI'o/ /bden bral phyogs su ni gos dkar can no/ /

rlung gi phyogs su ni lha mo sgrol ma'o/ /rdo rje shugs kyis phyir phyung nas rim pa gnyis pa la shar phyogs su ni rdo rje sems ma/ lhor rdo rje rin chen ma/ nub tu rdo rje chos ma/ byang du rdo rje las ma rnams bri'o/ /

grwar rnams su bskul byed ma dang / rin chen sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud rnams so/ /de nas yang 'gying bag tu langs te/ rdo rje shugs kyis phyir byung nas rim pa gsum pa la/ shar phyogs su

byang chub sems dpa' byam pa dang / 'jam dpal dang spos kyi glang po dang / ye shes tog rnams bri'o/ /lho phyogs su bzang skyong dang / blo gros rgya mtsho dang blo gros mi zad pa dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa rnams bri'o/ /

nub phyogs su ni mthu chen thob dang / ngan song thams cad spong ba dang / mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang / dra ba can gyi 'od rnams bri'o/ /byang phyogs su zla 'od dang / 'od dpag
med dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams bri'o/ /shar sgor ni gshin rje mthar byed do/ /lhor sgor ni shes rab mthar byed do/ /nub sgor ni pad ma mthar byed do/ /

byang sgor ni bgegs mthar byed do/ /grwa rnams su ni mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / be con sngon po dang / stobs po che'o/ /zur rnams su ni rdo rje bri'o/ /sgo'i nang logs su yang rdo rje bri'o/ /

'khor lo ni tshon rtsi dkar pos bri'o/ /gnyis pa ni tshon rtsi dkar po dang / ser po dang sngon po gsum gyis bri'o/ /gsum pa ni sna lngas bri bar bya ste/ de lta bu ni dkyil 'khor chen po yin no/ /de nas dbang bskur ba'i don

du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa sgo bzhi dang ldan pa rim pa gnyis par bya'o/ /dbus su ni pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa snying po dang bcas pa bri'o/ /snam bu gnyis pa la shar phyogs su ni rdo rje'o/ /lho phyogs su ni rin po che/ nub

phyogs su ni pad ma/ byang phyogs su ni ral gri ste/ de lta bur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis lus legs par bkrus te/ spos kyis bskus nas legs par brgyus pa'i me tog gi phreng ba mgo

la bcings nas mgul pa dar gyis bcings pa la/ /ldum bu yis ni kha bkab pa/ /rin chen sman 'byung sna lnga dang / /spos chu yis ni bkang ba dang / /bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya/ /rnam rgyal bum pa dkyil 'khor

gyi/ /bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi/ /lha rnams kun gyi bum pa bzhi/ /sgo yi phyogs kyi bum pa ni/ /las kun byed pas bzlas brjod do/ /sems can kun gyis bsang gtor bya/ /yang na ku sha'i chun pos bya/ /de nas bum pa

mngon par bsngags te lha bshos dang gtor ma phul nas me tog dang bdug pa dang / dri dang phreng ba dang mchod yon dang / zhabs bkru ba la sogs pa dbul lo/ /de rnams phul nas bum pa rnams grwar gzhag par bya'o/ /

rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni dbus su spyan drang bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams spyan drangs nas gsal bar bya ste/ gzhug pa dang bsdam pa dang / dbang du bya ste/ phur bu dang /

ra ba dang / dra bas phyogs bcings ba dang / mtshams gcad pa byas la/ mchod yon dang zhal bsil dang / gdan dang me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa yang bsngos te phul nas phyag rgya'i tshogs rang rang la

bstan par bya'o/ /bstod pa dang rdo rje'i glu dang / dril bu bsil ba'i sgra dang / sil snyan dang gling bu dang / rgyud kyi sgra'i khyad par yang dbul lo/ /rol mo'i khyad par gzhan rnams kyis kyang bstod par bya'o/ /bstod nas

bzod par gsol te dngos grub thams cad kyi phyir gsol ba gdab bo/ /de nas slob dpon bdag nyid zhugs te/ de'i 'og tu slob ma gzhug go/ /de nas sems can thams cad snying po 'di dang phyag rgyas gnas lngar bsrung zhing

gnas lngar cho ga bya'o/ /hUM dzi na dzin/ / AHA ro lika / hU~M badzra d+h+r-ig / swA rata na d+h+r-ig / hA pradz+nyA d+h+r-ig / de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gzhug par bya ste/ rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa'i/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /

pho brang dkyil 'khor snying po 'dir/ /bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya/ /rdo rje sems mas me tog gtor bar bgyi ste/ pra tIts+tsha badzra ho/ tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gdong g.yogs dgrol lo/ /de ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni/ /dkyil

'khor deng 'dir blta bar gyis/ /sangs rgyas gdung gi rigs su 'khrungs/ /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs/ /dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /dam tshig mchog tu grub par byed/ /rdo rje pad ma rol pa'i mchog /

sngags kyi bdag nyid shes par bya/ /de yi snying po 'di yin te/ /pa sh+ya badzra/ gang la me tog bab pa de de'i lha yin no/ /de nas dbang bskur sbyin bya ste/ /dri dang me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /gos dang rgyan gyis legs par brgyan/ /steng du bla re bri

bar bya/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /lha dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang / /gdu bu dag dang ska rags dang / /bkra shis yo byad rnams kyis klubs/ /slob ma sdig dang bral ba la/ /slob dpon gyis ni

dbang bskur ro/ /dang por rnam rgyal bum pa yis/ /de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang / /lha rnams kun gyi bzhi po yis/ /bkra shis tshigs bcad glu sgra dang / /rdo rje dril bu bsil ba yis/ /skyob pa kun gyis mngon

sum du/ /til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i/ /rgyal bas bum pa bzung nas ni/ /de nyid la ni dbang bskur bya/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid rig par bsam/ /de lta bur ni bsams nas kyang / /chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par

bya/ /thur ma me long 'khor lo dang / /dung dang rdo rje glegs bam dang / /gser dag dang ni dngul rnams kyis/ /mi shes rab rib la sogs pa/ /ci nus par ni bsal bar bya/ /thur ma la sogs med na yang / /phyag rgyas gzugs

rnams bstan par bya/ /de nas dam tshig bstan par bya/ /de ring phyin chad bu khyod kyis/ /srog dang lus la bab gyur kyang / /dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems/ /slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya/ /rdo rje spun rnams bkur sti zhing / /

sdang la byams shing chags bral ba/ /nam yang bya ba ma yin no/ /de ltar byas na sangs rgyas kyis/ /khyod ni dmyal ba'i nang du 'dor/ /de nas bla mas yon blangs te/ /sa dang yid 'ong chung ma dang / /rin chen gser dang nor bu

'bar/ /mu tig byi ru la sogs dang / /lus kyang dbul du gzhug par bya/ /bla ma la ni gus pa yi/ /slob mas de bzhin kho nar bya/ /bla ma de ni mgu bar bya/ /bla ma mgu ba dngos grub ste/ /gzhan du min zhes thub

pas gsung / /de nas slob ma bslang ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan sngar mchod pa bya ste/ sbyin sreg gi las bya'o/ /de nas cho ga mthong bas las byas nas/ /sbyin sreg bzlas brjod mchod pa dang / /de bzhin
bsgom pa'i rim pa'i tshul/ /zhi dang rgyas pa'i rim pa yis/ /las rnams thams cad tshim par bya/ /de nas dus gsum gshegs pa yi/ /rgyal ba thams cad gshegs su gsol/ /bsgrims te tshon rtsi rnams

bsdus nas/ /chu klung chen por bskur nas kyang / /ba yi lci bas byug par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun/ /slob dpon nyid kyis bsdu bar bya/ /slob mas cung zad mi spyad do/ /de ni dam tshig nyams par
'gyur/ /slob dpon gyis kyang ci rigs par/ /bdag nyid 'dod pa spyad par bya/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas

bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas yang gsang sngags kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /snyoms par zhugs nas phyag na rdo rje
la bka' stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje gsang sngags kyi snying po'i yi ge rnams nyon cig /phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ sems can thams cad la smon pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bde bar

gshegs pas bshad du gsol/ oM las rnam par snang mdzad do/ /oM hU~M mi 'khrugs pa'o/ /oM hrI rin chen 'byung gnas so/ /o~M` hrIH'od dpag med do/ /oM kha~M don yod grub pa'o/ /oM ga ga na lo tsa ni hU~M spyan gyi'o/ /o~M` ki ri ki ri

mA ma kI hU~M mA ma kI'o/ /oM ka Te bi ka Te ka Ta~M ka Te ka ro Ti bIr+ya swA hA/ gos dkar mo'o/ /oM tA re tuta tA re tu re swA hA/ sgrol ma'o/ /oM satwa badzra hU~M/ rdo rje sems ma'o/ /oM rad+na badzri hU~M/ rdo rje rin chen ma'o/ /o~M` d+harma badzri hU~M/ rdo rje chos

ma'o/ /oM karma badzri hU~M/ rdo rje las ma'o/ /o~M` tsa le tsu le tsun de swA hA/ skul byed ma'o/ /o~M` rata nA lo ki rata nA dz+wA li ni swA hA/ rin chen sgron ma'o/ /oM b+h+r-i kuT+Ti b+h+ri/ khro gnyer ma'o/ /o~M` badzra shr-i ma kha le hU~M phaT swA hA/ rdo rje lu gu
rgyud ma'o/ /o~M` mai/ byams pa'o/ /o~M` mu~M// 'jam dpal la'o/ /oM sa man ta b+ha dra hU~M/ kun du bzang po'o/ /oM gan d+ha d+ha sti ni hU~M/ spos kyi glang po'o/ /

oM dz+nyA na ke tu ba ti hU~M/ ye shes tog go/ /oM b+ha dra b+ha ti b+ha dra pA la hU~M/ bzang skyong ngo / /oM sA ga re ma hA sA ga re hU~M/ blo gros rgya mtsho'o/ /o~M` ak+Sha ye hU~M hU~M ak+Sha yak+Sha ya karma yA pa ra Na pa ri sho d+ha ni swA hA/

blo gros mi zad pa'o/ /oM pra ti b+hA na pra ti b+hA na k+'u Te hU~M/ spobs pa brtsegs pa'o/ /oM s+tha me ma hA s+the ma ba ti swA hA/ mthu chen thob pa'o/ /o~M` sar+b+ba a pa ya dza te sar+b+ba pA pa~M sho d+ha hU~M/ ngan song thams cad

spong ba'o/ /oM sar+b+ba sho ka ta mor na ta ma ti hU~M/ mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros so/ /oM dzA li ni ma hA dzA li ni hU~M/ dra ba can gyi 'od do/ /oM su tan shri ye hU~M/ nor bzangs so/ /

o~M` tsan dre tsan dra tsan dra byA ba lo ki te swA hA/ zla 'od do/ /oM a mi te pra b+he a mi te hU~M/ 'od dpag med do/ /o~M` ga ga ne ga ga na ba ra lo tsa na hU~M/ nam mkha' mdzod do/ /oM sar+b+ba ni ba ra Na bi sh+ka~M` b+hi ne hU~M/ sgrib pa thams cad
rnam par sel ba'o/ /oM ya mAn ta kr-ita/ gshin rje gshed do/ /oM pra dz+nyAn ta kr-ita/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o/ /oM pad mAn ta kr-ita/ rta mgrin no/ /o~M` a mr-i ta kuN Da li big+h+nAn ta kr-ita/
bdud rtsi thab sbyor ro/ /oM a tsa la hU~M ha~M/ mi g.yo ba'o/ /oM Tak+ki hU~M/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po'o/ /oM nI la daN Da ma hA daN Da hU~M/ be con sngon po'o/ /oM kro d+ha hU~M dza//

stobs po che'o/ /dkyil 'khor du dgod pa'i gsang sngags kyi yi ge de dag go/ /'di dag la bsten nas ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las nges par 'byung ba'i gsang sngags bye ba phrag du ma gsungs so/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa la sogs pa thams cad ni lcags kyus spyan drang ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so/ /rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi ni rigs kyi yum rnams kyis so/ /khro bo rnams kyi ni zhal gyi phyag

rgyas so/ /bran rnams ni zhags pa'i phyag rgyas so/ /pho nya rnams ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so/ /de dag la sogs pa ni spyan drang ba'i sbyor ba'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni gsang sngags

rim par phye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /phyag na rdo rje ras sam brtsig pa la sogs pa la gzugs brnyan bsgrub pa la dmigs pa gang gis gsang sngags 'chang rnams kyis ye shes

rdzogs par 'gyur zhing ye shes rdzogs pas sangs rgyas nyid bde blag tu thob par 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshogs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gsang chen bla na med pa
bshad par bya yis nyon cig /oM gyi ye shes kyis bsgrubs pa/ /rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /shes rab ye shes rab rgyas pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mchog gis mchod/ /zhi ba thor tshugs
cod pan 'chang / /zhal gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /gser gyi mdog can phyag drug pa/ /dang po bsam gtan phyag rgya can/ /bgrang phreng ldan zhing mda' yis brgyan/ /g.yon gyis lha mo'i
nu ma 'dzin/ /'khor lo dang ni gzhu thogs shing / /lha rnams bred cing khams rnams 'dzag /'bar ba'i 'od dkyil brgyan pa la/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sprin 'phro ba/ /rab tu 'byung zhing legs 'khyud pa/ /

de nyid spyod yul can bsgoms te/ /gsang sngags nang gi bzlas brjod bya/ /ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /oM zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam/ /
'jig rten dbang phyug 'od chen bsam/ /thor tshugs cod pan 'chang ba'i lha/ /dbu rgyan thams cad mkhyen pas brgyan/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /gtso bo zla ba'i gzugs dang 'dra/ /
zhal gsum spyan gsum 'bar ba la/ /phyag drug 'dug stangs bzhi pa can/ /phyag gnyis pad ma'i 'jo tshul can/ /g.yas na bgrang phreng rdo rje 'chang / /g.yon pas nu ma 'dzin pa la/ /ril ba spyi blugs
gsum pa na/ /gzugs rnams thams cad 'phro mdzad cing / /kun nas 'od zer phreng ba can/ /lag nas mtshon shor 'jigs 'khrugs pa'i/ /bgegs 'gyel ba la lta byed pa'i/ /de 'dra'i tshig gis lam

bsgoms na/ /ring por mi thogs sangs rgyas 'thob/ /rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog yangs pa thams cad kyi 'byung gnas chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /zla ba'i gzugs la hU~M zhes pa/ /sems kyi rdo rje bsgom
par bya/ /mthing shing bzang po lta bu'i mdog /rgyan rnams kun gyis rab klubs pa/ /cod pan la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs/ /rin chen rnams kyis yongs su brgyan/ /zhal ras gsum ldan spyan gsum pa/ /cung

zad bzhad cing 'jo sgeg can/ /phyag brgyad kyis ni brgyan pa la/ /rdo rje dang por gsor ba dang / /gnyis pa na ni ral gri gdengs/ /lcags kyu bzang po gsum pa na/ /bzhi pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /de bzhin g.yon na

dril bu bsnams/ /de bzhin gnyis pas nu ma 'khyud/ /gsum pa na ni zhags pa ste/ /bzhi pa lha rdzas gzhu yang 'dzin/ /rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas sprin gyis 'bar/ /'di 'dra gang zhing

rtag bsgom pa/ /de yi rdo rje sems brtan zhing / /ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob/ /rga shi rnams kyi pha rol 'gro/ /sems can gyi stobs mtha' yas pa rdzogs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po rdo rje shugs shes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin to/ /trA~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i bdag nyid de/ /zhal ras gsum ldan spyan gsum pa/ /thor tshugs cod pan rnams kyis brgyan/ /bde ba chen po kha dog dmar/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya rnam

par bzhugs/ /sems dpa'i skyil dkrung bcas pa ste/ /phyag g.yas na ni rdo rje dang / /g.yon pa rin chen yongs su 'dzin/ /'od zer ser po 'phro ba las/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i sprin chen nam/ /byang chub sems dpa'

gzhan rnams kyis/ /rin chen char gyis rgyas par byas/ /rin chen mngon par thob pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /kha~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /don yod rdo rje bsam par bya/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgya legs

bzhugs pa/ /mar ka ta'i 'od ltar 'bar/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri dang / /g.yon pa yis ni lcags kyu nyid/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro zhing / /legs par bsgrubs phyir slar yang sdud/ /'od zer chen pos

rab gsal zhing / /ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /'di 'dra rtag tu sems byed pa/ /nam mkha'i snying po thub pa che/ /'du byed thams cad spangs pa yi/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa der 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'

snang bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /la yi ye shes las bsgrub pa/ /rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang brgyan/ /lha mo spyan gsum phyag brgyad pa/ /zhal gsum gser gyi mdog dang mtshungs/ /

sgeg pa'i cha lugs legs 'chang ba/ /cung zad bzhad pas 'dod chags ma/ /dang po'i phyag ni mchog sbyin mdzad/ /de bzhin gnyis pa mi 'jigs sbyin/ /phyag gsum pa na rdo rje ste/ /bzhi pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub

zhags pa can/ /rin chen snye ma gnyis pa na/ /gsum pa na ni bgrang phreng ste/ /bzhi pa gzhu yis legs par brgyan/ /'od dmar 'od zer phreng ba can/ /lha rnams 'jigs pas sems myos te/ /lag pa thal mo sbyor bar byed/ /sangs rgyas

rnams kyi spyan 'phro bar/ /ye shes rdo rje spyan ma bsam/ /byang chub yan lag 'bras brgyan pa'i/ /lha mo 'di 'dra bsgom par bya/ /ye shes spyan gyis snang bar byed pa'i rdo rje 'jo tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /ma yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /rdo rje rigs can mA mA kI/ /lha mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma/ /dgod cing zhal ras phro dang bcas/ /uta pal sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba/ /'od dmar
shin du 'bar ba can/ /dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag /gnyis pa legs par rdo rje bsdams/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i 'dzub mo ste/ /gnyis pa zhags pa
legs par bsnams/ /gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin/ /rdo rje can ma sku gsum 'chang / /dngos med ngo bo mtshan nyid can/ /sangs rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro ba/ /'di 'dra sgom pas bsgom par bya'o/ /

sgyu 'phrul 'byung ba'i stobs kyis ye shes zab mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /zla ba'i mdog dang ldan pa'i yum/ /ming ni gos dkar can zhes bya/ /spyan gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /

zhal ras gsum pa dga' mdzad ma/ /phyag drug mi 'jigs sbyin mdzad ma/ /gnyis pa na ni rdo rje ste/ /gsum pa mda' yis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yon pa pad ma bsnams par bya/ /gnyis pa na ni bgrang nor phreng / /gsum pa na ni gzhu bsnams shing / /

rol pa'i stabs su legs par zhugs/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'phro bar mdzad/ /pad ma'i sprin gyis rgyas par bsgom/ /gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/ /rin chen skur ni bsgom par bya/ /pad ma'i gzugs kyi 'jo

tshul sangs rgyas kyi rgyal ba 'dren pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /tA yi ye shes las bsgrub pa/ /lha mo sgrol ma rdzu 'phrul can/ /'jo sgeg cha lugs la gnas pa/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /

phyag drug sems dpa'i skyil mo dkyung / /bzhad pa margad 'od dang ldan/ /dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag /gnyis pa na ni rdo rje bsnams/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i 'dzub mo ste/ /
gnyis pa na ni uta pal nyid/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu yang 'dzin/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar ba can/ /sangs rgyas 'phro bas rgyas mdzad pa/ /dga' mdzad sems can kun gyi ma/ /rtag par rgyun du bsgom par bya/ /

sems can thams cad dbang du 'gro zhing dga' bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /skyes mchog rgyal bas gsungs pa yi/ /sems ma bzhi ni brjod pa'i ming / /sems ma dang ni rin chen ma/ /
chos ma rdo rje las ma ste/ /rol ba'i rjes su mnyes mdzad ma/ /de dag ji ltar rigs par bsgom/ /de dag kyang ni bsgoms pa yis/ /ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob/ /sems can rab tu dga' byed pa'i/ /

'phags ma bzhi yi ting nge 'dzin to/ /tsu~M gi yi ge las bsgrubs pa/ /ming ni skul byed ces ma'i gzugs/ /sku gsum rgyal ba bye ba phrag /bdun gyis gsang sngags glu yis bstod/ /yi ge dgu pa thabs dgu can/ /lha dgu

rnams kyi gnas kyang yin/ /zhal gsum ston ka'i 'dam bu'i mdog /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /na chung skal ldan dar la bab/ /rig sngags thams cad sgrol mdzad ma/ /dang po'i zhal ni cung zad tsam/ /bzhad

cing spyan gsum ldan pa ste/ /g.yas kyi zhal ni rnam gdangs pa/ /uta pal sngon po 'dab ma'i 'od/ /mche ba zla ba tshes pa bzhin/ /lce ni glog bzhin ljib par mdzad/ /g.yon pa kha dog dmar po ste/ /tshems kyis sgros ni rnam

par gnon/ /rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs/ /gdu bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /brgyan pa'i phyag ni nyi shu rtsa drug de la phyag gnyis rtsa ba'i phyag rgyas snying ga'i gnas rnam par brgyan pa'o/ /g.yas pa gnyis

ni mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o/ /gsum pa na ral gri'o/ /bzhi pa ni rin po che sbyin pa'o/ /lnga pa ni shing tog bI dza pU ra'o/ /drug pa na mda' gsor ba'o/ /bdun pa na dgra sta'o/ /brgyad pa na dbyug to'o/ /dgu pa na
tho ba'o/ /bcu pa na lcags kyu'o/ /bcu gcig pa na rdo rje'o/ /bcu gnyis pa na se gol gtogs pa'o/ /bcu gsum pa na bgrang phreng ngo / /g.yon pa gnyis pa na yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan no/ /

gsum pa na pad ma'o/ /bzhi pa na ril ba spyi blugs so/ /lnga pa na zhags pa'o/ /drug pa na gzhu'o/ /bdun pa na mdung thung ngo / /brgyad pa na 'khor lo'o/ /dgu pa na dung ngo / /bcu pa na bsdigs pa'i 'dzub mo'o/ /bcu
gcig pa na bum pa bzang po'o/ /bcu gnyis pa na thag mdung ngo / /bcu gsum pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /pad ma la bzhugs bsgom par bya/ /la yi zhing

cung bgos pa yi/ /steng du bla gos gyon pa ste/ /sna tshogs tshig gu na bzar gsol/ /cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis sku gzugs 'phro/ /sum bcu'i lha rnams ltung ba dang / /bgags

rnams shin du 'jig skrag nas/ /thal mo sbyor bar byed pa ste/ /'di 'dra gang zhig rtag bsgom zhing / /bsgrims nas gsang sngags brjod pa des/ /sangs rgyas myur du thob gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos/ /

ting 'dzin ngo bo thob 'gyur zhing / /sdigs pa kun las rnam par grol/ /rgyal ba mtha' yas pa'i ye shes bskul bar byed pa'i stobs kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ra yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /

rin chen sgron ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug gser gyi mdog dang ldan/ /na chung dar la bab pa'i tshad/ /zhal ni cung zad bzhad pa ste/ /phyag ni rin chen gdu bus gtams/ /
phyag gnyis rin chen thal mo ste/ /'od kyis dkyil 'khor phreng ba 'khrug / /g.yas pa'i phyag ni mi 'jig sbyin/ /gsum pa mda' ni rnam par gsor/ /g.yon mdzub ma rungs rnams la sdigs/ /gsum pa yis ni
gzhu yang 'dzin/ /'od zer dmar po legs par 'bar/ /rol stabs thabs kyis zhabs kyi gnon/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni 'phro zhing sdud/ /chos 'dzin yid du 'ong ba yi/ /lha mo 'di 'dra bsgom par bya/ /

sangs rgyas rin chen sprin gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /b+h+ri yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /'jigs las sgrol ba khro gnyer can/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /ston

ka'i zla ba'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /phyag drug pad ma la bzhugs pa/ /rol ba'i stangs la brtson pa ste/ /zhal ni khro dang bcas par bzhad/ /legs par 'bar ba'i rtser lta can/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa
be con 'dzin par bshad/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i 'dzub mo can/ /gnyis pa ril ba spyi blugs bsnams/ /gsum pa na ni mtshon cha gzhu/ /sangs rgyas rnams

kyi sprin 'phro zhing / /de bzhin gzhan dag legs sdud pa'i/ /nyal dang 'greng dang 'dug pa na/ /lha mo 'di 'dra rtag tu bsgom/ /'jigs pa thams cad dmigs pa med par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin to/ /hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /ming ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud thams cad 'ching ba bskyed pa ste/ /sems can ma rungs phung bar byed/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug sngo bsangs gzugs
bzang ma/ /zhal ni cung zad bzhad pa mdzad/ /lag pa g.yas na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa rdo rje lu gu rgyud/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang bsnams/ /g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i 'dzub mo ste/ /gnyis
pa na ni zhags par gsungs/ /gsum pa gzhu yang thogs par brtson/ /sangs rgyas rnams ni sprin 'phro ba/ /rdo rje lu gu rgyud bsgoms na/ /byang chub skad cig gis 'thob na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig

smos/ /rdo rje sgrog gi ye shes kyi rdo rje lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /me yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /thub pa'i skyes mchog byams pa ni/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /de yi 'og na pad ma ste/ /

sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung du bzhugs/ /phyag bzhi dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /phyag gnyis chos 'chad phyag rgyas brgyan/ /g.yas pa yi ni phyag gnyis pa/ /sems can skyob pa mchog 'dzin mdzad/ /g.yon pa lha rdzas

klu shing gi/ /me tog ze'u 'bru'i mgo sogs bsnams/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi/ /sprin chen de bzhin 'phro bar mdzad/ /byams pa'i stobs kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam par brgyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /mu yi
ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /gzhon nu 'jam pa tshig gi lam/ /shes rab ye shes mchog thob pa/ /zab mo tshul ni ston pa po/ /zhal gsum spyan gsum zur phud gsum/ /gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ /

cod pan bzang po mi 'khrug can/ /me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis klubs/ /'og ma pad ma chen po la/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung du bzhug / /'jo sgeg thabs kyis rol pa ste/ /zhal ni cung zad bzhad pa la/ /dpa'

bo chen po phyag drug pa/ /dang po mi 'jigs sbyin par bya/ /gnyis pa na ni ral gri nyid/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /de bzhin g.yon pa shes rab 'chang / /gnyis pa na ni uta pal thogs/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid

do/ /shes rab ye shes mchog gi klubs/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin gyi bsnams/ /'phro bar sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i bsgom/ /'jam dpal mchog gi shes rab dang ye shes kyi rdo rje snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /spos

kyi glang po ye shes tog /de bzhin du ni bzang skyong dang / /blo gros rgya mtsho blo gros ni/ /mi zad pa dang spobs brtsegs nyid/ /ngan song kun spong mthu chen thob/ /mya ngan kun mun 'joms pa'i blo/ /nor bzangs dang ni dra ba'i

'od/ /de bzhin zla 'od 'od dpag med/ /nam mkha'i mdzod dang sgrib kun sel/ /de ltar de sogs grangs med pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa kun/ /sa bon yig 'bru rnams las 'khrungs/ /yi ge phyag rgya'i sbyor ba can/ /
zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /sna tshogs thabs kyis rol bar mdzad/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di yi rgyu/ /gsang sngags bzlos par bsgom par bya/ /mdog ldan 'du zhing 'phro mdzad pa/ /rnal 'byor can
gyis rtag tu bsam/ /hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /gzi brjid ldan pa 'jam dbyangs kyi/ /gshin rje'i dgra zhes rnam grags pa/ /bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba ste/ /char sprin gyi ni 'od dang 'dra/ /

zhal drug pa la phyag drug pa/ /de bzhin zhabs drug mi'u thung 'dra/ /gsus khyim shin du che ba ste/ /de ni drag po chen po yin/ /ljags 'dril rdo rje mche ba can/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rgyan pa ste/ /stag lpags kyi ni
sham thabs bgos/ /rol pa'i stabs can ma he bcibs/ /de yi 'og tu pad ma byas/ /mi thod phreng can skra 'khyil ba/ /ag tshoms ser la sgra chen 'byin/ /mgo yi steng na mi 'khrugs pa/ /sku
gsum la ni rnam par bzhugs/ /'jam pa'i dpal gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad/ /g.yas pa ljags ni 'dril ba ste/ /g.yon pa'i tshems kyis sgros mnan khro/ /g.yas pa'i phyag
na ral gri ste/ /gnyis pa na ni rdo rje nyid/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa gzhu ni brdungs pa yis/ /shin tu legs
par rnam par brgyan/ /lha mo yis ni g.yas nas 'khyud/ /gnyis pa na ni ut+pa pal thogs/ /g.yon pa zla ba ltar snang ba/ /pad ma dkar po thogs par bya/ /'og tu lha dang bgegs
kyi rnams/ /sngar ma bred nas phyag kyang 'tshal/ /'od zer dmar po 'bar dang bcas/ /sangs rgyas sprin rnams 'phro zhing sdud/ /rnal 'byor dag gis bsgoms nas su/ /bsgrims nas gsang sngags bzlas pa
de/ /'dug dang nyal dang 'chag pa na/ /legs par bsams te kun zos shing / /'dod pa lnga la longs spyad kyang / /nam mkha' lta bur gos mi 'gyur/ /gshed byed thams cad rmongs par byed pa'i
ye shes rdo rje gshin rje gsod pa'i 'dul ba 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pra yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /
phyag drug gis ni rnam par brgyan/ /mdog ser mi thung gzugs can la/ /'od zer dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /pad ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa la/ /dang po'i zhal
ni rnam par bzhad/ /de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par bsgyur/ /g.yon pa'i tshems kyis sgros kyang mnan/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis 'bar ba ste/ /lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje thogs/ /gnyis pa na ni dbyug pa ste/ /
gsum pa na ni mda' yang thogs/ /g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa gzhu can yin par gsungs/ /spyi bo'i steng na mi 'khrug pa/ /rim
bzhin 'phro zhing sdud pa ste/ /'di 'dra goms par bsgom par bya/ /bzlos par sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob/ /gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ha yi ye shes las

bsgrubs pa/ /khro bo pad ma mthar byed pa/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /kha dog dmar po phyag brgyad can/ /sku ni sbrul gyis dkris pa ste/ /pad ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs/ /khro bo blta bas gzigs
mdzad pa/ /dang po zhal ni rnam par bzhad/ /g.yas pa ljags ni 'dril ba ste/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan pa/ /stag lpags gsol zhing khro ba la/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa na ni
dbyug tho gsungs/ /gsum pa na ni lcags kyu ste/ /bzhi pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa bsdigs pa'i 'dzub mo ste/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni pad ma ste/ /bzhi pa na ni gzhu
nyid do/ /de ni cod pan mi 'khrugs pa/ /sangs rgyas gzugs ni mang po dag /'phro zhing 'du bar bsgom byas na/ /'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /rta mchog gi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge
'dzin to/ /hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /ming ni khro bo bgegs kyi gshed/ /me yi dkyil bzhugs sgrub pa sbyin/ /lag na rdo rje'i rjes 'brangs pa/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /
bgegs rnams 'joms mdzad phyag drug can/ /dang po'i zhal ni bzhad pa ste/ /de bzhin g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pa/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan khro/ /uta pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra'i mdog /
zhabs kyis bgegs ni mnan pa ste/ /gnyis pa pad ma'i steng na bzhugs/ /g.yas kyi phyag na ral gri ste/ /gnyis pa na ni dgra star gsungs/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa
bsdig mdzub zhags pa can/ /de bzhin gnyis pa nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu yang gsungs/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bar/ /ye shes mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /
bgegs rnams thams cad 'dral ba'i ye shes kyi rdo rjes rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /mig g.yon bus pa'i gzugs dang
ldan/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /gzhon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa la/ /dang po'i zhal ni bzhad pa ste/ /de yi g.yas pa'i zhal gdangs pas/ /khrag gis brlan pa'i ljags kyang 'dril/ /
g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan khro/ /hU~M gis snying ga'i phyogs kyang bkang / /mthing shun gyi ni mdog can te/ /rin chen ri stengs pad ma la/ /rol pa'i zhabs kyis stabs su bzhugs/ /
thub pa bgegs kyi chu 'dzin 'joms/ /phyag drug 'bar ba 'phro ba yi/ /'od bzangs dmar po'i dkyil 'khor na/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na ral gri ste/ /gnyis pa na ni rdo rjer gsungs/ /gsum
pa mda' ni rnam par gsor/ /g.yon pas bsdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa gzhu ni brdungs pa la/ /tshangs pas gzung ste lta ba dang / /sna tshogs me tog gis
bcings pa'i/ /cod pan dang ni dbu rgyan thogs/ /zur phud g.yon pa bung ba'i mdog /mi 'khrugs pa yis rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin dag gis/ /cho 'phrul chen po du ma 'phro/ /
de ltar rtag tu rnal 'byor gang / /sgom pas sgom par byed pa de/ /bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi/ /them skas la ni 'dzegs par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin

byed pa mi g.yo ba'i ye shes rdo rje bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /ming ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug pa zhes bya

bar bsgrags/ /dbu rgyan sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa'i/ /thor tshugs cod pan bzang po can/ /dang po'i zhal ni bzhad pa la/ /g.yas pa yis ni rnam par bsgyur/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan khro/ /dbral

ba khro gnyer rim pa can/ /'bar ba char sprin lta bu'i mdog /dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba can/ /phyag gnyis 'dod pa'i phyag rgyar ldan/ /g.yas pa na ni rdo rje gsungs/ /gsum pa mda' yis rnam par rol/ /
g.yon pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa'i phyag na gzhu yang bsnams/ /pad ma la bzhugs rol pa'i stabs/ /'og tu bgegs kyang rnam par mnan/ /sangs rgyas lang long 'phro mdzad pa/ /ting nge 'dzin
gyis bsgom byas na/ /bla na med pa'i ye shes 'thob/ /snying thams cad 'gugs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hU~M gi ye shes las bsgrub pa/ /khro bo be
con sngon po can/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /phyag drug gis ni rnam par brgyan/ /dang po'i zhal ni 'jo sgeg bzhad/ /de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par gdangs/ /g.yon pa tshems
kyis sgros kyang mnan/ /sku ni kha chu 'dra ba ste/ /lus ni sbrul gyis rnam par brgyan/ /skra tshogs lcang lor 'khyil pa ste/ /dbu rgyan la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /pad ma la bzhugs rol stabs
can/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa na ni be con nyid/ /gsum pa mtshon cha mda' dang ldan/ /g.yon pa bsdigs mdzub zhags pa ste/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /
gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid bsnams/ /dkyil 'khor dmar po 'bar ba can/ /sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis bskrun pa'i/ /sangs rgyas sprin ni rtag tu 'phro/ /bags kyis rtogs pa'i ye shes rdo rje
rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /hU~M zhes gsungs pa'i khro bo ni/ /ye shes dam pa stobs po che/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /
phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /sprin gyi kha dog 'dra ba ste/ /sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ /mig dmar skra 'bar gyen du brdzes/ /mgo bo la ni mi 'khrugs
bzhugs/ /dang po'i zhal ni rnam par bzhad/ /de bzhin g.yas pa rnam par gdangs/ /g.yon pa tshems kyis sgros mnan pa/ /pad ma la bzhugs 'gying bag can/ /drag
po'i tsham rngam stang stabs can/ /phyogs bcu'i lha rnams phung bar mdzad/ /'bar ba rnams kyis yongs bskor ba'i/ /nyi ma'i dkyil
'khor nang na bzhugs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa be con thogs par mtshon/ /gsum pa
yis ni ral gri gdengs/ /bzhi pa mda' yis rnam par brgyan/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /
gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni tho ba nyid/ /phyag bzhi pa ni gzhu can la/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin

sprin 'phro ba/ /sgom pa mchog gis bsgom par bya/ /bsnol ba med pa'i ye shes rdo rje'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /b+h+ru~M gyi ye shes las bsgrub pa/ /gtsug tor 'khor los
bsgyur ba ste/ /sku gsum ldan pa zhal ras gsum/ /gser gyi mdog can 'od bzang ba/ /'dom gang 'od kyis rnam par brgyan/ /ting 'dzin phyag rgyar rnam par gnas/ /rin chen ri stengs pad ma la/ /

rdo rje skyil mo dkrung du bzhugs/ /rigs kyi yum ni bzhi po rnams/ /gzugs dang yan lag kun mdangs can/ /zhal ras 'jo sgeg tshul gyis brgyan/ /gos dang rgyan gyis klubs pa ste/ /chags phyir spro ba'i rtsol ba can/ /

phyag rgya rin chen snye ma dang / /rdo rje pad ma ud pal ldan/ /lha mo so so'i phyogs na bzhugs/ /gtsug tor 'od zer lnga pa can/ /kun du 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / /'khor lo'i bar na rdo rje gnas/ /'od zer phreng

bas rnam par brgyan/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin 'phro bas/ /nam mkha' thams cad 'gengs par mdzad/ /byang chub snying po don gnyer bas/ /'di 'dra'i 'khor lo can sgom zhing / /bsgrims nas rnal 'byor bsgom pa yis/ /

ring por mi thogs 'dod pa 'thob/ /byang chub snying po thams cad kyi rgyan gyi ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dza~M gyi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /gnod sbyin gnod gnas sku gsum can/ /zhal ras gsum pa phyag gnyis

pa/ /bI dza pu ri ne'u le can/ /pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa 'am/ /yang na bzang po'i 'dug stangs gnas/ /ngos na rgyan rnams thams cad kyis/ /brgyan pa'i gnod sbyin me bzhi dag /rin chen char pa 'bebs par
byed/ /mgo bo'i steng na sangs rgyas lnga/ /de yi cod pan bzang po yi/ /g.yon phyogs rtse phran rgyan yang chags/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro zhing / /rin chen char pa 'bebs par mdzad/ /
