gang zhig nor rdzas 'dod pa yis/ /gnod gnas 'di 'dra bsgom byas na/ /de yis sa chen nor rdzas kyis/ /ring por mi thogs gang bar 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rjes bdud rtsi yi/ /chu yang rtag tu dbul bar bya/ /

rin po che sprin sbyin pa'i char pa 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ma yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i/ /nyi ma'i 'od lnga 'od zer can/ /rta bdun ldan pa'i shing rtar bzhugs/ /

'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor snang mdzad pa/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum ldan/ /phyag drug kha dog ser por snang / /phyogs bcu bsrung bar brtson pa ste/ /'jo sgeg tshul du zhal yang bzhad/ /na chung rgyan ni g.yo ba can/ /

cod pan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga/ /thor tshugs me tog rnams kyis brgyan/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa la ni khab skud rnams/ /gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs 'dzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa

a sho'i yal ga ste/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do/ /gzugs brnyan mang po 'phro ba yis/ /sdang ba'i sems can bcing ba dang / /mig dang kha ni 'brub par byed/ /gsang sngags bzlas brjod bad pa dag /gal te byang chub

mchog 'dod na/ /lha mo hU~M mdzad bsgom par bya/ /'di ni bsgom par byed pa yis/ /dbang du sems can rab tu 'gro/ /sdang ba rnams kyis mi tshugs par byed pa'i rdo rje mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pa yi

ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i/ /rig pa'i ri khrod shing lo can/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /zhal ras bzhad cing khro dang bcas/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /na chung gzhon nu phyag drug ma/ /g.yas
pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa na ni dgra sta nyid/ /gsum pa mda' yang rnam par gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa shing lo'i bam po ste/ /phyag gsum pa na gzhu nyid do/ /

thor tshugs me tog phreng bas brgyan/ /de steng kha dog lnga po dag /rab tu 'dres pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs/ /mdog ser pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /dkyil 'khor dmar po cher 'bar bas/ /khro bo'i sprin 'phro sdud
mdzad cing / /gdon gang skyes dgu'i nang gnas pa/ /de dag khro bo'i mes kyang bsreg /phyir yang bsregs nas sangs rgyas kyi/ /kha dog bdud rtsi char 'bebs mdzad/ /de 'dra rnal 'byor
gyis bsgoms na/ /mi des thams cad zhi bar mdzad/ /nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /dza yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /rig sngags
mtshan ni dug sel ma/ /sbrul mgo bdun gyi gdengs ka can/ /nor bu 'bar bas brgyan pa ste/ /zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /gzhon nu mtshan ni 'bar ba can/ /bzhad cing khro dang bcas pa ste/ /
sbrul gyi ska rags dag gis brgyan/ /phyag drug rol pa'i stangs stabs can/ /mgo yi steng na mi 'khrugs bzhugs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa ral gri thogs par brtson/ /phyag gsum
pa ni gar thabs kyis/ /stangs stabs tshul gyis mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa sdigs 'dzub zhags pa can/ /gnyis pa dug gi me tog can/ /phyag gsum pa na gzhu nyid do/ /dbu rgyan me tog rnams kyis
brgyan/ /gser mdog pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs/ /'od ni dmar po'i dkyil 'khor can/ /dza rnams 'phro bas bskor ba ste/ /kun nas 'bar ba rnams kyis khebs/ /sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan

'phro ba can/ /phyag bzang bum pa zla 'dra ba'i/ /kha na dza yi rnam brgyan pas/ /dug gis phog pa rnams la ldugs/ /rtag tu sku gsum dug sel ma/ /dug gis phog pa rnams la bsgom/ /de ltar bsgom par byas

pa yis/ /ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob/ /nyon mongs rnams kyi dug sel ba/ /gdengs ka'i dbang po rde rje ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /tri yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /sku chen ha la ha la ste/ /

zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa/ /thor tshugs cod pan rnams kyis brgyan/ /zla ba tshes pa bsnams pa'i lha/ /dbu rgyan thod pa dag gis brgyan/ /thor tshugs rgyal po'i sku gzugs bzhugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis

brgyan pa ste/ /pad ma dkar po lta bur snang / /sems stobs ldan pa'i 'jo tshul can/ /phyag brgyad zhal yang bzhad pa ste/ /smad g.yogs stag gi lpags pa mnabs/ /g.yas pa'i phyag na rdo rje ste/ /gnyis pa bgrang nor phreng ba

can/ /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /g.yon pa pad mas rnam par brgyan/ /gnyis pa yis ni nu ma 'dzin/ /gsum pa na ni gzhu nyid do/ /g.yas pa mdung rtse gsum pa la/ /sbrul gyis yongs su dkris pa ste/ /
g.yon na thod pa dri zhim pa'i/ /me tog sna tshogs kyis bkang ba/ /pad ma dmar po la bzhugs pa/ /rol pa'i stangs stabs tshul du gnas/ /rin chen ri phug nang bzhugs par/ /rnal 'byor sems dpas bsgom

par bya/ /sangs rgyas rang bzhin gzugs dang ni/ /cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs 'byung / /rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis/ /kha zas thams cad za byed cing / /nang gi sngags pas sngags brjod cing / /rim bzhin

rnal 'byor gyis bsgoms na/ /byang chub myur du thob 'gyur zhing / /bla na med pa'i bde ba 'dren/ /'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrub pa/ /ha la ha la yongs su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

to/ /sa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /stong chen rab tu 'jom mdzad pa/ /lha mo nad kun 'phrog ma ste/ /sdang ba'i sems can 'dzoms mdzad ma/ /phyag stong ldan zhing dbu stong la/ /spyan gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan/ /

brtson chen phyag brgyad khro ba dang / /steg pa'i stabs kyis dgongs pa can/ /phyag g.yas mchod sbyin lha rdzas kyi/ /ral gri lcags kyu mda' dang ldan/ /phyag g.yon pad mo rdo rje nor/ /zhags pa gzhu dang sta re can/ /
mdog dmar zhal ras bzhi pa ste/ /bgegs stong 'joms par mdzad pa yin/ /rang gi rnal 'byor la brtson pas/ /nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs 'jug cing spro/ /glang po rta dang skyes pa dag /za bar

mdzad ma phreng ba can/ /de yi las kyis bskul ba yi/ /gsang sngags dpa' bos gnon par bya/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug las 'dod pas/ /'di byas pas ni srung bar 'gyur/ /dpung chen po la rnam par lta ba thams cad srung

ba stobs kyi mchog stong chen po rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /d+h+wa~M zhes bya bas bskyed pa yi/ /bsdigs pa'i 'dzub mo'i phyag rgya can/ /drag mo chen mo zhal bzhi pa/ /

spyan gsum phyag brgyad kyis rnam brgyan/ /ral gri gtun shing 'khor lo mda'/ /mdung rtse gsum pa rdo rje gzhu/ /chom rkun 'dzub mos bsdigs pa ste/ /rdo rje ro langs 'byung ba dag /mthong bas dpung rnams bcom

gtor bas/ /lha mo rtag tu bsgoms na ni/ /ring por mi thogs byang chub 'thob/ /'jig rten gsum rnam par 'joms pa la mkhas pa mchog gi rtse mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /pra yi ye shes las bsgrubs

pa/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon mdzad ma/ /spyan gsum phyag brgyad g.yas pa na/ /ral gri 'khor lo mdung rtse gsum/ /mda' yis rnam brgyan phyag g.yon na/ /rdo rje zhags pa dgra sta gzhu/ /bsnams pas sdang ba'i

bgegs ltung mdzad/ /bu mi 'tsho dang mo sham dag /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu gnas su/ /lha rnams kun gyi bum pa 'dzin/ /slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur zhing / /de yi mngal du byis pa ni/ /'jam pa'i gzugs

can 'jug par bsam/ /zhags pa'i phyag rgyas mtshan ngan nas/ /skyes pa gzugs can 'byung ba dang / /dran pa yis ni bral nas kyang / /mngal ni bsod nams dag gis spel/ /mngal thams cad rnam par lta ba so sor

'brang ma'i ye shes rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /ba yi ye shes rol pas bskrun/ /lha mo nor gyi blo gros ma/ /gzi chen gser gyi mdog can la/ /phyag drug lang tsho dar la bab/ /rgyan rnams

kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /'jo sgeg thabs bcas 'bar ba ste/ /de yi phyag g.yas mchog sbyin mdzad/ /gnyis pas 'bru yi snye ma dang / /gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor/ /phyag g.yon yid bzhin nor bu dang / /
rin chen char 'bebs gzhu yang 'dzin/ /grogs mo'i skye bos yongs bskor cing / /mngag gzhug gnod sbyin mo yi gzugs/ /rin chen char pa 'babs pa dang / /nor kun gyi ni char pa yang / /'bebs par byed pa

bsam par bya/ /nor gyi blo gros chen mo 'di/ /de ltar sngags pas bsgoms na des/ /dpag tshad bdun ni rgyas par yang / /nor gyi char gyis khyab par mdzad/ /byang chub sbyin mchog dam pa ma/ /de ltar rnal 'byor

bdag nyid bsgom/ /nor gyi rgyun gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /bi yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa/ /srin mo 'bar ba'i glog phreng can/ /ming ni dngul dkar las skyes mo/ /

stobs mo che la pha rol gnon/ /gsus 'phyang mo la mche gtsigs ma/ /skra ser kham pa gyen du brdzes/ /thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ /spyi bo la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs/ /bcu gnyis dbu dang bcwa brgyad
phyag /spyan ni gsum gsum thod phreng ldan/ /drag mo lag na rak+ta yis/ /bkang ba'i thod pa thogs pa ste/ /smad g.yogs seng ge'i lpags pas g.yogs/ /sbrul gyis mchod phyir thogs pa can/ /ral gri

lcags kyu 'khor lo dang / /gtun shing rtse gsum dril bu dang / /ba dan lhag dbyug mdung mchog sbyin/ /gzhu mda' mdung thung be con dang / /zhags pa dgra sta tho ba thogs/ /rgyan rnams kyis ni lus la brgyan/ /
mdog nag rol pa'i stabs kyis ni/ /pad ma'i gdan bzhugs sdang ba dag /'dul ba zhes brjod 'di lta bu/ /rtag tu hU~M gis hU~M mdzad pa/ /bzlas brjod yang dag ldan par bsgoms/ /sems can
kun don tshogs pa yi/ /byang chub ring por mi thogs 'thob/ /sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'i mchog rab byang chub kyi snying por rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs zhes

bya ba'i bsgom pa'i gzugs/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste/ /na chung gzhon nu 'jo tshul can/ /mgo bo skra tshugs phyed tu gzung / /de bzhin du ni stod g.yogs kyang / /la dkar seng ba bgos pa ste/ /
de la kha dog lnga pa yi/ /me tog 'phrul pa rnams kyis brgyan/ /gser gyi mdog can bzhin 'dzum pa/ /phyed zur bas ni rnam par rol/ /dpag bsam shing gis brgyan pa yi/ /rin chen ri la
legs par zhugs/ /'jam pa'i khro bo rdo rje yis/ /de yi mgo bo mnan nas bzhugs/ /tha ma thog thag gnod sbyin mos/ /nam mkha' gang bar bsgom par bya/ /gnod sbyin mo thams cad sgrub pa'i
mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /sngags la oM AHhU~M/ yi ge gsum pa mig gsum gzugs/ /khyab 'jug lha chen mes po ste/ /gdong gsum rang gi mtshon thogs la/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad
kyis bskul cing / /rdo rje ting nge 'dzin bsgoms nas/ /mod la dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten thams cad grub pa mig gsum rnam par rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /gzhan yang

gsang sngags yi ge yi/ /sa bon gang gis sbyar byas te/ /rdo rje yig 'bru rnams bsgoms na/ /de dag ma bsgrims bzhin du 'grub/ /'phrog ma 'phrog byed las skyes pa'i/ /bu ni lnga brgya po rnams dang / /lnga rtsen dang ni
dpal can ma/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las ting nge 'dzin rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad

chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la zhi bar lta ba rdul dang bral ba'i mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi yum las sna tshogs

kyi ye shes bskyed par mdzad pa 'di dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM b+ha ga ba dI ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid d+hi lo tsa ni sar+b+ba aR+tha sa d+ha ni swA hA/ de nas las thams cad rab tu rdzogs par byed pa 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis/

sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang / /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams dgyes/ /bdud kyi dpung rnams 'dar 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes dran byed/ /zhi ba sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/ /rdo rje dam tshig gis bskul na/ /shi ba rnams la srog

sbyin mdzad/ /ma grub pa rnams grub par stsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsum rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje

'chang mchog thams cad bskyed pa'i yum rdo rje dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa 'di phyung ngo / /oM sha~M ka re/ shAn tiM ka ri/ g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ta g+huT+Ti ni g+hA Ta ya g+huT+Ti swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs
tsam gyis/ /rdo rje gsum las skyes gyur pa/ /thams cad kyis ni mig phye nas/ /rdo rje shug ni rjes dran gyur/ /sgrub pa thams cad srung mdzad ma/ /de bzhin las rnams sgrub pa yin/ /sdig pa thams cad

'joms ma ste/ /zhi dang rgyas dang 'phel mdzad ma'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'dod chags chen pos zhen pa pad ma gar gyi stang stabs thugs kyi rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par 'thor ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas chos thams cad 'dzin pa mchog gi yum 'di rdo rje gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /oM ka Te bi ka Te ni ka Te/ ka Ta~M ka Te swA hA/ de nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan mchog /dam pa
'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /ting nge 'dzin gyis mig phye nas/ /rdo rje pad ma rjes dran byed/ /rgyas pa chen po yum yin te/ /chos mdzod rnams par 'phel mdzad ma/ /bsgoms shing bstan te bzlas

brjod na/ /rgya cher srung bar mdzad pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dbang du bya ba khong du chud pas/ rdo rje gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis dga' bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas ye shes la 'jug par byed pa sna tshogs thams cad 'chang ba'i yum gyi sgros ma 'di gsungs so/ /oM tA re tut+t+wa re tu re swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun dang sras kyi rnams/ /
spyan phyed rnam par gdangs nas su/ /ye shes rdo rje ldan par dran/ /lha mo bzlas brjod byas tsam gyis/ /skye dgu rnams ni mngag gzhug 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi mchog gi ye shes la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di rdo rje gsum las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man ta bud d+hA NA~M/ oM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba duSh+Ta sa two da ma ka

a si mu Sha la pa R+sha pA sha hasta/ tsa tur mu kha/ tsa tur b+hu dza/ Sha Ta tsa ra Na/ A gats+tsha/ A gats+tsha/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta prA Na a pa hA ri Ne/ ma hA bi g+h+nA g+hA ta ka / bi kri ta An na/ sar+b+ba b+hu ta b+ha ya~M ka ra/

aT+TAT+Ta hA sa nA di na/ byA g+h+ra tsar ma ni ba sa na/ ku ru ku ru/ sar+b+ba karmA Ni/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ sar+b+ba mAn tran/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha pa ra mu drAn/ A kar Sha ya/ A kar Sha ya/ sar+b+ba b+hU tAn/ ma tha ma tha/ nir ma tha nir ma tha/

sar+b+ba du pra bi sha ya/ pra bi sha ya/ maN Dal ma d+h+ye be ba shwa ta/ dzI bi tAn ta ka ra/ ku ru ku ru/ ma ma kAr+yaM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA bi lam ba/ mA bi lam+ba/ sa ma ya ma nu smar/ hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ bi s+pho

Ta ya/ sar+b+ban nA sha ya ri pUn/ kar kar/ big+h+na na~M sarba A shA pa ri pU ra ka / he he b+h+ra ga bAn/ kiny+tsir ya si/ ma ma sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ya swA hA/ de nas khro bo 'di gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems mkhas kun/ /

'dar zhing 'jigs pa skyes gyur nas/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad/ /rdo rje ra ba dra ba yin/ /ye shes sna tshogs can la lta/ /srubs gcig pa'am srubs gnyis pa'i thod pa bzang po rnying pa dang / /rkang rjes sa'i cho ga la/ /

lha mo bzhi pa'i sbyor ba dang / /sangs rgyas lnga yis byin brlabs te/ /sku gsum dbyer med bsgoms nas su/ /myur bar khugs kyi bar du ni/ /rkang pas mnan te bzlas brjod bya/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes kyi rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i mchog sprin chen po nam mkha'i rdo rje ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje gsum rnams

las snying po 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man ta bud d+ha NA~M/ na mo badzra kro d+hA ya/ ma hA da~MSh+To T+ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu Sha la/ pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya/ o~M` a mr-i ta kuN Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/

ban d+ha ban d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ bi s+phoT ya/ sar+b+ba big+h+na bi nA ya kA na/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI ba tAn+ta ka rA ya swA hA/ khro bo chen po gsungs pa yis/ /grag chen sangs
rgyas thams cad ni/ /yid phyung nas ni skrag par 'gyur/ /log 'dren rnams dang bgegs rnams 'dar/ /sku gsum ye shes mchog mnga' ba'i/ /rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa dran/ /de yi rkang rjes sa dang ni/ /

rlung gis gtsugs pa'i shing lo la/ /khro bo'i 'khor lor gzir nas su/ /tshogs bdag rkang pa'i drung du bzhugs/ /hU~M dang phaT kyis bskul nas su/ /bskrad pa'i sbyor ba byas na ni/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje can yang skrod/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje 'phro ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i khro bo chen po sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man ta kA ya bA ka

tsit+ta badzrA NA~M/ oM hU~M dzi na ri T-iT+Ta hU~M` hU~M` phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas khro bo 'di brjod pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /'jigs par gyur cing skrag gyur nas/ /gtso bo rnam snang mdzad pa dran/ /srin po 'byung po

dang mkha' 'gro/ /skem byed gdon rnams gzir ba la/ /rdo rje gzir ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /hU~M tsam gyis kyang las byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mtha' yas kyis yon tan rin po che dpag tu med pa kun nas

sdud pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje pad ma'i khro bo chen po 'di sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man ta bud d+ha NA~M/ o~M` hU~M` hU~M` hU~M` ta ru la/ bi ru la/ sar+b+ba bi Sha g+hA ta ka /

dz+wa li ta/ bi s+phu la ga~M/ aT+TA T+Ta hA sa/ na di ni/ ke sha ris TA To pa Ta~M kA ra/ badzra khu ra/ nir g+hA ta na/ tsa le ta ba su d+ha ta la ni shwA sa mA ru to tik+Sha p+ta d+hA ra NI d+ha ra/ b+hI Sha Na aT+TAT+Ta hA sa/ a pa ri mi ta/ ba la pa ra

kra ma/ Ar+ya ga Na b+hI ta b+hU ta ga Na/ ad+h+yu Shi ta/ bud d+h+yu bud d+h+yu/ ha ya grI ba/ khA da khA da/ pa ra man trA nA/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha/ sid d+him me/ a d+hiSh+Tha te A be Sha ya A bai Sha ya/ sar+b+ba dz+wa ra pi shA tsA

ni/ sar+b+ba gra he Shu/ a pra ti ha to b+ha bA/ badzra da~MSh+Ta kin tsa rI ya si/ i dan duSh+Ta gra hA na/ duSh+Ta sar+b+bam+bA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ mar da mar da/ pA Ta ya pA Ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ bud d+ha d+har+m+ma saM g+hA/ a nu dz+nyA taM

kar+m+ma ku ru shI g+h+ri ha ya grI bA ya phaT/ badzrA ya phaT/ badzrA gA trA ya phaT/ badzra ne trA ya phaT/ badzra da~M Sh+TA ya phaT/ badzra khu rU ya phaT/ badzra khur nir g+hA ta nA ya phaT/ pa ra man tra bi na sha nA ya phaT/

sar+b+ba trai lokya b+ha ya~M ka rA ya phaT/ sarba kar+m+ma su pra ti ha tA ya phaT/ badzra ku la san trA sa nA ya phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas khro chen byung ba yis/ /rdo rje pad mchog las byung rnams/ /
yid ni 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur/ /'khor bcas 'jigs pas rnam 'khrugs nas/ /byang chub tshogs ni dran byed cing / /ye shes rdo rje dran 'gyur ba/ /lag pa la ni pad ma dang / ha zhes
bya ba mchog 'bar bsam/ /khro rgyal ting 'dzin la gnas nas/ /rdo rje gsum yig 'dzin pa'i/ khams gsum dag kyang khyab byed pa'o/ /mi bzad dug ni drang bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis don yang dag par 'byung ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog nor bu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo'i rgyal po chen po be con sngon po can 'di rdo rje gsum

las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man ta bud d+ha NA~M/ e h+ye e h+yi/ b+ha ga bAn/ nI la badzra daN Da/ tu ru tu ru/ hu lu hu lu swA hA/ gu lu gu lu/ gu lA pa ya gu lA pa ya/ kra ma kra ma/ b+ha ga bAn/ bA yu be ge

na/ b+hU tA nA shI g+h+raM/ da ha da ha/ da ra da ra/ ba ha ba ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ pA ta ya pA ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta mo TA pa ya mo TA pa ya mo TA pa ya/ sar+b+ba kar+m+mA Ni/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya/ as+thi me dam a se/ ru d+hir mad dza me dam/

bi shwa mad dza/ ru d+hi ra/ pri ya e h+ye hi b+ha ga ban/ sar+b+ba big+h+na ni/ sar+b+ba bid+yA ni/ sar+b+ba man trA Ni/ sar+b+ba mU la kar+m+mA Ni/ kri tri ma Ni/ bi Sha dI ni/ sarbA gra hA na/ ha na ha na/ b+han dza b+hany+dza mar da mar da/ e dam me/

kAr+yam sA d+ha ya/ hU~M nI lA ya nI lA ya/ nI la badzra daN DA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ big+h+nAn bi nA ya kAn/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ hu ru hu ru/ dIp+ta tsaN DA ya/ sar+b+ba sha trU~M danA~M hr-i da yA ni pI Ta ya/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha/ pa ra bid+yA nA ma/ ts+tshe da

ka hU~M bid+yA nA maSh+Ta ka / sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ badzra d+ha ra ba tsa na~M tsa/ mar mA Ni ni kr-in ta/ hU~M ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ku ru ku ru/ tu ru tu ru/ hu ru hu ru/ phaT phaT hU~M hU~M kri tAn tA ya/ de ba ri Shi bi drA ba kA

ya/ ha na badzra daNe De na swA hA/ khro bo chen po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu bdud kyi ris thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams rab tu g.yos te sku gsum gyi mchog gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad dran par

gyur to/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sbyor ba'i tshogs bskul na brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis mod la khro bo chen pos gsod par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa

mi 'khrugs pas bkod pa kun du rnam par 'phro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stobs po che rdo rje 'di sku gsum las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man ta bud d+ha/ oM hUM hU~M` hU~M`/ phaT phaT phaT/ u gra shU la

pA Ni hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ oM dz+yo ta nir nA da hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ de nas khro bo gsungs tsam gyis/ /gdengs ka yis ni bskor ba kun/ /yid ni shin du 'jigs skrag ste/ /rdo rje rnam par snang
mdzad dran/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas pa yis/ /las kun rab tu grub par byed/ /char pa che na gcod 'gyur la/ /char pa chung na rab tu 'bebs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu 'bar ba'i snying po

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khro bo chen po 'dod pa'i khro bo 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nA~M/ Tak+ki hU~M dza/ de nas khro bo gsungs pa yis/ /
sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu 'dar/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang skrag /bdud kyi dpung rnams ltung bar 'gyur/ /rkang g.yas sna tshogs rdo rje yi/ /sbyor ba'i mtshan ni mnan nas su/ /sku gsum
ye shes stobs ldan pas/ /khro gnyer rim par gnyer byas te/ /gsang sngags kun gyis bkug nas su/ /sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i

de bzhin gshegs pas rdo rje rab tu 'bar zhing khro ba'i ye shes rab tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje khro bo mi g.yo ba gtum po 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /

na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nA~M/ a tsa la kA Na tsaN Da/ na Ta na Ta/ maT+Ta maT+Ta moT+Ta moT+Ta/ saT+Ta saT+Ta/ taT+Ta taT+Ta/ ta na ta na/ da ha da ha mo ha mo ha/ mo ha ka ra/ ha sa ha sa badzra hA sa ku ru/ ha sa ha sa/ ma ra ma ra Ta ma ra ma ra Ta/

gar+dz+dza gar+dz+dza/ ha na ha na/ ban d+ha ban d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a bi sha a bi sha / ma hA man tra pA la kA/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ti Ni ti Ni/ kha da kha da/ big+h+nA nAn/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ duSh+TA na/ b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ sar+b+ba na ku ru ku ru/ ki ri ki ri/ ma ha bi Sha

ma badzraH s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ tri bi lA ta rang ga nar ta ka /a~M a~M a~M/ hA~M hA~M hA~M/ a tsa la tse Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ hU~M hU~M a sa man ta kA TA Ta ma hA ba la sha tA ya/ pa ra man trA na/ a~M a~M/ hA~M` hA~M` ma~M`

shud d+h+ya~M tu lo ka / tu Sh+D+ya~M tu badzra~M/ na mo tu kru a pra ti ha ta ba le b+h+yaH dz+wa la ya/ trA Ta a sa ha na maHswA hA/ /de nas khro bo mi g.yo ba/ /khro bo stobs chen 'di gsungs pa/ /lha dang klu kun mngag gzhug byed/ /gnod sbyin srin po lha ma
yin/ /'jigs pa thob nas brgyal bar 'gyur/ /bdud kyi sde rnams lhung nas su/ /tshig cing rab tu zhum bzhin du/ /gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran/ /khro bo'i rgyal po du ma yis/ /bcu pas 'jigs pas
nyin bzhin du/ /gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad nyid/ /sna tshogs las rnam myur du mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas sku gsum gyi ye shes

rdo rje 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis 'jigs pa chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig pa'i rgyal po chen po gnod mdzes 'di gsungs so/ /na maH oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hU~M/ grih+na grih+na hU~M grih+na pA ya

grih+na pA ya hU~M A+oM A na ya ho b+ha ga ban bid+yA rA dza hU~M phaT/ de nas khro bo 'di gsungs pa'i/ /lha yi bu mo thams cad ni/ /skra tshugs zhig cing gcer bur gyur/ /mig rtsa rig rig byed pa dag /sku gsum
rdo rje mchog mnga' ba'i/ /zhal gyis nu ma gnyis mnan pas/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad/ /ye shes kyis 'joms dran par 'gyur/ /lcags kyu yis ni rnam dral te/ /rdo rje zhags pas
bcings nas su/ /bu mo thams cad dgug bya ba/ /bu mo dgug pa'i mchog yin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes chen po rnam par bsgyings pas dga' ba ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas sku gsum gyi mchog rdo rje 'chang bskyed par mdzad pa sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di/ /rjes su dran par mdzad do/ /'khor lo che la rnam gnas nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis
sprin dag dang / /de bzhin rdo rje 'chang ba'i sprin/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags thogs 'byin/ /kun mkhyen ye shes las byung gtso/ /gsang sngags skyes bur bdag bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'gugs
byed na/ /rdo rje 'chang sogs ci zhig smos/ /bud med lha chen bu mo dag /rlung la rkang pa bzhag nas su/ /lcags kyus snying la drangs nas ni/ /sems can kun yang 'gugs 'gyur te/ /'di la dpyad pa cung
zad med/ /rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /sku chen zla ba'i kha dog yin/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi 'bebs bsams te/ /lan grangs bcu ni brjod pa yis/ /
de nas gdon mi za bar khugs/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor las byung ba/ /rdo rje lcags kyu chen po yi/ /'bar ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba yis/ /gzhon nu ma dag nges par 'gug / /rdo rje gsum 'khrugs
khro bo ni/ /rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa ste/ /lha ma yin kun des sreg cing / /lha min bu mo rjes chags pas/ /gsal shing gis ni bsgyel nas su/ /rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa yis/ /drangs nas

lha min bu mo 'gugs/ /btsag dang thod lo kor dang ni/ /bab bla 'byor par gyur na ni/ /gzas zin tshe na khar bcug ste/ /rdzas rgyal rdo rje lcags kyus 'grub/ /drag po rlung dang khyab 'jug dang / /lha mo gnod sbyin gnod
sbyin ma/ /mngag gzhug bcas par 'jigs bskrag ste/ /ming bris kun nas rtag tu 'gugs/ /sangs rgyas 'khor lor legs bzhugs te/ /'jam dpal rdo rjer rnam par bsgom/ /khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed/ /

lag na rdo rje lcags kyu thogs/ /khros shing 'bar ba 'phro ba yis/ /gnod sbyin bu mo bkug nas spyod/ /phyag rgya gsang sngags sbyor ba dang / /bsam gtan 'khor lo sbyor ba yis/ /dgug par bya ba'i tshig gsungs pa/ /
gzhan du byas na 'grub mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i zhabs drung kun gnas pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ /kun gyis sems rab rdzogs byed pas/ /yang dang yang du bskul bar byed/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje rgyal mo chen mo rnam par

bsgyur ba'i rdo rje 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /o~M` shU lI ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /klu mo dbang chen grags pa dag /gos dang bral zhing tshig bzhin du/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran/ /
gsang sngags rig sngags 'di yis ni/ /klu rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed/ /bsam gtan rdo rje mthu dang ni/ /gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pa yis/ /sor gdub rgyan ni gsol ba yis/ /
klu mo mig yangs bkug nas ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lngas chags pa'i/ /klu mo nye bar spyod par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho 'phro ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bskul byed ma chen mo'i gzungs kyi rig sngags chen mo 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsa man ta bud d+ha nA~M/ si myag sa~M bud d+ha ko TI nA~M`/ tad ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu le
tsun de swA hA/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus/ /ting nge 'dzin las g.yos par gyur/ /bdud rnams brgyal zhing

tshig nas su/ /thams cad cho nges pa 'debs par byed/ /sa yi 'og gi bu mo dang / /lha min bu mo klu mo dang / /gsang dbang bu mo rnams 'khrugs nas/ /gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran/ /rig sngags 'di ni
bzlas pa dang / /sgom pa yi ni sbyor ba yis/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur zhing / /bkug nas rab tu longs spyod byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i

rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos bdud rtsi'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i khro gnyer 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo / /oM b+ha ya nA sha ni trA sa ni trA se/ trA sa

ya trA sa ya/ bai ra Ti b+h+r-i ku Ti ti Te/ bai Ta Ti bai Ta Ti/ shwe te shwe te/ dza Ti ni swA hA/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rig sngags 'chang dang lha rnams ni/ /g.yos shing 'jigs par thob par 'gyur/ /bdud rnams

'jigs pas rnams 'khrugs te/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad/ /yid gcig tu ni dran par byed/ /nor bu'i gdub rnams g.yo ba yis/ /rig sngags 'chang ma klu mor bcas/ /lha min bu mo gsang ba yi/ /bu mo bkug la spyod par
byed/ /'dis ni las kun byed pa dang / /mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'jigs pa yin/ /yang na gsang sngags thams cad ni/ /skye bo med pa'i nags tshal du/ /sngags pas bye ba bzlas nas su/ /las rnams thams

cad bya ba gsungs/ /gang gzhan slob dpon smod pa dang / /theg pa chen po sun 'byin dang / /mi gang gsang sngags rgyud dag gis/ /sbyor ba la ni 'phya byed pa/ /de yis dngos grub thob mi 'gyur/ /de ni rtag tu gdon gyis
zin/ /bsgribs nas gsang bar bya ba 'am/ /yang na lus ni gzhig par bya/ /sngags pas 'di ltar byas na ni/ /byang chub dngos grub legs par 'thob/ /phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad ni/ /
sku gsum ye shes las byung ba'i/ /khyad par du ni bsgom par bya/ /dgra la 'di ni the tshom med/ /khrag 'thung chu yis brlan pa'am/ dur khrod thal ba'am bshang gci yis/ /brlan pa'i gos ni bgos nas
kyang / /rkang pas mtshan ma mnan nas su/ /khro bo'i rgyal por sbyor byas te/ /gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/ /sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig /chus brlan pa yi gos bgos te/ /khro bo'i
mdun du bcings nas su/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan na ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig /bshang gci yis ni sbags pa'i gos/ /

rul ba'i dri can dmad pa dag /bgos nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod na/ /mod la 'chi ba'am skams par 'gyur/ /dur khrod thal bas bsdus pa'i gos/ /bgos nas khro bo khugs nas ni/ /lan grangs stong du brjod na ni/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' rnams par 'jig /skra ni lhug par bshig na ni/ /kha bzhin rnam par bsgyur byas te/ /rkang pas mtshan ma mnan na ni/ /nam mkha'i khams kyang 'jig par 'gyur/ /ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam/ /

khang stong 'am ni bzhi mdo 'am/ /mtshan ma gcig pa'am shing gcig tu/ /drag shul spyod pa brtsams par bya/ /de yi rkang rjes sa la ni/ /mi rus las byas phur bu dag /sor brgyad tsam gyi tshad tsam la/ /lan

grangs brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pa'i/ /phur bu yis ni btab nas su/ /dgra yi khyim sgor brkos te gzhug /sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa/ /shes dang mi shes spangs pa yang / /zla phyed nya yi nang rol du/ /'ching

ba'am yang na 'jig par 'gyur/ /mkhas pas thod pa yongs tshang ba/ /khyad par can ni rnyed pa dang / /de la gsang sngags tshig bris te/ /rdo rje tshig gis bzlas brjod nas/ /dgra yi sgo 'am yang na ni/ /grong du sbas na nges par
skrod/ /ta le'i 'dab ma'am gzhan la'ang rung / /khro bo'i gsang sngags legs bris te/ /dgra yi khyim 'am sge kar ni/ /sbas na 'chi'am skams par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad

chen pos bka' stsal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsum rdo rje'i phur bu'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khams gsum thams

cad ye shes kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phur bu zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo / /o~M` g+ha g+ha/ g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sar+b+ba du phaT phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/

sar+b+ba pA pa~M phaT phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M badzra kI la badzra d+ha ra badzra d+hi re adz+nya ba y+ti/ kA ya bAka tsita ta badzra/ kI la ya hU~M` hU~M`hUM phaT phaT/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis/ /rdo rje dbang chen grags pa kun/ /

brgyal nas 'jigs pa skyes gyur te/ /rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa dran/ /mi yi rus pa'i phur bu'am/ /yang na seng ldeng las byung ba'am/ /lcags las byas pa'i phur bus ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par 'jig / /rdo rje
sems dpa' mnyam gzhag ste/ /'od bzangs me stag 'khrug pa can/ /sku gsum rdo rje mtha' gtugs pas/ /gzugs brnyan la ni bsams nas sbyor/ /rnam snang phyag rgya chen po'am/ /yang na 'dod chags rdo rje

can/ /phyag rgya chen po gshin rje gshed/ /'dod pa'i khro bo nyid du ni/ /rdo rje phur bu bsams par bya/ /bdag nyid chen po stobs po che/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor rdo rje dang / /rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gyis/ /sdang dang gtum po

gcad par bya/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang / /thugs nas zhabs la thug bar du/ /rdo rje phur bus rnam par bsgoms/ /rdo rje ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis/ /sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par gnon/ /'di ni phur

bu'i mthu brlabs te/ /steng 'og lha yi dam tshig yin/ /rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /sangs rgyas thams cad gnon pa yi/ /ting 'dzin sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /myur du 'chi 'am skam par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i sku gnyis su med pa'i dam

tshig gi phur bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang / gsungs dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo / /oM tshin d+ha tshin d+ha da ha da ha/ drIp+ta badzra tsakra hU~M phaT/ phan tshun bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /mthe bo'i

ngos kyi drung du bsdu/ /snang mdzad zhabs kyis mnan nas su/ /rdo rje phur bus btab par bya/ /btab pa tsam gyis sems dpa' che/ /sku gsum ye shes las byung ba/ /dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzod/ /gzhan du

byas na brlag par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i thugs kyi ye shes chen po rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i stang stabs kyis phur bu zhes

bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams las phyung ngo / /oM badzra rA dza hU~M/ rtse mo lnga pa bcings nas su/ /me stag 'phro ba bsgom byas te/ /rdo rje thugs kyis zhabs kyis mnan/ /
rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya/ /btab pa tsam gyis rgyal po che/ /sku gsum ye shes las byung ba/ /dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzod/ /gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

kyis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dam tshig mchog rnams par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung gi dam tshig gi stang stabs kyi phur bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi sku

dang gsung dang thug dang rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo / /oM tri oM b+hu rbu/ rdo rje sor mo bcum pa yis/ /pad ma kha bye 'bar ba yis/ /'dod chags rdo rje zhabs kyis mnan/ /rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab/ /btab

pa tsam gyis rgyal po che/ /sku gsum ye shes las byung ba/ /dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzod/ /gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur/ /sku gsung thugs kyis chags pa yin/ /cho ga bzang po tsham gyis ni/ /
rdo rje mkha' dbyings mtha' gtugs pa/ /mnan 'gyur 'di la the tshom med ces bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje phur bu'i tshig rnams bka' stsal to/ /de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog /
sems can khams la phan bzhed rnams/ /dgyes shing mgu ba brnyes nas su/ /rdo rje dbyings kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /kye ma'o gsang ba'i tshig gi mchog /kye ma'o gsang ba kun
'dus pa/ /kye ma'o zhi ba chos kyi tshig /ye shes rdo rje phur bu rmad/ /gsang sngags kun gyi phur bus 'di/ /bde gshegs bka' yi rjes su byed/ /'di dag sangs rgyas kun gyi ste/ /phur bu

de nyid rnams las byung / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chom rkun thams cad mdongs par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'od zer can 'di

gsungs so/ /oM mA rI ts+yai de ba tA ye swA hA/ rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni/ /dbang chen grags pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /thugs ni dgyes shing mgu bar 'gyur/ /sras rnams kyi ni spyan yang phye/ /'di ni

las rnams thams cad ma/ /chom rkun sdang ba 'ching mdzad ma/ /'di yi sbyor ba la gnas na/ /'gro ba'i tshe na mthong mi 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas sdang

ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed pa'i ye shes chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rig sngags
kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs so/ /oM ma hA sa ha sra pra martanA bar sid ge ma Ni badzra Ni hU~M phaT swA hA/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/ /byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad dang / /bdud kyi rig rnams g.yos par 'gyur/ /gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad pa/ /thams cad tshig bzhin btud nas su/ /bcom ldan rig sngags mthu stobs kyis/ /gnod bgyid
thams cad gzer lags so/ /gang na rig sngags stobs mo che/ /pha rol gnon pa 'di zlos pa/ /der ni bdag cag mi mchi zhing / /der ni srung ba dag kyang bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ brgya byin mngon par mtho ba'i stobs lha ma yin rnam par 'joms pas rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas

rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi gzungs chen mo 'di gsungs so/ /oM b+ha ga bA tI d+h+wa dzA gra ke yu re pa ra sai n+ya/ bi d+h+wAn sa na kA swA sai n+ya pa ri la ni/ u la kA mu khi kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ pa ra sai n+ya ma
a nan ta b+hu dze/ a nan ta mu khe pra ha ra pra ha ra hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams g.yos par 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa' rab g.yos shing / /

bdud kyi sde rnams tshig par 'gyur/ /gnod sbyin srin po gos bral nas/ /'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa yis/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran/ /bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis tshig

lags te/ /bdag cag dam tshig la gnas par 'tshal lags na mgon mdzad cing lus thams cad rab tu bsgrub tu gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas mngal thams cad yang dag par

skyes pas khyab pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba 'di gsungs so/ /o ma Ni d+ha ri badzra Ni mA hA pra ti sa ri swA hA/ rig sngags chen mo gsungs pa dang / /rig sngags rgyal

mo'i mthu yis ni/ /mi yi skye dgu 'tshe byed pa/ /mthu chen mngal ni 'phrog pa dang / /log 'dren kun dang sdang ba'i rnams/ /mi bzad gi l+tsas tshig gyur nas/ /'jigs pa dang ni skrag pa yis/ /rdo rje snang mdzad drung lhags te/ /
zhabs la gtugs te tshig smras pa/ /bdag cag dam tshig gnas par 'tshal/ /rig sngags dam tshig rtag gnas pa/ /gang gis mngal yang mi 'phrog cing / /rtag tu mngal ni sel bar mdzad/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas nor gyi rgyun gyis yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo

nor rgyun 'di gsungs so/ /oM ba su d+hA ri ma hA ba su d+hA ra b+h-iSh+Te ni pa ta ni ba su swA hA/ nor gyi rgyun zhes bya ba yi/ /rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dag /yid ni 'jigs shing skrag

gyur nas/ /rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ /drung du nye bar 'ongs nas su/ /dam bcas pa yi tshig smras pa/ /bcom ldan nor rgyun zhes bya ba'i/ /mtshan ni mi mchog sgrags bgyid na/ /de la nor gyi char 'bab cing / /nor chen dang ni

ldan par bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod par byed pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas srin mo glog 'bar ma bsgyur ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so/ /oM re du tre Ni pra ku pata tsaN Da

ma hA be ga d+ha ri bid sA d+hu dzi dz+we/ ma ho da ni rau tri kra pA la mA la d+ha na ri Ne dzA Ta mu ku Ta/ maN ti te/ na na pra ha ra na/ d+ha ri hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra/ /ku ru ku ru hU~M hU~M swA hA sar+b+ba sha trU~M na na/ sho Ni ta bi ba pra tsaN De/ be ga d+ha ri

pa tsa ta pa tsa ta/ be ki ra ta sa ta ya hU~M/ da ha da ha/ sar+b+ba sha trUM/ sar+b+ba du sh+TAn/ ni kr-in ta/ pra sA d+ha ya hU~M/ ma hA b+ha ga ba te/ dz+wA la dz+wA la/ hU~M phaT/ che ge'i mo zhig me ba sha nA ya hU~M swA hA/ de nas srin mo 'bar ba'i glog /rig sngags
chen mo gsungs pa yis/ /bdud kyi gnas rnams tshig par 'gyur/ /dgra rnams kyi ni snying yang skams/ /dur khrod kyi ras la srin mo btsag gis bris nas legs par sbas te gu gul gyi bdug pas bsreg cing

brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ /me tog dmar po dang / dri dmar po dang / gtor ma dang lha bshos dmar por byas pa byin nas dur khrod du brko bar bya'o/ /de'i steng du ming nas smos shing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas

pa'i yungs kar gyis gtor to/ /bskos pa'i mod la phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro/ /mnan pa dang rmongs par byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrog ma'i dga' ston gnod sbyin mo'i tshogs

dga' bar byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje 'chang chen po 'phrog ma'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM hA ri t+ye na hA yak+Shi Ni ye ha ra ha ra/ sar+b+ba yak+Shi Ni pra be sha ni

swA hA/ de nas 'phrog dga' 'phrog ma ni/ /gnod sbyin chen mo gsungs pa dang / /gnod sbyin ma kun g.yos nas su/ /dngos grub phyir ni mngon phyogs 'gyur/ /khro mo'i 'khor lo gnod sbyin ma/ /brgyad dbus 'phrogs mas brgyan

byas te/ /lcags kyu 'bras bu ne le can/ /gnod sbyin brgyad kyis klubs nas su/ /gnod sbyin ma kun bsgrub par bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad chen po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mi ngas chen po zhi bar mdzad pa'i rig sngags ri khrod kyi shing lo can ma 'di gsungs so/ /oM pi shA tsi par+Na sha ba ri/ sar+b+ba mA rI pra sha ma ni hU~M phaT/ de nas rig
sngags che gsungs pas/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g.yos/ /gnod byed nad 'gro srin po dang / /sdang ba rnams kyi snying yang zags/ /yam shing 'o ma can dang til/ /'o mas du ba zhi bar 'gyur/ /nam
mkhar kun nas rig sngags kyi/ /rgyal mos legs par bkang nas su/ /bdud rtsi char 'bebs bsams na ni/ /mod la gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyur 'phrul gyi dra ba las 'di ni gsang

sngags kyi ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa'i rim par phye ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'

stsal to/ /sku gsum ye shes kyi rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba lag pa'i phyag rgya tha dad pa rnams mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis nyon cig /gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing / /'di na
lus ni byin rlabs te/ /rang gi gzugs su rnam bsgoms na/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na/ /dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ /lag pas gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las mthe bo gnyis gteg pa na

de bzhin gshegs pa'i ste/ sku byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las g.yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste/ g.yas pa'i mthe bo bteg pa ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi ste gsung byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /

de nyid las g.yas pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste g.yon pa'i mthe bo bteg pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi ste/ thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo bsgreng

ba'i thor to g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba ni rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i phyag rgya'o/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo dkrung du 'dug nas lag pa g.yon pa pang par bzhag ste/ g.yas pa sa la gnon pa ni mi

'khrug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las g.yas pa mchog sbyin par byas pa ni rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las lag pa gnyis bsam gtan gyi tshul du byas pa ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid

las g.yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byas pa ni gdon mi za bar grub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcing bar byas pa las gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba ni rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las

gung mo'i tshigs dang po bkug ste/ rin po che'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje rin chen ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las gung mo pad mo'i 'dab ma ltar gdub bu'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las

gung mo nang du bskum pa ni rdo rje las ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba la 'dzub mo gnyis gdub bu ltar byas te mthe bo'i rtse mor mig gi tshul du byas pa ni sangs rgyas spyan gyi

phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshigs gsum par 'dzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i tshul du bzung ba ni mA ma kI'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te pad ma kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni
gos dkar can gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las 'dzub mo gnyis bkug pas gung mo'i sen mo mnan te mthe bo gnyis dbus su bzhag nas cung zad bkug pa ni sgrol ma'i ud

pa la'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te/ 'dzub mo dang gung mo'i tshigs dbus mar gdub bu'i tshul byas nas mthe bo gnyis glor bzhag pa 'di ni skul byed ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rdo rje
bcing pa byas pa las 'dzub mo gnyis mthe bo'i rtse mor bkug pa 'di ni rin chen sgrol ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis brkyang ste mthe bos so so'i mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan nas lhag ma rdo rje'i
mtshan nyid du byas pa 'di ni khro gnyer can ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs pa las 'dzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings pa 'di ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi
phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te rtse mo'i tshul du byas la gung mo'i rgyab tu srin lag bsnol la/ 'dzub mo gnyis gdub bu'i tshul du byas
pas dkris pas mthe bo gnyis mdun du bzhag pa las cung zad bkug ste kha'i tshul du byas pa 'di ni gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las khro bo'i mdzub

mo snying gar bzhag ste/ lag pa g.yas pa thal lcag gi tshul du byas pa ni khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis la mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud ltar mdud la 'dzub mo gzhibs te bsgreng ba las bzlog ste/

dpral bar bzhag pa ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bos srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyi sen mo mnan la ral gri shubs nas dbyung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'i phyag

rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las rgyab sprad de mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings nas 'dzub mo gnyis bsgrengs pa las zhags pa'i tshul du byas pa ni 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon

pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi 'dzub mo snying gar bzhag la/ g.yas pa khro bo'i sor mo be con gyi tshul du phyar ba ni be con sngon po can gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje snying gar bzhag la g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur

rdeg stangs dang bcas par phyar ba ni stobs po che'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs la/ 'dzub mo dang gung mo bsgrengs te sprad nas me tog gi tshul du byas pa ni byams pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal

mo khong stong du sbyar nas 'dzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi sen mo mnan nas uta pal kha bye ba'i tshul du gzhug pa ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa pang par bzhag la/ lag pa g.yas pa glang

po che'i sna ltar byas pa ni spos kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur nam mkha' la sgreng ba lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo ba dan gyi tshul du byas pa ni ye shes tog gi phyag rgya'o/ /bzang po'i 'dug stangs su 'dug ste/

thal mo khong stong du sbyar te snying gar bzhag pa ni bzang skyong gi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis chu rlabs kyi tshul du brkyang ba las sor mo rnams chu rlabs drang ba ni blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag la

g.yas pa mchog sbyin pa ni blo gros mi zad pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur pang du bzhag la g.yas pa se gol gtogs pa'i tshul du byas pa ni spobs pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis pad ma cung zad

kha bye ba ltar byas pa ni mthu chen thob kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis me tog 'dor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni ngan song thams cad spong ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las bsnun pa'i tshul du byas pa ni mya ngan

thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis brkyang nas 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni dra ba can gyi 'od kyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa mchog sbyin par byas pa la g.yon pa zla ba'i tshul du byas pa ni zla

'od kyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis bum pa'i tshul du byas nas dbang bskur ba ni 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la g.yas pa'i khu tshur nam mkha' la kun du bskor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya'o/ /

g.yon pa sa la brkyang nas lag pa g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo dang mthe bong sprad nas zhi ba'i tshul du byas pa ni sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa rdo rje khu tshur las khro bo'i 'dzub mo snying gar bzhag la hU~M zhes bya zhing / lag pa g.yas

pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg stabs dang bcas par phyar ba ni ri khrod lo ma can gyi phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa sor mo brkyang ba las 'dzub mo dang mthe bo rkang pas 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la/ lag pa g.yas pa khab kyi tshul gyis 'tshe bar byed pa rnams

kyi kha mig 'drub pa ni 'od zer can ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis spyi bor sbrul mgo gdengs ka'i gdugs ltar byas nas phud ces brjod pa ni dug sel ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag gnyis las 'dzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba

ni rdo rje hU~M mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las g.yas pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu yis dzaHzhes bya ba'i dgug pa ni rdo rje khro bo lcags kyu dgug pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa ste rdo rje khro bo'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur

gnyis kyi mthe'u chung mche ba'i tshul du byas pa las bsnol te 'gram pa gnyis su bzhag la/ lce ljib cing khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya ba ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mthe bo chung gnyis bskum/ 'dzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du

byas nas kha'i grwar bzhag ste hU~M zhes bya zhing khro bo'i lta bas lus gcu ba ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las 'dzub mo gnyis brkyang ste bsnol nas gyen du bteg pa ltar byas pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi

phyag rgya'o/ /de nyid las mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol te bstod cing bteg pa ni sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bsnol nas mchan khung du bsdams te khro bo'i lta bas 'gyur ba dang bcas pa ni gdon thams cad

skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa g.yon brkyang ste kha sbub pa la de'i steng du g.yas pa bzhag nas lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo bskyod pa ni lha ma yin gyi sgyud dang 'khrul 'khor 'byed pa dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo smrar

gzhug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo dang mthe bo chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings te bzhag la/ lhag ma ba dan rtse gsum pa'i tshul du byas nas stang stabs dang bcas par hU~M zhes bya ba ni khro bo rdo rje sa 'og gi phyag rgya'o/ /

g.yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi khro bo'i 'dzub mos bsdigs pa ni rdo rje'i bdag mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje bcings pa las 'dzub mo gnyis brkyang ste phur bu'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje phur bu'i phyag rgya'o/ /g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur brdung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni rdo rje tho ba'i phyag rgya'o/ /

lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las 'dzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje mdud pa dor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bcings pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcings te sog le drang ba'i tshul byas pa ni rdo rje sog le'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo zla ba'i tshul du

byas te gdong g.yog cing brkyang la khro bo'i mig tu byas nas a la la zhes bya ba ni rdo rje srin mo'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings pa la 'dzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis pad ma'i tshul du byas pa ni sprin thams cad gtub pa'i

phyag rgya'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las 'dzub mo gnyis gdub bu ltar byas te rkam pa'i tshul du dpung pa brkyang ba ni 'khrul 'khor gyi phur pa dbyung ba'i rkam pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo

lag mthil du bzhag ste/ lhag ma rnams 'dab ma ltar g.yab cing rkang pa ya gcig sa la btsugs la/ gcig rgyab tu bskums nas khro bo'i lta bas lce ljib cing hU~M phaT ces bya bas rim gyis bskyod pa ni rdo rje nam

mkha' lding gi phyag rgya'o/ /'di bcings pa tsam gyis khams gsum khyab pa'i dug kyang skad cig gis sel bar byed do/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mda' gzhu dgang ba'i tshul gyis phyogs bzhir mda' bkang ste 'phangs

pas pha rol dpung gzhig pa ni mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o/ /khu tshur gnyis las gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba las rin po che'i tshul du dgug la mthe bo brkyang ba'i steng du 'dzub mo gnyis gdub bu'i tshul du

byas pa ni sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi phyag rgya g.yul las sgrol bar byed pa'o/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos sor mo mnan te gung mo bsgreng la g.yas pas pad ma kha 'byed pa'i tshul du byas pa ni ha la ha la'i phyag

rgya'o/ /khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis dkris la 'dzub mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng nas bzlog la dpral bar bzhag pa ni rdo rje khrag 'thung gi phyag rgya ste/ dur khrod du 'jug pa na mkha' 'gro ma

rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o/ /g.yon pas thod pa gzung la g.yas pas mdung rtse gsum thogs nas ral pa bcings te zla bas brgyan cing mtshan bsgreng la/ mig gsum pa gar byed pa ni gar stabs kyi phyag rgya ste ya

ni bde byed kyi phyag rgya'o/ /g.yon pa mi 'jigs par byas pa las sor mo rnams cung zad phye ste mthe bo lag mthil du bzhag /de bzhin du g.yas pa'i khu tshur dbyug tho 'dzin pa ltar byas pa ni khyab 'jug gi

phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis brkyang nas pad ma'i tshul du byas pa ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te me tog ltar byas pa ni ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis ni/ /
rgyab du mdud pa ltar 'dor zhing / /rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i/ /rin chen cod pan phreng dbang bskur/ /ting 'dzin gnas pas 'khor lo can/ /'khor lo mnga' ba'i lha rnams la/ /sangs rgyas sa ni

rab 'gengs pa'i/ /gsang ba'i mchod pa 'byung bar bsam/ /'gyur zhing cung zad 'jo tshul can/ /bsgeg mo yi ni phyag rgya yis/ /gar gyi tshul tu bskyod nas kyang / /hU~M zhes bya ba glur blangs shing / /de nas

sangs rgyas kun dgyes pa/ /rdo rje rgyud ni bsgreng bar bya/ /de nas phreng tshul phreng ba yis/ /lha rnams kun la bcing bar bya/ /'jo sgeg thabs la spro ba yis/ /lag gnyis bskor zhing dgrol ba dang / /g.yas nas
g.yon du bskor ba yis/ /gar stabs byas nas mgo la gzhag /me tog dbul ba'i tshul du ni/ /gang gis me tog thal mo sbyar/ /bdug spos rtse mo sbyar ba yis/ /gung mo gnyis ni bzlog ste bsgreng / /bskor
cing bsgyur ba byas pa yis/ /mtheb gnyis mar me'i tshul du gzhag /dung gi tshul du lag bsgyur nas/ /dung phor lta bu'i mchod yon dbul/ /de nas lha rnams kun la yang / /lag pa'i gar gyis byug
tshul bya/ /de nas sil snyan tshul gyis su/ /lag gnyis sil snyan legs par brdung / /dung dang gling bu bud pa dang / /lag pa gnyis ni rnga yab g.yob/ /bsil yab tshul gyis bsil yab dang / /sor mo

gnyis kyis rgyal mtshan bya/ /tshon bgye tshe na lcug phran ltar/ /bskyod cing tshon gyi phreng ba bgye/ /lag g.yon snod kyi tshul byas la/ /g.yas pa yis ni lha bshos dbul/ /khang pa brtsegs pa bzhag nas su/ /
gos kyi tshul gyis gos rnams dang / /gdub bu ske rags rkang rgyan dang / /rna cha do shal gnas lngar gzhag /de nas gdugs kyi tshul gyis su/ /lha rdzas gdugs ni legs par gzung / /bsams gtan

tshul gyis lag pa dag /nam mkha' la ni mdzes bskor na/ /sangs rgyas zhing rab 'gengs byed pa'i/ /bla re rnam pa sna tshogs 'gyur/ /grwar ni pad ma'i phreng ba dang / /dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan/ /

gsang sngags 'di ni cho ga bzhin/ /rdo rje dril bu bsil ba yis/ /sgo 'phar dag kyang dbye bar bya/ /oM badzra gaN De rad Na/ pra ra Na/ sam pA ra Ni sarba bud d+ha k+She tra/ pra tsa li te/ pradz+nya pA ra mi tA/ nA da swa b+ha be badzra

d+ham+ma hrI da ya/ a pa sho d+ha ni hU~M hU~M hU~M/ lag g.yas rdo rje gsor bya zhing / /sna tshogs khugs su 'gyur ba yi/ /rdo rje glu yis bstod par bya/ /rdo rje theg pas mnyes byed pa/ /'di ni don dam mchod pa yin/ /gang gis rnam rtog

rnam spangs te/ /byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pas/ /lus ngag sems ni rnam dag pa/ /de yi mchod pa bla na med/ /sems can gang gis dbu ma yi/ /theg pa gong ma ma bsgoms shing / /theg pa dman pa lhag mos pa/ /
de yi mchod pa kun rdzogs pa/ /sangs rgyas dbang chen grags kun gyis/ /mchod pa de dag gsan pa dang / /ngo mtshar byung ba'i spyan phye nas/ /legs so zhes ni rab tu gsungs/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas thams
cad kyis/ /byang chub sangs rgyas thabs su ste/ /rdo rje bsgom pa byas pa yin/ /nyon mongs med par byang chub 'thob/ /rdo rje theg chen legs pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa legs/ /zab cing
rgya che legs pa ste/ /rdo rje rin chen kun 'dus legs/ /de nas ye shes kyi sku gsum las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje theg pa sngags pa thos nas/
dga' bas spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad la/ /dga' ba'i yid kyis stod par byed/ /thog ma med cing skye ba med/ /'gyur ba med cing gnas pa med/ /mkha' bzhin rnam rtog las
grol ba/ /rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtag /thabs su brtags pa gang yin des/ /ye shes kyi ni sras po kun/ /rdo rje theg pa bsgoms pa yis/ /sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur/ /zhes
smras so/ /bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang ba yis/ /dngos po dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen/ /dang po gang du rnam par snang mdzad ni/ /dag cing dri med blos ni oM du sprul/ /gzugs mang

tshul gyis phreng bas bskor ba yi/ /sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsung snyan yi ge kun la khyab pa yi/ /spros med gsung du 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs/ /mig gsum lha mo dang bcas 'dul mdzad

pa/ /sgyu 'phrul tshul mang ldan pa 'ga' ma mchis/ /gang du bde chen rang bzhin rjes chags pa/ /na chung dag dang lhan cig bzhad mdzad cing / /g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje gsor nas su/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gis dril bu
sgra snyan 'khrol/ /lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor gyur pa yi/ /dam tshig rnams kyis bya ba byas par 'gyur/ /gcig gi lag pas kun nas 'khyud pa ste/ /gnyis pa rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu/ /gsum pa
mi bzod me tog phreng ba 'thor/ /bzhi pa bde ba yis ni mda' yang 'phen/ /gang zhig glu 'di len par byed pa dag /bde ba'i rdo rje can dang mnyam par 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed

pa'i rdo rje'i glu yin no/ /oM a nut+ta d+ha ra sar+b+ba pU dzA me g+ha ud ga te/ s+pha ra Na hi ma~M ga ga na hU~M phaT swA hA/ sngags 'di lan gsum brjod pas mchod pa'i sprin rab 'byam thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro/ /

rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchod pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin
gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis tshig mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /ye shes
gces pa dri med pa/ /byang chub sems ni rin po che/ /bla na med pa bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa thugs su chud nas byang chub sems dpa' thams
cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems ni lus kyi rnam pa yin/ /lus kyang sems kyi rnam par yin/ /sems kyang tshig gis brjod pa yin/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnam par sbyor ba thos nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /e ma kun du bzang po ni/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can/ /chos rnams skye ba med pa ste/ /g.yo ba med cing

gnas pa med/ /rtog pa'i dri ma spang pa 'di/ /bskyed par bya zhes rab tu gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas gsung spros pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag ma skyes te/ /chos can med cing chos nyid med/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i/ /byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin/ /
zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po 'di dag dngos med de/ /chos kyi mtshan nyid spangs pa yin/ /bdag med chos
las legs byung ba'i/ /byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis

rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /dngos po skye ba med pa ste/ /dngos po ngo bo yod min pas/ /nam mkha'i go 'phang thob po
zhes/ /dngos rnams rab tu brjod pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla ma'i

yang bla ma ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so/ /chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/ /gzod nas dag cing rnyogs pa med/ /sems can med cing

srog med kyang med/ /sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med/ /rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i/ /byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis gsungs so/ /de nas

yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag par mthong nas

ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do/ /kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye ma'o/ /dag kye ma'o chos ni bstan pa rnams/ /bdag med chos las las byung ba/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub
sems ni bsgom pa yin/ /mi g.yo yi ge las byung ba/ /rmi lam sogs ltar ma skyes pa/ /byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te/ /sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung

bcas nas/ /dang por rang bzhin dag pa zhes/ /dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas/ /yid kyis hU~M byas rdo rje can/ /rdo rje sems mas byin gyis brlabs/ /rin chen lus su nga rgyal bya/ /lag pa bstod de bskor ba yi/ /

lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang drang / /byon nas dang por phyogs bcings te/ /dam tshig dag kyang dbul bar bya/ /gdan rnams so sor phul nas su/ /mchod yon dbul ba'i sbyor ba bya/ /dbang bskur mtshon cha go cha
sogs/ /sil snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya/ /rnam pa kun gyis mnyes par bya/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid can gyis brtag /rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste/ /byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtags dang / /gzugs

gnyis rdzogs par gyur pa ni/ /rnal 'byor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsung / /sngags kyis byin brlabs nga rgyal bskyed/ /rnal 'byor byin brlabs yin par gsungs/ /byang chub sems ni dag pa dang / /gsang sngags sa bon bskyed

pa che/ /phyag rgya'i tshogs su brtags pa yin/ /rim gyis gzugs ni rdzogs byas pa/ /de nas brtag par brjod pa ste/ /rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs/ /bsdu dang spro bar byas pa las/ /rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa

dag /skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa/ /rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do/ /dang por dam tshig byin brlabs par/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa bdag gis brtags/ /rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag /'di ni rnal 'byor
cho gar bshad/ /nyon mongs dri mar byas pa'i sems/ /byang chub sems kyis dag byas te/ /de ni rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes/ /brjod cing thal mo gsum gyis sbyang / /dag 'gyur de nas blo yis ni/ /sems la so

sor brtag par bya/ /sems la so sor brtags nas kyang / /phyi rol rang bzhin stong par bya/ /sems tsam la ni gnas nas su/ /byang chub tshogs kyi bag chags te/ /bsgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag /zla ba'i gzugs su rnam

par brtag /lag pa'i pad ma la gnas pa'i/ /\u0f00 gyi myu gus bskrun pa yi/ /yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs/ /rdo rje skur ni bsgom par bya/ /AHzhes bya ba spros med gsung / /sems ni hUM~Mzhes bya bar sprul/ /yi ge

gsum gyis byin brlabs lus/ /snying la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs/ /de la rang gi yi ge ni/ /mdog gzugs 'od ni phyed bsams te/ /nga rgyal bskyed nas de la ni/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag yin brjod/ /rgyan kun yongs

su rdzogs pa dang / /'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ /cha shas kyi ni dra ba can/ /ye shes sems dpa' rdzogs par brtag /de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis/ /go cha mtshon cha la sogs bya/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas

lngar dbang bskur te/ /cod pan phreng ba rnams kyis klubs/ /de nas de 'og sangs rgyas kyi/ /sprul pa mdzad pa'i sgyu ma spro/ /yan lag bzhi pa'i dbus ldan pa'i/ /phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dag dang / /bsnyems

ma dang ni rtogs ldan ma/ /mtshon cha mda' dang rtse mo can/ /sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam mang po/ /rnam par 'phrul par byin gyis brlab/ /kun la khyab par byed pa yi/ /sna tshogs dbus su bzhag nas ni/ /de nyid chen po bdag
nyid lngas/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'khor lo khyab byas te/ /dga' bas dga' byed bzhi yang spro/ /ting 'dzin kun gyis dga' ba la/ /longs par spyod pa'i sngags pa yis/ /'khor lo la ni rdo rje'i gzugs/ /
pad ma'i gzugs la de dag ni/ /'khor lo kun las pad ma yi/ /ngo bo yis ni rol pa dang / /e zhes bya ba 'phros pa las/ /mdog ldan bdag gnyid gzugs su bya/ /mdzes pa'i rgyan nyid kun ldan
pa/ /nyid kyi stan la bzhugs par blta/ /sgeg mo glu dang gar rnams dang / /rgyal mtshan la sogs tshon dgye dang / /sil snyan mchod pa'i rnam pa ni/ /sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod par bya/ /rnam pa
kun dang ldan par ni/ /bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgoms nas/ /myur ches pa dang bul ba dang / /mi gsal gug bskyed nyams pa dang / /rtog pa ngan pa rnam spangs nas/ /de nas gsang sngags bzlas

brjod bya/ /bzlas pa skyo na lag g.yas kyis/ /bsgrims te rdo rje gsor nas kyang / /g.yon pas rdo rje dril bsil zhing / /rdo rje glu tshul sna tshogs dang / /ba dan tshul du bya bas mchod/ /bzlas pa'i mjug ni brtul nas kyang / /gshegs

su gsol te bdag nyid bsrung / /lus dang ngag dang sems bsgoms te/ /brtan por ci bder 'gro bar bya/ /bar chad du ni gyur na yang / /yi ge brgya pas byin gyis brlab/ /de ltar sgom pas sgom byed pa/ /rdo rje theg pas rab rdzogs

pa'i/ /byang chub des ni myur thob nas/ /zla nyi'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang / /sna tshogs las kyis thog 'dren cing / /rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed/ /chags chen pad ma'i gdung rgyud can/ /gnas chen 'jig rten dbang phyug

'gyur/ /dpal ldan rig sngags kun gyi gtso/ /dga' chen rdo rje lcags kyur 'gyur/ /sgyu ma bshig pa kun shes shing / /dregs pa 'joms byed khro bor 'gyur/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni byang chub
kyi sems sgom pa'i ye shes sgrub pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
bka'i 'khor lo rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyi nang gi 'khor lo thams cad rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi las kyi sbyor ba rab 'byams 'di

bka' stsal to/ /lha ni gang yang rung ba zhig /'khor lo'i dbus su bzhag na ni/ /de yi ming smos rdo rje yi/ /dkyil 'khor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsung / /zhi dang rgyas dang drag shul dang / /rang gi las
la sbyor ba na/ /'khor lo'i rgyal po rnam bsgoms nas/ /bdag po nyid kyis rab tu bya/ /zhi ba spyan dang skul byed mas/ /rgyas la rin chen gos dkar mo/ /dbang la sgrol ma lu gu rgyud/ /yams dang gnod
pa gzhig pa'i phyir/ /'od zer can dang ri khrod mas/ /drag shul spyad la mA ma kI/ /khro gnyer can ma dag gis bya/ /'di dag shes rab rol pa ste/ /chags pa'i rdo rjes rjes chags pa/ /gsang sngags

de nyid kyis bskul na/ /gdon mi za bar phrin las mdzad/ /spyan dang lha mo skul byed ma/ /dbang po zhi ba zla 'dra ba/ /phyag gnyis na ni bgrang phreng dang / /ril ba spyi blugs kyis brgyan pa/ /dang por ting 'dzin

gyis sprul nas/ /bum pa zla ba'i mdangs ldan pa/ /bdud rtsi'i 'o mas rab bkang ste/ /lag gnyis pad ma'i gdub mchog gis/ /rnam par snang mdzad zhabs drung du/ /nad pa la ni bdugs par bsams/ /rin chen ma

dang gos dkar can/ /sku che kha dog ser po ste/ /lha mo ser mo snang ba la/ /phyag na rin chen pad ma can/ /dang por ting 'dzin gyis sprul nas/ /yid 'ong rgyal ba'i 'dod pa yis/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i zhabs drung du/ /

bdud rtsi'i rab tu dgang ba dang / /bla med rin chen khar bab na/ /rgyas pa mtshungs med mdzes par 'gyur/ /lha mo sku chen mdog dmar ba/ /sgrol ma de bzhin lu gu rgyud/ /kun nas 'od dmar 'bar ba can/ /

lha rdzas lcags kyu zhags thogs pa/ /rab tu bzhad cing spyan phye bas/ /'od dpag med pa'i zhabs drung du/ /bsgrubs bya rgyags pas myos pa dag /bkug steng mda' yis bsnun na ni/ /skad cig nyid la dbang du mdzad/ /mi

ngas gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir/ /sku chen nam mkha'i kha dog can/ /'od zer can dang ri khrod mas/ /rdo rje don yod zhabs drung du/ /mkhas pas sngar bshad tshul du ni/ /bdud rtsi yis kyang rnam par bzlog /lha mo khro

gnyer mA ma kI/ /margad lta bu'i mdog can ma/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs pa/ /rdo rjes bsdigs par brtson pa yis/ /rdo rje mi 'khrugs zhabs drung du/ /khros nas rdo rje'i me yi char/ /'bebs par rnam par bsam par bya/ /

rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba des/ /bsgrub bya tshig nas mog ces byed/ /sbyor ba 'di yi mod la ni/ /de ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba'am/ /yang na lus ni 'jig par mdzad/ /byin brlabs dam tshig dbang bskur la/ /rdo rje sems ma rin chen dang / /

chos dang rdo rje las ma bzhi/ /sbyor ba rnams ni rab tu sbyar/ /sems dpa' chen po bcu drug kyang / /bla med 'khor lo byed pa ste/ /rang gi phyogs nas las byas na/ /'bras bu don yod sbyin par byed/ /khro bo'i lus la legs gnas te/ /

khro bo'i rgyal po sbyar bar bya/ /dam tshig la sogs cho ga bzhin/ /der ni rdo rje bsgoms nas bskul/ /rkang pa'i rjes kyi sa blangs la/ /dur khrod thal ba dag dang bsre/ /de yi ras blangs mi rus dang / /chu 'gram gnyis kyi sa dag

ni/ /btags nas lung bong gcin gyis sbru/ /de las dgra bo'i gzugs byas la/ /de tshe gzugs brnyan bcing bar bya/ /dug dang ske tshe lan tshwa dang / /'bru mar tsha ba rab bsres te/ /dgra bo tsha ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ /
de yis lus nang rab tu dgang / /de nas rnam shes rlung 'dra ba/ /lcags kyu yis ni bkug nas kyang / /srin bu me khyer 'dra bcug ste/ /zhags pa yis ni dam du gzung / /de ni rdo rje sgrog tu gzhug /
bsgrims nas de yi ming smos te/ /dgra bo'i lus ni ma lus par/ /po son cha yi tsher mas dbug /mi rus las byas phur bu'am/ /yang na seng ldeng las byung bas/ /dpral ba snying mgrin dpung
mgo gnyis/ /gnas lnga dag tu bsgrims te gdab/ /nim pa'i shing la sbar ba yis/ /me 'bar ba la bkal bar bya/ /mkhas pas rkang pa nas brtsams te/ /mtshon cha rnon pos gtubs nas ni/ /'bar

ba'i lus can khros pa yis/ /de yi dum bu sbyin bsreg bya/ /las 'di la ni lhag par yang / /rus sbal gyi ni rkang stabs sbyar/ /nyi ma'i gung ngam nam phyed na/ /las 'di nyid ni bsgrub par bya/ /las 'di byas nas nges par

ni/ /gang zhig rgyal bas bsrungs na'ang des/ /nges par 'chi na khyab 'jug dang / /lha chen tshangs pas ci zhig smos/ /phyi rol gyi drag shul spyod pa'i go cha'o/ /gsod pa'i yes shes las sprul pa/ /nang gi yang ni

bshad par bya/ /bsgrub bya yid kyis bsrungs nas su/ /cho ga bzhin du dgug par bya/ /lag na ral gri mtshon cha dang / /be con rdo rje gtun shing zhags/ /lag na 'khor lo mda' gzhu can/ /khro bo sna tshogs bsnams

pa des/ /bsgrub bya zhags pas bcings nas su/ /rdo rje yi ni khro bo yis/ /lho yi phyogs su khrid pa dang / /rdo rje gzhan gyis brdeg pa dang / /de ni ral gris gtub pa dang / /rgyu ma lang long nar bar bsam/ /oM hU~M

badzra rak+Sha sI/ b+hak+Sha ya tha phaT/ rdo rje srin mo bsgoms nas kyang / /bya rog wa dang bya rgod kyis/ /kun nas yongs su bskor nas su/ /de dag zang thob byed par ni/ /bsgoms zhing ming nas bskul bar bya/ /rlung
gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i/ /rdo rje rnga mo rnams bsams te/ /bsgrub par bya bar yongs brtags pa/ /de yi rgyab tu zhon nas su/ /rdo rje khro bos gzir bzhin du/ /lho phyogs su ni dkri bar bya/ /

de yi rkang rjes sa la ni/ /rlung gis gtsubs pa'i shing lo la/ /de yi ming nas brjod byas te/ /rdo rje sna yon drung du sba/ /de lta bur ni sbyor ba las/ /bsgom zhing cho ga bzhin byas na/ /brgya byin nyid kyang bskrad 'gyur na/ /

sa steng skye bo smos ci dgos/ /de ming gsang sngags dang spel te/ /'ug pa'i sgro la bris nas ni/ /dge sbyong bram ze'i skras dkris te/ /sa yi 'og tu bskos nas gzhug /rdo rje khro bo gnyis kyis ni/ /'thab mo

'gyed du gzhug par bya/ /de ltar bsams pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /'dod pa bzhin du dbye bar 'gyur/ /hU~M zhes bya bas gang ba yi/ /rdo rje phra mo bsgom byas nas/ /sna yi rtse mo nas bton te/ /bsgrub bya'i lus ni dgang bar bya/ /

lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad du/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bcings nas su/ /rdo rje 'bar ba 'phros gyur pa/ /des ni lus kyang bskam par bya/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgoms te/ /kun nas kyang ni gzhig par bya/ / oM

badzra DA ki nI/ a mu ka s+ya rag ta A kar Sha tsa sha ya hU~M phaT/ sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni/ /skam 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /mkhas pas rlung gi phyogs song ste/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas nas ni/ /spos kyi thig le

bdun byas te/ /de dag kham pa'i phor pa dgab/ /de ni ri rab thams cad nas/ /rtse mo brgyad par sprul bya te/ /rdo rje 'phro bas brgyan pa yis/ /de dag rnams ni mnan par bya/ /ya~M zhes bya bas bskyed pa'i

rlung bdun rnams/ /la~M zhes bya ba'i mtshan ma dbang chen gyi/ /nang du rlung rnams nges par chud par bya/ /de lta'i sbyor bas 'jig pa'i rlung yang bcings/ /pad ma 'dab brgyad bsgoms nas de'i 'dab la/ /
klu brgyad bkod dbus me tshogs 'bar ba can/ /rdo rje khro bo'i sku yi zhabs mthil gyis/ /klu rnams mnan na char sprin char pa 'bebs/ /hU~M zhes bya bas gnyis dbus klu rnams kyi/ /snying po yongs bcug
spel mas gzir nas su/ /hU~M zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas nas su/ /'jig dus char rna lta bu'i char pa 'bab/ /nyi ma'i mdog ltar dmar po'i 'od bzang zhal/ /nam mkha' khyab par rnam par gdangs nas ni/ /

kun nas char chus yongs su gang ba'i sprin/ /hU~M zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lce yis lhag /dbugs rngub pa yis bkug nas dbyung ba yis/ /shing bal bzhin du rab tu gtor bar bya/ /yang na rang gi phyag rgya'i
tshogs 'bar ba/ /btang bas skad cig la ni bcad gtubs te/ /hU~M zhes bya bas bsdigs pa byas na ni/ /nam mkha' dag kyang ston ka'i dus ltar snang / /me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas snang mdzad kyi/ /
zhabs drung dpral dbyes nas byung mi g.yo bran/ /bdud las rnam rgyal phyag drug mda' gzhu zhags/ /ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje char 'bebs pa/ /khro bo grangs med pa yis yongs bskor nas/ /bgegs rnams

sreg mdzad hU~M gi sgras bkang nas/ /'jig rten gsum po gang 'di rnam par 'jig /rkang rjes sa dang mi yi khrag dag las/ /mi yi gzugs byas mi rus phur bu la/ /'od zer can gyi gsang sngags bsgrags pa yis/ /

lan grangs nyi shur mngon sngags mig du gdab/ /tshogs kyi bdag po'i khar ni ming bcug nas/ /phyi bzhin rdo rje gtun shing dag gis brdung / /oM su~M b+hA badzra mu sa le na/ tsUr+N+Na ya na ra b+hig g+ha hU~M phaT/ las 'di bsam

pas mod la ni/ /me yi bgegs kyang bzlog par 'gyur/ /stang zil kha dog lta bu nam mkha' lding / /lus la sbrul stong dag gis brgyan byas pa/ /mkha' la 'dug nas gdengs ka stong ldan pa'i/ /klu brgyad dag

dang char sprin rnams la bsgo/ /brgya byin bka' ni de dag gis thos nas/ /sprin tshogs bum pa'i char gyis me yang gsod/ /nam mkha' lding gi 'dab mas bkab nas ni/ /mchus brkos chu klung gis ni mtshams kyang

bcad/ /badzra nA rA ya Na/ ni ra ba bA ya/ ma hi na/ ba ma mu me ge hU~M/ zhal ras gsum pa ston ka'i zla ba'i mdog /phyag bzhi 'od dmar sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od/ /lha mo bzhi pa bsnyems ma byams ma dang / /chu
srin rgyal mtshan me tog rol pas bskor/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje legs gsor zhing / /g.yon pas rdo rje dril bu sgeg par gzhag /ldem bag 'jo sgeg tshul gyis rol pa ste/ /sems dpa'
'byung ba'i sprin rnams rnam par 'phel/ /rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan cing / /rin chen cod pan dbang bskur bas/ /nam mkha' la ni 'bab pa yi/ /thog thog rnam par bzlog par byed/ /\u0f00 ma hA pu

ka badzra/ che ge mo dz+dza zhes bya ba dang / hU~M zhes bya ba nas/ pU ra Ta ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ sbyor ba 'di ni byas pa yis/ /bla med byang chub rgyas par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
par snang mdzad chen po/ mi 'khrugs rin chen 'od dpag med/ /don yod gsang sngags rgyal rnams dang / /bzang po rnam pa bcu drug po/ /kun dang drag po'i ting 'dzin la/ /gnas pa yi ni khro bo dang / /
gsang sngags rdzogs mdzad ri rgyal ma/ /rnam pa kun dang ldan pa dag /rims bral rang gi ting 'dzin gnas/ /thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor rnams la/ /gzigs pa chen pos rnam gzigs nas/ /sku gsung thugs kyi

rdo rje can/ /smin ma mdzes par bskyod nas su/ /yan lag 'phrog pa'i 'dzum bstan nas/ /thugs kyi sems ni dga' bar mdzad/ /dga' bar mdzad pa'i mod la ni/ /sangs rgyas mchog kun gyis mchod pa/ /shes rab chen po'i thog 'dren

pas/ /bsgrims te so sor gsor nas des/ /bde chen ting 'dzin la gnas te/ /ldem bag 'jo tshul gyis bltas nas/ /lag gnyis pad ma'i tshul gyur te/ /spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas/ /ye shes lam ni rab ston pa/ /

rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad la/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /yid rgyas pa yis tshig gsol ba/ /ci slad rnam pa thams cad du/ /zur gyis rnam par gzigs pa dang / /smin ma bskyod byas 'dzum mdzad pa/ /ye

shes rnam par bsgyings pas gsungs/ /byang chub chen po'i rdo rje can/ /lag na rdo rjes gsol mod la/ /brtan zhing zab pa'i gsung gis ni/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rol pa bshad/ /bsgom pa'i lam la legs byung

ba/ /rdo rje ye shes rnams kyi thabs/ /bde ba'i byang chub thob 'gyur ba/ /sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas kyi/ /rjes su 'brang ba'i 'khor nyon cig /gang la dngos rnams dngos med cing / /mtha' gnyis kyi ni
mtshan ma med/ /dbus la'ang spyod pa med pa dag /dus gsum 'das pa'i nam mkha' 'dra/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs pa/ /de la byang chub ji ltar rtogs/ /rtogs par 'dod pa de dag ni/ /thabs

rnams nga yis bshad par bya/ /phung po dngos po yod med pa'i/ /byang chub sems ni grogs gyur pa/ /spro ba dang ni btung ba yis/ /sku gsum mchog ni mchod par bya/ /sems kyis sku ni thob 'gyur zhing / /sems

kyis chos rnams bstan pa yin/ /sems kyis byang chub 'thob 'gyur bas/ /de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par bsgom/ /sems ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste/ /byang chub kyang ni sgyu ma 'dra/ /dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas/ /gyo mo

la ni sngags bzlas te/ /legs par byas pa'i gzugs dag la/ /sbyor ba goms pas bsnun na ni/ /rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gzugs/ /zhen pa'i sems la snang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin bsod nams ye shes las/ /byung ba'i tshogs

kyis bsgom pa'i sems/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la/ /bla med byang chub snang bar byed/ /dngos po don dam mi shes pa/ /phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa'i/ /ngan par rtog pa'i rnam rtog gis/ /rin chen sems 'di dri mar byas/ /

'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams dang / /dngos po thams cad ldan zhes gsungs/ /de la gtsang dang mi gtsang sogs/ /mi shes pa yis yongs su btags/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mngon zhen pas/ /don dam phyi rol byas pa yi/ /theg pa dman pa

pa rnams kyis/ /bla med byang chub ci ltar 'thob/ /byang chub rnam pa gnyis gsungs te/ /lhag ma dang bcas lhag ma med/ /lhag bcas phung po'i ngo bo ste/ /nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su bsregs/ /lhag med bag chags med pa ste/ /mkha'

ltar dri ma med pa yin/ /bla med byang chub 'di lta bur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam par bshad/ /de yi byang chub spel ba'i phyir/ /las kyi tshul ni sna tshogs yin/ /rnal 'byor can gyi gsang sngags gang / /ye shes sems dpa'i zhabs

drung du/ /rtag tu mnyes byas ma grub pa'i/ /lhag ma nga yis bshad bya ste/ /de ni bde blag thabs kyis su/ /tshar bcad nas ni bsgrub pa bshad/ /rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po che/ /rdo rje zhags pa rab gdung byed/ /rdo rje khu tshur

gzi brjid che/ /rdo rje phur bu rnams 'dril byed/ /rdo rje tho ba rdung ba ste/ /rdo rje nag mo cher 'bar ba/ /lha rnams kun la 'jig pa bskyed/ /phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs 'di/ /bsgoms nas las la sbyar na ni/ /dam tshig

rgyal bas bstan pa'i phyir/ /mtshungs pa med pa'i las byed do/ /gsang sngags rig pas hU~M zhes pa'i/ /lcags kyu btang nas zhabs drung dgug /'di ni gal te sangs rgyas sam/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i snying las dgug /dam

tshig gis ni zhugs pa dang / /rdo rje bcing bas bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas/ /rdo rje nag mos kun tu bsdigs/ /rdo rje yi ni phur bu yis/ /gzugs brnyan gyi ni gnas lnga po/ /dpral ba mgrin pa snying ga dang / /

de bzhin dpung pa gnyis su gdab/ /rdo rje tho bas brdung bar bya/ /cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par gnon/ /bsdigs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /gzugs brnyan mig yor gyur pa dang / /sangs rgyas byang chub rab

rdzogs pa'i/ /dngos grub de tshe sbyin par mdzad/ /'di ni mthu yis grub pa yi/ /sbyor ba gcig pu gsang chen yin/ /de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis gsang ba sgrub pa thos nas mgrin gcig tu thams

cad kyis legs so zhes bya bar gsol te/ /gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad/ /dpa' bo chen po legs so zhes/ /zab mo chos kyi mchog gyur pa/ /dam pa bshad par mdzad pa legs/ /sems can phan phyir thugs rje yi/ /

lcags kyus kun nas 'bar ba legs/ /bdag med chos rnams sgrub pa yi/ /ye shes snying khu 'bar ba legs/ /gsang chen thams cad bstan pa yi/ /rdo rje theg pa nges par gsungs/ /theg pa'i tshul 'di la gnas na/ /

bla med byang chub bde bar thob/ /oM badzra a~M` ku sha A kar Sha ya hU~M/ \u0f00 badzra pA sha ban d+ha hU~M/ oM badzra TAk+ki rA dzA ya hU~M/ oM badzra muSh+Ti gr-ih+na hU~M/ oM badzra kI la ya kI la ya hU~M/ \u0f00 badzra mud ga ra a ko Ta ya hU~M/ ye shes kyi

snying khus snying po can du gyur pa'i gsang sngags dag pa mchog tu gyur pa don yod pa'i las 'di dag su la yang bstan par mi bya'o/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'di ni sbyor ba'i thabs kyis sgrub pa'i rim par
