phye ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sbyor ba'i las thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs

nas dbab pa la sogs pa'i las bya ba 'di bshad do/ /oM zhes bya ba mgor bzhag ste/ /AHni bzhin gyi pad ma la/ /hU~M ni bskul nas snying gar gzhag /yang ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la/ /bzhag nas bsgrims te
gdeg byas na/ /'gro ba dang ni gnas pa yi/ /'gro ba thams cad 'bab par 'gyur/ /dbab snod skul byed gzugs de yi/ /gzugs kyi ngo bor bsams nas su/ /rdo rje 'chang ba'i nga rgyal gyis/ /gsang sngags

bsnyems dang bcas par bklag /brjod par bya ba thogs pa med pa'i phreng ba ni/ /na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nA~M`/ samyag sam bud d+ha ko TI nAM/ tad ya thA/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun de swA hA/ brtson 'grus chen mo thogs pa med par 'dul ba/

stobs che ba/ pha rol gnod pa che ba/ phyag na ral gri dang tho ba dang dgra sta dang zhags pa bsnams ma/ khro mo khro mo'i dbang phyug ma/ drag po'i gzugs can ma/ zhal ras mtha' yas pa/ phyag stong ma/ ma pham ma/

gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod pa/ gdul bar dka' ba/ mig stong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod pa rab tu grub ma/ rdo rje'i sen mo can/ rdo rje rdo rje

'dren ma/ rdo rje'i mtshon cha can/ rdo rje'i sku can ma rdo rje'i spyan gdangs pa'i stang stabs can/ /drag shul can ma lags kyang drag shul can gyi gzugs can du bsgyur bar snang ba/ sku rdo rje dang bai dUr+yas brgyan ma/ \u0f00 b+ha ga bA ti tsun

de dru~M` dru~M` dru~M` dru~M`/ mri mri/ ru ru/ sru sru ru ru grIh+na gr-ih+na A be sha A be sha ya/ gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya/ sa ra sa ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ ha ra ha sha b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da ha da ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ sdang ba'i gdon

dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / brtag pa'i rim dang / yud tsam pa dang / 'byung po dang / ro lang dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang /

mngal nas skyes pa dang / las las skyes pa dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas pa 'di dag dang / sdang ba gang dag bdag la 'tshe ba thams cad/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ mar d+ha ya mar d+ha ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ tA pa ya tA pa

ya/ uta pa d+ha ya uta pa d+ha ya/ ha na ha na/ badzre Na sa ra sa ra/ daN+Ten/ ma ra ma ra/ kha D+gen hU~M hU~M hU~M/ / tri tri tri/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun de sar+b+ba sA d+ha ya swA hA/ de ni rdo rjes bskul nas su/ /rdo rje dril bu
gsil bya zhing / /rdo rje bcing bar bskyod par bya/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas oM/ /dbus su pad ma 'dab brgyad dang / /'brel ba'i pad ma bzhag nas su/ /AHzhes bya bar brgyad kyis brgyan/ /dbus

su bsgrubs bya bzhag nas su/ /hU~M bzhi yis ni mdzes par bya/ /kham phor kha sbyar nang bcug ste/ /steng du rdo rje 'chang bas mnan/ /bsgoms zhing gsang sngags bskul tshig gis/ /bzlas brjod dag ni bya ba dang / /

ba zhes bya ba'i theg pa yis/ /kun nas kyang ni bkri bar bya/ /'di ni sku gsum las byung ba'i/ /lha dang mi kun mnan par 'gyur/ /sngags la mkhas pa'i bdag nyid ni/ /kha dog dmar po rdo rje can/ /'dod chags che dang
ldan pa'i gzugs/ /'dod pa'i lha dang lhan cig bsams/ /sku gsum ldan pa mda' thogs shing / /g.yon pa yis ni gzhu yang gzung / /\u0f00 hU~M bud med spyi bor bsams nas ni/ /'dod pas snying zags

dregs bdo ba/ /mdog dmar thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /'dud bzhin du ni mdun bzhag ste/ /rdo rje mda' yis bsnun na ni/ /pad ma dag las zil pa 'dzag /rdo rje mda' yi sbyor ba yis/ /'dod chags can ma 'dzag par 'gyur/ /

rnal 'byor can gyis dbang bya'i phyir/ /'dod chags rdo rje can yang bsgom/ /mi thod las byas cang te'u la/ /spre'u pags pas g.yogs nas ni/ /ngos gnyis la ni pad ma bri/ /bud med khrag gis 'dzag par bya/ /de yi dkyil du kher

bris te/ /mi yi skra yis btags nas ni/ /mthing ril gyi ni rkang rus kyis/ /khre hU~M ming nas brjod cing brdung / /lam gyi bzhi mdor dkyil 'khor ni/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos bris/ /grwar ni bu mo zas sbyin ma/ /
'gugs par brtson pa'i lcags kyu bya/ /gtso bo khrag 'thung cha lugs kyi/ /gzugs can gyis ni rting bas brdung / /'di ni khams gsum rnam gnas pa'i/ /bu mo zas sbyin 'gug par 'gyur/ /gang yang rung

ba'i gzugs brnyan la/ /gnas pa yi ni nga rgyal gyis/ /rnal 'byor 'khor lo rdzogs gyur na/ /tshig gi rnam pa tsam gyis kyang / /lha dang lha min mi la sogs/ /rnal 'byor can gyis thams cad byed/ /gang tshe dbang

nyid la gnas pa/ /de tshe thams cad mngag gzhug 'gyur/ /bltas pa tsam gyis 'chi ba 'am/ /me tsam gyis kyang gcod pa'i mchog /sgyu ma'i ye shes kyis bskul nas/ /rnal 'byor can gyis glu dang gar/ /ci ltar ci ltar

bsgom byas pa/ /de ltar 'gro ba rab tu byed/ /sbyin sreg de nyid la gnas pa'i/ /me yi lha ni zhal yin pas/ /sna tshogs las rnams grub byed pa'i/ /sbyin sreg las ni rab tu bshad/ /sbyin sreg gis ni lha rnams tshim/ /

tshim par gyur nas dngos grub ster/ /gsang sngags lhag chad gang yin pa/ /thams cad sbyin sreg dag gis skong / /de phyir sku gsum mkhas mchog gis/ /sbyin sreg rab tu bsngags par mdzad/ /gtsub shing las ni byung ba'i me/ /dge ba yi ni las

rnams byed/ /gdol pa'am dur khrod las byung ba'i/ /me yis las rnams rab tu bsgrub/ /thab khung zlum po gru bzhi pa/ /zla gam dang ni zur gsum pa/ /dkyil 'khor zur gyi kha khyer la/ /rdo rje mtshan ma dag gis brgyan/ /sbyin sreg de nyid tshul rig pas/ /

thab khung rnams kyi dbus su ni/ /pad mo steng gnas gtsug tor dang / /rdo rje rin chen pad ma gzhag /ci ltar rigs par 'dug gnas su/ /lag gnyis pus mo'i bar bzhag ste/ /dgang gzer mar gyis bkang nas ni/ /blugs gzar bkang ste de bzhin bsreg /

sbyin sreg la dgos g.yas su gzhag /g.yon du chu yi snod dag go/ /las kun byed pa bzlas nas su/ /bsang gtor dang ni 'thor 'thung bya/ /ku sha'i rtse mos gnon pa yis/ /thab khung khor yug bskor bar bya/ /me ni 'bar bar

shes pa dang / /g.yas pas mi 'jigs mtheb bskyod cing / /gsang sngags 'dis ni cho ga bzhin/ /me yi lha ni spyan drang ngo / /tshur spyon tshur spyon 'byung po che/ /lha yi drang srong bram ze mchog /bsreg blugs zhal zas bzhes nas kyang / /

'di nyid tu ni bzhugs su gsol/ oM ag na ye/ dI pya dI pya/ A be sha ma hA shri ye/ ha bya ka bya/ ba ha nA ya swA hA/ lag g.yon rdo rje gsang gtor te/ /mchod yon mchod pa rnam lnga dbul/ /me yi phyogs nas bod pa ni/ /

gsus po che la mig gsum pa/ /gdong bzhi lag pa bzhi dang ldan/ /'od dmar ral pa'i thor tshugs can/ /me yi dkyil 'khor la gnas shing / /las kyi 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan/ /lag pa dang po mchog sbyin la/ /

gnyis pa na ni sngags nor phreng / /g.yon na ril ba spyi blugs te/ /gnyis pa na ni be con nyid/ /mdog dmar rgyan ni med pa la/ /drang srong rnams kyis yongs bskor ba/ /'di lta'i gzugs ni bsams nas kyang / /thabs

kyi dbus su bzhugs su gsol/ /de la sbyin sreg la dgos pa/ /kun nas lan gsum bsreg blugs dbul/ /de nas 'thor 'thung byas nas su/ /'bar ba'i rnam par bsgyur bar bya/ /rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni/ /mkhas pas

lha rnams tshim par bya/ /legs par tshim byas bzod gsol te/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub gsol ba gdab/ /bum pa rgyal mtshan rdo rje gdugs/ /pad ma lcags kyu'i rnam pa dag /me lce mdog dkar snang ba dang / /'khyil pa'i

mtshan ma mkhas pas brtag /de nas myur du 'grub 'gyur bas/ /bsgom dang bzlas la 'bad par bya/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang la ni/ /oM zhes pa dang swA hA mthar/ /dbyangs kyi rgyun ni bsring ba dang / /bar chad med pa'i dbyangs

kyis sbyar/ /zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba mo/ /'byor pa rgyas pa mngon par spel/ /dregs gdong stabs tshul bcas pa dang / /dbang du gyur pas dbang bya'o/ /drag shul spyod tshul la gnas pas/ /hU~M zhes pa dang phaT dang bcas/ /lus ni

me lce 'bar ba dang / /'jig rten gsum po bzar bsams nas/ /bskul ba'i tshig dang spel ba yi/ /gsang sngags yi ge nges par sbyar/ /sngags grub cho ga shes pa yis/ /sbyin sreg cho ga thams cad la/ /sna tshogs las dang ldan pa'i lha/ /

gang dag yin par mchod par bya/ /sbyin sreg de nyid kyis bskul cing / /dang po dgang blugs sreg cing dbul/ /phyis ni rim bzhin rnam par spel/ /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams la/ /dge ba rdzas rnams sbyin sreg bya/ /bshang gci khrag rkang

rus pa dang / /sha chen dag kyang sbyin sreg bya/ /ci ste ye shes sems dpa'i zhal/ /mi gtsang ba yis bkang na go/ /ji ltar sdig pa mi skye 'gyur/ /gal te sdig 'gyur 'bras bu gang / /sems can mi shes pas rmongs te/ /thams cad shes rab rnams

spangs shing / /phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pa/ /rnam rtog dra bas blun byas gang / /de dag gis ni dge sdig gi/ /phung po gnyis su rnam par brtags/ /chos 'di rang bzhin gyis dag ste/ /skye ba med cing gnas pa med/ /sems can shes pa spel

ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi thabs kyis bstan/ /dam pa'i don du dge spangs na/ /bsod nams med pa ci zhig smos/ /dper na chus gang chu klung gi/ /pha rol 'gro ba'i sems can dag /rtswa dang shing la sogs bsdus te/ /chu las rgal ba'i gzings

byas na/ /de la 'jus te legs brgal na/ /bor te bde bar 'gro ba ltar/ /de bzhin 'khor ba'i pha rol gyi/ /chos kyi lam ni bskyed byas kyang / /chos dang chos min rnam spangs nas/ /byang chub bde ba thob pa bzhin/ /de phyir rnam rtog drang

spongs la/ /zab mo yi ni chos spel te/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs lam la/ /sngags rig rnam rtog ma byed cig /rnam rtog rmongs pa chen po ste/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor ltung byed pas/ /nam mkha' lta bur dri med pa'i/ /rnam par mi

rtog ting 'dzin mnon/ /dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar te/ /lus dang ngag dang sems bsdams nas/ /nga'o snyam pa'i gzi bskyed gzugs/ /rnam pa kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /rnal 'byor ldan pa tshe 'di la/ /ye shes rdzogs pa

nyid du 'gyur/ /las las byung bar rnam bstan pa'i/ /skyes pa bud med gzugs mang la/ /brnyas pa nyid du mi bya 'dis/ /rdo rje lus can dam tshig yin/ /ngan rtog bzang rtog dra ba yi/ /sems kyi sems can rnams la ni/ /

sna tshogs gdung bas sun mi dbyung / /rdo rje sems ldan dam tshig yin/ /sred pas bskyed rtsub phra ba yis/ /tshig dag rnam par mi smra zhing / /mnyan na bde bar byed pa 'di/ /rdo rje ngag can dam tshig yin/ /rnam par snang mdzad

cher 'khrugs mchog /sha yi khams la gnas pa yin/ /rkang la mi 'khrugs rgyal po ste/ /khrag la rin chen 'byung ba gtso/ /sems can rnams kyi rus phung gi/ /phung gos la ni 'od dpag med/ /rtsa yi tshogs rnams rnam 'dren pa/ /

thub pa skyes mchog don yod la/ /dam tshig shes pa rnams la ni/ /gsang chen nga yis bstan pa 'di/ /blo ldan rdo rje sems kyis ni/ /rtag tu bsten zhing bsgom par bya/ /'dod chags zhe sdang de bzhin rmongs/ /sred dang de bzhin

rnam spel ba'i/ /chos ni rnam pa lnga po 'di/ /thub pa skyes mchog rnams kyis gsungs/ /bshang gci khu ba mchil ma khrag /'dzag pa 'byung ba bzhis bsdus pa/ /bsgom pa'i blo gros rdzogs pa yis/ /dam tshig bsten

par bya ba ste/ /rtag tu bza' zhing btung bar bya/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul gyi dra ba las 'di ni sbyin sreg rim par phye ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin

gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i mchog dngos grub 'di bka' stsal to/ /lag na rdo rje gsang sngags bsgom pa'i

rnal 'byor gyi cho gas yang dag par bskul nas rdzas thams cad kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thabs gsang chen 'di nyon cig /rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin la/ /gnas shing sku gsung thugs bsgoms te/ /mdun du 'khor lo legs par bzhag /

sku gsum rdo rje can gyi gzugs/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od/ /'khor lo'i nang du zhugs gyur par/ /bsgom zhing 'khor lo bsgrub par bya/ /me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba'i 'od/ /'khor lo chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ /spyan ni bzlas brjod byed

bzhin du/ /bla med 'khor lo blang bar bya/ /rgyal chen 'khor lo drug pa dag /'od ni rnam par snang mdzad bzhin/ /lan gsum 'jug pa'i sems can la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur/ /mi 'khrugs par ni rnam bsgom zhing / /rdo rje

mdun du bzhag nas ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bskul na 'dis/ /sku gsum rnam par 'phel 'gyur zhing / /'bar ba'i phreng chen mnyam pa'i 'od/ /rdo rje chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ /mA ma kI ni zlos bzhin du/ /rdo rje bla med blang bar bya/ /rdo rje rgyal

po blangs pa yis/ /gtso bo rdo rje 'chang gnyis 'gyur/ /gtso bo chen po sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' yongs bskor nas/ /sems can kun sems la gnas pa'i/ /lag na rdo rje rdo rje 'chang / /'jig rten

khams su rnam rgyu zhing / /kun gyi bsam pa yongs rdzogs byed/ /rin chen 'byung ba bsgom na ni/ /rin po che ni mdun bzhag ste/ /sbyor ba'i rim pas rnam spel na/ /rin chen chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ /rin chen sgrol ma zlos bzhin

du/ /'od bzang gzi brjid 'bar ba can/ /phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yi/ /nor bu'i rgyal po blang bar bya/ /lha rdzas nor bu blangs pa yis/ /rin chen 'byung ba gnyis par 'gyur/ /de ni sems can thams cad kyi/ /
yid bzhin nor bu rin chen bzhin/ /rin chen char pa rab 'bebs shing / /sems can kun gyi dbul ba 'joms/ /gtso bo yid bzhin nor bu can/ /sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par rgyu/ /'od dpag med par rnam bsgoms
nas/ /pad ma chen po mdun bzhag ste/ /rim bzhin gzi brjid gzengs bstod na/ /'dab ma bye bas rnam brgyan pa/ /'od bzang gser ltar 'bar ba can/ /pad ma chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ /gos dkar can
ma'i gsang sngags kyis/ /yid las byung ba'i pad ma blang / /pad ma'i rgyal po blangs pa yis/ /'od dpag med pa gnyis par 'gyur/ /chos mdzad rnams kyis thog 'dren cing / /sems can rnams la bdud rtsi

stsol/ /sangs rgyas zhing rnam snang byed gtso/ /bde ba can gyi rgyan du 'gyur/ /don yod grub pa rnam bsgoms nas/ /ral gri mdun du rnam bzhag ste/ /rnal 'byor rim pa 'di yis ni/ /bsgom pa de nyid kyis bskul

na/ /rdo rje 'bar ba lta bu'i 'od/ /ral gri chen po 'phags par 'gyur/ /sgrol ma'i gsang sngags zlos bzhin du/ /ral gri bla med blang bar bya/ /de nas ral gri mchog blangs nas/ /don yod grub pa gnyis par 'gyur/ /sangs

rgyas zhing du rnam rgyu zhing / /sems can rnams kyis mi shes gcod/ /rtag tu dri med snang gyur te/ /chu yi nang gi ston zla bzhin/ /rdzas kyi dngos grub bsnan nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya/ /rnal 'byor che la

rnam gnas pa/ /de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo che/ /zhe sdang rigs ni 'dren mdzad ma/ /rdo rje gdan can mA ma kI/ /rin chen 'byung ba'i lha mo dang / /lha mo 'gro ba dbang mdzad ma/ /mkha' la longs spyod spyod mdzad ma/ /

rim pa bzhin du nga yis bshad/ /de nas bu mo mig yangs ma/ /lo ni bcu drug lon pa la/ /gzugs dang mdangs dang lang tshor ldan/ /gser gyi rna cha g.yo ba can/ /gcig cig bsgrims te btsal nas su/ /lha mo byi dor

legs byas te/ /rigs lnga yi ni tshogs can ma/ /las kyi rjes su bsgoms byas nas/ /bzhag ste sprad pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /pad ma la ni rdo rje gzhag /sprad pa dang ni 'khyud pa yis/ /rdo rje dang ni pad ma bskul/ /gar gyi tshul du gyur pa dang / /de bzhin spro

dang bsdu ba yi/ /mod la sgyu ma'i dregs myos nas/ /rdo rje las ni bdud rtsi 'byung / /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i shes rab las/ /pad ma la gnas bdud rtsi btung / /rnal 'byor ldan pa'i kha yis ni/ /'thungs pas de bzhin gshegs

lnga yi/ /sku ni yongs su 'gyur ba 'thob/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos kun la/ /thabs dang shes rab rnam par 'phel/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sku yi snying po sgrub pa ste/ /'dod pa'i yon tan rjes 'jug pa'i/ /

byang chub bde bas bsgrubs na ni/ /rdo rje pad ma byin brlabs nas/ /rjes su chags pas 'thob par 'gyur/ /grub chen gsang ba'i dngos grub ni/ /sdug bsngal med pa'i bde ba'i thabs/ /rjes su chags pas bde ba yi/ /rdo rje theg pas mnyes

par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba'i khyad par 'di yis ni/ /lan gsum 'jug pa'i gsang sngags dang / /lam gyi phyag rgya ngas bshad do/ /de dag lag pa'i phyag rgya dag /ye shes phyag rgya rab bskul bas/ /dam tshig mchog gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /

thub chen sna tshogs gzugs mnga' ba/ /sna tshogs phrin las mdzad par 'gyur/ /de nas phyag na rdo rje khams gsum gyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang / thugs las phyung ngo / /sa ni spyan du brjod pa ste/ /chu khams mA ma kI zhes

bshad/ /sgrol ma rlung zhes kun du brjod/ /gos dkar can ma me ru bsgrags/ /rdo rje dam tshig nam mkha'i dbyings/ /ston pa rdo rje 'chang bshad ces de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sa'i dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'

chen pos gsungs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la rnam par bltas nas cang mi gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la

phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba 'dus par dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad kyis ci ltar blta bar bgyi lags/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis 'di ni rdo rje'i byang chub kyi sems su blta bar bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems dang rdo rje

slob dpon 'di gnyis gnyis su byar med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i bar nas rigs kyi bu mdor bsdus nas yang bshad par bya'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs shing gzhes

pa'i bar de dag thams cad dus gsum du byon nas/ slob dpon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pas mngon par mchod nas 'di skad ces bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha yin no/ /bdag cag de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma yin no/ /bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ston pa yin no/ /zhes rdo rje'i yi ge gsum phyung ba nas slar yang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu

dper na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i bar de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bsod nams kyi phung po bas ni rdo rje slob dpon de'i spu'i khung bu

gcig gi bsod nams kyi phung po ches khyad par du 'phags so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi snying por gyur pa'i bar nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'byung gnas

yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'jigs shing skrag pa'i yid kyis cang mi smra bar gyur to/ /de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa dang / rin chen 'byung gnas dang / don

yod grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad rnams rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshig la dmigs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/

byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bos nas shes ldan byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nyon cig /phyogs bcu dus gsum du byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rdo rje slob dpon gyi drung du byon nas mchod par mdzad cing phyag 'tshal bar

brjod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ston pa yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang de nyid ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro/ /

de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi dngos grub gang la gnas/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsum ni rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang ngag dang yid la gnas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis gsol pa/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi lus dang

ngag dang sems kyi gsang ba gang la gnas/ nam mkha' la gnas/ nam mkha' gang la gnas/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi sems la gnas/ sems gang la gnas/ gang du yang ma yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ngo mtshar du

gyur nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do/ /dkyil 'khor dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya dang stang stabs dang / 'dug stangs dang / bzlas brjod dang / sbyin sreg dang / mchod pa dang las la sbyar ba dang slar bsdu ba rnams ni gsang sngags kyi tshul de kho na nyid bcu

yin par gsungs so/ /dus gsum du 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thugs rje'i ro gcig pa rnams kyi gsang ba dang gsang chen dang ye shes rnam pa gsum gyi snying po bstan pa dag ni slob dpon gyi kha nas bla ma la gus pa'i slob mas shes

par bya'o/ /bla mas dam tshig ci ltar lta ba bzhin gyi dbang du byas nas bshad par bya'o/ /bsgrims nas sems can rnams la rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor chen po dang / lhag pa'i rnal 'byor rnams go rims bzhin bshad par bya'o/ /

'di mtha' dag ni rgyud thams cad kyi spyir shes par bya'o/ /de kho na nyid kyi dngos po mtha' dag yongs su mi shes par gsang sngags smra ba nga yin no zhes mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'chad par byed na dam tshig thams cad

nyams par 'gyur ro/ /dam tshig las nyams na bdud kyis gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /skyes bu shi nas dmyal ba'i gnas mi bzod pa chen por 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can rnams la brten te byang chub thob par 'gyur bas sems can

la bslu bar mi bya'o/ /zhes shes par byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam de nyid la sems can de dag sbyar bar bya'o/ /gang zhig 'di la brtson par ma byas pa de dag gis ni lag pa dang rkang pa dang / mig sbyin pa'i dka' ba spyad pa dang / dka'

thub ci lta bus kyang sdig pa gzhom pa'am/ bdud rtsi'i ro thob par mi nus so/ /rnal 'byor gcig khong du chud nas dben par song ste/ bsgom pa byas na sdig pa las grol zhing tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams dang / chos bdag med par

bsgoms pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i rnal 'byor khong du chud par bya'o/ /shes rab dang ye shes kyi 'jo tshul gyis gsang ba lnga'i bdag nyid kyi gtso bo la mchod par bya'o/ /dngos po thams cad dngos med par/ /bzhi bcu'i

don ni rtog pa dang / /rdo rje pad mas dbang bskur bas/ /bdud rtsi lngas ni dga' bar byed/ /gsang bar bya ba'i chos gsang ba/ /gsang zhing sbas te gzhag par bya/ /'dod yon lnga yi rnam pa ni/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg bya sogs/ /

rnal 'byor sems dpa' spyad bya zhing / /de bzhin bza' dang btung byas na/ /bltas dang khu tshur rnam pa yis/ /sems can thams cad dbang du byed/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las cho ga thams cad bstan pa rim par

phye ba ste bcu pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang dri za dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par

bstod do/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba theg pa chen po'i yang theg pa chen po'i tshul zab mo gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba chen po rdzogs so// //zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// //

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kA ya wA ka tsita ta kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri nA ma tan tra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed nag po zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal

gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo thams cad kyi b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs te/ gti mug rdo rje gshin

rje'i gshed dang phra ma rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / zhe sdang rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / tho ba gshin rje'i gshed dang / dbyug pa gshin rje'i gshed dang / pad ma gshin

rje'i gshed dang / ral gri gshin rje'i gshed dang / mtshams rnams su rdo rje tsar tsi kA dang / rdo rje phag mo dang / rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang / rdo rje gau rI ma rnams mtshams su'o/ /de dag la sogs te gshin rje'i gshed kyi tshogs chen po dang /

thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba btab pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bdud thams

cad rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje las nges par bton to/ /zla ba rdo rje sbyor ba yis/ /gshin rje mthar byed bsgom par bya/ /bdud rnams zhi bar bya phyir dang / /zhe sdang thams cad bsal

ba'i phyir/ /'od zer lnga yis 'khrigs pa yis/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i don du bsgom/ /phyi mtshams rdo rje sa gzhi dang / /ra ba dra ba de bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa skyed pa po bdud 'dul ba

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gti mug rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed la sogs pa thams cad kyi sa bon 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams la nges par phyung ba/ dbus su ya da k+She ma me da yats+tsha ni
rA dzA sa do ru Na yo ni ra'o/ /ya sogs yi ge dang po las/ /gshin rje'i gshed du gyur pa yin/ /yi ge k+She ni gti mug brjod/ /yi ge ma ni phra mar gsungs/ /yi ge me ni 'dod chags nyid/ /

yi ge de ni phrag dog 'gyur/ /gshin rje'i gshed sogs lnga ru grags/ /yi ge ya las tho bar 'gyur/ /yi ge ts+tsha las dbyug pa'i gtso/ /lag na pad ma ni yig las/ /lag na ral gri rA las yin/ /dzA las tsar

tsi kA zhes brjod/ /yi ge sa las phag gdong ma/ /yi ge do las dbyangs can bsgrags/ /yi ge ru las gau rI dran/ /Na yo ni ra mtshams kyi bzhi/ /thod pa bzhi ru 'dod pa yin/ /sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs rung ba/ /

nam mkha' rdo rje'i dkyil du bsam/ /de dkyil bzhugs pa gshin rje'i gshed/ /gnag cing 'bar ba bsgom par bya/ /shar du gti mug rdo rje ste/ /lho ru de bzhin phra ma yin/ /nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje ste/ /de bzhin byang du

phrag dog go/ mtshams kyi rdo rje rtse bzhi la/ /tsar tsi kA sogs rnam par bsgom/ /sgo yi rdo rje rtse bzhi la/ /tho ba la sogs rnam par bsgom/ /sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshams bzhi ru/ /mi yi mgo bo bzhi dag go /

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gshin rje'i gshed po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhe sdang chen po'i rigs kyi sngags gsungs pa/ oM hrIH

Sh+T+ri wi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos gti mug rdo rje chen po'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM dzI na dzIka / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi bdag pos phra ma rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ /oM rat+na ka / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos 'dod chags rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM A ro lIka /

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos phrag dog rdo rje'i sngags gsungs pa/ o~M` pradz+nyA d+h+r-Ika / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje tho ba'i sngags gsungs

pa/ oM mud gar d+h+r-Ika / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbyug pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM daN Ta d+h+r-Ika / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi bdag pos rdo rje pad ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM pad ma d+h+r-Ika / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje ral gri'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM kha Ta gad+h+r-Ika / de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje tsar tsi kA'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM mo ha ra ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM dwe Sha ra ti/

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM rA ga ra ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje gau rI ma'i sngags

gsungs pa/ oM badzra ra ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M`/ oM sarba

ta thA ga to wAka badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M`/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M`/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos zhe sdang chen po'i sku nges par bstan pa/ zhal gsum phyag

drug khros pa la/ /in dra nI la 'dra ba'i mdog /phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa nyid/ /gshin rje'i gshed ni bsgom par bya/ /zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba la/ /gsal ba'i gzugs dang 'dra ba'i 'od/ /phyag na 'khor lo
bsnams pa nyid/ /gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /zhal gsum phyag drug rgyas gyur pa/ /gser gyi rnam pa'i 'od dang ldan/ /phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa nyid/ /phra ma rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /zhal

gsum phyag drug dbang byed pa/ /pad ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od/ /phyag na pad ma bsnams pa nyid/ /'dod chags rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /zhal gsum phyag drug thams cad la/ /rin chen mar gad 'od dang ldan/ /phyag na

shubs can bsnams pa nyid/ /phrag dog rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud las mngon par rtogs pa'i rim par phye ba ste le'u dang po'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la bstod pa/ gshin rje'i gshed po rab 'jigs pa/ /gti mug rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /

rdo rje sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /gshin rje'i gshed po rab 'jigs pa'i/ /phra ma rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /rdo rje thugs dang rab mtshungs pa/ /rdo rje rin chen phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i ngo bo khyod/ /gshin rje'i gshed

po rab 'jigs pa/ /rdo rje gsung dang rab mtshungs pa/ /rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phrag dog ngo bo'i rang bzhin khyod/ /gshin rje'i gshed po las kun pa/ /rdo rje chags dang rab tu mtshungs/ /phyag na ral gri phyag

'tshal bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos po khyod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pas/ /sangs rgyas kun mchog gtso bo'i gtso/ /dkyil 'khor gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /rdo rje mig dang rdo rje rna ba dang rdo rje sna

dang rdo rje lce dang rdo rje lus dang rdo rje thugs zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa ni mig la sogs pa byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /'dod pa'i don grub sgrub byed pa'i/ /gshin rje'i gshed

po nyid mtshungs pa/ /gshin rje'i 'jigs pa'i dkyil 'khor lo/ /skud pa gsar pa legs bsgrims la/ /legs pa'i tshad la mdzes pa yis/ /skud pa byas pas thig gdab bo/ /gshin rje'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor lo/ /

mtshan rnams thams cad rab rdzogs shing / /bar chad thams cad rab nyam pa/ /zhi ba la sogs rab 'jug pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i cha byad la/ /rtse mo lnga dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /las kyi rdo rje de la bri/ /rdo rje 'bar

ba 'khrigs pa yi/ /rdo rje de yi dbus su bri/ /ral gri byang gi phyogs su bri/ /'khor lo'i 'od kyis bskor ba yi/ /'khor lo shar gyi phyogs su bri/ /'od kyi phreng ba mnyam 'phro ba'i/ /rin po che ni lho ru bri/ /pad ma rA ga'i

mdangs 'dra'i 'od/ /pad ma nub kyi phyogs su bri/ /'od zer lnga dang mnyam ldan pa'i/ /shar gyi mtshams su 'khor lo bri/ /lho ru rdo rje bri bar bya/ /nub du pad ma'i me tog ni/ /yu ba dang bcas kha bye gsal/ /'od kyi

phreng ba mnyam 'phro ba'i/ /uta pal ni byang nub bri/ /shar gyi sgor ni tho ba ste/ /dbyig pa de bzhin lho yi sgor/ /'dam las skyes pa nub kyi sgor/ /byang du rdo rje ral gri'o/ /shes pas dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa la/ /
mchod pa khyad par 'phags pa ni/ /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dag gis/ /'jigs pa med par mngon par mchod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud las dkyil
'khor chen po'i rim par phye ba ste le'u gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'joms

pa yi/ /'jigs pa'i gshin rje 'joms dkyil 'khor/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi gtso bo/ /mgon po dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen pos nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rnams las

bdud rtsi myang ba'i cho ga nges par phyung ba/ oM AHhU~M`/ rdo rje me lce sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje can kun mnyes pa dang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad bzhugs/ /ye shes 'byung gnas ngo bo nyid/ /dgug pa dang

ni gzhug pa dang / /bcing dang de bzhin dbang bya nyid/ /tho ba la sogs sngags bzhi yis/ /mnyam par bzhag pas rnam par bsgom/ /ma he rdo rje rnam bsgoms la/ /dkyil 'khor gtso bo rnam bsgom bya/ /zla ba'i dkyil

'khor dbus gnas par/ /gti mug rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /rta bdun ldan pa'i dbus gnas pa/ /phra ma zhes bya rnam bsam bya/ /dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dbus gnas pa/ /'dod chags rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus

gnas pa/ /rdo rje las ni bsgom par bya/ /zhi ba'i gti mug rdo rje ste/ /rgyas pa de bzhin phra ma yin/ /'dod chags rdo rje dbang du byas/ /rdo rje las kyis thams cad du'o/ /rdo rje las kyi sbyor ba yis/ /mi tshil mi yi thod par bzhag /

de bzhin mi skras sdong bu bya/ /dur khrod dag du du ba bsgrub/ /mig sman dag ni de bzhin du/ /mig sman las kyi bsgom pa dang / /las kyi bzlas pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /mig sman 'di ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /khrag dang gur gum gzung byas

nas/ /sgrub pa byug pa bsgrub par bya/ /las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yis/ /rkang mgyogs dag ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /bdud rtsi lnga ni mnyam pa la/ /sha lnga dang ni ldan pa yis/ /lcags gsum du ni bcug byas na/ /las kyi sbyor bas

'grub par 'gyur/ /kan ta'i lcags kyi ral gri ni/ /las kyi sbyor ba bsgrub par bya/ /las kyi rdo rje sbyor ba yis/ /las kyi ral gri rab 'grub 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i

rgyud las las kyi rim par phye ba ste le'u gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod nas gsol ba btab pa/ las kyi dbye ba'i dbye ba las/ /

sems can 'jug pa ji ltar 'gyur/ /rdo rje chen pos bshad du gsol/ /yon tan rgya mtsho rnams nyan lags/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /las ni thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /nyes kun gso ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /'di skad

kyis ni tshig gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs rdo rje nyid kyi mthus phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang du phyag byas nas/ /

bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan to/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /dbang du bya ba'i 'khrul 'khor bstan/ /gshin rje'i gshed las 'khor lo mchog /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bud med dbang du bya dang / /bsrung ba'i

don dang de bzhin du/ /zhi ba ro tsa nas bzung ste/ /gro ga'am de bzhin smyug shun la/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris nas/ /nA ma ming gis rnam bsten la/ /nag dang yu can ma yin pa'i/ /kham phor gnyis ni kha

sbyar te/ /mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang bar gzhug /skud pa dkar pos kham phor bcing / /shar du mngon par phyogs pa yis/ /me tog dkar pos dus gsum gtor/ /gshin rje mthar byed chu shel 'drar/ /bdag nyid bsgoms

nas mdun bkod la/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ /bsgrub bya bltas nas dbang bskur bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis gang ba yi/ /bum pa dkar po zla ba 'dras/ /rdzogs sangs du mas khrus byas te/ /bltas nas sngags

kyi bzlas pa brtsam/ /oM na maHhrIHSh+TIHbi kri tA na na hU~M hU~M de ba dat+ta shAn+tiM ku ru na maHswA hA/ zhi ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /skyes pa zhi la gur kum gyis/ /bri bya de bzhin rgyas pa yang / /'khor lo gnyis ni kha che yi/ /swA hAs ming ni

brgyan pa yi/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni bris byas la/ /mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang nas ni/ /kham phor kha sbyar nang du gzhug /skud pa ser pos bcings nas ni/ /me tog ser po dus gsum gtor/ /byang du kha bltas mdog ser ba'i/ /gshin rje'i

gshed du bdag nyid bsam/ /bsgrub bya zla ba ser nag la/ /bum pa ser pos bkru bya zhing / /dbang bskur ba ni bsgom byas la/ /spros la rgyas pa'i bzlas pa bya/ /oM hrIHSh+TIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/

de ba dat+ta shAn+ti ku ru swA hA/ oM hrIH Sh+TIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ bau Sha Ta de ba dat+ta s+ya puSh+TiM ku ru bau Sha Ta swA hA/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /gro ga'am ras la rgya skyegs kyi/ /khu ba'am

tsan dan dmar po'am/ /srin lag gi ni khrag kyang rung / /yi ge hoHyis brten pa yi/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri/ /'khor lo nag po sogs bral ba'i/ /kham phor gnyis ni kha sbyar du/ /mar dang sbrang rtsis bkang ba
bzhag /skud pa dmar pos bcings byas la/ /nub phyogs su ni kha bltas nas/ /me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ /bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa/ /kha dog dmar po cher 'bar ba/ /zla ba dmar po la gnas

pa'o/ /bsgrub bya yang ni rnam bsam bya/ /rang gi lus las byung ba yi/ /'od zer dmar po lcags kyu yis/ /bsgrub bya dgug par bya bar bsam/ /sngags ni spro zhing khri bzlas bya/ /des ni bsgrub bya nyams gyur nas/ /rkang pa

gnyis su lhags gyur nas/ /gos bral skra ni bshig gyur pa/ /rnam par bsams la bzlas pa brtsam/ /gal te dbang du ma gyur na/ /mar la sogs pa bral byas la/ /du ba med pa'i seng ldeng mes/ /'khor lo de ni sgrub

pos spro/ /oM hrIHSh+TIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ ho de ba dat+ti wa shaM ku ru hoHoM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hA~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ bau ShaT de ba dat+ta s+ya wa sha ma na ya bau ShaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang du bya ba'i

cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /dur khrod gos sam yang na ni/ /rang byung gis bskus ras la ni/ /khrag dang rgya skyegs bsres pa yis/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam bris la/ /yi ge dzaHdang yi ge hrIHsa/ /ming ni rnam par brten

byas la/ /btsun mo yi ni pad ma'i snod/ /kha sbyor nang du btsud byas te/ /skud pa dmar pos bcings byas la/ /me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ /bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa/ /nub ka'i nyi ma dang 'dra dmar/ /lcags

kyu dmar pos bkug pa yi/ /bsgrub bya dag ni rnam bsgom bya/ /snying la lcags kyus brgyab nas ni/ /ske nas zhags pas bcings byas te/ /gcer bu skra ni ma bcings par/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yi/ /seng ldeng

dmar po'i steng 'dug la/ /rdzas lnga yis ni bkru bya zhing / /'ongs pa ru ni bsam par bya/ /gal te bsgrub bya mi 'ong na/ /seng ldeng gi ni me mdag la/ /der ni bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /brtul zhugs can gyis 'khor lo

bsro/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ hrIHa mu kaM A kar Sha ya hrIH oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT dzaH/ de ba dat+ta A kar Sha ya dzaH/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dgug pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /

dur khrod gos la mkhas pas ni/ /yung ba yi ni khu ba yis/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mnyam par bri/ /yi ge la gyis brten pa yi/ /bsgrub bya'i ming yang bri bar bya/ /kham phor kha sbyor nang du ste/ /kham phor ser po'i

steng du bzhag /de la mkhas pas re khA bri/ /re khA bdun nam yang na bzhi/ /mnyam par bzhag pas bri bar bya/ /ri rab lcog brgyad ces grags pa/ /de yi steng du mnyam par bri/ /yi ge hU~M dang yi ge ba~M`/ /ri rab de ni

brtan par bya/ /de yi steng du la~M` yig las/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan pa la/ /skud pa ser pos bcings nas ni/ /gshin rje'i gshed po mdog ser po/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor la

gnas pa/ /bsgrub bya ser po rnam bsams la/ /ri rab kyis ni mnan byas pa/ /phyag na rdo rjes mnan byas pa/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyi 'og tu/ /man dA ra sogs ri bo dang / /sna tshogs ri bo rnams kyis kyang / /

bsgrub bya mnan par bsgom par bya/ /de la gnas nas bzlas par bya/ /oM hrIHHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT la~M de ba data ta s+tha ne stam b+ha ya ku ru la~M/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs par byed

pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /ngag ni rengs par 'dod pa yis/ /de bzhin 'khor lo gnyis bris la/ /bsgrub bya'i ming yang bri bar bya/ /der ni sngags kyang spros la bzlas/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M` hU~M` phaT phaT la~M` de

ba data ta s+ya ya thA sra ra thA/ kar kr-ita te nan ti bi ra ya thA a bi ru pa kaM de ba data ta ya dz+nyAM data ta ya s+ya wAka stam b+ha na ku ru la~M/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs par byed pa'i cho ga de skad gsungs so/ /shin du legs par sbas pa

yis/ /'di las gsungs bzhin dgos pa dag /gshin rje'i gshed nag sbyor ba yis/ /nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngar bzhin dur khrod kyi ras la/ /'khor lo gnyis bris brtul zhugs can/ /ske tshe dang ni

tshwa dang ni/ /dug dang gzhan yang nim pa dang / /tsha ba gsum dang tsha ba'i mar/ /dur khrod kyi ni sol ba dang / /d+ha dur lo ma'i khu ba dang / /tsan dra li 'bras 'dzub mo khrag /tsha sgo can gyi sa blangs te/ /gdol pa'i rdza

ma'i dreg pa dang / /rab tu ltogs pa'i smyu gu yis/ /bcu bzhi la bris brtul zhugs can/ /khros pa'i sems kyis nyin phyed na/ /gdug pa can rnams gsad pa'i phyir/ /sems can gnod pa byed pa'i ming / /yi ge

hU~M gis brten byas la/ /bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed pa'i/ /sbyor bas lho phyogs kha bltas te/ /khro chen rab tu drag po'i gzugs/ /rus pas mgo bo rnam brgyan la/ /ma he la bzhugs lce phyung 'dril/ /gsus pa

che la rab 'jigs pa/ /skrag byed skra 'bar gyen du 'greng / /sma ra smin ma de bzhin ser/ /g.yas na rdo rje chen po dang / /gnyis pa na ni ral gri dang / /gsum pa'i phyag na gri gug go/ da ni g.yon pa'i bri bar bya/ /'khor lo dang ni pad ma

che/ /thod pa nyid ni g.yon na'o/ /rtsa ba'i zhal ni shin tu gnag /g.yas pa'i zla 'od bzang po 'dra/ /g.yon pa'i dmar po yin par brtag /rdo rje rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan/ /ba spu khung nas 'jigs chen po/ /rang rigs bdag po rab 'phro ba/ /nyi

ma'i dkyil 'khor steng na ni/ /zhabs ni g.yon pa brkyang pas gnas/ /mche ba gtsigs shing rgyags pa yis/ /bskal pa'i 'bar ba me dang mtshungs/ /'di lta bu yi bdag nyid kyis/ /bsgrub par bya ba mdun du dgod/ /gdug pa'i mtshon gyis

brgyab pa yis/ /dri ma can la nad kyis gzir/ /gos med 'dar zhing nyams chung bas/ /don 'dod pa yi tshig smra zhing / /mtshon gyis gzir bar byas pa yi/ /rnag gi thum pos lus gang ba/ /grang ba'i rlung gis gtses gyur zhing / /me yi nang du

zhugs pa la/ /ma he dang ni stag dag dang / /khyi dang mchu rings can dag gis/ /sangs rgyas sde ni mngon 'jigs pa'i/ /sdig po che ni za bar byed/ /mthar byed pa yi lhor gnas pa/ /tsher mas lus ni bkang ba dang / /rkang pa shing

lcags sgrog gis bsdams/ /de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas/ /pags pa dag ni bshus byas nas/ /de la tshwa dang ske tshe bskus/ /hU~M zhes zer ba bsgom par bya/ /de yi lus bsrung la sogs pa/ /gcad pa dag ni mdun du dgod/ /

de yi go cha'ang med byas nas/ /stong pa'i lus ni mdun du bsam/ /rang gi lus byung khro bo ni/ /gshin rje'i gshed sogs bdag nyid 'dras/ /de yi lus la brgyab nas ni/ /tshil bu rkang dag 'thung bar byed/ /de yi mdun du gshin rje bsgom/ /

lag na dbyig pa stobs po che/ /gdug pa can des brdeg par byed/ /de yi rgyu ma'i phreng ba sogs/ /bya rgod kyis khyer mkha' la 'gro/ /sa yi 'og nas klu dang ni/ /lha ma yin la sogs pas rdeg /'di ltar bsgrub bya nyams bya ba/ /snying rje la

gnas sems kyis ni/ /phyed pas 'khor ba'i gnas bton nas/ /sangs rgyas zhing du 'gro bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khyad par can gyi thugs kyis 'di lta bu'i gsung phyung bar mdzad do/ /

e ma'o gsad pa'i yang dag gsad/ /bsad pa ma yin sdig las bkrol/ /ji srid bsad kyang ma bsad do/ /sdig pa stong phrag byas pa yi/ /mnar med la sogs mi skye ba/ /e ma'o sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag /bsad pas

byang chub thob par byed/ /sems can gsod pa bsad pa nyid/ /snying rje chen po nyid kyis byas/ /e ma'o snying rje stobs kyi mchog /snying rje dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIH wi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ hU~M de ba data

ta mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIH wi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ de ba data ta mA ra ya phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud las rnam par rtog pa gsod pa'i rdo rje'i 'khrul

'khor dang sngags dang sman gyis gsad pa la sogs pa'i cho ga ste rim par phye ba bzhi pa'o// // de nas 'khor lo gnyis bris la/ /yi ge phaT kyis brten pa yi/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri byas la/ /thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug /skud pa

sngon pos bcings byas te/ /nyi ma phyed kyi dus su ni/ /dur khrod sa yi nang du sba/ /gshin rje'i gshed kyi sbyor ba yi/ /rta dang ma he zhon pa yi/ /lag na mtshon thogs bsgrub bya gnyis/ /mdun du bsgrub bya dgod par bya/ /

khros pa'i lus la sprul pa'i tshogs/ /gnyis ka'i phyogs su bsam par bya/ /gnyis kas 'thab mo mang po byed/ /khros shing gdug pa'i sems ldan pa'i/ /stobs ldan khros pa bsgom par bya/ /bsgoms pas bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /

oM hrIHSh+T+rIH wi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ de ba data ta yadz+nyA data te bi dwe ShA ya hU~M` phaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dbye ba'i cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /cho ga dag ni snga ma bzhin/ /'khor lo gnyis ni bri byas la/ /yi ge hU~M phaT kyis brten

pa/ /thod pa kha sbyar nang du gzhug /skud pa nag pos bcings byas la/ /sha za'i tshul du sba bar bya/ /gshin rje'i sbyor ba la gnas pas/ /mdun du bsgrub bya bsgom par bya/ /ya~M byung gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra ba'i/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor

nag po la/ /de steng mdog sngon rnga mo bsgom/ /de la gdug pa can bskyon la/ /lho yi phyogs su kha bstan te/ /khro bo'i tshogs kyis de brdeg pa/ /sangs rgyas yin yang bzlog pa dka'/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ hU~M phaT

de ba dat+ta uts+tshA Ta ya na~M hU~M phaT/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bskrad pa'i cho ga gsungs pa'o/ /khros pas rnal 'byor lhor bltas la/ /ra khrag ro bsregs thal ba dang / /dug gi tshwa dang ske tshe dang / /mar khu smyon pa'i khu ba yis/ /

dur khrod las la 'khor lo gnyis/ /rim pa 'di bzhin bri bar bya/ /bsad pa gshin rje'i lus la gnas/ /dbye ba rta dang ma he yis/ /bskrad pa rnga mo'i lus la gnas/ /zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis/ /rgyas pa zla ba ser po la/ /

btsun mo snying gar dbang du bya/ /ra la bskyon pas 'gugs par byed/ /ri bo'i dkyil du rengs bya gzhag /sha ra b+ha 'am seng ges dgug /de bzhin gzhan yang mtshon par bya/ /ro tsa na dang rgya skyegs dang / /kha che yi ni khyad par gyi/ /

dbang du bya ba gro gar bri/ /dge ba'i sems kyis bzung byas na/ /'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /kham phor kha sbyar nang du gzhug /khra yi sgro yi smyu gu yis/ /nyi ma phyed nas bri bar bya/ /pad ma'i kha sbyor ro bsregs sar/ /

gshin rje'i rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHsogs gsang sngags bzlas/ /lho phyogs gnas te tshar gcad bya/ /mtha' yi ya bor zhi ba la/ /yi ge ni de gnyis ka dang / /phyi nas dkyil gyi ya spangs te/ /yi ge

lhag ma ci bde bar/ /sngon du bsnyen pa khri tsam bya/ /'dis ni las rnams rab bsgrub la/ /ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste/ /gshin rje'i gshed kyi rnal 'byor pas/ /rab tu grags pa'i 'khor lo 'di/ /yi ger bris

nas gnas pa dang / /'khor lo bris nas gnas pa yi/ /khyim der 'thab mo rtag tu 'byung / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud las 'khrul 'khor gyi go rims bri ba zhes bya ste rim par phye ba lnga pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po las dad pas/ bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ gang gis rdo rje can mnyes pa/ /zhe sdang phyag rgya'i rnal

'byor gyis/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas/ /dngos grub rgya chen thob par byed/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang rgyal pos/ /'di lta bu yi gsung bsgrags so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni lha kun gyi/ /dbu la gshin rje'i gshed po bsgom/ /rtag tu dkyil

'khor bri bar bya/ /rtag tu sbyin sreg gis kyang dgang / /rtag tu dam tshig dag kyang gzung / /sdom pa dag kyang yang dag gzung / /dang po la ni cod pan dbang / /gnyis pa ral gri sbyin par bya/ /gsum pa rdo rje dril bu dang / /zla ba bza'

ba bzhi pa ste/ /bzhi po 'di ni dbang chen po/ /nag po'i zhal nas byung ba yi/ /dbang 'di dag gi bye brag gis/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyis byang chub thob/ /'byung po kun gyi gtor ma'i lugs/ /sngags 'di de nas rab bshad bya/ /

sngags chen bzlas pa tsam gyis ni/ /'byung po thams cad 'dar 'gyur ba/ /oM in drA yaH hriHya ma ya/ Sh+T+rIHba ru NA ya/ wi ku be rA ya/ kr-i I shwa nA ya/ ta ag+na ye/ A n-i t+yA ya/ na bA ya be na tsan+d+rA ya/ hUM Ar+k+kA rA ya hU~M

brah+ma NA ya/ phaT ba su d+ha rA ye+e/ phaT be ma tsi tri na~M`/ swA sarba/ /b+hU ti b+h+yo/ hA ha ha hi hi/ hU~M hU~M/ phe~M phe~M phaT phaT swA hA/ biD+Da m+'u tra chu bsres pas/ /dkyil 'khor gru gsum byas nas ni/ /lha rnams kyang ni tshim par bya/ /ha ha zhes kyang dran par bya/ /

dkyil 'khor rim gsum bya ba ni/ /brgyad dang bcu gnyis bcu drug pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bris pa la/ /sngags ni kun du dgod par bya/ /brtul zhugs can gyis bcu gnyis par/ /grub pa'i sngags rnams dgod

par bya/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /ya ma rA dzA sa de me/ /yam du ru na yo da ya/ /yang yo ni ra yak+She ya/ /yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ /dkyil du ya byas shar du k+She/ /lho ru 'jam pa'i rdo rje ste/ /yi ge mi ni nub du bri/ /

byang du da ste da ma nA/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni sbyin bya ba/ /mtshams kyi stong pa dag tu'o/ /hU~M gnyis kyis ni brten byas pas/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed/ /ya ts+tsa ni rA dzA sa do ru Na yo na ra la sogs pa/ /

phyi rol rim par g.yon brtsams bri/ /don kun rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /rim pa gsum pa de la ni/ /kun du cha re bor ba la/ /shar nas brtsams nas bri bar bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs pa'i sngags/ /de yi

bar dag thams cad kyi/ /cha brgyad por ba dag la bri/ /a mu kaM ku ru/ /ats+tshA Ta ya/ wa sha ku ru/ bi dwe Sha ya/ shan tiM ku ru/ puSh+Ti~M` ku ru/ 'di ltar g.yon nas brtsams nas ni/ /las dang rjes su mthun par

ni/ /ming dang na maHtha ma'i bar/ /tha ma ru bau Sha Ta dang / /hU~M phaT dang ldan sa bon gyis/ /zhi dang rgyas dang mthar dbang byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud

las 'khor lo rnam par bri ba zhes bya ba ste rim par phye ba drug pa'o// // khrag dgug pa yi sbyor ba ni/ /zhal gsum phyag drug skem pa yi/ /phyag na 'khor lo zla 'od 'dra'i/ /mkhas pas tsar tsi kA bsgom bya/ /chang dag

dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /zhal gsum phyag drug phag gdong ma/ /rab sngo phyag na rdo rje bsnams/ /mkhas pas phag mo bsgom par bya/ /shes rab bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dmar ba la/ /zhi ba phyag na
pad ma bsnams/ /dbyangs can brtul zhugs can gyis bsgom/ /khu ba dgug pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /zhal gsum phyag drug ral gri bsnams/ /nor bu mar gad 'dra ba ni/ /gau rI mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed po gsad pa dang dgug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje tsar tsi kA'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM tsar tsi kA sid d+hen dra nI la hA ri tshi rad na tra ya a pa
kA ri No ru di ra A kar Sha ya dza/ sngags 'di dag ni dran byas na/ /kha gdangs pa dag byas pa yin/ /'jig rten gsum gyi khrag chen po/ /'gugs pa 'di la the tshom med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

gshin rje'i gshed chen po chang 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje phag mo'i chang 'gugs pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ /oM badzra g+ho Ne su g+ho Ne badzra mA ma kI b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam b+ha ra sam b+ha ra/

trai d+hA+e tu ka myar/ A kar Sha ya dzaH/ rdza mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas/ /bum pa kha mdzes nyer byas la/ /rkun ma'i skra ni rten bzhag ste/ /sngags ni rjes su dran par bya/ /sngags 'di che ba'i bdag nyid 'di/ /ba ta mchod

rten dag tu bstan/ /dal gyis dmigs nas 'bad par bya/ /chang ni 'gugs par rab tu grags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i gshin rje'i gshed rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje dbyangs can ma'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nya ba ra d+ha ni dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+hA ba ra d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri bud d+hi bar d+ha ni swA hA/ tshes kyi dang po nas bzung ste/ /kun du zla ba nya yi bar/ /sbyar ba'i
skad ni smra bar bya/ /ji srid zla ba'i rjes 'jug pas/ /rtag tu tshigs bcad brgya zin 'di/ /ngag gi dbang phyug 'grub par 'gyur/ /khams gsum ma lus pa dag ni/ /ma lus lus pa med par 'grub/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed rdo rjes khu ba 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ khu ba 'gugs par byed pa'i gau rI'i sngags 'di gsungs so/ /oM A kar Sha Ni A

kar Sha Ni gau rI hrIHduSh+TA ya/ duSh+TA ya shu kram/ A kar Sha ya dzaHdzaHdzaHhU~M hU~M swA hA/ pad ma kha dang rdo rje dang / /dril bu lcags kyu'i rlung sbyor gyis/ /bzlas dang bsgom pa'i sbyor ba ni/ /khu ba'i tshogs ni 'gugs par byed/ /

nags kyi nang ngam dben pa ru/ /las 'di dag ni bskul byas nas/ /nub bdun tsam du sbyor ba yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed chen po/ rdo rje nag po 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbang bskur ba mchog gi dam tshig 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung bar mdzad do/ /u dum bA ra man dA ra/ /pa ri dza ta ka phreng dang / /kar Ni ka yi phreng ba ni/ /bu khyod zung la byin gyis rlob/ /ral gri chen po

khams gsum pa'i/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /'byung po thams cad 'gugs par byed/ /las kyi ral gri dam pa 'di/ /bzung na bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo nyid/ /rdo rje dril

bu bsgrubs pa 'di/ /long la slob ma yang dag zung / /btung ba rin po che 'dis ni/ /rdo rje lus ni rab tu sgrub/ /kun tu ye shes bu khyod kyis/ /'thung shig ye shes las byung ba/ /slob ma'i khar yang blugs

bya ba/ /gshin rje'i gshed kyis bsgrags pa yin/ /rdo rje slob ma bdag nyid ches/ /shin tu dga' ba'i sems su bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud las dgug

pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'i rim par phye ba ste bdun pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor bar byed/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa dang / /gdug pa can dag bsal phyir gsungs/ /dpal ldan

ral gri 'chang ba'i bdag /srung ba'i 'khor lo sbyor bar byed/ /ral gri 'bar ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /rig pa gsum las mchod par byed/ /sems can thams cad skyob pa yi/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur/ /gshin rje'i

gshed kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /slob dpon bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri/ /gos kyis gdong ni bcings byas la/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun skor bzhag /khyod su zhes kyang 'di skad dri/ /skal bzang bdag ces tshig tu brjod/ /gsol btab
pa yi blo bzangs la/ /yol ba'i nang du sbyin par bya/ /dbang bskur don du gus chen pos/ /de nas lan gsum ched du brjod/ /ji ltar sangs rgyas chos chen pos/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ltar/ /bdag

kyang mgon pos dbang bskur zhing / /mchog kyang bdag la stsal du gsol/ /de bzhin glu dang rol mos mchod/ /de bzhin khrus dang byug pas kyang / /slob ma dang bas blug par bya/ /de la bstod pa kun kyang bya/ /de nas

rdo rje 'chang gi rgyal pos stong pa'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA Ata ma ko\u0f85ha~M`/ o~M` bu dza badzra swa b+hA ba Ata ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM d+harma d+hA tu badzra swa b+hA Ata ma ko\u0f85 ha~M`/ zhi ba la sogs dbye ba yi/ /sbyin sreg de

nas bshad par bya/ /sbyin sreg gang gis grub pa yi/ /las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i sems kyis te/ /rgyas pa rgyas pa'i sems kyis so/ /dbang yang der gtang sems kyis te/ /bsad dang bskrad

pa la yang ngo / /zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum po ste/ /rgyas pa yi ni rdzing bu 'dra/ /dbang du bya ba zla gam ltar/ /nam mkha'i khams 'dra bas ni bsad/ /zhi ba khru gang tshad du ste/ /de bzhin rgyas pa'i khru do pa/ /ji ltar rgyas pa

de ltar dbang / /bsad pa la ni sor nyi shu/ /zhi ba steng du khru phyed tshad/ /rgyas pa la ni khru tsam ste/ /sor lnga gnyis ni bsad pa la/ /dbang la ji ltar de bzhin dgug /tshes gcig la ni zhi ba bya/ /zla ba nya la rgyas pa ste/ /

bcu bzhi la ni mngon spyod do/ /dbang gi las ni tshes brgyad la'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud las sbyin sreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba ste brgyad pa'o// //

rgya mtsho'i sa ni blang byas la/ /klu yi gzugs gcig brtsams byas te/ /yi ge hU~M phuHsnying gar ni/ /hrIHSh+TIHla sogs bzlas pa bya/ /char ni mi 'bab dus dag tu/ /bzlas pa khri byas 'bab par 'gyur/ /sbrul nag po yi
sha dang ni/ /nim pa'i lo ma dang bsres la/ /de la ri lu byas nas ni/ /brtul zhugs can gyis rgya mtshor gzhug /sngags kyi bzlas pa khri byas na/ /mtsho rlabs rengs byed mchog yin no/ /tsan da'i

'bras bu brgya blangs la/ /'bras dang mar shas bsres byas te/ /'bum phrag brgya ni rab bzlas la/ /sbyin sreg byas na lha mthong 'gyur/ /dur khrod ro bsregs yog pa'i shing / /brtul zhugs can gyi gzugs su

bri/ /smyon pa'i khu bas bsku byas la/ /sngags khri bzlas pas mdzes thebs 'gyur/ /grub pa'i yungs kar blangs byas la/ /'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas byas na/ /sbrul gyis bzung nas 'gyel ba la/ /gtor na 'tsho bar the tshom

med/ /ri gshong chu yi sa blangs la/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa 'bum byas nas/ /mgo la bskus pa tsam gyis ni/ /mgo yi nad ni nyams par byed/ /sngags ni lan bdun mngon bzlas pa'i/ /lag pas mgo bo mnyes na ni/ /mgo ni zug gzer

'byung mi 'gyur/ /de ni 'di ltar the tshom med/ /bram ze yi ni sha dag la/ /dur khrod sa dang thal ba las/ /gshin rje'i gshed kyi gzugs byas te/ /phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa la/ /rdo rje chen po g.yas pa na/ /de bzhin mi mgo g.yon pa na'o/ /mdog

ni dkar po cher 'jigs pa/ /de yis gdug pa 'joms par byed/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga yis/ /nyin re bzhin du gtor ma sbyin/ /bdag gi dgra bo chom shig ces/ /rnal 'byor pas bdag gsol ba gdab/ /nub mo de skad brjod pas nyal/ /dgra ni tho rangs

'chi bar 'gyur/ /chu 'gags la sogs pas gzir zhing / /yang na nad kyis thebs par 'gyur/ /dgra yi bai ro tsa na blang / /mi yi rkang sbubs yongs bkang ste/ /rab tu bkang nas 'bum bzlas na/ /shing rtser rgyu ba'i yi dags mtshungs/ /

lha rdzas dngos grub kun byed cing / /dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub bo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud las 'jigs byed gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba'i rim par phye ba ste

dgu pa'o// // ro langs chen po'i sgrub thabs ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /sgrub pa bzang po kun byed cing / /dgos pa sna tshogs rab sgrub pa'o/ /bzang po ma god rma med pa/ /shing la sbyangs pas bsdus byas la/ /phab la

legs par bkru bya ste/ /der 'dug sngags bzlas brtul zhugs can/ /e ma'o ngo mtshar sngags kyi mthu/ /bsam pa med pa'i 'o dod 'bod/ /gshin rje'i rnal 'byor ldan pa yi/ /yid kyis cung zad 'jigs mi bya/ /

rnal 'byor lam ni gang 'dod pa/ /de kun thams cad ster bar byed/ /ma he dang ni ku be ra/ /stag dang de las gzhan pa dang / /dom dang spre'u dag la ni/ /khyi dag gi ni khyad par dang / /dug dang ske tshe tshwa dang ni/ /de bzhin tshwa

gsum so ba\u0f85dza/ /'di dag legs par sbyar gzugs bya/ /gshin rje'i gshed po 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /de la rnal 'byor pas gsol gdab/ /hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags kyis ni/ /che ge mo de bdag la stsol/ /de yi pha
yis ster bar byed/ /gal te rnal 'byor pa ma phyin/ /rmi lam gshin rje'i gshed brdeg cing / /lho yi phyogs su khyer mthong nas/ /sad na de yi pha yis ster/ /zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa la/ /in+t+ra
nI la 'dra ba'i mdog /tho ba 'dzin pa'i brtul zhugs can/ /phyag tu tho ba dgod par bya/ /zhal gsum phyag drug khros pa la/ /mdog dmar po ste khros par 'jigs/ /'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad/ /
mkhas pas phyag tu dbyig pa dgod/ /zhal gsum phyag drug dmar ba la/ /'jigs pa chen po bsdigs pa yi/ /phyag na pad ma dmar po bsnams/ /pad ma zhes bya mkhas pas bsgom/ /zhal gsum

phyag drug ljang gu ste/ /phyag na ral gri bsnams pa yi/ /las kun byed par gyur pa'o/ /ral gri zhes bya rnam bsgom bya/ /b+ha gar ling ga rnam bsgom nyid/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po rnam par bsgom/ /zhe sdang

rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis/ /gti mug rjes dran rnam bsgom bya/ /gti mug rjes dran la dmigs nas/ /phra ma rjes dran bsgom par bya/ /phra ma rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis/ /'dod chags rjes dran bsgom par bya/ /'dod chags

rjes dran rnal 'byor gyis/ /phrag dog dran bya brtul zhugs can/ /so so'i rigs kyi sprin rnams ni/ /ba spu'i khung nas spro bar bya/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /gtum po'i khro bo bsgom par bya/ /zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ /lha mo bzhi po rab bsgom bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud las rjes su dran pa rim par phye ba ste bcu pa'o// //
zhe sdang gis mnan 'gro mthong nas/ /zhe sdang gshin rje'i gshed gzugs su/ /bcom ldan gshin rje'i dbang du mdzad/ /zhe sdang thams cad zad par byed/ /gti mug gis mnan 'gro mthong nas/ /gti mug
gshin rje'i gshed gzugs su/ /bcom ldan gshin rje'i dbang mdzad nas/ /gti mug thams cad zad par mdzad/ /'gro ba phra mas mnan mthong nas/ /phra ma gshin rje'i gshed gzugs su/ /bcom
ldan snying rje can gyis mdzad/ /phra ma thams cad zad par mdzad/ /'dod chags kyis mnan 'gro mthong nas/ /'dod chags gshin rje'i gshed gzugs su/ /bcom ldan snying rje can mdzad nas/ /'dod
chags thams cad zad par mdzad/ /phrag dog gis mnan 'gro mthong nas/ /phrag dog gshin rje'i gshed gzugs su/ /bcom ldan snying rje can mdzad nas/ /phrag dog thams cad zad par mdzad/ /byams pa

tsar tsi kAr gsungs te/ /snying rje de bzhin phag mo'o/ /dbyangs can ma ni dga' ba ste/ /btang snyoms gau rI'i gzugs so/ /bdag nyid dngos po thams cad kyis/ /rdzogs par byas nas dkyil 'khor gyi/ /rnal
'byor snying ga'i sa bon spro/ /'grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /de nas da ni bshad bya ba/ /spyod pa yi ni mtshan nyid mchog /gshin rje'i gshed po 'jigs gzugs kyis/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs su

'grub/ /dgon pa chen po'i sa phyogs su/ /ma he mchog ni bkug la zhon/ /sbrul dag gis ni brgyan par bya/ /lcags kyi rdo rje gzugs par bya/ /skra yang ser po dag tu bya/ /gyen brdzes pa yi khyad par gyis/ /mgo

la thod pas yang dag bskor/ /sma ra lkog spu ser por bya/ /hrIHSh+T+rIHla sogs sngags brjod cing / /lcags kyi rdo rje mkha' la gsor/ /rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed sbyor bas/ /seng ge'i sgra yang de la bya/ /nus pa cung zad

skyes pa na/ /rol cing grong du 'jug par bya/ /gar dang bde ba'i cha kun gyis/ /drug las skyed sogs glu blang bya/ /de nas rgyal mtshan khyams mthong na/ /der ni 'o ma rab bsgrub bya/ /'o ma la sems gcig goms pas/ /

phyag rgya chen po rab bsgrub bya/ /phag mo yi ni gzugs bzung ba'i/ /btsun mo kun la mkhyud pa yis/ /dpa' mo seng ge bzhin du spyad/ /'dod pa'i don kun rab tu 'grub/ /de nas da ni bshad bya ba/ /phyag rgya ma ni rab sgrub

thabs/ /gsang sngags chen po yi ge gcig /de yi bzlas pa mngon bshad bya/ /yi ge hrIHlas byung ba yi/ /ma he yang dag bsgom bya ste/ /rdo rje dkyil 'khor la gnas pa/ /ma he steng du bsgom par bya/ /gang yang

cung zad gcod cing 'bigs/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs gzugs de ni/ /ma he sna tshogs bsgrub pa yi/ /blo dang ldan pa'i phyag na bsnams/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /dbyig pa gshin rje'i gshed bsgrub thabs/ /yi ge

hrIHni gsang sngags che/ /ma he chen po la bcib pa/ /phyag ni 'bum phrag rdzogs pa'i phyag /sku ni mi ro'i thal bas bskus/ /ri rab dang ni mnyam pa'i lus/ /gser gyi sa gzhi thug par mnan/ /de nas yang dag bshad

bya ba/ /bye ba'i phyag can sgrub pa'i thabs/ /yi ge hU~M las byung ba'i gtso/ /wi kr-i tA na gsang sngags che/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M` hU~M` phaT phaT ha hA hi hI hu hU he hai ho hau ha~M` haHphaT swA hA/ dgos pa thams cad bsgrub pa yi/ /

dam tshig bsgrub thabs bshad par bya/ /sngags kyis dub pas kha zas bza'/ /ngan pa dang bral rnyed dka' min/ /sha chen dang ni rta dang ni/ /glang po che yi khyad par dang / /ba lang gi dang khyi dang ni/ /bong bu rnga mo lce

spyang ngo / /sngon po dang ni bsres pa yi/ /snum chen gyis ni lus byugs na/ /lus la byugs pa tsam gyis ni/ /'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ /snang mdzad si du ba ra dang / /de bzhin bil ba'i lo ma dang / /so phag phye ma bsres

pa dang / /gser shing lo ma'i khu ba rnams/ /'di yis dril phyis byas gyur na/ /khams gsum po ni dbang du 'gyur/ /dug dang chu bur de bzhin mdze/ /dril phyis byas pas nyams par byed/ /gci ba chen po btung bar bya/ /

rdo rje bdud rtsi de bzhin du/ /'di ni rnal 'byor mchog gtso bo/ /rang 'byung me tog btung ba bzhin/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud las spyod pa ston pa zhes bya ba'i

rgyud rim par phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i dam tshig rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo tsar tsi kA'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par zhugs shing / phag mo'i rnam pa'i ting nge

'dzin la yang snyoms par zhugs so/ /dbyangs can gyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par zhugs so/ /gau rI ma'i rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ mchod pa'i glu 'di dag brjod par mdzad do/ /

a kye kye gshin rje'i gshed nag bla/ /srin po'i gzugs can rang bzhin khyod/ /bdag gis khyod mthong shin du 'jigs/ /khro ba'i rang bzhin 'di thong mdzod/ /mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og bcas/ /khyod kyi gar gyis g.yos

par mdzad/ /any+dza nag po bcag 'dra ba'i/ /khro khyod ro langs zhi gar mdzod/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs sprul zhing / /mdangs nag tshad ni thung ba la/ /bde chen ngo bo khro gar gyis/ /rdo rje dbyangs can ma gsol

'debs/ /hrIHHsngags hrIHSh+T+rIHsngags dang gar gyis khyod/ /srid pa gsum gyi 'khrul pa chod/ /snying rje khros pa'i ngang sgrol gar/ /'gro bas dad na ngo mtshar 'gyur/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bzlas pa yi ni mtshan nyid mchog /

bzlas pa gang zhig rab bzlas na/ /dngos grub yangs pa thob pa ni/ /myur bar ma yin dal bar min/ /ring du ma yin thung du min/ /sngags ni cung zad thos par bzlas/ /gshin rje slob dpon mi mchog gi/ /ma he mi dang so

gnyis dang / /ba lang dang ni rta dag dang / /bong bu rnga mo'i rus pa las/ /bzlas pa'i phreng ba rab bsgrub bya/ /zla ngo gcig gi bcu bzhi la/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis/ /sha lnga dag ni bsdu byas nas/ /bzlas na dngos grub 'grub pa'i

mchog /ril bu dag ni so so la/ /rnal 'byor pa yis gshin gshed bsgom/ /mkhas pas ni yang mi mgo ste/ /khrag gis bkang ba'i mgo bsgom bya/ /khri tsam gyis ni 'byung po rnams/ /mkha' 'gro ma rnams stong phrag

gis/ /bdud dang yi dags tshogs kyang 'chi/ /gshin gshed rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis/ /rnal 'byor bdag nyid 'bum bzlas nas/ /des ni las kun byed pa yin/ /bye ba bzlas nas dngos grub ster/ /bye ba lnga bzlas smos ci dgos/ /

nyin re'am yang na zla re 'am/ /de bzhin lo ni re re la/ /gtor ma drug bcu rtsa bzhi sbyin/ /dbyug gu drug bcu rtsa bzhir shes/ /rtag tu cung zad ci za dang / /de bzhin cung zad 'thung ba dang / /gzhan yang bza' ba thams cad kyi/ /

phud ni gshin rje'i gshed la dbul/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul ba'o/ /las ni thams cad bsgrub pa dang / /bdag nyid zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /bdag nyid kyang ni dbul ba dang / /rta dang ba dang glang po dang / /

gser dang de las gzhan pa dang / /rang gi chung ma de bzhin bu/ /ma dang sring mo tsha mo dang / /de bzhin du ni spun zla dang / /na bza' sna tshogs dag dang ni/ /gdugs dang rdul yab mdzes pa dang / /khyim dang gdan dang dri zhim dang / /

de bzhin glu dang rol mo dang / /ral gri dang ni rgyan dag dang / /brtul zhugs can gyis bla mar dbul/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud las nye bar mkho ba'i las kyi khyad par thams

cad zhes bya ste rim par phye ba bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas sems can thams cad kyi/ /sdig pa dag ni ji snyed pa/ /de dag gcod pa'i gri gug ste/ /zhe sdang gcod pa'i shubs can no/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /ring ba'i thos

pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma sgrub thabs/ /nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gtogs par/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mchog bsam bya/ /gnas der rtse lnga pa yang bsgom/ /de yi steng du gnas dgod bya/ /mthing mdog

nag po 'jigs tshul la/ /phyag drug 'jigs su rung ba ste/ /phyag na rdo rje rnam bsgom bya/ /phyag gzhan dag la gzhan dag dgod/ /shar du sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyag drug gti mug rdo rje mtshungs/ /lag na 'khor lo 'jigs par byed/ /

bsgom bya sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ /lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyag drug phra ma dang mtshungs pa/ /phyag na rin chen rab 'bar ba/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/ /nub tu pad ma'i mkha' 'gro ma/ /phyag drug pad ma

'dzin pa'o/ /byang du las kyi mkha' 'gro ma/ /ral gri 'dzin pa'i dkyil 'khor rim pa'o/ /me la sogs pa mtshams bzhi ru/ /lha mo bsgom bya brtul zhugs can/ /lA s+ye mA le de bzhin gar/ /glu ma yi ni khyad par ro/ /las

kyi cho ga mthong ba yis/ /der ni sgo skyong bsgom par bya/ /tho ba dbyig pa dang pad ma/ /de bzhin gzhan ni ral gri'o/ /oM badzra DA ki nI/ oM bud+d+ha DA ki nI/ oM rat+na DA ki nI/ o~M` d+har+m+ma DA ki nI/ oM kar+m+ma DA ki nI/ la~M na~M ga~M ma~M/ mtshams su'o/ /

oM mung+ga ra dza oM daN+Da hU~M/ oM pad+ma ba~M/ oM khaD+ga hoH/ 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i sgrub thabs gsungs pa'o/ /ring po'i thos pa bsgrub don du/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya/ /der ni gsang sngags

kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur te/ oM A ka sha tsa ra badzra DA ki nI swA hA/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rdo rje sa 'og sgrub thabs so/ /sa 'og rnam par bsgrub don du/ /gnod mdzes rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /phyag drug mdog sngon 'jigs

pa yi/ /phyag tu gtun shing dgod par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dkyil dag tu/ /'di ni rab tu dgod par bya/ /shar du spyan ma dgod par bya/ /de bzhin lho ru mA ma kI/ /nub tu lha mo gos dkar mo/ /sgrol ma byang gi phyogs su dgod/ /

me tog spos dang de bzhin dri/ /mar me la sogs mtshams su dgod/ /tho ba la sogs sgo drung ste/ /sbrul gyis brgyan pa'i ska rags byas/ /las kyi cho ga mthong nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ltar bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje sa 'og

sbyor ldan pas/ /rmi lam du ni lam mthong 'gyur/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bdun pa'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor te/ /mkha' spyod nyid ni rab bsgrub phyir/ /rta yi mchog ni rab tu bsgrub/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal

gcig pa/ /sku mdog ljang gu 'jigs par byed/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng du gzhag /rta yi gdong pa rab mdzes pas/ /g.yas pa srad bu khu tshur bcas/ /phyag g.yon pa ni thod pa'o/ /oM phu~M phu~M phu~M hi hi hi/ gsang sngags

'di ni mkhas pas bzla/ /rta yi mchog tu gyur par grags/ /shar du ba Da bing bsgom bya/ /lho phyogs su ni rim gro ma/ /nub tu bdun pa'i rgyal po ste/ /rta mchog ma ni byang phyogs dgod/ /bdag po'i zhal phyag ji lta bar/ /

thams cad de dang 'dra bar bsgom/ /sngags 'di yis ni thams cad du/ /gshegs su gsol bar rab tu grags/ /smyug ma'i gling bu pi bang dang / /rnga zlum rnga bran mtshams su gzhag /ban glang sna dang glang po'i sna/ /

de bzhin gdong bzang gdong ngan te/ /gtun shing dang ni sta re dang / /lcags kyu dang ni zhags pa dang / /gar la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /sgo bzhi ru ni rtag tu bsgom/ /sngo chags g.yon par bsgom par bya/ /rang gi phyag

mtshan de bzhin g.yas/ /ji ltar lta mchog sngags kyis ni/ /rdo rje sa 'og gi yang gter/ /rta mchog rnal 'byor nyid kyis ni/ /khams gsum nam mkha'i khams su 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs

gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud las dngos grub nges par bstan pa ste rim par phye ba bcu gsum pa'o// // de la 'di ni srad bu brkyang ba'i dam tshig gi mchog ste/ a kA ro mu kha~M sar+b+ba d+harmA NA~M/ Ad+yA nud pan na twAd/ dpal

ldan gshin rje'i gshed bsgom la/ /slob ma rnam snang mdzad du bsgom/ /ye shes thig mchog rtse mo rtse/ /shin du mnyam par bzhag nas btab/ /de la 'di ni dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig mchog /oM AHhU~M`/ dkyil

'khor nyis 'gyur rim par bya/ /de yi sgo yi nyi shu'i tshad/ /ba yi rnam lnga mnyam byugs pa'i/ /skud pa sangs rgyas kyis rab brtag / /de la 'di ni rdo rje chen po gsol ba gdab pa'i dam tshig go/ e ma ho sangs rgyas slob

dpon che/ /e ma ho chos dang tshogs kyi gtso/ /dam tshig de nyid bdag la stsol/ /byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol/ /de la 'di ni sa chen po yongs su gzung ba'i cho ga ste/ rdo rje sa'i lha mo bkug la/ /lha mo khyod ni dpang du

'gyur/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /spyod pa yi ni khyad par dang / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa la'o/ /sgo ni dkyil 'khor cha brgyad de/ /khyams chen dag ni bor ba la/ /bdag nyid chen pos shes par bya/ /yid du 'ong zhing legs

spras pa'i/ /mu khyud sgo tsam shes par bya/ /lha yi snam bu'ang de tsam mo/ /rdo rje lha mo ldan pa yis/ /glu dang rol mo gar yang dgod/ /mchod snam sgo yi phyed nyid de/ /'gram dang ngos kyang de tsam mo/ /do shal se mo do dang ni/ /

nyi ma zla ba me tog phreng / /de la gos dang 'phan dag go/ rtsa ba sa yi thig rgyab tu/ /tshon rtse'i snam bu de yi phyed/ /de la snying po chen po 'dis/ /bdag nyid 'khor lo rnam par dgod/ /der ni rang gi phyag rgya'ang bsten/ /

dam tshig ye shes gzhug pa ste/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya/ /shar du dkar po chen po ste/ /lhor ni ser po dang ldan pas/ /nub kyi char ni dmar po'o/ /byang du ljang khu dang ldan par/ /in dra nI la'i 'od 'dra ba'i/ /dbus

kyi char ni yang dag bri/ /de la phyag rgya dgod par bya/ /las kyi cho ga mthong nas ni/ /rtag tu phyag rgya mkha' mnyam pa/ /phyag rgya de nyid rtag tu bri/ /de yi dkyil du rdo rje bri/ /shar du 'khor lo yang dag bri/ /de lta bu la sogs pa blta/ /

phyag mtshan kun tu zhal dang mtshungs/ /de la 'di yi dgang gzar ni/ /de yi yu ba'i tshad du bya/ /khru gang dang ni ldan par bya/ /de yi dkyil 'khor rtse mo ni/ /sor bzhi po la zlum por bya/ /gting du sor gnyis zab pa la/ /de la sor phyed mchur

byas pa'o/ /blugs gzar pad ma'i 'dab 'dra ba'i/ /kha ni mthe bo'i lto gang la/ /de la sor gcig tsam zab pa/ /rgyud 'di ru ni rab tu bsngags/ /dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang / /mtshams med lnga ni byas pa dang / /sems can

srog ni gcod pa dang / /nya dang sha ni sngon za dang / /chang la mngon par dad pa dang / /chad lta'i brtul zhugs 'dzin pa dang / /mngon par dbang ni ma bskur dang / /kun du 'khyam zhing ldom bu dang / /grong ga gla mi byed pas kyang / /gshin

rje'i gshed rgyud mngon gzhol na/ /nag po'i tshig ni ji lta bar/ /grub par 'di la the tshom med/ /de nas byams pa la sogs kyis/ /rdo rje nges pa 'di mthong nas/ /rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' kun/ /mi smra bar ni sdod par gyur/ /

de la 'di ni rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga'o/ /'byung bzhi'i sa bon chen po yis/ /'khor lo bzhi ni rab bsgrub bya/ /gnas bzhir rab tu sbyor ba bsam/ /nam mkha' la ni g.yo bar byed/ /rkang pa dag gi 'og tu ya~M/ /lte bar ra~M ste snying gar la~M/ /

mgo bo la ni yi ge ba~M/ /yi ge ya ni nag chen po/ /drag la rngam pa rab 'gyur ba'i/ /gru gsum sreg pa'i me ltar 'bar/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur dmar/ /rdo rje sa gzhi 'dzin bzod pa'i/ /ser po chen po gru bzhi pa/ /ri rab ri

yis mnan pa yi/ /nor 'dzin de ni bsgom par bya/ /dkar po zlum po bsil chen po/ /sprin bzhin du ni char pa 'dzin/ /rgya mtsho du ma chus gang ba'i/ /gangs kyi ri bo ltar bsil ba'i/ /gnas bzhi ru ni sbyor bas na/ /khar ni snang

ba mtha' yas te/ /slob ma rdo rje bsgom par bya/ /myur ba ru ni 'bebs par byed/ /de la 'di ni spro ba'i cho ga'o/ /rdo rje chos ni mgon chen po/ /snang ba mtha' yas bde ba che/ /gsungs shig 'dod chags chos chen po/ /dge dang mi dge legs

par dri/ /khru gang nas ni brtsams nas ni/ /ji srid khru ni stong gi bar/ /slob ma chen po 'phar bar 'gyur/ /de ni dbab pa'i cho ga'o/ /'jigs gzugs ri mo'i mtshan nyid ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /sa ni 'jam po blang byas la/ /

brtul zhugs can gyis bzlas pa bya/ /sran dre'u 'o ma de bzhin sha / bu ram tin ni ni la sogs/ /snum dang nim pa'i 'o ma dang / /na ti de bzhin dza ge sa/ /dang por dkar por bri bar bya/ /kha dog gzhan gyis de nas bsgom/ /rdo

rgyus dang ni btsag dag las/ /rgya skyegs lta bu'i mdog tu 'gyur/ /yung ba de dang rams dag las/ /de bzhin kha dog ljang khur 'gyur/ /sngon po dag ni rams kyis bya/ /de bzhin du bas nag po'o/ /ldong ros kyis ni ser po ste/ /

dmar po de bzhin mtshal gyis so/ /de la bil ba'i snying po bzhag /ha cang nyung dang mang ba min/ /mangs na nag por 'gyur ba ste/ /nyung na de bzhin 'thul bar 'gyur/ /gzugs ni khro dang zhi ba'o/ /mtshan nyid dag ni bshad

par bya/ /rol ba zhi bar gsungs pa ste/ /khro bo sbom la thung bar bshad/ /sna ni sor bzhi bya ba ste/ /dpral ba kos ko mchu de bzhin/ /mgrin pa 'gram pa de bzhin mtshan/ /sor bzhi dag tu bya ba yin/ /nyi shu rtsa bzhi lag pa la/ /gyen

du sor ni nyi shu yin/ /lag pa rkang pa gdong ji ltar/ /mig ni mthe bong gang tsam ste/ /rna ba gnyis la sor gnyis bsgrags/ /'bras bu gnyis la de bzhin bzhi/ /mchu ni sor gnyis bsdoms pa'o/ /lte ba sor gcig zab

pa yin/ /lus ni mgrin pa bor ba yi/ /gdong ni gsum 'gyur lus la dgod/ /ral pa cod pan de yi tshad/ /rin chen cod pan sor drug pa'o/ /ral pa gcig ma rab sgrub thabs/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gnod sbyin mo ni bsgrub

'dod pas/ /ral pa gcig ma rab sgrub thabs/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig ste/ /gri gug dang ni thod pa la/ /shin tu sbom la mdog sngo ba/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom par bya/ /dzam+b+ha la ni shar du bsgom/ /ba su d+ha ra lho

phyogs su/ /chu dbang nub tu dgod par bya/ /byang du rna cha kos ko 'phyang / /me la sogs pa'i mtshams dag tu/ /gnod sbyin mo bzhi rab bsgom bya/ /ku tal kye he ni gyi ha~M/ /ba su d+ha ri chog bzhin dgod/ /der ni sgo ba rnam bsgom ma te/ /

tho ba la sogs mnyam par ro/ /'khor lo snga ma mthong ba bzhin/ /de bzhin mdog ni rab sbyar bya/ /phyag mtshan bdag ni ltar 'dzin pa/ /mkhas pas phyi nas sngags bzlas te/ /oM e ka dza TI ba su d+ha ri Ni swA hA/ /puk+ka sI ni rab

sgrub thabs/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /gang zhig bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /'jig rten gsum la 'tshe nus pa/ /sku mdog ser po zhal bzhi pa/ /phyag bzhi bong bu la bcibs pa/ /puk+ka sI yi lus bsgom bya/ /zhags

pa tho ba mda' dag dang / /brtul zhugs can gyis gzhu bcas bsgom/ /oM puk+ka sI a~M/ zhes sngags brjod do/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /de yi mod la mi snang bar/ /'jam pa'i rdo rje

grags 'gyur ba/ /'bar ba'i gser 'od 'dra ba yi/ /ser po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /gzhon nu'i gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i mgon/ /mi mthong bya ba'i don du bsgom/ /shar du mdzes ma dgod par bya/ /de bzhin lho ru skra can ma/ /nub tu ser po bsgom

par bya/ /byang du nye ba'i skra can ma/ /thams cad phyag na ral gri dang / /'khor lo la sogs gzhan la dgod/ /thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ /sa bon yi ge ma~M las byung / /dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus na bzhugs/ /

thams cad zhabs ni g.yon brkyang bas/ /ri bong can gyi gdan la bzhugs/ /'od zer can dang ri khrod ma/ /de bzhin nor 'dzin skul byed ma/ /me la sogs pa'i mtshams bzhi ru/ /bsdus pa dgod bya snying po la'o/ /mya ngan med dang yal 'dab dang / /

'bras kyi snye ma dbyig pa'o/ /ser dang ljang dang yang ser po/ /dkar po'i lus ni bsgom par bya/ /kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /dkyil 'khor dag tu gdab par bya/ /tho ba la sogs sgo ba bzhi/ /bsgoms na mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud las 'jam pa'i rdo rje bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ste rim par phye ba bcu bzhi pa'o// // 'phags pa 'dzam gu la'i bsgrub thabs/ /de nas yang dag

bshad par bya/ /gang zhig bsgom pa tsam gyis ni/ /chu yi steng nas 'gro 'gyur ba/ /ser po zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ /sa bon phuHlas yang dag byung / /sku chen phyag na sbrul bsnams pa/ /rma bya la ni zhon pa dgod/ /shar du rma bya dgod

par bya/ /de bzhin lho ru khro gnyer can/ /nub tu ri khrod lo ma can/ /byang du rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/ /rma bya'i sgro dang spyi blugs dang / /lo ma dang ni lcags sgrog ma/ /de dag rnam par bsgom par bya/ /ser dang dmar dang de bzhin ljang / /kha

dog sngon po dbye ba nyid/ /mkhas pas 'di ltar bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin sngags 'di dag kyang bzlas/ /oM phuHdzaH/ tho ba la sogs sgo ru dgod/ /me tog la sogs mtshams su dgod/ /dza~M gu li yi sbyor ba yis/ /chu yi steng nas rtag tu

'gro/ /ku ru kul+le rab sgrub thabs/ /de nas yang dag bshad par bya/ /gang gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni/ /klu yi bu mo rab 'gugs pa/ /kha dog dmar po zhal bzhi pa/ /phyag brgyad dang ni rab tu ldan/ /hrIHyi sa bon las byung bas/ /klu ni

'gugs par byed pa yin/ /phyag brgyad du ni klu dgod de/ /mtha' yas la sogs klu rigs brgyad/ /brtul zhugs can gyis mdzes ma bsgom/ /sngags ni oM ku ru kul+le hrIHphuHswA hA/ de nas gsang ba bshad par bya/ /bsdus

nas yin gyi rgyas pa min/ /gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni/ /lha yi bu mo 'gugs byed pa/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig ste/ /phyag na mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa/ /lus ni ser po chen po yi/ /rdo rje lus med bsgom par bya/ /shar

du dga' ma bsgom par bya/ /lho ru 'dod pas mdzes ma bsgom/ /nub tu 'dod pa'i lha mo bsgom/ /byang du 'dod pa'i lcags kyu'o/ /'dod pa'i lha mo thams cad kyi/ /phyag tu mda' dang gzhu bsgom bya/ /ser dang dmar dang de bzhin

ljang / /dmar skya dag ni bsgom par bya/ /mtshams rnams su ni rtag dgod pa/ /mi 'gag de bzhin mtshams kyi bdag /dbyi dang spre'u'i rgyal mtshan no/ /sgo yi phyob kyi bshad par bya/ /'dod pa 'gying dang 'gying bag can/ /dran

dang de bzhin mda' gri can/ /lha rnams de dag thams cad kyi/ /dbu la gshin rje'i gshed po bsgom/ /bud med kyi ni pad ma ru/ /rdo rje lus med bsgom par bya/ /yi ge hrIHlas yang dag byung / /kun du 'khor bar rnam par 'phro/ /

bslus shing g.yengs pa bsgom par bya/ /myos nas bde ba'i 'dod yid kyis/ /dmar po'i gos kyis yongs dkris te/ /rkang pa'i drung du lhung bar 'gyur/ /der ni sngags kyang bzlas par bya/ /yi ge oM ni ring por drang / /yi ge swA hA
mtha' mar sbyin/ /yi ge si ta'i sngags bzlas bya/ /che ge mo zhig bdag dbang 'gyur/ /thams cad du ni bsgoms byas na/ /nag po'i tshig ni ji bzhin gyis/ /rnal 'byor 'dod pas de 'thob 'gyur/ /de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud las lus med rdo rje'i bsgrub thabs rim par phye ba ste bcwa lnga pa'o// // he ru ka chen bsgrub pa'i thabs/ /de nas yang dag

bshad par bya/ /rnal 'byor 'khor bar bcings pa la/ /gang zhig shes pas myur grol ba/ /phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig ste/ /kha dog sngon po phyed gar can/ /rdo rje phyag du bsgom par bya/ /gzhan yang thod pa bsgom

par bya/ /spyan gsum skra ni gyen du 'greng / /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /kha T+wA~M ga ni g.yon phyogs su/ /phreng ba dag gis rkang pa brgyan/ /sa bon hU~M las yang dag byung / /yi dags la gnas rtag tu dgod/ /
