dang bcas par sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bdag nyid kyi nor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /rta'i sha rnam par snang mdzad dang bcas pa gshin rje'i gshed kyi sngags kyis sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad gnas gcig
tu gnas la/ mtshan mo rgyal po la dmigs nas byas na zhag bdun gyis 'khor dang bcas pa dbang du 'gyur ro/ /glang po'i sha khu ba dang bcas pas mi'i 'jig rten kun la dmigs la yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis

mtshan mo sbyin sreg stong byas na zhag bdun gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nya dang sha dang chang dang bcas pas 'jigs pa med par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na bud med thams cad dbang

du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bskrad par 'dod na/ bya rog gi sha ma 'dres par yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyis gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg stong byas na nyi ma bdun gyis rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu yang rab tu 'bros na

phra mo'i mi lta ci smos/ de nas bya rog gi tshang dang 'bras kyi phub ma dang lhan cig tu d+ha du ra'i shing la me rab tu sbar nas/ yi ge bcu pa'i sngags gang gi ming dang bcas par nam phyed na sbyin sreg

byas na/ nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dbang du bya bar 'dod na/ seng ldeng gi me la til dang 'bras dang bud med kyi me tog dang lhan cig tu rdo rje'i chu dang bsres te/ rnal 'byor gyi gzugs
dmar po dmigs nas kha nub tu bltas te/ yi ge bcu pa gang gi ming dang bcas par sngags pas bsregs na/ nyi ma bdun gyis dbang du 'dus te/ de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi 'bral lo/ /de nas 'gug par

'dod na/ bdud rtsi lnga mar dang bcas par seng ldeng gi me gang gi ming dang bcas par sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na de skad cig gis 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /las 'di rnams ni sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa'i sngags

pas bya'o/ /gzhan pas byas na sngags pa 'jig rten pas dpyas par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bye brag mi bya ste/ gang la yang bye brag sbyin par mi bya'o/ /bye brag phye na sngags pas dngos grub mi 'grub bo/ /
ngas rgyud gzhan las kyang bshad de/ ji ltar bye brag ma skyes pa/ /de bzhin bya ba'i bye brag smras/ /rdo rje sems dpas kyang mi 'grub/ /gang gi mdun du'ang sngags pa yis/ /de phyir las rnams
mthong mi bya/ /gzhan du'ang lhan cig tu mi bya/ /gal te sngags pas las bya 'dod/ /de dag gcig pu zhig gis bya/ /sngags pa de yis las kun byed/ /'di ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje
'jigs byed kyi rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las sbyin sreg gi las kyi cho ga rgya che ba'i rtog pa ste drug pa'o// // de nas bsam gtan gyi las kyi cho ga ji lta bu yang dag par gsungs te/

bsam gtan dang sngags kyi rab tu sbyor ba las dgos pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub par bya ste/ de'i cho ga'i dang por re shig rnal 'byor pa ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor ba la gnas pa'i sngon du sbyang ba byas
pas las thams cad bya'o/ /re pha las yongs su gyur pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor kun du gsal bar 'bar bar rnam par bsams la/ de'i steng du bsgrub bya gcer bu skra bshig pa/ bred par gyur pa

bdag gi mdun du rnam par bsam mo/ /de nas rang gi lus las khro bo'i gzugs mang po rnam par spros te/ khro bo de rnams kyis ral gri btab cing khrag 'thung bar bsam par bya'o/ /bsgrub bya de'i sha za ba dang /
rgyu ma drangs par bsam par bya'o/ /'di skad smra bar bya ste/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod par byed pa dang / bla ma la skur pa 'debs pa la rgyob cig rgyob cig /sod cig sod cig bsams pa tsam gyis rdo rje

'dzin pa yang zhag bdun gyis 'chi na phra mo'i srog chags gzhan lta ci smos/ de nas gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba 'byung ba ni ma he'i gdong pa'i sbyor ba'i nga rgyal la gnas te las thams cad

bsgrub par bya'o/ /me'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bsgrub bya du bar bsams la/ de'i mdun du srin po mang po bsam par bya ste/ srin po de dag tha dad pa'i lus can ma rungs pa/ shin du gtum par sha za ba dang /

khrag 'thung bar rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya rnams te/ bya rgod dag dang / bya rog dang 'ug pa dang wa rnams dang khyi rnams kyis sha za ba dang khrag 'thung bar rnam par
bsam par bya ste/ bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas the tshom med par 'chi'o/ /dpag tshad brgya na gnas pa'i skyes bu yang sems kyis bzung bas bsam gtan brtsam mo/ /sngags pas bsam gtan brtan
par bya'o/ /de nas dbral bar 'dod na ma he'i snying gar bsgrub bya bsam par bya ste/ bsgrub bya gzhan rta'i snying gar rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /rta dang ma he gnyis phan tshun 'thab par byed par

bsam ste/ ji srid du rta dang ma he gnyis phye bar ma gyur gyi bar du'o/ /phyi nas bsgrub bya de gnyis/ rab tu mi mdza' bar bsam par bya ste/ bsams pa tsam gyis nyi ma bdun gyis nges par 'thab par 'gyur te/

gzhan du ma yin no/ /de nas bskrad par 'dod na de ru ya~M las yongs su gyur pa'i rnga mo bsam par bya ste/ ya~M de'i rgyab tu ya~M gi rnam pa las gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla ba phyed pa'i rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i

steng du bsgrub bya gcer bu skra bshig pa bred par gyur par bsam par bya ste/ ma he'i gdong can gyi sbyor ba la gnas pas de'i rgyab tu gshin rje'i gzugs lag pa g.yas pas dbyug pa 'dzin pa skra bsil ba rnam

par bsam par bya ste/ rnga mo de kha lhor bstan la gtang ngo / /de'i ming dang bcas par gshin rje'i sngags brjod pas rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /rnal 'byor pas 'di bsams pa tsam gyis zhag bdun na 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin

pa yang bskrod par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba ni bya rog gam/ bya rgod kyi rgyab tu bsgrub bya skra grol ba gcer bu rnam par bsam mo/ /de'i rgyab tu gshin rje rnam par bsam par bya ste/ lag pa

tho ba thogs pa bsgrub bya'i skra bzung ba de la ma he'i gdong can gyis bka' bsgo ste/ kha lho ru bltas nas song bar bsam par bya ste/ rtse gcig pa'i sbyor bas bsam par byas na/ rtse gcig pa'i sbyor ba des zhag bdun

gyis skrod par 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'gugs par byed par 'dod na yi ge ya~M las byung ba'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor/ de'i steng du a las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du gshin rje'i gzugs lcags kyu dang zhags pa lag tu thogs

pa rnam par bsam mo/ /ma he'i gdong pa'i rnal 'byor la gnas pas de la bka' bsgo ba/ gshin rje song la yul che ge mo nas bu mo che ge mo myur bar khug cig /de skad bskul bas ya~M gi rnam par bskyod de song bar rnam par

bsam par bya'o/ /bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor ba la gnas pa'i sngags pas khams gsum du gtogs pa'i bud med bkug la rol bar bya'o/ /ji ltar bsam pa brtan par gyur na 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas de dag bya'i gzhan gyis mi

bya'o/ /de nas sbrul gyis zin pa blang ba'i rab tu byed pa gsungs te/ rang gi snying gar pad ma dkar po 'dab ma brgyad pa rnam par bsam mo/ /de'i steng du dbyangs yig gsum pa 'dab mar phaT brgyad rnam par bsam mo/ /de

yis ni 'og gi klu'i gzugs rnam par bsam par bya ste/ de'i spyi bor yi ge i kha dog dkar po las bdud rtsi 'dzag pa bsam par bya'o/ /klu de'i mig rnams nas bdud rtsi 'phros nas bsgrub bya de'i lus la thim par bsam

par bya ste/ bsam gtan 'di'i sbyor bas khams gsum yongs su gang ba'i dug kyang med par 'gyur ro/ /dug khur stong yang za nus so/ /de nas zhu ba'i bsam gtan gyi rab tu sbyor ba 'byung ste/ bsgrub bya mdun du

bsam ste/ de'i rkang pa gnyis la yi ge ya~M las gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya/ de'i steng du gsang ba'i gnas su me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar po ra~M gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o/ /

de'i steng du snying gar sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa mdog ser po la~M gyis byin gyis brlabs pa bsam par bya'o/ /de'i steng du dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /de'i dbus su yi ge ba~M mgo thur
du gnas pa las bdud rtsi 'dzag par bsam ste/ 'di ni legs par rnam par bsams nas rlung gis me rab tu sbar te/ me des dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsregs par rnam par bsam/ dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor

gyi drod kyis bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor de zhu bar bsam par bya'o/ /'di yi sbyor ba tsam gyis ni/ /de yi bud med zhu 'gyur te/ /'o ma yi ni shing bzhin du/ /zhu bar byed par the tshom med/ /de nas rgyal po'am/

rgyal po'i blon po dbang du bya bar 'dod na sngags pa ma he'i gdong can gyi rnal 'byor la rab tu gnas la/ de nyid mdog dmar por bsams te/ bsgrub bya gang du gnas pa de'i steng du gnas la/ phyi nas rang gi
lus 'jam dpal mdog dmar po phyag na lcags kyu dang zhags pa can phyung ste/ 'jam dpal des bsgrub bya'i snying ga dang mgrin pa bcings nas bkug par bsams te/ 'jam dpal gyi sku la rab tu gzhug go /

bsgrub bya de myos par bsam par bya ste/ de'i snying gar yi ge bcu pa'i sngags rnam par bsam par bya'o/ /yang kha dog dmar po sgrub pa pos ye shes kyi gzugs kyis yi ge la gzhug par bya'o/ /de dang bsgrub
bya gcig tu gyur par bya'o/ /bsam gtan 'di'i rab tu sbyor bas nyi ma bdun gyis 'khor los sgyur ba yang dbang du 'gyur te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du the tshom med do/ /rab tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sngags

pas mi g.yo ba'i bsam gtan gyis bya'o/ /rgyud gang la yang mi sbyin no/ /gal te sngags kyang mi bstan/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po ma he'i gdong can gyi bsam gtan gang la yang mi sbyin/ smra bar yang

mi bya/ sngags kyi dbye ba yang mi bya/ bris sku yang gang gi mdun du yang mi dgram ste/ thang ka yang gsang bar gzhag go/ rgyud 'di rab tu sbyor ba dang / /bzlas pa dang / smra ba gzhan su la yang 'ga' tsam yang mi

smra/ gal te smras na dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed dang / gzhan yang rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis za'o/ /dam tshig nyams par 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir sngags pas su la yang mi sbyin no/ /

de nas dam tshig ma nyam pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / dam pa'i brtul zhugs can dpa' bo bla ma la gus pa dul ba can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la nges par 'dzin pa/ rgyud sbas pa/ mi khros

snying rje dang ldan pa/ bzlas pa dang bsam gtan la phyogs pa/ rnam par smin pa la 'dzem pa/ 'di lta bu'i yon tan khyad par can ni slob ma bzang mo ste/ dkyil 'khor dam pa dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po la
mchog tu gus pa/ snying rje chen pos yid brlan pa/ rnam par rtog pa med pa/ mchog tu bla ma la gus pa/ rab tu brtag pa la shin du rnam par bsams te/ bla mas de lta bu'i slob ma la dpal rdo rje 'jigs

byed chen po'i rgyud sbyin no/ /sngags pas gzhan la byin na de dang slob mar bcas nas dmyal bar 'gro bar the tshom med do/ /'jig rten 'dir ni 'jigs pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pha rol tu ni dmyal
bar 'gro'o/ /dam tshig kyang nyams par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni 'jam dpal zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud las bsam gtan gyi las bsgrub pa brtag pa'i rtog pa ste
bdun pa'o// //dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor lo'i rgyud 'bum pa nas btus nas phyung ba rtog pa'i phyogs bklags pas 'grub pa/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed
chen po ma he'i gdong can gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i rtog pa rdzogs s+ho// //dpal u D+yan gyi gnas chen po nas dpal 'jam dpal gyi rgyud las phyung ba rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal rdo rje 'jigs

byed chen po zhes bya ba/ bla ma dam pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i slob dpon dpal la li ta badzras bton nas mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho// //rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta mchog gi dngos grub brnyes pa bA ra phyag rdum gyi zhal snga nas dang /
bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rdo rje grags kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI badzra b+hai ra ba kal pa tan tra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog

pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas 'dir ni bshad bya ba/ /ji ltar 'gro rnams zad byed cing / /sdug bsngal rnam thar byed pa yi/ /sgrub pa'i thabs chen mchog gyur pa/ /gsang

sngags de las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dang por rnam par snang mdzad de/ /de dang nye bar ngag dbang phyug /rdo rjes 'khor lo bsgyur ba'o/ /gdon gyi bdag dang 'byung po'i rje/ /mi yi sa bon gnyis ldan bya/ /mchod

rten sreg byed mtha' dang bcas/ /gzhan du shes par mi 'gyur te/ /rdo rje can gyi mkha' la gnas/ /yi ge 'bum phrag khri brjod na/ /nyams pa thams cad sel byed cing / /zhi dang rgyas dang dbang mngon spyod/ /gsod

dang skrod dgug dbye rings dang / /dman par byed dang rgyal srid sogs/ /thob pa nyid la the tshom med/ /dur khrod tshang tshing khron ngogs rtsub/ /shing gcig khang stong mtshan gcig dben/ /gang 'dod gnas su bsam

gtan brtsam/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das 'phrul pa thams cad la khyab pa me long lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku dang ye shes thams cad la khyab par bya ba'i phyir/ sku mdog dkar po

zhal lnga dang ldan par byas nas/ 'jig rten pa thams cad la gzigs nas/ rang gi rigs kyi yi ge nyid brjod pas/ sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las dang / ye shes kyang gcig gi ngo bor

sprul pa'i skur gyur to/ /kye ma bcom ldan rdo rje che/ /don rnams bskyed pa yang nyid do/ /mkha' dkyil 'od kyis 'gengs 'gyur ba/ /slar zhing kha dog lnga ldan pa/ /sa bon sngags kyis bskul ba yi/ /'od kyi rtse

phrag thub pa'i sku/ /kun kyang sangs rgyas gnas las skyes/ /rang la zhugs pas sku rdzogs 'gyur/ /zhal drug khro gnyer rab brjid pa/ /ma he'i zhal ldan steng gnas pa/ /'jam dpal zhal ni 'dzum bcas bzhugs/ /lhag ma

dmar dang ser dang sngo/ /du ba'i mdog mtshungs gyen skrar ldan/ /thod pa skam rlon rgyu ma sbrul/ /rus pa rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan/ /glang chen stag lpags gyon nas ni/ /hU~M phaT glur len gad mo can/ /nam mkha'i lus can khro bo'i

sprin/ /yang dang yang du spro byed pa'i/ /phyag drug rab tu brjid pa ste/ /dbyug pa tho ba gtun shing dag /g.yas pa'i phyag gis rim bzhin 'dzin/ /be ta li dang lcags kyu dang / /zhags pa g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'dzin/ /pad ma

nyi ma ma he dang / /gshin rje'i steng na 'gying bag can/ /zhabs drug g.yas brkyang gar gyis gnas/ /'jig rten bdag po mthar mdzad pa'o/ /de ltar gang zhig dad pa dang / /blo ldan g.yo sgyu rab spangs shing / /legs par dbang rnams

thob byas nas/ /rdo rje slob dpon mnyes byed pas/ /yang nas yang du dran byed na/ /brtan pa chen po thob par 'gyur/ /lha yi dge 'dun nga la nyon/ /dpa' bo chang la rab dga' zhing / /sha chen rtag tu mur byed na/ /las rnams

de yis myur du 'grub/ /sku ni du ma 'phro byed cing / /sku la sku rnams nges thim byed/ /thams cad sgyu ma nyid shes pas/ /'jig rten rnams su yid sad byed/ /khong stong rtsa ni ka ba ste/ /rgyun tu byang chub sems 'dzag byed/ /chu skyes

dmar po kha sbyar gnyis/ /yan lag gnyis kyis legs par bcun/ /shes pa 'phel ba me dang rlung / /nyi ma zla ba thabs ldan dang / /shes rab ldan par shes par bya/ /gnyis po de nyid rnam spangs na/ /khong du chud

par mi 'gyur ro/ /chu skyes kha sbyor la brten te/ /gsum gnas pa yi ting 'dzin la/ /rdo rje chos kyis rgyas btab pa'i/ /thabs dang shes rab grol ba'i rgyu/ /blo ldan 'bad pas shes par 'gyur/ /de phyir de la brtson par bya/ /
chos rnams chos nyid dbyer med pas/ /stong pa nyid kyi ye shes che/ /mi shigs rtog bral mtshan ma med/ /bde chen ye shes rdo rje'i skur/ /ye shes mi rtog rtog pa bral/ /rtog pa'i mtshan ma thams cad

bsreg /spros pa'i mtshan ma mtha' dag ni/ /ji snyed sgyu ma'i rnam pa shes/ /de nyid shes nas grol ba'o/ /ma shes pas ni phyir zhing 'khor/ /'jig rten skye bo blo ldan 'gas/ /nges par rtog pa thabs kyi mchog /sdug bsngal

chen po rab 'jigs nas/ /bde ba 'dod pas nan tan bya/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las/ thabs dang shes rab kyi bsam gtan bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /

sngags grub pa las byung ba yi/ /las rnams 'dir ni shes bya ste/ /der ni lha yi sku yang sbyar/ /zhi sogs bzlas pa'i rim pa la/ /rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje ni/ /nyi zla la brten yi ge yi/ /phreng ba kha dog lngar shes pa/ /skyen

bul spangs nas bklag pa ni/ /mkhas pa'i bzlas pa'i rim pa'o/ /drag po'i las rnams sgrub pa la/ /nyon mongs gcod pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /ser po rtse rtsibs bcu pa la/ /'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba bsam/ /zhi bar 'dod

pa'i skyes bu des/ /sems ni yang dag mnyam gzhag nas/ /sngags kyi 'od kyang 'gro gzhan la/ /phan pa'i yid dang ldan par bya/ /gro kha ras dang shing shun la/ /gur gum gi hang dri rnams kyis/ /mchod rten rim pa

lngar ldan zhing / /gdugs dang 'khor lo ldan par bya/ /sgrub pa po yi ming dang rus/ /de yi bum pa'i nang du bri/ /ye d+harmA la sogs pa yi/ sngags kyis g.yas nas bskor bar bri/ /rab tu gnas par byas nas kyang / /

lus sam mgul lam gang bder gzhag /des ni gdon dang byad stem dang / /rims dang yams rnams sel bar byed/ /gang zhig yul rnams gzhom 'dod na/ /hU~M gi sa bon dang ldan par/ /ming yig tsam po bri bar bya/ /

so phag phye ma ldong ros dang / /bab la ma he khrag gis brdzis/ /zla gam gnyis pa'i gzugs byas te/ /bar du gang 'dod bsgrub bya yi/ /gzugs brnyan sor brgyad pa yi tshad/ /byas la gan rkyal du gzhag la/ /ma he gdong

gi sbyor ba yis/ /khri phrag gcig tu sngags bzlas nas/ /dum bu dum bur gtubs byas te/ /chu bo'i gzhung du dor byas na/ /skad cig de la de dbang 'gyur/ /bya rog 'ug pa'i gzugs byas te/ /ma nu ma li ro tsa nas/ /

khyo shug bsgrub bya'i ming bris te/ /gshin rje'i phyogs bltas gsang sngags gdon/ /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/ /mi yi rje ngar phur pas gdab/ /skad cig tsam la de dag 'bye/ /de nas 'dir ni bsad pa yi/ /

cho ga'i rim pa bshad par bya/ /zhal drug phyag drug zhabs drug gam/ /yang na zhal gcig phyag bzhi'am/ /zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa yang rung / /ma he'i gdong gi sbyor ba yis/ /khrag rnams sna tshogs tha dad dang / /bsgrub

bya'i rjes dang dug gi rigs/ /rta dang ma he bong bu'i chus/ /sbrus pa'i bsgrub bya'i ling ga bya/ /lus la tsher mas gzugs bya zhing / /til mar gyis kyang bsku bar bya/ /yang ni shing lo gro kha 'am/ /dur khrod ras sam shun pa

la/ /rang nyid gcer bu skra bshig nas/ /lus ni thal bas byugs byas te/ /mngon sum khros nas sha chen bza'/ /rab tu zhim pa'i chang 'thung zhing / /nag po'i tshes kyi mtshan phyed dus/ /'khor lo bri ba brtsam par bya/ /leng

tshe bcu gnyis 'khor lo ni/ /yungs kar til dang skags khu dang / /rta dang ma he ra khyi khrag /bya rog 'ug pa'i sgro yis bri/ /yi ge ya yi lto bar yang ming dang rus su ldan par bri/ /phyogs bzhir yi ge bcu pa ni/ /ming

dang bcas pa bri bar bya/ /brgyad po dag la rim pa bzhin/ /yi ge 'di dag bri bar bya/ /oM mu sa le tsuR+Na ra ga tsar na tsu sha na hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT phaT/ yi ge ya la bskor nas ni/ /bsgrub bya gzugs dang ldan par bri/ /de yi
mu khyud dag la ni/ /yi ge bcu pa ming bcas bri/ /phyogs bzhir rtse gsum rdo rjes mtshan/ /de bzhin rdzas rnams ma lus pas/ /'khor lo lto bar ldan pa bri/ /gshin rje'i gzugs ni ral gri dang / /

dbyug pa 'dzin pa bris nas ni/ /de dang de gnyis lto sbyar la/ /mtshan ngan thod pa'i nang du gzhug /tsha gsum ske tshe dug mu zi/ /ro nyes bkang nas dkyil 'khor ni/ /gru gsum dbus su gzhag par bya/ /yungs dang

bra bo sA lu nag /dza b+hi bra ba sogs rnams la/ /gsang sngags rgyal po brjod byas te/ /dro'am du ba 'thul bar du/ /rims dang rims kyi khrag rnams ni/ /ma lus zad par 'thung ba yis/ /ma yengs par ni bsam

gtan bya/ /yang na bsgrub bya za bar mthong / /shing gcig rtsar ni rengs pa dang / /mal gyi 'og tu zha zhing lkugs/ /chu mdor 'byed zhing ri rtser bskrad/ /gsad pa me thab 'og tu sba/ /dgug pa la ni sgo khang 'og /lha

'am 'khor lo sgyur ba'o/ /bde gnas rnams kyis dbang du 'gyur/ /mar khu chen po thod pa yi/ /nang du blugs nas bskol byas te/ /bzhar bas mig la byug byed na/ /mngon shes de nyid myur du 'thob/ /rigs ldan rgyal

po las rnyed cing / /mdog ldan lang tsho gser bkug la/ /tsan dan 'de gu mang byas te/ /las kyi sbyor bas de nyid bcing / /yang na me la gdung bas 'grub/ /oM badzra kro d+ha ya ma rA dza badzra kI li kI le/ ha na ha na ma ra ya
phaT/ ces bya'i gsang sngags brjod byas la/ /rus pa'i phur pas gdab par bya/ /gsal shing la btsug skyes bu yi/ /rdzas la brten te bsgrub par bya/ /til mar byugs la thod pas gzhar/ /mar mer byas pa'i

dud pa yis/ /mig rnon dag ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags rgyal po thogs med la/ /bten pas thob bya mang mod kyang / /'dir ni brjod pa ci zhig dgos/ /yang ni 'di ltar shes bya ste/ /rang nyid sngags dang

ting 'dzin ldan/ /brtson chen gzhan du ma yengs pas/ /gang du brtsams pa de 'grub 'gyur/ /smad 'tshong rang byung nyid kyis ni/ /sngon bstan tsakra legs bris te/ /ling ga'i snying gar bcug byas la/ /rang mdun khrag gi

zla gam steng / /khrag gis byugs pa'i steng du gzhag /mi 'am rgyal po'i bu mo dag /dgug dang dbang gi yi ge yis/ /de nyid du ni nges par 'gyur/ /nyal sa'i 'og tu mnan par bya/ /mi glang ra khyi bse phag khrag /

'khor lo bris nas ling ga yi/ /mgrin par bcug nas bya rog gi/ /khrag gis khrag skyug sngags bris nas/ /yi ge de ldan thod pa ru/ /bcug nas gsang sngags mang bzlas te/ /dur khrod me thab 'og gzhag na/ /
khrag skyug pa la the tshom med/ /bsros na tsha ba'i nad kyis 'chi/ /sbal khrag pha wang glad pa yis/ /'khor lo de nyid legs bris nas/ /ling ga'i mchan khung g.yon bcug la/ /g.yas g.yon glang khrag

sbal khrag byug /ling ga'i phyogs su rang nyid kyi/ /rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthe bos mnan/ /de tshe bzlas pa mang byas nas/ /rgya gram lam du mnan la gzhag /de las zlog pa bris nas ni/ /shing gcig khong par
sbas na rengs/ /rnga mo bya rog rgan po'i khrag /'khor lo bris nas ling ga yi/ /rkang gnyis bar bcug rang mdun du/ /khrag gis rnga mo gzugs bris te/ /de yi steng gzhag rang nyid kyis/ /rlung gi bsam

gtan nges ldan na/ /bskrad pa nyid du the tshom med/ /ri bo'i rtse la 'dzegs te sba/ /ne'u le sbrul rta ma he dang / /bya rog 'ug pa'i khrag gis ni/ /khyo shug rkang ya'i rjes sbrus pa'i/ /ling ga sor brgyad par byas te/ /

khrag des bris pa'i 'khor lo dag /snying gar bcug pa gnyis byas te/ /ne'u le gzugs byas steng du gzhag /lag gnyis rta dang ma he yi/ /rus pas brdung zhing gsang sngags zlos/ /rtse 'drud shing rtsar sbas na 'byer/ /
tsan dan dkar pos legs bris nas/ /gser sogs rin chen rdzas su dril/ /mdun du zla ba'i gzugs steng du/ /gzhag la nyin re'i bskor ba ni/ /ji srid byas na bsrung bar nges/ /spyi bor btags

na g.yul las rgyal/ /rkang par btags na chu steng 'gro/ /ba yi 'o mas khrus byas te/ /ku sha ba mar sogs mchod na/ /gsol btab nad rnams thams cad srung / /de nas bcom ldan 'das las phra ba thams cad las

rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ las thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i sngags 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /ma ra ya phaT ces bsad pa'i 'o/ /bi dwe Sha ya dbye

ba'i 'o/ /uts+tsha Ta ya bskrad pa'i'o/ /mo ha ya~M rmongs pa'i 'o/ /ba sha~M ku ru dbang du bya ba'i 'o/ /stam+b+ha ya mnan pa'i'o/ /A kaR+Sha ya dzaHdgug pa'i'o/ /\u0f00 hrIHswA hA mchod pa'i'o/ /i da~M g+ha swA hA zhal bsil

gyi'o/ /oM duSh+Ta swA hA dri'i 'o/ /oM b+ho ya~M dzaHdza me tog gi'o/ /Sh+Ti ha he phaT phaT/ bdug pa'i'o/ /dI po d+ha na ma ya swA hA mar me'i'o/ /oM badzra nai bid+ya AHhU~M swA hA zhal zas kyi'o/ /oM kA la r+'u pa satwa da ma

ka ma hA b+hU ta pa ti/ i da~M ba li gr-ih+Na pa ya gr-ih+Na pa ya swA hA gtor ma'i'o/ /oM hrIHya ma rA dza e h+ye hi A gats+tsha A/ gats+tsha b+ha ga ban sar+b+ba sa me da madz+dza/ ru d+hi ra pri ye b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha/ ma ma sar+b+ba satwa da ma ka /

kar+m+ma ku ru sid+him+me swA hA lha spyan drang ba'i'o/ /oM hrIHbadzra dza ye su dza ye ma hA badzra dza ye mu ni badzra muH/ lha la sogs pa gshegs su gsol ba'i'o/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang /

ldog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags yongs su rdzogs pa'i phrin las 'di nyid bka' stsal to/ /nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par/ /hU~M las yongs su rdzogs pa yi/ /

rdo rje 'jigs byed bsam par bya/ /dmar po zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /shes rab mo dang mnyam du sbyor/ /dbyug pa thod khrag phyag na 'dzin/ /ma he pad ma nyi ma la/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi tshul gyis bsgom/ /

oM ya mAn ta kr-i hU~M phaT/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di bzlas na/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'byung / /nam mkha'i dbyings su dbus gnas par/ /ya yig sngon po las skyes pa'i/ /khro bo rdo rje 'jigs byed ni/ /

pad ma nyi ma'i gdan steng na/ /sems dpa'i skyil krung gis gnas pa'i/ /gri gug pi d+hi pa la dang / /dgra sta dang ni thod khrag dang / /phyag bzhi po ni rim pas 'dzin/ /ma he nag po zhal steng na/ /'jam dpal zhal

ni ser zhing 'dzum/ /dpa' bo chen po rang nyid bsgom/ /rab tu zhim pa'i chang btung zhing / /sha chen dag kyang mur bar bya/ /mtshan mo dur khrod rgyu byed cing / /rtag par gsang sngags bzla bar bya/ /thig le 'dren pa'i

rnal 'byor ni/ /bsgrub bya'i phyogs su bsam par bya/ /las rnams myur du 'dis 'grub bo/ /yang na 'di ltar shes bya ste/ /ma he gdong gi sbyor ba yis/ /sku yi kha dog so sor shes/ /khyad par du yang gsad pa la/ /

dmar po ma he'i zhal can ni/ /rtse gsum lcags kyu 'dzin pa des/ /ma he sha steng bsam byas na/ /khrag 'dren pa yi mchog tu gsungs/ /ras 'ga' sku la khro bo ni/ /lcags kyu 'dzin pa grangs med spro/ /zla ba spyang kis

zin dus su/ /byi la'i sder mo ra snying dang / /bya yi khrag dang mi rus bsres/ /gang la phog pa smyo bar 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sbyor ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// //

de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /sgrub par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /dur khrod ras sam dpa' bo'i gos/ /yang na mtshan gyi kheb ma la/ /rnam snang mdzad dang rdo rje chus/ /dpa' bo'i khrag dang chang dang dug /go ro tsa nas ras tshos

bya/ /legs par dam por drud byas te/ /lus ngag yid kyi gnas su ni/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa'i chus/ /yi ge dang AHhU~M bri/ /skra phyed dur khrod sol ba dang / khrag chen ldong ros bab bla yis/ /dbang thob dam tshig srung

byed cing / /shin du gsang la dam pa yi/ /ri mo mkhan ni brtson ldan des/ /rgyud kyi don la mkhas byas nas/ /nag po'i tshes kyi mtshan phyed dus/ /gsang ba'i gnas su rab zhugs nas/ /bcom ldan rdo rje 'jigs

mdzad bri/ /rtsa ba ma he khros pa'i zhal/ /de steng 'jam dpal 'dzum pa'i zhal/ /lhag ma dmar dang ser dang sngo/ /du ba'i mdog mtshungs gyen skra can/ /rab tu brjid cing khro bo'i zhal/ /drug dang ldan pa'i sku lus che/ /

thod pa skam rlon rgyu ma sbrul/ /rus pa rdo rje phreng bas brgyan/ /glang chen stag lpags gyon nas ni/ /pad ma nyi ma ma he la/ /gshin rje mnan nas zhabs drug gis/ /g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum gar gyis 'gying / /

phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na/ /rtse gcig gnyis pa tho ba ste/ /gsum pa gtun shing mkha' la 'phyar/ /dgra sta lcags kyu zhags pa ni/ /g.yon pa'i phyag gis 'dzin pa bri/ /nam mkha'i mdog can thal bas byugs/ /

sku la khro bo du ma 'phro/ /sna tshogs mchod pa'i lha mos bskor/ /legs par de ltar bris pa yi/ /rgyab dang phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /dur khrod chen pos bskor bar bri/ /mgo rdum rgyu ma mkha' la khyer/ /rkang rdum

lag rdum ro langs dang / /wa dang spyang ki gtum po dang / /mkha' 'gro pho mo sha za'i tshogs/ /bya dang gcan gzan sna tshogs bri/ /skyi bung rab tu 'jigs bris nas/ /der ni bsgrub pa po yang bri/ /gri thod bzung nas sha

chen mur/ /gos nag gyon nas khrag chen 'thung / /rta dang ma he rus pa yi/ /phreng ba bzung nas gsang sngags 'don/ /bcom ldan 'das la lta bar bri/ /de ltar bris nas chang dang khrag /sha chen go ro tsa nas mchod/ /

mnyam gzhag lha yi dge 'dun des/ /dus gsum rgyun du mchod byed na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa myur du 'thob/ /sku ni rab tu sba zhing gsang / /phan yon dam pa 'di las 'byung / /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal

po las/ bris sku'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /rtog pa ma lus zad byed cing / /las rnams thams cad grub 'dod pas/ /blo ldan ser sna rnam spangs te/ /rtul phod g.yeng ba rnam spangs nas/ /

sbyin sreg las la rab brtson bya/ /mtshal dang bab bla ldong ros dang / /shan pa'i go thab dur khrod sa/ /mi dang ma he khrag gis brdzi/ /khru do pa la khru phyed brtsig /gru bzhi'i steng du zlum po ni/ /rdo rje rgya gram

ldan byas la/ /de steng 'khor lo rtsibs drug la/ /mtshan ma drug ni dgod par bya/ /lte bar me yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /mtho gang tshad du byas pa la/ /ma he'i khrag gis legs par byug /bdag nyid lho yi phyogs
bltas te/ /ma he zhal gyi sbyor ba yis/ /thab kyi nang gi phyogs mtshams su/ /me yi sa bon mngon bltas la/ /bskal pa'i me chen lta bur bsgom/ /der ni me lha'ang bsgom bya ste/ /zhal gsum phyag bzhi
gnag la rtsub/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis 'gro rnams la/ /skyabs sbyin mdzad cing bgrang phreng 'dzin/ /g.yon pas ril ba mchog stsol brtson/ /zhal nas me rnams rab 'phro zhing / /'od rnams sna tshogs kyis

brgyan pa/ /de ltar shes nas rab bsregs na/ /'dod pa'i don rnams rab tu 'byung / /dgra bo'i gzugs dang sha chen dang / /chang dang ma he'i khrag bcas pa/ /stong phrag gsum du bsregs byas na/ /bsgrub bya

khrag tu skyugs nas 'chi/ /glang po rta bong khyi sha la/ /stong phrag gsum gyis dbang du byed/ /bya rog 'ug pa khyi sha chu/ /bsregs na mi rta 'byer bar nges/ /til dang nas dang gro sA li/ /yung ba gi hang so

phag rnams/ /stong phrag drug tu gang bsregs pa/ /longs spyod thams cad rnyed par 'gyur/ /rta dang rnga mo bya rog sha / mi sha rdo rje chur bcas pa/ /gsang sngags rnal 'byor ldan byas te/ /brgya rtsa brgyad kyis

nges par skrod/ /ra sha da na ud pa la/ /chang dang ma he chur bcas pa/ /gang 'dod brgya rtsa brgyad kyis lkugs/ /dug dang khrag dang sgog pa dang / /sha chen til mar rab sbags te/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs
byas na/ /pha rol gzhan gyi rig sngags gcod/ /tsan dan dkar po 'bras dkar dang / /til dkar 'bras chan yungs kar dang / /ud pal dkar dmar ga pur dag /shar du bltas te brgya rtsa brgyad/ /bsregs nas
dus rnams kun du bsrung / /gang zhig bya ba'i rims sogs dang / /sngags rnams bsam gtan nges ldan pas/ /snying rje'i yid ni ma bral na/ 'dod pa thams cad 'dir bsgrub bya/ /gzhan du rmongs pa'i byis pa

'ga'/ /blo gros med gang shes rab 'chal/ /sngags dang dam tshig sman gyur cing / /ting nge 'dzin la mngon g.yel ba/ /brtson pa chung zhing lhod pa 'gas/ /bskal pa stong du bsgrubs byas kyang / /'bras bu

yod pa ma yin te/ /sha thang chad pa nyid du 'gyur/ /dper na blo zhan byis pa rnams/ /'ga' zhig 'bras 'dod 'khrul gyur nas/ /phub ma rdung khar byed pa la/ /'bras yod nam yang mi 'gyur bzhin/ /ji ltar sprin

dang chu zla dang / /dbang po'i gzhu rnams rtag min te/ /thar pa 'dod pa'i bya ba'ang de/ /sgyu ma nyid la sgyu ma rol/ /ye shes gcig pu rnam grol rgyu/ /stong pa dpag par blos ci nus/ /de la dpyad cing gzhal bzod na/ /

brtags pa'i snying po de la med/ /de la dngos rnams ma grub na/ /bsgrub pa'i rim gzhan smos ci dgos/ /bya ba dang ni byed pa dag /nges par de la brtag mi bzod/ /ngam grog g.yang sar lhung yang bla'i/ /chad par rtog
pa 'di mi bzod/ /rtag pa nyid kyang rig min te/ /dngos po yod par gal te 'gyur/ /dper na byis pa rnams la mas/ /sa 'dir sdod dang ma nyid kyis/ /'bras bu shing tog mang blangs la/ /khyod la bde

bas sbyin zhes brjod/ /de bzhin rnam pa du ma yang / /'jig rten rtog pa tha dad pas/ /de dag drang bar bya phyir bshad/ /bcom ldan lha yi lha mdun du/ /sha chen po yi zhal zas dang / /chang dang til mar
ma he khrag /rab tu zhim pa'i zas mchog rnams/ /dus rnams rtag tu dbul bar bya/ /gsang sngags rgyal po yi ge bcu/ /bdag gis rgyun du gdon bya zhing / /bsam gtan rtag tu brtson par bya/ /
de ltar shes shing sgrub byed pa'i/ /skyes bu blo ldan de yis ni/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyang myur 'grub 'gyur/ /zhi sogs las rnams smos ci dgos/ /grong khyer dkrug na sngags pa des/ /khyi sha sbal

sha rus sbal sha / rnga mo byi la'i sha rnams la/ /stong rtsa brgyad du bsreg par bya/ /rta sha dri chen rab sbyar bas/ /ri lu byas te bdag mdun du/ /gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas byas nas/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du
bsregs pas ni/ /rgyal po dbang du byed par 'gyur/ /bud med dbang du byed 'dod na/ /sha chen glang po sha dang bcas/ /byang chub sems dang bsres byas te/ /stong phrag brgyad du sreg par bya/ /dgug
pa dus rnams thams cad du/ /khyi sha nya sha bdud rtsi lnga/ /cha mnyam ri lu byas nas ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bsregs na 'gugs/ /sbyin sreg las rnams thams cad kyang / /ma he zhal gyi sbyor
bas ni/ /gsang sngags rgyal pos 'dod pa sbyar/ /ma yengs rtse gcig sems kyis bya/ /gsungs dang ma gsungs mtha' dag kyang / /ji lta ba yi rim pa yis/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po nyid
nyer gnas/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu myur du 'thob/ /zhi la zhi ba'i yid kyis te/ /rgyal po lta bur rgyas pa la/ /sdang bral chags pas dbang la'o/ /drag po'i las la khro
zhing rtsub/ /rab tu gtum pa'i yid kyis ni/ /gsod pa'i sems dang ldan par bya/ /gang zhig ltos pa med pa'i mi/ /grub pa myur du tshol byed na/ /sems kyi rang bzhin rnam dag pas/ /rdo rje
'dzin pa de 'grub 'gyur/ /dngos po gang dang gang spyod yul/ /de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro/ /mnyam gzhag nyams par mi bya la/ /dus rnams rtag tu rnal 'byor pas/ /shin du mnyam
par gzhag par bya/ /des ni thar pa nyid kyi rgyu/ /rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di las ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub myur byed de/ /dka' ba med pa'i thabs 'di ni/ /dka' spyod brtul zhugs rnams
spangs te/ /shin du bde bar sgrub pa'i thabs/ /sdug bsngal 'jigs med bdud rtsi'i ro/ /blo ldan legs par blang bya ste/ /shin du 'bad pas bsgrub par bya/ /mi shes blo gros rmongs
pa 'ga'/ /rtog pa'i dra bas bsgribs pa'i tshe/ /bsod nams dang ni sdig pa yi/ /phung po rnam pa gnyis su brtags/ /'on kyang 'dod pa thams cad ni/ /rgyud mchog 'di las 'byung 'gyur
phyir/ /dman zhing brtson pa chung ba 'ga'/ /'di la zhugs na myur du 'grub/ /de bas ngo mtshar rgyud 'di ni/ /rnyed dka' khyad par mchog gyur pa/ /yi ge'i dbyibs kyang mi bstan na/ /bshad
cing 'grol ba smos ci dgos/ /dbang rnams nges par ma blangs shing / /bla ma mnyes par ma byas tshe/ /bstan kyang thob par mi 'gyur te/ /tsha ba la sogs 'khor bar 'khor/ /de skad
ston pas bshad pa'i tshe sde rnams myos shing brgyal rmongs te/ /kun kyang 'dud cing mgo bo smad/ /'jig rten 'di ni shin du g.yos/ /gang zhig rgyud 'di nyan pa dang / /shes nas 'chang
bar byed pa dang / /dus rnams kun du 'don byed na/ /tshe 'dir 'jigs pa kun bsal te/ /shi nas mtho ris myur du 'thob/ /gal te gzhan du rgyud mchog 'di/ /bstan nam bshad dam
gsal phye na/ /de ni sdug bsngal mang myong nas/ /shi nas myur du dmyal bar 'gro/ /rang gis shin du bcang byas shing / /dngos grub nyid bzhin mngon byas na/ /sdug bsngal mtha'
dag nges zad nas/ /myur du bla med thob par 'gyur/ /dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las sbyin sreg gi rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// //
dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi rtog pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i las kyi dngos grub brtag pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po a mo g+ha'i zhabs nus pa
can dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba mar pa ban+de chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/ /

@#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shri kr-iSh+Na ya mA ri tan tra rA dzA tri kalpa nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rtog pa gsum pa zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje'i gshed po la phyag

'tshal lo/ /don dam chos sku zhi ba nyid/ /gang 'dir khams gsum rnam rgyal te/ /gshin rje'i dgra zhes grags pa yi/ /'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga bshad/ /yon tan ldan pa'i sngags pa yis/ /cho ga bzhin du bsnyen byas

nas/ /dur khrod dben pa la sogs par/ /maN+Dal khru do'i tshad du bya/ /dri dang ba yi rnam lnga dang / /nyi zla sogs pas byi dor bya/ /ba lang la sogs dam rdzas lnga/ /gzhan yang tshogs kyi 'khor lo dang / /phyi nang mchod pa'i bye

brag gis/ /legs par mchod pa byas nas ni/ /'khor lo bri dang btu ba dang / /drang dang bsre dang spo ba brtsam/ /sngags pa rnal 'byor ldan pa yis/ /lho yi phyogs su kha bltas te/ /dam tshig rjes su dran pa yis/ /

oM badzra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ /gsang sngags 'di ni dran byed cing / /'khor lo bri ba brtsam par bya/ /dbus nas sor tshad bcu drug par/ /kun nas zlum por bskor ba ni/ /'di ni nang gi 'khor lo ste/ /rim pa gsum du bskor ba la/ /sgo med

lcags mkhar bcu drug bya/ /'di ni gshin rje'i grong khyer te/ /srid pa gsum gyi 'jug sa yin/ /de yi phyi rim mu khyud gsum/ /kun tu lcags ris bskor ba ste/ /mu khyud de dag re re la'ang / /khang pa sum bcu rtsa gnyis mdzes/ /

'gro ba chos bzhin spyod pa yi/ /'khor lo 'di ltar bris nas ni/ /phyi rim mu khyud tha ma la/ /yi ge ka sogs da yig mtha'/ /nga nya bsal nas dgod par bya/ /yi ge d+ha sogs k+ShaHyig mthar/ /de yi rjes su bri bar bya/ /mu khyud

dbus ma dag la ni/ /dbyangs yig bcu drug nyis 'gyur dgod/ /btu dang dgod sogs brtsom pa na/ /mtshan ma 'di dag shes par bya/ /zla ba mig dang yon tan dang / /rig byed mda' dang dbang po dang / /rgya mtsho bkra shis gza' dang

phyogs/ /drag po nyi ma yan lag sa/ /tshes zhes bya bar rab tu grags/ /phyi rol mu khyud tha ma la/ /shar gyi tshangs thig nas brtsams te/ /rim min gza' can khang pa nas/ /yi ge bkra shis tsam blangs te/ /nang gi ngos kyi mu khyud kyi/ /tshangs

thig gi ni ngos dag la/ /phyogs bzhir mig gi tshad du sbyin/ /rim min phyogs can khang pa nas/ /yi ge mig gi tshad blangs te/ /shar du de yi g.yas g.yon gzhag /rim min bkra shis khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa can blangs

te/ /mig gi tshad du byas nas ni/ /de yi ngos la re re gzhag /nub kyi tshangs thig nas bgrangs pa'i/ /rgya mtsho can gyi khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig dang ldan pa/ /mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /lho phyogs de yi g.yas g.yon

gzhag /nub nas rim pa min pa yi/ /zla ba can gyi khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum dang ldan pa/ /mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /lho ru de rjes sbyin par bya/ /de nyid dbyangs yig gsal ba ni/ /mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /sngon bzhin

nub kyi ngos su sbyin/ /nub nas bkra shis khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig bcu gsum par ldan pa/ /mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /nub kyi ngos la de bzhin sbyin/ /byang nas bkra shis khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig bcu gcig par ldan pa/ /

mig gi tshad du blangs nas ni/ /byang gi ngos la de bzhin sbyin/ /rlung gi sa bon zhes bya ba/ /mig gi tshad blangs de rjes sbyin/ /mda' can khang pa nang gnas pa/ /'od kyi gong bur byas pa dang / /de nyid nas ni bgrangs pa yi/ /sa can khang pa

la gnas pa/ /dbyangs yig gsum par ldan pa dag /zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni/ /byang shar mtshams su re re sbyin/ /rgya mtsho'i khang pa na gnas pa/ /dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan dag /rim min yon tan khang pa nas/ /zla ba'i tshad

du bzung nas ni/ /shar lho'i mtshams su de bzhin sbyin/ /rim min bkra shis khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig lnga pa ldan pa dag /yan lag can gyi khang pa nas/ /zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni/ /lho nub mtshams su de bzhin sbyin/ /rim min tshes

can khang pa nas/ /dbyangs yig gsum dang ldan pa dang / /rim min bkra shis khang pa nas/ /zla ba'i tshad du blangs nas ni/ /nub byang mtshams su de bzhin sbyin/ /de ltar dgod pa byas nas ni/ /de nas drang ba brtsam par bya/ /dam tshig

rjes su dran byed cing / /rdo rje shugs dang ldan pa yis/ /shar gyi tshangs thig ngos gnyis nas/ /yi ge zung ldan drangs nas ni/ /dbus kyi khang par gzhag par bya/ /phyogs gzhan tshangs thig ngos dag nas/ /de bzhin zung ldan drangs nas ni/ /

de bzhin dbus kyi khang par gzhag /de nas shar gyi yi ge yang / /zung ldan gnyis pa drangs nas ni/ /rim pa gnyis pa'i khang par gzhag /phyogs gzhan du yang de bzhin no/ /shar gyi zung ldan gsum pa yang / /rim pa

gsum pa'i khang par drang / /phyogs gzhan du yang de bzhin no/ /mtshams kyi yi ge ya bral ni/ /rang rang nang gi mtshams su drang / /de dag phyung ba'i khang steng du/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge drang bar bya/ /dbyangs kyi yi ge'i gzhi la ni/ /ming gi yi ge drang bar

bya/ /ming gi yi ge'i gzhi la ni/ /so so las dang mthun pa yi/ /bskul ba'i yi ge dgod par bya/ /gsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba la/ /yi ge phaT ni gzhag par bya/ /mnan pa la ni yi ge la~M/ /zhi ba la ni yi ge oM/ /rgyas pa de bzhin

yi ge swa/ /dbang la ba~M gis brgyan pa ste/ /dgug pa la ni yi ge dzaH/ /de la las kyi 'od zer ni/ /zhi ba chu ste rgyas pa sa/ /dbang ni rlung ste drag po me/ /dbye dgug bskrad pa dbang dang mthun/ /mnan pa la ni rgyas pa bzhin/ /drang ba'i

sbyor ba byas nas ni/ /bsre ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya/ /gnyis med sngags dang ldan pa yis/ /dbus kyi bkra shis yi ge ya/ /zla ltar 'od kyi gong bur bya/ /'od kyi gong bur de nang du/ /'dod pa'i bsgrub bya gzhag par bya/ /

de dkyil rang ming dang por gzhag /phyogs kyi khyim na gnas pa yi/ /yi ge zung ma thams cad kyang / /de tshe 'od kyi gong bur bya/ /sngags kyi rgyal po bcu pa yang / /bcu gnyis khyim du spel te bri/ /byin rlob hU~M zhes bya ba yang / /

khang pa bzhi la zur re mdzes/ /yongs su dag par bkod byas nas/ /mchod dang gtor ma byas nas ni/ /spo ba dag ni brtsam par bya/ /las kyi dbye ba ji lta bar/ /'khor lo'i ras ni blangs bya ste/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa la/ /shin du dge ba'i ras

la bya/ /dbang dang dgug pa smad 'tshong sogs/ /bsad dang dbye dang bskrad pa dang / /mnan pa la ni dur khrod ras/ /gi ha~M gur gum zhi rgyas la/ /dbang dang dgug la tsan dan dmar/ /mnan pa la ni ldong ros sogs/ /bskrad la bya rog khrag

gis te/ /dbye la rta dang ma he'i 'o/ /bsad la dug la sogs pas bri/ /dge ba'i ras la bzang po'i shing / /dge min la ni rus pa dang / /lcags la sogs pas bri bar bya/ /zhi ba shar bltas dbang la nub/ /rgyas pa byang ste drag po lho/ /

gzhan yang ci rigs sbyar bar bya/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug pa la/ /sa bskor rim bzhin dgod byas te/ /gnam skor dag ni rim las bzlog /bsad bskrad dbye dang mnan pa la/ /sa skor rim las bzlog pa ste/ /gnam bskor dag ni

rim bzhin bri/ /'di ltar legs par ma bris na/ /'khor lo rang la ldog par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan bskyed de bya/ /ras kyi 'khor lo legs zin nas/ /maN+Dal la gnas 'khor lo de/ /ras kyi 'khor lo spyan drangs te/ /rdo rje bsdu

ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /maN+Dal 'khor lo bsdu bar bya/ /ras kyi 'khor lo mchod nas ni/ /bden pa'i byin brlabs dmigs par bya/ /ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /'khor lo sba ba byas nas ni/ /gsang sngags bzlas pa brtsam

par bya/ /o~M` badzra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ /dam tshig gi sngags so/ /o~M` badzra be ga hU~M/ /rdo rje shugs kyi sngags so/ /o~M` a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa ma ye swA hA/ yi ge bsre ba'i sngags so/ /o~M` badzra sa mA dzaH/ 'khor lo spo ba'i sngags so/ /

o~M` ya ma rA dzA sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni k+She ya/ ya k+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya phaT phaT/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i gsang sngags te las thams cad pa'o/ /o~M` hrI Sh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M phaT/ 'di ni las kyi gsang sngags te las thams cad pa'o/ /

shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ /zhi bar bskul ba'o/ /puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ rgyas pa'i 'o/ /ba sh+yaM ku ru swA hA/ dbang gi'o/ /mA ra ya phaT/ gsad pa'i 'o/ /bi dwe Sha ya phaT/ dbye ba'i 'o/ /uts+tshA Ta ya phaT/ bskrad pa'i 'o/ /s+t+waM b+ha ya hU~M la~M/

mnan pa'i 'o/ /A kaR+Sha ya hU~M dzaH/ dgug pa'i'o/ /oM muH/ slar dgrol ba'i 'o/ /A li kA li'i grong khyer ni/ /gsang sngags 'byung ba'i rtsa ba ste/ /las kyi btson ra dag kyang yin/ /yi ge btu ba med na ni/ /gsang sngags sgra ni log

par 'gyur/ /yi ge tshang bar ma bkod na/ /gsang sngags sgra ni nyams par 'gyur/ /gsang sngags brda yis ma brjod na/ /sngags ni dngos grub med par 'gyur/ /drang ba dag ni ma byas na/ /shin du 'khor bar mi 'gyur ro/ /

yi ge bsre ba ma byas na/ /bcu drug khang pa don med 'gyur/ /bskor phyogs log na don mi 'grub/ /rig sngags nyams dang log pa ni/ /lha min g.yul las pham pa dang / /dbang po'i dgra yis dgra bsad bzhin/ /'khor lo spo ba ma byas na/ /

cho ga dag ni nyams par 'gyur/ /rgyu yin pa dang sbyor ba dang / /dad pa brtan pas 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bas nan tan bskyed de bya/ /dpal gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bri ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa ste dang po'o// // de nas gzhan

yang bshad bya ba/ /sngags pas rtag tu bsten pa ni/ /ru sbal 'o ma zhes bya dang / /de bzhin 'od kyi lo ma dang / /'jim pa skam po nyid dang ni/ /de bzhin me yi khu ba dang / /sgra brnyan gyi ni rdzas dag ste/ /'di rnams rtag

tu spyad na ni/ /rang bzhin gyis ni nad med cing / /tshe ring dbang po rgyas pa dang / /rtag tu lang tsho dar la bab/ /lha rnams kun gyis byin gyis rlob/ /'di la dpyad par mi bya ste/ /mthu dang ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub/ /ting 'dzin

sngags kyis byin brlabs na/ /las kyi rnam smin sbyong bar byed/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa la gnas/ /de phyir cho ga bzhin du bsten/ /tshes gcig skya rengs shar tsam na/ /snod ma reg la ru sbal zho/ /drod ma yal bar btung ba'i/ /yang na nyi ma'i

sbu gus btung / /mar gyi ngo yi tshes gcig la/ /'od kyis lo ma btsil nas ni/ /de nyid nas ni bzung nas kyang / /zhag gsum skya rengs shar ba na/ /lo ma de bcang bza' bar bya/ /yang na nyi ma'i sbu gus bya/ /'jim pa bzang po sbyar nas ni/ /zhag gsum

chu yi nang du sba~M`/ /de blangs nas ni yang skams nas/ /phye ma byi la'i spar tshad re/ /ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar nas/ /sngags pas rtag tu btung bar bya/ /me yi sdong po sar ba ni/ /sa yi mar gyis dril nas ni/ /kha sbyar snod dang ldan byas nas/ /me chu

sa yis btsir nas ni/ /btung ngam nyi ma'i sbu gus btung / /lan tshwa bral ba'i sgra las ni/ /zhag gsum bcings pa'i dgra brnyan rdzas/ /nam gyi gung la sngags pas blangs/ /cha gsum snod du zhag gsum gzhag /rtse mo'i cha ni byug

pa ste/ /dbus ma'i cha ni bdud rtsi yin/ /rtsa ba'i cha ni dor bar bya/ /'di rnams so sor bsten pa na/ /tha mar 'bras bu gsum gyi phye/ /byi la'i spar tshad re dang sbyar/ /ma sbyar na yang nyes pa med/ /tshogs par bsten na bzang bar bshad/ /

re re bsten kyang nyes pa med/ /'jam dpal gyi rtog pa las dam rdzas sman du bsgyur te bsten pa'i cho ga'i rtog pa ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni/ /las kyi grogs kyi bye brag ste/ /zhi ba'i las ni zla ba yin/ /rgyas pa de

bzhin mig tu bsgrags/ /dbye ba yon tan zhes bya ste/ /dbang du bya ba rig byed yin/ /dgug pa'i las ni de bzhin mda'/ /bskrad dang mnan pa dbang po yin/ /mnan pa rjes su 'brang ba yis/ /gsad pa'i las ni rgya mtshor

'dod/ /las rnams de dag re re yang / /'phags sogs mchod sbyin dang po ste/ /nyi ma gnyis pa gtor ma sbyin/ /gsum pa bzlas pa rnam par 'bad/ /bzhi pa sbyin sreg tshang bar bya/ /lnga pa las kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /drug pa

bsam gtan rtse gcig bya/ /bdun pa las kyi lhag chad bskang / /grogs kyi las la khyad par du/ /las kyi gtsor ni gang bsgrub de'i/ /'khor lo bskor ba nyi ma bzhi/ /las kyi bye brag 'di shes na/ /zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob/ /

rgyas pas yon tan drug dang sbyor/ /dbang gis mos pa rnam bzhir 'gyur/ /dbye bas gsang sde brgyad dang 'byed/ /mnan pas dbang po drug 'ching byed/ /gzhan ni ji ltar de bzhin no/ /sngags dang rdzas kyi sbyor ba la/ /dpyad na dngos grub

mi 'grub ste/ /gal te yid gnyis za gyur tam/ /bsam par 'gyur ram dad pa nyams/ /de tshe dngos grub nye ba yang / /phyir ldog 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /dad pa brtan pos bsgrub pa na/ /nam mkha' med par gyur na yang / /sngags kyi dngos

grub med mi srid/ /lha dang drang srong gis bshad pa'i/ /rig sngags bslu ba mi srid na/ /'dod chags bral bas bshad pa yi/ /gsang sngags sbyor bas bslu ba ni/ /ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/ /

don la the tshom med pa yi/ /mkhas pa la ni dngos grub nye/ /yang na blun po dad pa brtan/ /de la sbyor ba'i dngos grub nye/ /rtog cing dpyod pa'i rtog ge pa/ /de la sbyor ba'i dngos grub ring / /bla mas man ngag bstan byas kyang / /slob ma yid

gnyis yod pa na/ /de la dngos grub ring bar bshad/ /bla mas man ngag sbas byas kyang / /slob ma yid gnyis mi za zhing / /bla ma'i man ngag dam pa zhes/ /gces spras byas na 'grub par nges/ /de yi phyir na sngags pa yis/ /rang gi

yid gnyis spang ba'i phyir/ /bla ma mnyes par bya ba gces/ /bsnyen bkur byas na nus mthu che/ /gsang ste brjod pas bar chad med/ /yon chen phul ba byas pas ni/ /rang sems rin chen rnam gnyis 'gyur/ /rin chen gnyis las grub

pa 'byung / /dkon par gyur pas bsngags pa brjod/ /bsngags na yon tan 'byung 'gyur te/ /bsngags pa dag ni ma byas na/ /ji ltar yid bzhin nor bu yang / /gang gis bsngags pa ma byas pa/ /de la 'dod don mi ster ro/ /dad pa sangs

rgyas dad pa chos/ /dad pa dge 'dun dad pa ma/ /dad pa bla ma dad pa pha/ /dad pa lam chen dad pa gru/ /dad pa yid bzhin nor bu ste/ /dad pa gsang sngags dngos grub nyid/ /dad pa bsod nams nor nyid de/ /de yi phyir na sngags pa yis/ /

rang sems dad pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ /gzhan la gus pas mchog tu bkur/ /dpal gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i 'khor lo bskor ba'i cho ga las/ las kyi rgyud dang grogs bsten pa'i rtog pa ste gsum pa'o// //dpal gshin rje'i gshed nag po'i rgyud rtog pa

gsum pa rdzogs s+ho// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /bcom ldan nyid kyi sku gsung thugs/ /rdo rje rnams las byung ba yi/ /rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis/ /lho phyogs rgya mtsho'i phar rgal na/ /de nas gshin rje'i grong khyer ni/ /ga la ba yi gnas

su byon/ /mi bzad zhabs ni bcu drug gis/ /lcags mkhar sgo med bcu drug brdzis/ /ye shes rtse gcig mtshan ma yis/ /dbus kyi lcags mkhar chen po brdzis/ /de tshe bdud chen las brgyal nas/ /ha ha hi hi'i sgra sgrogs pas/ /

chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa/ /gzir bzhin du ni rab smras pa/ /dpa' bo chen po ga la ci/ /dpa' bo'i dgos pa bdag gis bgyi/ /bdag cag srog gi snying po rnams/ /tshul bzhin 'bul gyis dpa' bos bzhes/ /lha ma srin ni sde brgyad kyis/ /

srog gi yang snying phul ba ni/ /gshin rjes ya phul ma mos ma/ /srin pos ra phul gnod sbyin k+She/ /mi yis Ni phul sa bdag sa/ /btsan gyis ts+tsha phul bdud kyis da/ /de rnams gcig tu dril ba ni/ /bran du yang ni khas blangs so/ /gtan tshigs

chen po de yi phyir/ /ye shes lha yi dgongs pa dang / /bsnyen pa nyams 'og rab chud nas/ /lha yi bsnyen pa la chud nas/ /sngon gyi thugs dam las mi 'da'/ /mi 'grub pa ni mi srid do/ /ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni

ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya/ de skad ces ni smras pa dang / /rdo rje 'jigs byed chen po yis/ /chos kyi rgyal po la sogs pa/ /gshin rje'i pho nya thams cad kun/ /sgrol ba'i zhing du byin gyis brlabs/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo

rnams/ /'khor bcas rnams la bka' bsgo ba/ /lnga brgya dus kyi tha ma la/ /nga yi bstan pa 'byung ba'i tshe/ /rnal 'byor rig 'dzin ldan pa la/ /bka' bsgo'i las rnams tshul bzhin gyis/ /ces pas dam bcas pa dang mnan bzhin

du mna' bor ro/ /gtam rgyud kyi rtog pa rdzogs s+ho// //thang chen rgyal ring gis zhus chen bgyis pas dag / @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI rak+ta ya mA ri tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal gshin rje'i gshed dmar po

zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i

b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so/ /der bcom ldan 'das kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po rje btsun gsang ba las ches shin tu gsang ba/ e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po

phyag na legs so legs so/ /zhe sdang rdo rje'i rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i snying po gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rang bzhin nyon cig /phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ 'dir gsungs pa'i gshin rje 'joms par byed pa ji tsam

zhig mchis/ gti mug rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / phra ma rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / 'dod chags rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed dang / phrag dog rdo rje gshin rje'i gshed ces bya'o/ /rdo rje tsaR+tshi kA dang / rdo rje phag mo dang rdo rje
dbyangs can ma dang rdo rje gau rI ma rnams kyang ngo / /mtshams rnams la bum pa rnams so/ /de lta bu la sogs pa'i gshin rje 'joms pa'i tshogs rnams kyis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyi bdag po bdud thams cad 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung bar mdzad pa ni/ sngags kyis 'gugs dang dbang byed che/ /de bzhin mthu

yi cho ga mang / /ral gri bsgrub dang rgyal po dang / /pha rol dmag tshogs rnam 'joms dang / /mi snang mig sman bcud len dang / /de bzhin grib gnon rig pa dang / /ro langs gnod sbyin sgrub pa dang / /sbrul gdug la sogs

bsrung ba dang / /sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor las rnams dang / /byang chub sems kyi rnams dpyad dang / /thabs rnams kun gyi spyod pa dang / /pha rol grong du 'jug rnams la/ /'od zer rnam lnga 'khrigs pa yi/ /rdo rje bsrung ba'i don du

bsgom/ /rdo rje sa gzhi'i cha rnams la/ /ra ba gur rnams de bzhin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bskyed par mdzad pa/ bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

la snyoms par zhugs nas gti mug gshin rje'i gshed la sogs pa thams cad kyi sa bon 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams las nges par phyungo / /ya ni dbus su ste/ k+She ma me da ya ts+tsha ni rA/ dzA sa do ru Na yo ni ra/ dang por ya
las gshin rje'i gshed/ /k+She yig las ni rmongs par brjod/ /ma yig las ni phra mar bshad/ /me yig las ni 'dod chags nyid/ /da yig las ni phrag dog ste/ /gshin rje'i gshed rnams lnga ru grags/ /

dza yig tsar tsi kAr bshad do/ /sa yig las ni phag mo'o/ /do yig dbyangs can mar bshad do/ /ru yig gau rI mar 'dod do/ /Na yo ni ra mtshams bzhi la/ /mi yi thod pa rnam pa bzhi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po gshin rje'i gshed rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhe sdang chen po'i rigs bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gsungs pa/ sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod par

ldan/ /ro gcig mkhas pas sems can don/ /byams sogs yon tan kun du rdzogs/ /thos pa'i rgyun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /dang por kha sogs yongs su gsang / /snga bar snying rje'i bdag nyid can/ /rab tu rtsom pa dben
pa'i phyogs/ /du khrod sogs su bde ba'i gdan/ /dben zhugs nyid kyi thugs kar ni/ /pad nyi blta zhing 'od rab 'bar/ /de yi 'od kyis bkug byas nas/ /sems can don rnams phun sum tshogs/ /
bsgom bya bla ma sangs rgyas rnams/ /ji snyed ma lus nam mkha'i mthil/ /dmigs te phyag 'tshal de rnams kyi/ /sku yi bkod pa rnam par bsgrub/ /tsar tsi kA sogs rnams kyis mchod/ /de la sdig pa
rab tu bshags/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/ /yang dag sdig gyur byas de bzhin/ /bdag gis de bshags gang zhig yang / /dus gsum mgon mdzod rjes yi rang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshungs
rnams kyis/ /bsod nams tshogs la rjes yi rang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam chos dang / /tshogs mchog rnams la bdag skyabs mchi/ /yon tan rgya mtsho khyed rnams la/ /bdag gi lus 'di dbul bar

bgyi/ /gnas dang chos kun ston pa dang / /shin du mthar yang mdzes pa dang / /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi/ /de nyid sbyin sogs gzugs can gyi/ /sku gsum ye shes thob bya'i phyir/ /bsten cing 'di
la rab tu dad/ /sems can rnams kyi don byed phyir/ /byang chub sems dag bdag gis bskyed/ /gang zhig bsod nams nyer bsags rnams/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub bdag gis bsngo/ /'gro 'di kun la phan
mdzad phyir/ /dpal ldan gshin rje mthar byed gyur/ /lhag par smon lam 'di byas pas/ /de rnams la ni gshegs su gsol/ /brtse bas byang chub bzhin du blta/ /khams gsum rnams ni stong par bsam/ /

rang bzhin gyis ni sbyor bral bas/ /rgyu dang de bzhin mtshan nyid la/ /rnam par rtog pa bral ba dang / /lha dang smon lam rnams par spangs/ /oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ ya~M ra~M ba~M la~M bzhi la dkyil 'khor

bsdus nas b+h+ru~M yig las skyes pa'i gzhal yas khang bsgom par bya'o/ /zur bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa la/ /dra ba dra phyed kyis spras pa/ /lha dang lha mos shin du mdzes/ /ba dan dril bu

bcas pa rnams/ /sna tshogs rtse mo rlung gis bskyod/ /pa~M` yig las ni de dbus gnas/ /sna tshogs pad ma rnam par bsam/ /de yi ze 'bru'i dbus gnas la/ /sna tshogs rdo rje dbyug par bcas/ /yongs su gyur las mtha'
dag rtags/ /zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /rim mtshungs pad ma nyi ma la/ /ma he dmar po'i steng du ni/ /sprul pas bdud rnams ma lus pa/ /g.yon brkyang zhabs kyis mnan par bya/ /nyi ma bye ba'i

'od 'bar lha/ /ro langs ma yis mgul nas 'khyud/ /dpa' bo zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan/ /spyan gsum dmar zhing 'jigs su rung / /mgo bo dmar po brgya yi phreng / /g.yas na

rdo rje'i dbyug pa dang / /g.yon na thod pa bsnams pa'o/ /khro bo'i mtshungs par ldan pa dang / /ljags ni bskyod cing mche ba gtsigs/ /khro gnyer sku mkhregs rked pa la/ /stag gi pags pas rnam par brgyan/ /thung zhing lto 'phyang

rngam zhing 'bar/ /shin tu rnam dag dri ma bral/ /ro langs ma yi g.yas gri gug /g.yon na mi yi thod pa'o/ /spyan gsum skra ni grol ba dang / /phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan/ /mgo bo'i phreng ba mtshungs par ldan/ /

ro bcud 'dzin pa gtso bo yi/ /shar gyi 'dab ma la gti mug rdo rje dkar po/ rdo rje tsar tsi kA dang snyoms par 'jug pa'o/ /lho'i 'dab ma la phra ma gshin rje'i gshed kha dog ser po/ rdo rje phag mo dang snyoms par zhugs

pa'o/ /nub kyi 'dab ma la 'dod chags gshin rje'i gshed kha dog dmar po/ rdo rje dbyangs can ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /byang gi 'dab ma la phrag dog gshin rje'i gshed kha dog ljang gu rdo rje gau rI dang snyoms par zhugs pa'o/ /

tsar tsi kA nag mo'o/ /phag mo ser mo'o/ /dbyangs can ma dkar mo'o/ /gau rI sngon mo'o/ /g.yon pa na thod pa dang g.yas pa na gri gug go/ phyag dang zhal dang sku mdog yang dag par gnas pa ni dpa' bo ji lta ba

bzhin no/ /me'i mtshams na mu men gyi bum pa bzhi mnyam gyis gang ba'o/ /bden bral du gser gyi bum pa gla ba yis gang ba'o/ /rlung du byi ru'i bum pa sih+la sa gang ba'o/ /dbang ldan du dngul gyi bum pa

ga pur gyis gang ba'o/ /thod pa yis kha g.yogs pa rnam par bsgom par bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po la sogs pa dpa' bo gtso bo'i sngags gsungs pa ni/ o~M` hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ snying po'i sngags so/ /

oM hra~Ms+Sha~M k+Sha ya~M kA rA ya gr-ih+Na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so/ /oM ma hA yak+Sha se nA d+hi pa ta ye ma hA dur dAn ta da ma kA ya nA Sha ya nA Sha ya/ bi drA pa ya bi drA pa ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ phreng sngags so/ /oM dwe

Sha ra ti nu da nu da tru Ta tru Ta hU~M dzaHswA hA/ rje btsun ma'i sngags so/ /oM mo hAn ta kr-ita hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM pi shu nAn ta kr-ita hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM rA gAn ta kr-ita hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM Ir Sh+yAn ta kr-ita hU~M hU~M phaT/ dpa' bo bzhi'i sngags so/ /

oM mo hA ra ti hU~M dzaH/ oM pi shu na ra ti hU~M dzaH/ oM rA ga ra ti hU~M dzaH/ oM Ir Sh+yA ra ti hU~M dzaH/ dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma bzhi'i sngags so/ /oM mar me mar mA bi g+hA te oM badzra tsar tsi ke ha ra ha ra buk+ka ma rA ya che ge mo la dzaH/

oM g+ho Ne su g+ho Ne badzra mA ma kI/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra hU~M dzaH/ oM mar me mar mA k+Sho b+ha NI sa ra swa ti da ra da ra/ tha ra tha ra pha ra pha ra/ ka~M pa ka~M pa/ d+hu na d+hu na hU~M/ che ge mo la dzaH/ oM gam+b+hI re badzra kAr ti ke g+ha g+ha/

rak+ta sho Na ti pri ye gau rI che ge mo la dzaH/ gdengs ka'i dbang po dga' bo ni/ /sngon pos skra bcings 'jigs par byed/ /klu 'jog dmar pos rna ba la/ /brgyan cing rtse mo 'khyil ba ste/ /rig ldan khra bos dpung pa brgyan/ /

lag gdub gdengs ka dung skyong ser/ /shin du dkar ba pad do shal/ /mtha' yas sngon po mchong phyir thogs/ /shin du mdzes par byas pa'o/ /bdud rtsi'i kha dog gdengs ka ni/ /nor rgyas kyis ni cod pan byas/ /

pad ma'i sdong bu'i kha dog dkar/ /rkang gdub pad ma chen po yis/ /thams cad phu tA'i yi ge sgrogs/ /phyag gnyis pa dang mche ba gtsigs/ /'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /gshin rje 'joms pa zhes bya la/ /
rnam rtog thams cad 'joms pa yi/ /sngags kyis byin gyis brlab par bya/ /mkha' khyab rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/ /rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi/ /lcags kyus kun bkug khar zhugs nas/ /bde ba

snying gar zhugs shing zhu/ /de las spro byas sa bon rnams/ /de zhu rdo rje'i lam nas ni/ /rang 'od pad ma'i nang mthar gnas/ /de bltas sa bon rang gzugs la/ /de yi sa bon las skyes pa'i/ /'khor lo sa bon kun

byin brlab/ /me stag 'phro ba'i tshogs gsal ba/ /cho ga bzhin du mkhas pas bsgom/ /blta zhing snying gar bzhu byas la/ /rdo rje'i lam nas dbyung bar bya/ /rang rig pad ma'i ze 'bru la/ /lha yi tshogs rnams blta

byas la/ /sna tshogs me tog la sogs dbul/ /lag na lo ma 'dzin rnams kyis/ /legs par mchod par bya ba ste/ /mchod pa'i glu ni yid 'ong dang / /sna tshogs gar gyi rang bzhin dang / /de bzhin bde ba chen
pos mchod/ /e ma gshin rje'i gshed dmar po/ /bla ma srin po'i rang bzhin te/ /bdag ni khyod mthong 'jigs pas na/ /bla ma srin po'i rang bzhin spangs/ /mtho ris sa stengs sa 'og rnams/ /khyod kyi
gar gyis g.yo bar byed/ /khrag gi mig sman khro bo'i sems/ /gar mdzad khyod ni ro langs gzugs/ /dmar zhing thung ba'i tshad ldan pa/ /rnam pa mang po'i sprul gzugs byed/ /rdo rje dbyangs can ma yis

zhus/ /khyod kyi gar mdzad bde ba che/ /khyod kyi hrIHSh+T+rIH'i sngags kyi gar/ /sa gsum po yi 'khrul pa sel/ /brtse bas khro ba'i rje btsun khyod/ /'gro la lta zhing gar mdzad do/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza badzra

swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ sgra yi tshogs pa thams cad la/ /sgra brnyan dang ni mtshungs par blta/ /'khor lo yi ni 'dren pa la/ /de yi de la de bzhin bstod/ /gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /

gshin rje'i gshed po shin du 'jigs/ /ston pa sangs rgyas kun rang bzhin/ /rdo rje'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod/ /phra ma rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /gshin rje'i gshed po shin du 'jigs/ /rdo rje'i thugs dang rab

mtshungs pa'i/ /rin chen rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /'dod chags chos kyi 'byung gnas gtso/ /gsung mchog kun gyi rab mchog ste/ /gsung gi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod/ /

phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod/ /gshin rje'i gshed po las kun pa/ /rdo rje'i sku dang rab mtshungs pa/ /phyag na ral gri phyag 'tshal bstod/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod/ /sangs rgyas thams cad
gcig bsdus pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi rab mchog gtso/ /dkyil 'khor dbang phyug phyag 'tshal bstod/ /AHyig las skyes rnam dag pa/ /mgo bo gsum gyi steng du gnas/ /pad ma'i snod ni gang ba yi/ /
de 'og me yi dkyil 'khor te/ /ra yig las byung gru gsum mo/ /de 'og rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/ /nag cing g.yo ba gzhu yi dbyibs/ /ya~M las byung ba ba dan mtshan/ /de la rnam par snang mdzad sogs/ /

da yig la sogs las byung ba/ /glang po la sogs lnga rnams so/ /hU~M skyes rdo rje'i gdab bya 'dis/ /gdab bya mkhas pas bsgom par bya/ /rlung gis bskyod cing me yis zhu/ /de la rnam par bsgom par bya/ /
rdo rjes mtshungs par ro gcig gyur/ /shin du dri med dag par blta/ /hU~M yig 'od kyis sangs rgyas rnams/ /ye shes gzugs kyis dgug par bya/ /rab zhugs sngags kyi gzugs kyis ni/ /mchog gi
bdud rtsi lnga rnams blta/ /de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlab/ /dkyil 'khor bdag po rnams la mchod/ /lce la rnam dag rdo rje nyid/ /hU~M yig las byung de la blta/ /de yi 'od zer sbubs rnams las/ /
mtshungs par dgug cing de yis ni/ /khams gsum bzhugs pa'i rdzogs sangs kun/ /de bzhin dkyil 'khor mchog 'di la/ /snying ga'i ye shes dgug gzhug bya/ /rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs/ /thog
mtha' dbus ma'i dbye ba yis/ /dpag med gzugs bye de la yang / /'khrul pa'i gzugs la de nyid med/ /gang las 'khrul pa gnyis la gnas/ /'khrul med thams cad sems la sbyin/ /'phro dang bsdu ba rnam par
gzung / /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje'i gshed dmar po'i rgyud las mngon rtogs kyi rim par phye ba ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa dang / ji ltar sems can rab 'jug la/ /las kyi dbye ba'i rab dbye las/ /ye shes kyi ni rgya mtsho
rnams/ /rdo rje chen po bshad kyis nyon/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /las kun thams cad rab bsgrub pa/ /nyes kun gso ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ /tshigs 'di nyid ni bka' stsal to/ /de nas
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje rab tu gsal bar mdzad pa la/ bcom ldan 'das mchod cing phyag 'tshal te/ g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba

byas nas/ yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' nyan par mdzad do/ /de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos/ /dbang du bya ba'i 'khrul 'khor gsungs/ /'khrul 'khor mthar thug gshin rje gshed/ /

ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bud med dbang du bya ba dang / /bsrung ba'i don dang de bzhin du/ /zhi ba la ni gI wang gzung / /de bzhin gro ga'am smyug shun la/ /'khor lo gnyis ni mngon par bri/ /
ming ni nA maHbrten par bya/ /nag po'i rtsa sogs dang bral ba'i/ /kham phor gnyis ni yang dag sbyar/ /dbus su zhun mar sbrang rtsi blugs/ /srad bu dkar pos dkri bar bya/ /me tog dkar pos thun mtshams
gsum/ /mchod bya kha ni shar du phyogs/ /gshin rje mthar byed chu shel bzhin/ /bdag nyid bsgom nas bsgrub bya ni/ /mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng / /bltas la mngon par dbang bskur ro/ /

bum pa dkar po zla ba bzhin/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis yongs su gang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis khrus mdzad pa/ /yang dag blta zhing bzlas pa brtsams/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hU~M` hU~M` phaT phaT/ na maHlha sbyin

la shAn+tiM ku ru na maH/ zhi ba'i dam tshig 'di lta ste/ /skyes bu rnams kyi zhi ba la/ /gur gum gyis bri rgyas pa yang / /'khor lo gnyis bri kha che yis/ /swA hA'i dbus su ming bcug ste/ /bsgrub bya'i ming blang de
rnams la/ /phu yis mngon par gtor bar bya/ /kham phor kha sbyor nang bcug nas/ /srad bu ser pos dkri bar bya/ /kha ni byang bltas thun mtshams gsum/ /me tog ser pos mchod par bya/ /kha dog ser
po gshin rje gshed/ /bdag nyid nges par blta bar bya/ /bsgrub bya zla ba ser la gnas/ /bum pa ser po chu yis bkru/ /mngon par dbang bskur bsgom par bya/ /rgyas par bya phyir yang dag bzla/ /

oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT swA hA/ lha sbyin gyi pu ku ru swA hA/ bau Sha Ta oM hrIHHwi kri tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ lha sbyin gyi puSh+Ti~M ku ru bau ShaT/ ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyas pa'i dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /
gro ga'am ni ras dag la/ /rgya skyegs dag gi khu ba'am/ /yang na tsan dan dmar po la/ /ming med dag gi khrag bsres nas/ /'khor lo gnyis ni yang dag bri/ /hoHyig gis brten byas pa yi/ /'khrul 'khor
nag sogs dang bral ba/ /kham phor gnyis ni yang dag sbyar/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi bcug byas la/ /srad bu dmar pos dkri bar bya/ /kha ni nub tu mngon phyogs gnas/ /me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ /
kha dog dmar po 'bar ba che/ /bdag nyid gshin rje 'joms byed la/ /bsgrub bya zla ba dmar po'i steng / /de bzhin du ni bsam par bya/ /rang gi lus las 'thon gyur te/ /'od zer dmar po'i lcags kyu yis/ /

bsgrub bya 'gugs par bsgom par bya/ /sngags ni khri tsam spro zhing bzlas/ /des ni bsgrub bya myos gyur te/ /rkang pa dag ni de bzhin 'gyel/ /gos bral skra ni grol ba ru/ /bsam zhing bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /

gal te dbang du ma gyur na/ /brtul zhugs can gyis 'khor lo bsro/ /mar sogs bral bar byas nas ni/ /du med seng ldeng me la'o/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT hoH/ lha sbyin gyi mchod sbyin dbang du

gyis shig swA hA/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ bau ShaT lha sbyin gyi mchod sbyin dbang du gyis shig /bau ShaT zhes pa ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang gi dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /yang na dur khrod gos dag gam/ /

rang byung gis byugs ras dag la/ /rgya skyegs khrag dang bsres pa yis/ /'khor lo gnyis ni yang dag bri/ /dzaHyig dang ni hrIHyig gis/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni brten byas la/ /bud med pad ma'i snod dag ni/ /

kha sbyar nang bcug mchod par bya/ /srad bu dmar pos dkri byas la/ /me tog dmar pos mchod par bya/ /nyi ma 'char kha dang mtshungs dmar/ /bdag nyid gshin rje 'joms byed do/ /kha dog dmar po'i lcags kyu yis/ /
dri ma dang ni rma dag dang / /gdug pa'i nad kyis bzung zhing 'joms/ /gos dang bral zhing 'dar bar byed/ /ngal zhing lus ni rma dang ldan/ /phol gyi phreng bas lus la gzung / /mtshon gyis rma
ni 'dod par byed/ /grang ba dang ni rlung gis gtses/ /me yi dbus su yang dag brten/ /ma he stag dang khyi rnams dang / /mchu rings rnams kyis za bar byed/ /sangs rgyas sde rnams 'joms byed pa'i/ /
ma rungs chen po rnams kyi ni/ /lto ba'i nang nas rgyu ma dang / /lus la tsher mas gang ba dang / /rkang pa gdos dang sgrog gis bsdams/ /de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas/ /lpags pa nges par
shu ba bsam/ /ske tshe tshwa yis byug par bya/ /grang ba yis ni lus 'don bsgom/ /de yi lus kyi bsrung sogs rnams/ /bcad cing bdag nyid mdun du gzung / /de yi go cha gcad par bya/ /
lus ni de bzhin stong par bsgom/ /bdag gi las las skyes pa yi/ /khro bo gshin rje gshed gzugs kyis/ /'joms pa dag tu bsgom bya zhing / /rkang dang tshil rnams 'thung ba ste/ /de yi mdun du gshin

rje bsgom/ /lag na dbyug pa stobs chen ldan/ /ma rungs de yis gdug pa de/ /rnam par 'joms pa bsgom par bya/ /de yi rgyu ma rtsa rnams ni/ /bya rgod kyis gzung mkha' la 'gro/ /klu yis sa 'og 'gug par byed/ /

lha ma yin la sogs pas btsir/ /de ltar bsgrub bya bsam par bya/ /snying rje'i sems kyis rab bcings nas/ /'khor ba las ni pha rol byas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing du 'gro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams thugs dgyes nas gsungs pa/ 'di lta ste/ kye ma gsad bya legs par byas/ /gsad par bya ba ma bsad de/ /ji srid sdig rnams grol bar byas/ /shi ba de yang ma shi ste/ /sdig pa stong phrag byas pa yis/ /

mnar med la sogs mi skye'o/ /e ma bdag nyid chen po ste/ /bsad pas sangs rgyas byang chub thob/ /slar yang brtse bas sems can rnams/ /gsad par bya bas gsad par bya/ /e ma snying rje'i stobs kyis te/ /

snying rje dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT hU~M lha sbyin sod hU~M/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ hU~M phaT lha sbyin mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rtog pa chen po gsad pa'i rdo rje'i

'khrul 'khor dang sngags dang rgyud kyis gsad pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /de nas 'khor lo gnyis bris te/ /phaT kyi yi ge'i nang du ni/ /bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa gzung / /thod pa yang dag sbyar byas te/ /srad bu

nag pos dkri bar bya/ /zhe sdang sems kyis nyin gung la/ /dur khrod du ni gzhug par bya/ /gshin rje mthar byed mtshungs bltas nas/ /bsgrub bya rang gi mdun du bya/ /rta dang ma he'i steng na gnas/ /gnyis po de yi lag na mtshon/ /

khro bo'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor/ /gnyis po'i phyogs la bsam par bya/ /gnyis po dag ni 'thab byed cing / /khro bas sems ni bcings pa ste/ /'thab mo byed par bsgom byas la/ /sgom zhing bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ /

oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ lha sbyin dang mchod sbyin dag rnam par zhe sdang bar gyis shig phaT ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis zhe sdang chen po'i dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /cho ga de yis sngon ma bzhin/ /'khor lo gnyis po

kun du bri/ /hU~M phaT yi ge dag gis brten/ /thod pa gnyis ni yang dag sbyar/ /srad bu nag pos yang dag dkri/ /pha gshin nags su bzhag byas la/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsgrub bya sngon du gzung bar

bsgom/ /ya~M las byung ba gzhu yi dbyibs/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po la/ /rnga mo chen mo kha dog sngo/ /de yi steng du bsgom par bya/ /de la ma rungs chen po ste/ /rdeg cing lho phyogs 'deng ba dang / /
bsgrub bya 'gugs par bsgom par bya/ /snying gar lcags kyus dgug bya zhing / /mgrin pa zhags pas bcings bar bya/ /seng ge dmar po la zhon nas/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyar ba yis/ /'ong ba
dag ni bsam bya zhing / /bdud rtsi lnga yi chu yis bkru/ /gal te bsgrub bya ma 'ongs na/ /brtul zhugs can gyis 'khrul 'khor bsro/ /seng ldeng shing gi me la'o/ /de nas bzlas pa yang dag brtsams/ /

oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT che ge mo khug cig hrIH oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT dzaHlha sbyin khug dzaHzhes pa ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gug pa'i dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /blo ldan gang gis dur

khrod gos/ /yung ba dag gi khu ba yis/ /'khor lo gnyis ni yang dag bri/ /laM yig dag gis brten byas la/ /bsgrub bya'i ming ni yang dag gzung / /kham phor kha sbyor dbus su'o/ /kham phor ser po steng du gzhag /

de la mkhas pas re khA bri/ /bdun dang bzhi pa'i re khA sogs/ /yang dag bris te ting 'dzin bya/ /ri rab rtse mo brgyad par grags/ /de yi steng du yang dag bri/ /hU~M yig dang ni ba~M yig ste/ /de yi dbus su ri rab bo/ /
de yi steng du la~M` yig gis/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor dgod par bya/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan bya zhing / /srad bu ser pos bcing bar bya/ /gshin rje 'joms byed kha dog ser/ /bdag nyid rnam par bsam
par bya/ /bdag nyid kha ni lho ru phyogs/ /dbang chen dkyil 'khor gyis mnan pa'i/ /bsgrub bya ser po rnam par bsam/ /myur du ri bo dgod cing gnon/ /sna tshogs rdo rjes mnan byas la/ /dbang chen

dkyil 'khor 'og dag tu/ /man da ra sogs ri 'jigs dang / /gangs ri mi g.yor gyur pa yis/ /bsgrub bya mnan par bsgom par bya/ /de la 'di bzhin bzlas par bya/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hU~M` hU~M` phaT phaT/

la~M lha sbyin rang gnas su rengs la~M swA hA/ zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rengs pa chen po'i dam tshig go/ ngag ni rengs par 'dod pa yis/ /'khor lo gnyis po de bzhin bri/ /nang du bsgrub bya'i ming byas na'ang / /

de la sngags ni spro zhing bzlas/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT la~M lha sbyin gyi 'dod pa'i don gyi phyir 'gog cing ngan par smros shig /mchod sbyin gyi ngag sta~M b+ha na~M ku ru la~M zhes pa ni 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis ngag

rengs pa'i dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /shin du mthar thug legs par sba/ /ji ltar 'di yi bya ba bshad/ /nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur/ /gshin rje gshed dmar sbyor bas so/ /dur khrod ras la sngon bzhin du/ /

'khor lo gnyis bri brtul zhugs can/ /ske tshe ba dang tshwa dang ni/ /dug dang nim pa ka 'am ni/ /tsha ba gsum dang tshwa rkyang ngo / /de bzhin dur khrod sol ba dang / /d+ha du ra yi lo ma'i chu/ /tsan+Ta'i sa bon de bzhin du/ /mdzub mo yi

ni khrag blangs te/ /tsi tra ka yi khu bas sam/ /tsha sgo tsan gyi sa blangs te/ /rdol pa'i rdza yi dreg pa dang / /bya rog sgro yi smyu gu yis/ /bcu bzhi la bri brtul zhugs can/ /gung thun khro ba'i sems kyis ni/ /
gdug pa can rnams bsad pa'i phyir/ /sna tshogs sems can rnam 'joms pa/ /hU~M gi yi ges mtha' rten la/ /rnal 'byor kha ni lho ru phyogs/ /bdag nyid gshin rje 'joms byed de/ /khro bo'i gzugs
can gtum po che/ /mgo bo'i dum bus rnam par brgyan/ /ma he la bzhugs ljags bskyod cing / /gsus chen 'jigs par byed pa po/ /mche gtsigs skra ni gyen du brdzes/ /smin ma dmar ser de bzhin du/ /

g.yas na rdo rje'i dbyug chen la/ /de bzhin g.yon na thod pa'o/ /mi sdug mche ba rab tu gtsigs/ /bskal pa'i me ni 'bar ba bzhin/ /de bzhin bdag nyid rnam par bsgom/ /myur du bsgrub bya de mdun gzung / /

khro bo rnams kyis 'joms pa dang / /sangs rgyas yin yang bzlog par dka'/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kri tA na na hU~M hU~M phaT phaT lha sbyin skrod par gyis shig hU~M phaT ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bskrad pa chen

po'i dam tshig tu gsungs so/ /rnal 'byor khro zhing lhor phyogs la/ /khrag bcas dur khrod thal ba dang / /dug dang tshwa dang ske tshe dang / /tsha ba'i mar khu smyo lo mas/ /de bzhin dur khrod gos la ni/ /'khor lo

gnyis pa de bzhin bri/ /gsad bya gshin rje'i lus la gnas/ /sdang sems ma he rta dag la/ /bskrad pa rnga mo'i lus la gnas/ /zhi ba zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dkar/ /rgyas pa zla ba ser po la/ /bud med snying gar

dbang du bya/ /ngag bcing ra yi lus la gnas/ /rengs pa ri rab dbus su ste/ /dgug pa seng ge stag la gnas/ /de bzhin gzhan yang mtshon par bya/ /gi ha~M dang ni rgya skyegs dang / /de bzhin kha che'i bye brag gis/ /

dbang bya gro ga shing shun bri/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /kham phor kha sbyar nang du gzhug /dge ba'i sems kyis yang dag gzung / /bya rog sgro yis bri bar bya/ /pad ma kha sbyor dur khrod la/ /nyi ma'i

gung la sba bar bya/ /gshin rje gshed kyi rnal 'byor bdag /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHsogs sngags bzlas la/ /lho phyogs gnas te tshar bcad do/ /zhi ba'i kha dog ya yig dbyi/ /ni gnyis kyang ni de bzhin no/ /phyi nas dbus

su ya yig las/ /lhag ma'i yi ge ci bde bar/ /sngon du bsnyen pa khri bzlas la/ /las 'di rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste/ /gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ba yis/ /drag po chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di/ /

gang du bris shing gnas pa dang / /yi ge bris par gyur pa yis/ /khyim de rtag tu 'thab mor 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las 'khrul 'khor gyi skabs rim par phye

ba gnyis pa'o// // ri dang skye bos dben pa'i phyogs/ /gsang zhing yid brtags sa gzhi la/ /ri mo gsal bris rnal 'byor bdag /sngags kyis 'gug pa brtsam par bya/ /dkar zhing zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ /gri gug thod pa 'dzin

pa yi/ /tsar tsi kA ni bsgom par bya/ /rnal 'byor khrag 'gugs rab sbyor ba/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed chen po dkrug pa rdo rje khrag 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /rdo rje tsar tsi kA'i

sngags gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ oM badzra tsar tsi si d+hA na tra nA la hA ri Ni rat+na tra ya pa ri No ru d+hi ra mA kar Sha ya dzaH/ zhal ni rab tu bskyod mdzad nas/ /sngags 'di rjes su dran byas la/ /khams gsum pa yi khrag chen po/ /'gugs

'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de nas gshin rje gshed chen po rdo rje myos pa 'gugs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /rdo rje phag mos chang dgug pa'i dam tshig gsungs pa 'di lta ste/ oM g+ho ne

sdu g+ho ne badzra mA ma kI b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa~M b+ha ra sa~M b+ha ra/ trai d+hA tu ka ma d+yA kar Sha ya dzaH/ rdza mkhan lag pa phyis pa'i sas/ bum pa kha ni mdzes byas te/ rkun po'i skra yi steng du gzhag /sngags ni rjes su dran par bya/ /sngags 'di'i

bdag nyid che ba ni/ /mchod rten pa ta na ru bstan/ /mkhas pas 'bad pas dmigs byas na/ /chang ni 'gugs par rab tu grags/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyi rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /oM pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la me d+hA bar d+ha ni/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ bud d+hi bar d+ha ni swA hA/ tshes gcig nas ni bzung nas ni/ /ji srid bcwa lnga'i mthar thug kun/ /legs par
sbyar ba brtsam par bya/ /ji srid zla ba'i rjes 'brangs nas/ /gsung gi dbang phyug ma ni 'grub/ /'di yis tshigs bcad brgya phyed do/ /khams gsum pa ni ma lus shing / /ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje mthar byed chen po dkrug pa rdo rje khu ba 'gugs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /khu ba 'gugs pa gau rI'i sngags gsungs pa 'di lta ste/

oM kar+D+h+ri ni kaR+Sha Ni gau rI dzaH duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA/ yAHshu kra mA kar Sha ya dzaHdzaHdzaHhUM swA hA/ /nam mkha'i gdong dang rdo rje'i lam/ /rlung dang dril sbyor lcags kyu yis/ /khu ba'i tshogs rnams 'gugs par byed/ /bsgom dang bzlas

pa rab sbyor bas/ /skye bos dben dang nags tshal du/ /las 'di rab tu bsgrub par bya/ /mtshan mo bdun gyi sbyor ba yis/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gshin rje gshed chen po

dus kyi dbye ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /'dir mchog gi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje rnams las spro bar mdzad nas/ u du~M ba ra man dA ra/ /yongs su skyes

dang sna ma dang / /kar Na ka yi phreng ba rnams/ /bu khyod zung la byin gyis rlobs/ /khams gsum ral gri chen po la/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa/ /bzung na bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /las kyi ral gri dam

pa 'di/ /thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi/ /rdo rje dril bu bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /bu khyod gsang ba'i rdo rje zung / /slob ma yang dag gzung bar gyis/ /'di ni btung ba rin chen te/ /rdo rje'i lus su rab sgrub pa/ /
mi yi btung bya ye shes chu/ /bu khyod kyis ni thams cad du/ /slob ma'i khar yang blud par bya/ /gshin rje gshed kyis rab tu gsungs/ /sems ni rab tu dga' ba yis/ /rdo rje slob ma bdag nyid che/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs gshin rje gshed dmar po'i rgyud las sngags kyis 'gugs pa rab tu sbyor ba ste rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// // de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang / /

ral gri sgrub pa gsung bar mdzad/ /skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur/ /gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /slob dpon rnams gsungs rgyud bsgrub phyir/ /khab len lcags kyi

ral gri nyid/ /de rnams yang na bcud can gyi/ /ral gri khru gang tshad bcas tshad/ /brtul zhugs can gyis rnam par bsam/ /bcu bzhi 'am ni brgyad dag la/ /dur khrod dbus su sba bar bya/ /bdud rtsi lnga dang mtshungs
par ldan/ /thun mtshams gsum du bzlas pa khri/ /zla ba so so'i bcu bzhi la/ /gtor mas sngon du mchod par bya/ /zla ba re la bzlas pa 'bum/ /'bum phrag lnga yis 'grub par 'gyur/ /grub na ral
gri rab tu 'bar/ /'od zer lnga yi glog chen 'khyug /grub pa de ni gzung gyur pas/ /mi rnams khams gsum las rgyal 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor gang gis ral gri grub/ /gshin rje gshed po 'jigs byed
sbyor/ /bde bar 'grub cing sa chen gyis/ /de yis 'thab pa bzod mi nus/ /rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi kun/ /mthong bas gnas skabs bcu ru 'gyur/ /lha dang lha min gyis mi bzod/ /mi yi 'jig

rten smos ci dgos/ /rgya mtsho'i sa ni blangs byas la/ /klu yi gzugs ni sbyar bar bya/ /oM phu yi ge hU~M la dgod/ /hrIHSh+T+rIH/ /la sogs sngags rnams bzla/ /char mi 'bab pa'i dus rnams la/ /khri ni bzlas pas

'bab par 'gyur/ /sbrul nag sha dang nim pa yi/ /lo ma dag ni bsres pa yis/ /de yi ri lu legs par bya/ /brtul zhugs can gyis rgya mtshor 'phang / /khri phrag bzlas par gyur pa yis/ /dba' klong rengs byed mchog yin no/ /

tsaN Da'i sa bon brgya gzung zhing / /mon sran gre'u 'bras bsres te/ /'bum phrag brgyad bzlas sbyin sreg gis/ /de yis lha rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /dur khrod ro bsregs mgal ba'i shing / /brtul zhugs can gyis

gzugs brnyan bri/ /smyo byed khu bas byugs byas te/ /khri phrag bzlas na mdze yis 'khyer/ /yungs kar sa bon bsdus pa la/ /'bum phrag bzhi ni bzlas byas te/ /sbrul gyis gzung nas 'gyel ba la/ /gtor na 'tsho bar
the tshom med/ /ri bo chus bkas sa blangs nas/ /sngags ni 'bum du bzlas pa yis/ /mgo la byug pa tsam gyis ni/ /mgo yi zug rnams 'joms par 'gyur/ /bdun nyid mngon par bsngags byas te/ /lag pas mgo bo

mnye byas na/ /mgo yi zug rngu mi 'byung zhing / /nyams par 'di la the tshom med/ /bram ze yi ni sha dag dang / /dur khrod sa dang thal ba la/ /gshin rje gshed kyi sku gzugs bya/ /zhal gcig phyag ni gnyis pa ste/ /g.yas

na rdo rje chen po ste/ /g.yon na mgo bo de bzhin du/ /kha dog dkar po 'jigs chen po/ /de yis gdug pa 'joms par byed/ /bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga yis ni/ /nyi ma so sor gtor ma sbyin/ /bdag gi dgra bo sod cig ces/ /
