nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /oMAH hU~M oM AHhrI tra~M hU~M/ oMAHsarba

ta thA ga to gar+b+he badzra ta twa sar+b+ba dz+nyA na dz+wA la hU~M phaT swA hA/ oMAHsarba ta thA ga to ma t-i badzra ta two pa ya sa ra ba~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oMAHbadzra dz+nyA na hU~M phaT/ oMAHbadzro pA ya hU~M phaT/ oMAHbadzra tsakra a hU~M phaT swA hA/ oMAHbadzra ra hA

hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra pad+ma u hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra bi shwo e hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra mo hA a~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra war+Na I hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra rA ga a+shu hU~M phaT swA hA/

oM AHbadzra dwe Sha ai hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra s+thi ra oM hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra yo ga a~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra dz+wA la aHhU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra ba la AHhU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra rU pa Ni ka hU~M phaT

swA hA/ oM AHbadzra shap+da tsa hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra gan+d+ha Ta hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra ra sa ta hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra spaR+Sha pa hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra d+harma re ya hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra k+She tra sha hU~M phaT swA hA/

oM AHbadzra A lo kA k+ShaHhU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra a~M ku sha r-i hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra pA sha r-I hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra ban+d+ha l-i hU~M` phaT swA hA/ oM AHbadzra g+haT lI hU~M phaT swA hA/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAHsarbA d+harmAH

swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM badzra shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+har+m+maHbadzra shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ oM yo ga shud+d+hAHsar+b+ba d+har+m+mA yo ga shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ /rdo rje mi bskyod ral pa gcig /mi bskyod pa ni byang sems bcas/ /rdo rje sgron ma rdo rje dang / /rdo rje zhags pa rnam par

bsgom/ /gti mug bag chags 'dod chags dang / /zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor lor gnas/ /ri rab nyi zla ba dan las/ /'byung bzhi'i rdo rje de bzhin no/ /khyams bzhir me long pi wa~M dang / /dri mchog zhal zas las byung ba/ /gzugs

sgra dri ro rdo rje ma/ /mkhas pas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag /phyogs bral na bza' chos 'byung dang / /maN+Dal mar me las skyes pa/ /reg chos zhing dang snang ba yis/ /rdo rje lha mo rnam par blta/ /sgo bzhir lcags kyu zhags pa dang / /lcags

sgrog dril bu yongs gyur pas/ /rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bsgom/ /rang mtshan ka pA las rab mdzes/ /gtum drag tshang tshing 'khrig pa dang / /'ur 'ur 'bar bas khyab pa dang / /keng rus 'jigs rung shar sogs kyis/ /phyogs su g.yon
bskor gyis legs gnas/ /ha har dgod pa dbang ldan du/ /byin zar dpal gyi nags tshal lo/ /mun pa mi bzad bden bral du/ /rlung du ki li ki lir sgrogs/ /mi mnyam med pa zur bzhi yin/ /dran dang dbang po

sgo bzhi ste/ /bsam gtan bzhi ni rta babs bzhi/ /rnam thar brgyad phyir ka ba brgyad/ /byang chub yan lag bdun dag phyir/ /dra ba dang ni dra ba phyed/ /phyogs bzhir tshad med bzhi yin te/ /pad ma 'khor lo shes rab thabs/ /

rnam par shes brgyad yongs dag pa/ /de ni dur khrod chen po brgyad/ /zla ba me long nyi mnyam nyid/ /sa bon mtshan ma kun tu rtog /yong gyur bya ba grub pa ste/ /nying rdzogs chos dbyings ye shes yin/ /lnga phung dang ni dri ma bzhin/ /

chen po bzhi dang spyod yul brgyad/ /rnam bzhi tshor ba rnam dag lha/ /ye shes bdag nyid 'khor lo'o/ /rgod dang phrad 'khyud 'khrig pa dag /pU dzA o a go ra de ma/ /ka o tri ko ka la kA hi/ /pre gr-i sau su na si ma ku/ /ha hi hu he

ho ha~M/ /a i u e o a~M/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par smin/ /rnam par 'joms dang rnam mtshan bral/ /dga' dang mchog dga' dga' bral dang / /lhan cig skyes dga'i mtshan nyid do/ /rgod dang phrad 'khyud 'khrig pa

dag /bde chen dag phyir bum pa dang / /gsang ba shes rab bde ba che/ /dbang bzhi rgyal po thob par 'gyur/ /dzaHhU~M` ba~M hoH/ dmigs pas dub dang gzhan goms 'dod/ /rnam par mi rtog de nyid bsgom/ /rmi lam nam mkha'i sbyor

ba ni/ /nyin mtshan rtag tu rnam par gzhag /spyi bo snying ga lte bar ni/ /zla ba pad ma nyi steng du/ /ha~M dang hU~M dang a zhes pa/ /yi ge bde gsal mi rtog rgyud/ /snying po 'pho dang thim dang gnas/ /'gyur dang 'gul dang 'phar ba dang / /

mda' bsnun bsdu dang 'gro 'ong sbyar/ /lus med sems ni ci bder 'gro/ /bstims nas 'phro zhing 'bar bar byed/ /dbang du byed dang kha sbyar bsgom/ /'dun pas bsgrub dang sa bon bsgyur/ /'phen dran bar dor don sgrub 'gyur/ /

dri ma dang ni rma dag dang / gdug pa'i nad gyis bzung zhing 'joms/ /gos dang bral zhing 'dar bar byed/ /ngal zhing lus ni rma dang ldan/ /phol gyi phreng bas lus la bzung / mtshon gyis rma ni dod par

byed/ / grang ba dang ni rlung gis gtses/ /me yi dbus su yang dag brten/ /ma he stag dang khyi rnams dang / /mchu rings rnams kyis za bar byed/ /sangs rgyas sde rnams 'joms byed pa'i/ /ma rungs chen po rnams

kyi ni/ /lto ba'i nang nas rgyu ma dang / /lus la tsher mas gang ba dang / /rkang pa gdos dang sgrog gis bsdams/ /de bzhin dum bu dum bur byas/ /pags pa nges par shu bar bsam/ /ske tshe tshwa yis byug par bya/ /
grang ba yis ni lus 'don bsgom/ /de yi lus kyi bsrung sogs rnams/ /bcad cing bdag nyid mdun du gzung / /de yi go cha bcad par bya/ /lus ni de bzhin stong par bsgom/ /bdag gi las las
skyes pa yi/ /khro bo gshin rje gshed gzugs kyis/ /'joms pa dag tu bsgom bya zhing / /rkang dang tshil rnams 'thung ba ste/ /de yi mdun du gshin rje bsgom/ /lag na dbyug pa stobs chen ldan/ /
ma rungs de yis gdug pa de/ /rnam par 'joms pa bsgom par bya/ /de yi rgyu ma rtsa rnams ni/ /bya rgod kyis gzung mkha' la 'gro/ /klu yis sa 'og 'gugs par byed/ /lha ma yin la sogs
pas btsir/ /de ltar bsgrub bya bsam par bya/ /snying rje'i sems kyis rab bcings nas/ /'khor ba las ni pha rol byas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing du 'gro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
rnams thugs dgyes nas gsungs ba/ 'di lta ste/ kye ma bsad bya legs par byas/ /bsad par bya ba ma bsad de/ /ji srid sdig rnams grol bar byas/ /shi ba de yang ma shi ste/ /sdig pa stong phrag byas

pa yi/ /mnar med la sogs mi skye'o/ /e ma bdag nyid chen po ste/ /bsad pas sangs rgyas byang chub thob/ /slar yang brtse bas sems can rnams/ /bsad par bya bas bsad par bya/ /e ma snying rje'i stobs kyis te/ /

snying rje dman pas 'grub mi 'gyur/ /oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT hUM lha sbyin sod hUM/ oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT hUM lha sbyin mA ra ya hUM phaT ces pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtog pa chen po bsad pa'i

rdo rje'i 'phrul 'khor dang sngags dang rgyud kyis bsad pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig tu gsungs so/ de nas 'khor lo gnyis bris te/ /phaT kyi yi ge'i nang du ni/ /bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa gzung / /thod pa yang

dag sbyar byas te/ /srad bu nag pos dkri bar bya/ /zhe sdang sems kyis nyin gung la/ /dur khrod du ni gzhug par bya/ /gshin rje mthar byed mtshungs bltas nas/ /bsgrub bya rang gi mdun du bya/ /rta dang ma
he'i steng na gnas/ /gnyis po de yi lag na mtshon/ /khro bo'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor/ /gnyis po'i phyogs la bsam par bya/ /gnyis po dag ni 'thab byed cing / /khro bas sems ni bcings pa ste/ /'thab

mo byed par bsgom byas la/ /sgom zhing bzlas pa brtsam par bya/ / oM hrIHSh+T+rIHwi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT hUM lha sbyin dang mchod sbyin dag rnam par zhe sdang bar gyis shig phaT ces pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis zhe sdang chen po'i dam tshig tu

gsung so/ /cho ga de yis sngon ma bzhin/ /'khor lo gnyis po kun tu bri/ /hUM phaT yi ge dag gi brten/ /thod pa gnyis ni yang dag sbyar/ /srad bu nag pos yang dag dkri/ /phag shin nagasu gzhag byas la/ /gshin rje gshed kyi

rnal 'byor gyis/ /bsgrub bya sngon du gzung bar bsgom/ /yaM las byung ba gzhu yi dbyibs/ /rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po la/ /rnga mo chen mo kha dog sngo/ /de yi steng du bsgom par bya/ /de la ma rungs chen po ste/ /rdeg cing lho phyogs 'ded pa dang / /
tshe 'di 'ang ni de bzhin du/ /nying mtshams sbyor dang srid mtshams yang / /rnal 'byor rgyal po thabs ldan pas/ /bde chen sa gsum bde blag 'gro/ /srid zhi dag dang nges pa dang / /
rten 'brel 'byung dang zlog dang gsad/ /zhi rgyas dbang dang zhi la sogs/ /'di la the tshom mi bya'o/ /gnyis sbyor rgyun mi 'chad bde dang / /kun nas 'od gsal lhan cig skyes/ /bung bas

me tog rtsi ltar ni/ /rnam pa kun tu don bsgrub pa'o/ /oM a kA ro mu kha~M sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma na~M Ad+ya nut+pan+na twAta sar+b+ba ni swa b+hA ba hU~M/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa 'khor de dag thams cad rab tu yi rangs te/ tshigasu bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod cing mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyis
mchod pa la brtson par gyur te/ 'jig rten mgon po bcom ldan legs/ /'gro ba nyon mongs bskyab slad du/ /stong pa'i ting 'dzin spangs nas ni/ /khyod kyis byams chen skur bstan
mdzad/ /thugs rje chen po bcom ldan legs/ /sems can sdug bsngal bsgral slad du/ /zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas par/ /brtse chen rnam par 'phrul par mdzad/ /bde chen rgyal
po bcom ldan legs/ /lus can bde don bsgrub slad du/ /zag med dbyings thugs ma gzhol bar/ /dgyes chen kun du snang mdzad legs/ /gtso bo rdo rje rgyal po legs/ /skye bo dub pa
ngal bso'i phyir/ /mtha' gcig rgyun chad mi bzhugs par/ /ma lus 'tshal ba sgrub pa med/ /de nas 'khor gyi tshogs phal mo che de dag dang / rdo rje'i rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag
thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa'i nges par gyur pa thabs dang shes rab/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing gzhal du med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas bzhin du thams cad kyi
byin gyi brlabs kyis sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i don du/ cho 'phrul chen po du ma bstan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

mi bskyod pa'i gsang ba chen po rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba la sogs pa de dag ni nga dang rgyal ba thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje 'bar ba khrag 'thung gi
rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha bye ba khrag khrig mang po yang de yi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam gyis tshe rabs thams cad du yi dam byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'am mi ma yin pa la sogs

pa'i gnod pa thams cad dang / 'tshe ba dang ya nga ba dang / bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang gi khyim na gnas pa de yang mchod rten du bya bar 'gyur ro/ /rig pa dang dngos grub
thams cad kyi gter tshad med par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang /

dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /bcom ldan 'das ral pa gcig pa brtag pa rdo rje'i rgyud chen po bla na med pa rdzogs s+ho// //rnal 'byor gyi

dbang phyug chen po shrI dza ga ta mi tra A nan+da'i bka' drin la brten nas/ rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta chen po badzra shrI kha la ru tra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /mchan bu lo ts+tsha'i dngos byas nas legs rdzogs so shub+ha~M`// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsan+d+ra gu h+ya ti la ka nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de

bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar chen por gyur te/ yang 'dus nas phyag gar dang bcas pas thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po la gtsug gis 'dud pas gsol ba btab pa/ dpa' bo kun gyi gsang
ba yi/ /zla gsang thig le dga' byed pa/ /gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung / /bcom ldan khyed kyis bshad du gsol/ /sems can kun gyi ma skyes pa/ /skye dang ma skyes rnam spangs pa'i/ /byung

dang 'byung 'gyur rab sbyor ba'i/ /mchog tu rtog par sbyor ba'o/ /rin chen thams cad 'byung gnas dag /dri med nam mkha' dang 'dra ba'i/ /rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng byas te/ /nyi ma chen pos dbang bskur
ba'o/ /chos kyi longs spyod yang dag 'byung / /pad ma dmar po mchog gi mdog /'dod chags de nyid gsang ba che/ /thams cad bde byed bdud rtsi'i mchog /A dang lar ni yang dag ldan/ /yang dag
mdzes pa 'gying ba'i 'gros/ /sna tshogs ye shes sna tshogs che/ /zla gsang thig le'i mchog nyid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyis gsang ba'i gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas/ 'gog pa chen po'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la de kho na nyid dbyangs kyis bskul te bzhengs par mdzad do/ /oM hU~M a/ mi skye ye shes bde ba'i mchog dang ldan pa'i ro la
mnabs su gsol/ /a la la ho/ sems pa bde mchog de nyid 'gog pa rnams la bslang ba'i phyir/ /chags pa med pa'i bde mchog mnga' mdzad bzhengs shig brnabs/ /mchog tu gsang ba'i bde la rol cing
dam bcas 'jig rten sgrol/ /byang chub skye gnas bde mchog dbyings las mi nyams dga' ba'i gar mdzod cig /a la la ho/ sngon gyi zhen pa'i mtha' dang sngo skams nyon mongs gzir ba la/ /rmongs

med bde mchog rgyan dang ldan pas thabs kyis bskul te go bar mdzod/ /'gro kun mtshungs par spyod pa'i sgo mor byang chub lam ston cing / /bde mchog bdud rtsi khyad par med par 'dus pa'i tshogs la bka' stsol
cig /a la la ho/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i bdag nyid chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen po zla gsang thig le bskul

bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi thugs kyi gsang ba'i thig le las shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su rgyas par byas te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du yang snang bar byas/ steng dang 'og tu yang zhugs te/ ma lus lus pa med pa'i ri dang / sems can

rnams la gsal bar byas nas shin du dgyes pa chen po'i bde bas mnyes par byas te/ slar de nyid du log nas bcom ldan 'das shin du mnyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po snying po gsang ba mchog gi zla ba'i thig le'i
dbus na bde bar bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog tu bde ba chen por gyur pa'i snying po des bskul ba na/ gar mdzad cing rang rang
gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'i thugs kha'i zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su mchog tu gsang ba'i shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar gcig tu stug por gyur

pa bsgrubs te/ rang rang gi sku bud med kyi tshul du bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas mngon par byung bar gyur to/ /de nas la la ni spyan pad mo 'bar ba rgyas pa ltar bsgyur zhing bzlog ste smin ris g.yo
bas/ sangs rgyas tshul gyis gar mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ /rdo rje rab dgyes gdon mi za/ /sems dpa' che la dgyes mdzad cing / /sangs rgyas bde ba'i bde ba yis/ /bcom ldan

sangs rgyas bzhugs par 'gyur/ /smin ma bsgyur zhing zhabs bsgyur ba/ /spyan bsgyur shin tu gnon pa yi/ /sor mo'i mtha' ma rnams bsgyur ba/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis gar mdzad de/ /rdo rje che la mnyes mdzad cing / /rdo rje

rnal 'byor ma dkyil du/ /skad cig skad cig bskul ba yis/ /bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par gyur/ /brjid pa'i zhab dang rin chen dbu/ /dri med spyi bos gar mdzad cing / /zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bsgyur bas/ /bde

byed chen po myang bar mdzad/ /dur khrod yon tan tshogs dag gi/ /pad mo'i spyan gyis gzigs mdzad cing / /bde ba bdag po chen po la/ /rin chen tshul gyis mdzes par mdzad/ /shin tu dgyes gsal bde dam pa/ /

pad mo dmar la phye mdzad de/ /'dod chags bul dgyes rnam bsgyur bar/ /pad mo dra bas gar mdzad cing / /pad mo rnal 'byor ma kyil du/ /brjid pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs te/ /bde ba che la mnyes mdzad cing / /bcom

ldan pad mor gnas par gyur/ /phyag gis rtse mor sor mo'i mtha'/ /rnam par bsgyur bas gar mdzad cing / /phyag sbyar khong stong pad mo yis/ /glog bzhin dpal dang spyi gtsug tu/ /mchod pa'i sprin gyis long long pos/ /

sna tshogs bde byed gtso nyid la/ /las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing / /sna tshogs bcom ldan gnas par gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po chen po de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che gsang ba dang / pad mo dang las kyi gsang ba chen po thams cad

kyis bzhed pa/ bde ba chen po zhes bya ba 'od zer chen po'i sprin gyi tshogs nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo+e mchog las phyung ngo / /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di dag thams cad snang bas snang bar byas te/ nyid kyi thugs

kyi zla ba'i thig le la stug po gcig tu gyur nas bzhugs te/ thugs kyi zla ba'i thig le'i dbus su 'od zer des dgyes pa bskyed cing drangs nas bcug ste gcig tu byas nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za

bar rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku

dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dkyil 'khor gyi ni tshul gyis su/ /cho ga sbyor bas spro byas te/ /theg dang mthun par dkyil 'khor don/ /sbyor ba'i gar gyis gar bya zhing / /ji ltar yang dag brtag par bya/ /ji ltar

dkyil 'khor de kho na/ /zla gsang thig le'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang / /brtag par nus pa ma yin no/ /dkyil 'khor ye shes kyis brtags pa/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis/ /lha yi

sbyor bas rgyas btab pas/ /cho ga shes pas bri bar bya/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /thig bzhis yongs su bris pa ste/ /ka ba brgyad mchog yang dag gnas/ /kun tu yongs su zlum
pa ste/ /zla ba de yi dbus bsam pa/ /bde ba chen po mi phyed pa/ /gtso bo de steng bri bar bya/ /de ni tsheg drag bcas pa ste/ /yi ge bcu gsum ldan pa yi/ /yi ge mchog tu bde ba ste/ /rlung gi
dkyil 'khor yang dag 'byung / /shes rab can gyis de mdun du/ /mi phyed yid phyung bri bya ste/ /drag po'i tsheg dang 'dren par bcas/ /bzhi yis gtsug tu byas pa'o/ /de yi lho yi phyogs su ni/ /mi smra

ba yi yi ge mchog /phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog thams cad/ /sgrub par byed pa'i yi ge bri/ /ha dang rang ldan tsheg drag bcas/ /bzhi po yi ni dbus byas pa/ /sngags kyi gzugs kyi yi ge ni/ /nub kyi phyogs su bri

bar bya'o/ /khro bo'i yi ge ye shes che/ /yi ge'i phyag rgya'i rmad byung ba/ /brjid du bcas pa dgod pa yi/ /byang gi phyogs su bri bar bya/ /sems can thams cad mchog dag dang / /dgyes pa chen po rab 'grub phyir/ /

nga yi de nyid gsung gis ni/ /dkyil 'khor de nyid bstan pa yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po/ /gar gyis tshud pas rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sems can mchog gis ston byed na/ /de nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin chen po la gar mdzad cing / rab tu spros pa spyan gdangs nas/ /zhab dang zhabs

kyis gnon pa yis/ /sdud cing 'dor ba 'dzugs par mdzad/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyis/ /rjid pa'i rtse mo mtha' las dgrol/ /cung zad zur gyis gdangs pa'i spyan/ /mdzes pa'i spyan tshugs rnam bsgyur bas/ /spyan

gyi phyag rgyas gar mdzad pas/ /'gro la rgyas btab 'dud par 'gyur/ /sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo la/ /dbyangs 'di yis ni bskul mdzad cing / /shin tu dgyes che dkyil 'khor du/ /rnal 'byor ma kun gnas par 'gyur/ /

shin tu dgyes che rdo rje dag /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po/ /dkyil 'khor mchog tu dgyes pa yi/ /de nyid bcom ldan nyid kyis shod/ /rnam pa kun tu skye ba med pa'i bde bas rol cing chub mdzad pa'i/ /bdag cag

gzugs kyi dam dang bcas te rnam spyod 'gyur ba med pa'i yid/ /bde mchog byang chub sems ni rnam pa kun tu sdug bsngal yongs bral te/ /che ba'i ye shes lhun grub mchog ldan bde spyod bde la rol par mdzod/ /a la la ho/ /'di ni

glu ru blangs pa yis/ /shin tu srid pas mya ngan 'das/ /dga' chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ /dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis rlob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pas rgyas pa'i spyan

ud+pa la kha phye ba bzhin smin ma dang sku rnam par 'gyur ba/ glog dang chu rlabs bzhin du 'gyur ba'i rnam par gnon pas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las de kho na nyid 'di gsungs so/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba/ /

rdo rje ye shes thugs la gnas/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i mchog nyid ni/ /bdag nyid sbyor bas brtags pa yin/ /rdo rje dgyes pa chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor zla ba gang ba 'dra/ /'od zer dkar po'i phreng bas mdzes/ /byang chub sems

mchog 'dra ba yin/ /rdo rje dpa' bo'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /mdzes pa'i zla ba kham pa la/ /mthing ga'i 'bar ba kun rgyas pa/ /me dang rlung gis bus pa bzhin/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i mchog sgrub pa/ /rdo rje rin chen dkyil 'khor ni/ /

dga' byed dkyil 'khor cha brgyad kyi/ /'bar dang bcas pa'i nyi ma bzhin/ /dkyil 'khor dgyes mchog 'byung byed pa/ /pad mo'i dbang po pad ma 'dra/ /'dab ma brgyad po gyes pa yi/ /ge sar zla bas mdzes byas pa'o/ /

thams cad las ni grub byed pa/ /rdo rje'i las kyi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste/ /rab tu 'bar ba me dang 'dra/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i/ /dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag par bya/ /

skyong ba rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ /ji ltar de nyid sprul pa yin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang bzhengs nas brjid pa'i rdo rje gang dag gis gar mdzad cing glu dang sil snyan gyi gling

bu dang pi wang dang / rdza rnga dang / dun+du b+hi dang / ba na wa dang / pa li ka dang / zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun tu brdung ba dang / sil snyan la sogs pa'i rnam par rol pas lha'i ro dang / ro'i zas dang /

bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / theg pa dang / stan dang / gos dang / bldag pa dang / bzhib pa dang / 'jams la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje 'dzin pa la bstabs

nas gus pa dang bcas pas pad mo'i sor mo khong stong du mdzad de g.yon du btud pa'i tshul gyis 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/ yang de kho na nyid bskul bar mdzad pa'i dbyangs 'dis bstod pa mdzad do/ /shin tu

bde ba'i byams pa kun tu gzigs pa'i thugs rje spyan mnga' bas/ /byang chub chen po snying por 'gro ba bsgral bas skyo yid mi mnga' ste/ /mthun pa'i lam ston nyon mongs drug las bsgral ba'i phyir/ /nam mkha'i tshul du gzungs

kyi rang bzhin bde gshegs kun la stobs/ /e ma'o/ /bde ba kun tu rgyas pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren cing bsnams/ /sa yi khyad par bde bas rdzogs pa'i sku nyid stong pas tshogs pa'i rgyal po bzhin/ /chos nyid ji bzhin de la reg pas

sku nyid che ba kun ston cing / /snying po byang chub bgrod phyir 'gro ba thams cad sgo mo bsam gyis mi khyab bsten/ /dpal gyi snying po gzungs su bsten te rigs lnga'i gtso rnams mnyes mdzad cing / /dgyes pas drongs la banabs shing rab tu

dgyes pas rol mo mdzod/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba mnos te bying ba'i gnas nas bslang ba'i phyir/ /gnod sbyin cha lugs skye 'gog med pa'i tshul dang rnam par ldan/ /snying rje chen po rgyun dang bcas nas bde ba chen po

ston pa'i chos nyid nam mkha' bzhin/ /dgyes pa mchog gi ngang la sprul pa'i lha mo skye mched dang / /rol pas 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde mchog stsol bar mdzod/ /ha ha ha hoHbde la gnas shing bde bsgoms hU~M`/ /dgyes

pa mchog dang ldan pa'i mi skye bde mchog bde la char pa rab tu dbab tu gsol/ /rnam pa kun tu mtha' dang bral ba'i dbyings la bde gshegs slob ma gzungs du gsol/ /dpal gyi rgyal po tshul bzhin de ltar bzhugs

pa'i gnas su bsnams su gsol/ /ngo mtshar byang chub che ba 'di nyid 'gro ba rten bzhin bde thob pa/ /pha rol phyin drug dngos nyid gang la'ang mi brten par/ /mi skye mya ngan 'das pa'i gzungs dang rtag tu rnam par ldan/ /mtha' dang

bral ba'i bde bas chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yi/ /rmongs pa'i bde bas bying zhing gnas pa'i 'gro la snying rje'i chus khrus mdzod hoH/ de nas/ shin tu dgyes mchog mi chags pa/ /'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis/ /yid dang

mthun pa'i bde chen po/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la gsol ba'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa nye

bar gnas nas yang chu skyes kyi 'dab ma dri ma med pa dang 'dra ba'i spyan gyis kun tu gzigs shing 'dzum pa dang bcas pas zhal rgyas par gyur nas/ yang tshad med pa mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi tshogs kyi

'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal pa rgyas pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho ma lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu rin po che dang / pad ma dang / las kyi rigs thams cad las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / rin chen 'dzin

dang / chos 'dzin dang / sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po thams cad dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gi tshogs chen po dang / thugs las byung ba dang / mtshon dang dga' ba dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo'i g.yog gi tshogs tshad med pa 'dren par byed pa dang /

'gugs par byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs dang / grangs med pa'i rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs dang / gzhan yang phyi rol

gyi rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad ma dang / las kyi rigs las byung ba'i rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams la rnam par bde ba chen po gyur pa dang bcas pa'i kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan

gyis gar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i rnam par gnon pas kun tu gnon pas/ rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pas 'deg cing tshems kyis 'debs pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i kun tu 'brel pa'i phyag

gis gar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa'i sgeg pas 'gying ba dang / spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa'i rnams dang / kun tu 'dor ba'i rnam par gnon pas 'khor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la byin gyis brlabs

nas dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /bdag nyid de nyid mnyam gzhag dang / /de bzhin lha yi de nyid dang / /sngags dang phyag rgya de nyid dang / /
de yi dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur/ /yan lag thams cad bsgom las 'das/ /rtog dang mi rtog rnam spangs pa/ /'dren dang tshig las yang dag 'das/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog ces bya/ /chos dang chos
min rnam spyod pa/ /chos rnams thams cad brtag par bya/ /rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni bsten pa yin/ /'dod chags mi chags 'dod chags mnyam/ /chu yi pad ma dmar ba 'dra/ /rang
sems 'dod chags shin tu chags/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no/ /gzugs dang gzugs min dri med pas/ /gang khams kun la 'jug 'gyur ba/ /sems ni chu dang skul byed pa/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor

zhes bya'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po g.yog dang bcas pa dang / pho nya dang pho nya mo dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen po dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor

de dag thams cad yang bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin gtso bo chen po la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /kye ma'o rab dgyes sems dpa' mchog /kye ma'o rab dgyes phyogs bsgyur ba/ /rnal

'byor ma yi tshogs mchog gi/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba sbyor che ba/ /rdo rje sbyor ba bla na med/ /'jigs gsum bde mchog thob 'gyur bas/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsung / /

rin chen pad ma sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba'i gar mdzad pa/ /rnam grangs thig le'i 'jig rten du/ /rnam dag dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsung / /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rnal 'byor ma thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i

phyag pad ma'i sor mo'i 'dab ma kun tu 'brel pa'i rdo rje'i thal mo dang / gar rnam par 'gyur ba'i brjid bag tu bcas pas mtha' 'grol zhing ma mchu tshems kyis mnan nas chu skyes sar pa'i 'dab ma bzhin gzigs pas bzhad pa/

glu'i phyag rgyas dbyangs len pa dang / gcig la gcig bskul ba dang / bdag nyid kyi dpung pa la 'degs shing g.yas dang g.yon pa'i rnal par gnon pa'i tshul gyis/ oM/ hU~M a la la la ho/ /kun tu snang zhing mi chags

par/ /mi chags pa yi bde mchog gis/ /bde ba'i rnal 'byor gzugs kyi rnams/ /stobs shing bde ba sbyin mdzad pas/ /a la la ho/ bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i rang bzhin te/ /bzhengs shing gzhan la stob la

grub par mdzod/ /chags pas mi gos dngos po yi/ /bde ba kun la reg par mdzad cing dgongs su gsol/ /de nas kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje'i bdag po de kho na nyid kyis dbyangs chen po'i bskul bas thugs

sad par gyur te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor

chen po 'dir sna tshogs shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rnam par gnon par gar mdzad/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje'i dbyangs kyis glu len/ rdo rje rnam par rol pa chen pos rnam par rol/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhad pa/

chen pos bzhad cing nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i zla ba'i thig le'i dkyil nas/ oM ma hA su kha hU~M zhes brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag mo ye shes dbyings phyug ma phyung ngo / /steng du zla gam ldan pa yi/ /

gnyis pa yi ge ma lta bu/ /mtshan du thig le ldan byas pa/ /ye shes gsal ba'i rnal 'byor ma'o/ /A li kA li 'dren bya ba/ /dbus su ri mo brtag byas te/ /de yi mgo dang mjug dag tu/ /khro bo gnyis po mchog bsam bya/ /'di

ni btsun mo'i rab gsal ba/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'o/ /'di ni dran pa tsam gyis kyang / /bsod nams kun gyis byin rlob 'gyur/ /A li gnyis dbus ri mo bri/ /ldan pa 'dren pa yang dag ldan/ /de steng zla gam thig

le dag /mgo mjug gnyis su gzhan yang tra~M/ /'di ni don dam gsal ba ste/ /rin chen rnal 'byor ma dbang sbyin/ /dran pas bsod nams thob 'gyur te/ /sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed/ /A li gnyis dang ldan byas

te/ /tsheg drag yi ge gnyis su bshad/ /'di ni rab dga' kun tu chags/ /chu srin ma zhes bsten pa yin/ /dang po skal ba chen po yi/ /tsheg drag po dang bcas pa gzhan/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi A li 'di/ /sangs

rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed/ /bdag nyid la'am yang na gzhan/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /bsgrub bya'i dkyil 'khor grub byed na/ /dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog /

yi ge'i phyag rgya'i mngon gnas pa'i/ /'dzin pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba/ /bris pa yis kyang khyad par 'gyur/ /e ma'o bde ba ye shes che/ /de yi ye shes tshe 'di la/ /'dod byed bde ba sten byed cing / /'di yi tshul gyis thob par
'gyur/ /khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir/ /'di las rgya che mchog gzhan med/ /sgrub pa po yi sems can kun/ /tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub/ /zla gsang thig le'i gsang ba'i rgyal po chen po

shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyi gsang ba chen po rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi mchog tu
gsang ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor te dang po rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dgyes pa'i yid bde ba dang / mgu

ba dang / yid dga' ba bskyed nas gar dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje bzhad pa mdzad cing yang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba 'du ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol

ba 'debs par 'gyur ro/ /bde byed chen po bshad pa shod/ /bde ba chen po bshad pa shod/ /gsang ba chen po bshad pa shod/ /dgyes pa chen po bshad pa shod/ /khyod las 'dod chags yang dag 'byung / /khyod las

zhe sdang chen po ste/ /khyod las sdig byed sdug bsngal dang / /khyod las khams gsum thams cad 'byung / /khyod las skyes pa ma ning dang / /khyod las 'dod gzir bud med dang / /khyod las 'dod las rnam grol dang / /khyod las
byang chub bla med 'byung / /khyod las nam mkha' rlung dag dang / /khyod las gzi brjid me yi khams/ /khyod las de bzhin chu dang sa/ /khyod las spyod dang mi spyod kun/ /khyod las sangs rgyas dpa'
chen po/ /yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /khyod las chos dang dge 'dun dang / /khyod las pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / /ri dang skye bo thams cad 'byung / /khyod

las rdo rje sems dpa' dang / /khyod las dri med pad mo dang / /khyod las rin chen tshad med che/ /de bzhin rdo rje sna tshogs 'byung / /khyod las phyag rgya sngags kyi rnams/ /khyod las rig pa'i snying po 'byung / /de
nas bcom ldan 'das spyan mi 'dzums pas smin ma brkyang ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa chen po dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs dang /

rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / gzhan yang lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding

dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa kun 'dus pa thams cad la skad cig skad cig tu kun tu gzigs nas brjid pa dang bcas pa'i phyag 'jam pos/ nyid kyi snying ga'i rdo rje gsor zhing / nyid

kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rdo rje rjes su chags pa rab tu rgyas pa chen po'i lta bas 'khor thams cad zil gyis mnan te/ nyid thugs pad+ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yi ge'i thig le'i dkyil nas 'od zer phyung ste kun tu snang bar byin gyis brlabs nas/

shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /dang po'i yi ge bcu gsum pa/ /thig ler bcas pa bsam byas te/ /bde chen tshul bzhin

gzhag byas la/ /gzhan gyis mi phyed thig ler bcas/ /yi ge drug pa 'dren pa ru/ /tshul bzhin 'og tu yongs su brtag /'di ni gsang ba chen po ste/ /rmad byung yi ge phyag rgya'o/ /bde chen bde bar bskyed pa'i phyir/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrags pa yin/ /ye shes kyi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /skad cig snying pos rgyas btab na/ /dkyil 'khor rnams kyi 'chad pa po/ /ston pa rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po skul byed pa'i/ /

sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtogs par byed/ /yi ge ye shes grub pa yis/ /ye shes dbang phyug nyid du 'gyur/ /'phrul gyi mig dang shes rab che/ /mi shes sdig pa 'joms par byed/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'dra bar/ /tshe 'di nyid

la 'thob par 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po reg pa che/ /sdug bsngal 'dod pa 'joms byed pa'o/ /shes rab ye shes dngos grub che/ /byang chub myur du 'thob 'gyur te/ /rig ma 'bum phrag brgyas bskor cing / /sems dpa' chen

po de dang rtsen/ /rdo rje pad ma mnyam sbyor bas/ /thal mo brkyang ste rol pa yis/ /tshe dang lang tsho skal dang ldan/ /dran pa tsam gyis 'thob par 'gyur/ /'dod pa yis ni dgos pa'i rnams/ /myur ba nyid du 'grub par 'gyur/ /'og

dang steng gi nam mkha' la/ /bdag 'dod bzhin du 'gro 'ong byed/ /sa yang rnam par phug nas su/ /stobs chen de 'dir 'ong bar byed/ /sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed de/ /byang chub par ni gdon mi za/ /bde ba chen po'i rnam mdzad pas/ /

gzhom zhing de bzhin myang ba yi/ /rdo rje blo yis bdud kyi rnams/ /rnam par 'gyur bas thams cad bsgral/ /bde ba chen po gtong ba yis/ /skad cig nyid du gsol bar bya/ /grub pa'i rdo rje 'dzin pa che/ /dpa' bo chen pos dgug par bya/ /

rnal 'byor ma rnams ci 'dod par/ /rnam gnon tshul gyis gnon par bya/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen po/ /gnod byed stobs kyis dgon gnas par/ /rab tu rnam 'joms gnon pa yis/ /gzhom pa'i tshul gyis bsgral bar bya/ /

mtshon cha lnga yis rnam gnon pas/ /gzhan gyi bud med rtsen par bya/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde gnas pa'i/ /sems can chen pos grol byas te/ /byang chub sems ni bde 'byung bas/ /sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya/ /dam tshig rjes

su ldan pa yis/ /rnal 'byor rtag pa'i ngo bor 'gyur/ /skad cig mtho ris 'gro bar bya/ /skad cig bde ldan 'gro bar byed/ /rdo rje'i shugs kyis thams cad du/ /sems can skad cig 'di ru'o/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas

su 'gyur/ /sems can rnams dang grags chen po/ /thams cad kyi ni rigs rnams dang / /pha rol phyin rnams skye gnas te/ /de bzhin rigs dang pha rol phyin/ /de dag 'di la rab tu gnas/ /dbang por gyur pa brten chen po/ /yon
tan tshogs ni nam mkha' bzhin/ /de nyid dngos po thams cad la/ /thams cad dus gsum mnyam gnas te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu bde/ /sems dpa' thog ma tha med yin/ /bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
sems dpa'i shin tu bde ba chen po'i rdo rje chos kyi yi ge zhes bya ba yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /bcu gsum gyi ni yi ge che/ /ye shes thig le ldan pa ste/ /rdo rje yid 'byung lhags

pa yi/ /ha la ras btags dbu bskor bya/ /'di ni yid las skyes pa ste/ /shin tu dgyes che mdzes pa yis/ /yi ge'i phyag rgya phyag rgya che/ /gtso bo'i spyan sngar gnas pa yi/ /gsang ba'i snying gi pad ma la/ /phyag rgya 'di

yis rgyas btab pas/ /de ni de ma thag nyid du/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i mnyes par 'gyur/ /gtso chen rdo rje sems dpa' la/ /de yi bde bas mnyes byas te/ /dbang po yi ni sbyor ba yis/ /de dang rol pas myur du 'grub/ /de gnyis

phan tshun dgyes pa las/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i gzhir gyur te/ /rig 'dzin mchog gi gzugs ldan dang / /lha min kun gyis mchod par 'gyur/ /de dang lhan cig rol pa na/ /lha chen tshangs pa gtogs 'dod rnams/ /phyag rgya sbyor ba'i tshul

gnas pa'i/ /bdag nyid che la phyag byed pa'o/ /nyes gsum dri ma spangs pa yi/ /shin tu sbyor ba'i rgyas btab pa/ /sems can gar ni byed pa dang / /sems dpa' che la mnyes par byed/ /de ni sa dang nam mkha' la/ /bde bar gnas

shing 'gro bar byed/ /sna tshogs lha mo bde che ba'i/ /sna tshogs bde bas nyer spyod do/ /phyag rgya'i gar gyis gyir mdzad cing / /sems can myur du rtogs par byed/ /ral grir gyur pa gzi chen po/ /nam mkha' kun tu phan tshun

'gro/ /lha mo 'phrul gyi 'gro ba dang / /lha min klu yi bu mo dang / /gzhan yang 'phrul ldan mi bu mo/ /de yi bud med kun bsgrub bya/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes rab gnas pas/ /de nyid kun tu 'gro byed de/ /ji tsam
'dod par dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje sems dpa' che gnas so/ /sangs rgyas thams cad myur du 'grub/ /thams cad chos ni bde chen po/ /dge 'dun chags med thams cad rnams/ /de dag thams cad de yin no/ /dbang

po de dbang dbang chen gyi/ /thogs med stobs kyis bkug nas su/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i thabs gnas pas/ /gzhan gyi bud med rtsen par bya/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /phyag rgya ye shes bsgrub bya ste/ /skad cig

skad cig bsten pa yi/ /bdag gi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /gnyis med sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /de ni dngos grub kun 'gyur te/ /bdag med nga rgyal med 'gyur te/ /snang ba med cing yi ge med/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i yid

dang rjes su 'thun par mdzad ma'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /lha mo rdo rje kI li ni/ /dang por oM gyis rnam brgyan pa/ /bgegs mthar byed dang ldan pa ni/ /dbang mchog sbyin par mdzad ma ste/ /de yis bud med snying ga ru/ /

bdag nyid kyis ni byin brlabs te/ /dbang po gnyis ni sbyor ba yis/ /mkhas pas tshul bzhin bsgom par bya/ /de nas rnal 'byor chen po de/ /rnal 'byor dbang phyug byin brlabs pas/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag tu/ /mdzes

pa'i spyan dang rol cing 'gro/ /bdag gam 'on te gzhan dag la/ /phyag rgya de yis rgyas btab ste/ /rdo rje pad mo phye ba yis/ /sgrub pa pos ni myur du bsgrub/ /pad ma rnam par phye byas te/ /phyag rgya sbyor bas rol pa yi/ /phyag rgya 'di

yis rgyas btab na/ /'gro dang 'ong ba gdon mi za/ /g.yas dang g.yon pa'i tshul gyis su/ /lag pa'i phyag rgya bzung byas te/ /sbyor ba chen po bsgom byas na/ /de ma thag tu nam mkhar 'gro/ /bdag nyid gan rkyal

gnas byas te/ /nyid kyi steng du phyag rgya gzhag /nyid kyis byin brlabs phyag rgya la/ /sngags pas tshul bzhin bskyod par bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi glo dag tu/ /dgyes dang mdza' ba gnyis bzhugs par/ /mi g.yeng phyag rgya bzhag

byas te/ /bdag nyid shin tu dgyes par bsgom/ /'di yis dngos grub thob 'gyur te/ /'di dag lhan cig 'grogs pa yis/ /gzungs ma kun gyi dkyil 'khor du/ /sangs rgyas la sogs thams cad 'gyur/ /'di dang lhan cig

sbyor ba yis/ /nam mkha' bdag po sangs rgyas bzhin/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pas/ /de ni sangs rgyas ngo bor 'gyur/ /dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas/ /nub gcig bdud rtsi dbyung byas te/ /gzungs ma'i phyag

rgya la brten nas/ /rmad 'byung nyid ni 'thob ces bshad/ /mtshan gyi mtha' dang nyin gyi mtha'/ /dang por gnyis ka 'dus byas na/ /sngags kyi dbyings phyug gar 'gro ba/ /de dang lhan cig dngos grub 'gro/ /phyed dam yang na nam phyed na/ /

rigs ma'i dbyings su reg bya zhing / /myur bas khros pa'i sgra sgrogs pas/ /gyad kyi 'gyed pas brtsam par bya/ /bkye ba'i mjug tu de ma thag /'o ma mchog ni btung byas nas/ /de nas de ni rdo rje 'grub/ /zla gsang dkyil du 'gro bar

byed/ /bya ba de bzhin bzlog pa dang / /ci bde bsten pa byas pa las/ /byang chub sems ni 'char ma thag /'phrog ma yi ni dngos grub bo/ /'di yis rin chen gtsug nyid du/ /mi g.yeng mtshan mo byas gyur na/ /sangs rgyas

dngos grub 'phrog byed de/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub nyid kyis thob/ /'di yis snying gi zla gsang la/ /thig le nyid du brtag byas na/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /zla gsang thig le'i mchog 'drar 'gyur/ /'di yis

reg pa tsam gyis kyang / /dngos grub gang dag 'thob byed de/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgya gzi chen po/ /rgyal po 'di ni rnam par rgyu/ /'di ni sgrub pa'i dus su yang / /rnam par rtog pa yong mi bya/ /rtag tu mi rtog 'gyur ba yis/ /

nan tan gyis ni bsgrub par bya/ /sdug bsngal ba yi sems can la/ /sbyin pa bzhi ni rtag tu sbyin/ /de la bde ba sbyin byas te/ /mi snyan nam yang sbyin mi bya/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i sems ma chen mo dpe med pa dang ldan ma

zhes bya ba'i rdo rje kI li kI la shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen po 'thob par byed pa'o/ /thog ma oM ste 'ja' chen mo/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes dang 'brel/ /'di ni 'dod chags thams cad la/ /'dod chags bde byed snyoms par 'thob/ /

rol pa'i sbyor bas bud med la/ /'di ni rtag tu mnyes par bya/ /'di yi 'gro ba gsum dag tu/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed/ /pad ma kha che rgyas pa'i spyan/ /sngags mkhan de ni skad cig 'gyur/ /gtso bo yi ni bde mchog

gis/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bya/ /sprod pa'i phyag rgya rgyas btab ste/ /skad cig skad cig spyad par bya/ /dus dag tu ni reg pa dang / /gzhug pa yang ni rtag tu bya/ /bskyod dang mnye ba de bzhin du/ /mnyam du 'grogs

pa'i cho ga bya/ /bskyed pa dang ni sbyang ba dang / /skad cig skad cig bsnyen par bya/ /gar dang kun nas bskor ba dang / /'jib dang de bzhin btung ba dang / /the tshom med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /dam tshig dang ni bsgrub par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di yis

rnal 'byor pa/ /mi g.yo tshar ni dngos grub ste/ /sangs rgyas byang chub dngos grub dang / /bskal par gnas pa smos ci dgos/ /'di ni dngos grub 'thob ma thag /pad ma 'dzin pa'i rjes 'gyur te/ /lag na pad ma 'bar khyer bzhin/ /blo

ldan mi g.yeng bskal par gnas/ /brjid pas dpal dgyes lhan cig tu/ /bde ldan zhing du 'gro 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor chen po der phyin nas/ /bde ldan gyi mchog gtso bo yi/ /pad ma'i gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /de ni

bde bar gnas par 'gyur/ /bde ldan rtag tu 'grogs 'gyur ba/ /dngos grub ye shes bde myong 'gyur/ /yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /pad ma las skyes gzungs gzung ste/ /byin gyis brlabs nas bde myangs na/ /pad ma bde

ba'i bdag por 'gyur/ /gzhan gyi bud med bdag nyid kyis/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /bsten byas 'dod pa'i gzugs nyid du/ /sngags mkhan 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /sdug cing la sogs brgyan pa yi/ /nyi ma'i 'od zer gser byung

bzhin/ /dri med yangs pa'i lta ba yis/ /pad ma sems dpa'i tshe 'grub po/ /ji tsam nam mkhar nye bar ni/ /dpa' bo chen po 'phur byed de/ /rig ma 'bum phrag brgya tshogs kyi/ /lha mo yis ni mchod pa byed/ /sangs rgyas sras dang bcas kun

gyis/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag nyid mchod/ /'khor ba nyid na gnas pa'i tshe/ /'khor ba'i dri mas mi gos so/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/ /rtag tu nyon mongs dag 'gyur te/ /sman gyi phye ma sbyor ba yis/ /sbrul ni gsod par gyur pa bzhin/ /

zla gsang thig le'i dga' byed 'di/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob 'gyur te/ /'di yi mthu yi ngo bo yis/ /dgos pa thams cad dngos grub bo/ /gang 'dod dngos grub don yod pa/ /'khor ba 'di dang pha rol gyi/ /mthu chen phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis/ /dran pa tsam gyis

de dngos 'grub/ /shin tu dgyes pa pad mo'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye shes so// //dang por oM dang yang dag ldan/ /tha mar bsgyings pa'i hU~M nyid de/ /dbus su rab dgyes rdo rje bzhag /yi ge 'di ni rmad 'byung ba'o/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas

btab pas/ /sdig pa skad cig med par 'gyur/ /khams gsum 'di ni dngos grub che/ /dpal gyi bsgyings pa 'thob par 'gyur/ /bdud dang bdud las rjes 'jug pa/ /mi thogs par ni brgyal byed de/ /sna tshogs rdo rje mnyam sbyor bas/ /de yis khams gsum

'phrog par byed/ /bdag gi mthu yis rnam rgyal te/ /de yis khams gsum longs spyod do/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /pad ma rdo rje rab ldan bya/ /phreng byed phreng ba'i tshul gyis su/ /phreng ba bskums te 'dzin pa bzhin/ /'di yis byin gyis

brlabs byas te/ /bsnyen na myur du dngos grub bo/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi smin bsgyur bas/ /chu skyes spyan ni sbyar byas te/ /phyag rgyas btab ste rol byas na/ /bla ma'i dngos grub 'thob par byed/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor nye ba yis/ /rdo rje'i bdag nyid mchod byed de/ /de dag kun gyis bskor byas

nas/ /dkyil 'khor du ni dbang bskur ro/ /rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' ba yis/ /'jigs shing skrag las sbyin byed pa/ /rang nyid kyi ni phyag rgya'i gzungs/ /nyid kyis dngos grub stobs par byed/ /gzhan ni yang dag pha rol phyin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan rgyan/ /de yang de

la 'jigs skrag nas/ /rang gi dgyes mchog stobs par byed/ /bdag nyid chen po dmigs gsum dang / /che ba'i pha ni ngo bzhi dang / /rdo rje 'dzin dang gtogs rnams dang / /rang gi sdug pa stobs par byed/ /gshin rje sha ka rgyal po

dang / /rdo rje 'dzin de dngos grub la/ /'ongs nas bdag gi sdug pa rnams/ /srog gi phyir yang stobs par byed/ /gzhan gyi 'phrul gyi lus kyi rnams/ /khams gsum lam la gnas pa dag /myur du nye bar 'ongs nas kyang / /

bdag nyid dngos grub sbyin par byed/ /sna tshogs gnyen ni rgyal po che/ /dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs byed/ /de yang nyer 'ongs gtsug gtugs te/ /rnal 'byor sna tshogs ma sbyin byed/ /gnod sbyin srin po'i gzugs la sogs/ /

sha za yi dags bu mo rnams/ /sbyor ldan phyag rgya blang byas te/ /brtag pa mchog gis brtag par bya/ /thams cad las byed dge ba yi/ /'di yis dngos grub myur du 'grub/ /lha dang klu yi bu mo dang / /lha min lha yi mngal skyes

pa/ /phyag rgya 'di yis byin brlabs na/ /grub pa myur du dngos grub po/ /gzugs bzang yang na ngan yang rung / /gang de bud med bzung byas pa/ /rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis su/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba brtag par bya/ /'di yis sangs

rgyas thams cad dang / /de bzhin dpa' bo kun nyid du/ /skad cig skad cig rgyas btab pas/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po sna tshogs dpe med pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// //

nga ro bcu gsum steng nyid du/ /de bzhin thig le'i rgyal po ste/ /rab dgyes rdo rje lta che bde/ /mtha' ni yi ge hi sbyar ba'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bde chen spyan ni dga' byed yin/ /phyag rgya'i yi ge

'di yis ni/ /mkhas pas byin gyis brlabs byas nas na/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /bla med 'phrul gyi spyan du 'gyur/ /stong nyid ye shes gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas shin tu 'phra ba mthong / /smin ma rnam bsgyur

rgyas pa yis/ /lta ba'i phyag rgyas gar byed cing / /'gugs byed sangs rgyas thams cad dang / /dpa' bo rdo rje kun 'dzin dang / /pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang / /de bzhin gzungs min tshogs rnams dang / /rnal 'byor

ma dang mkha' 'gro dang / /phyi dang nang gi tshogs rnams dang / /lha mo klu mo gnod sbyin mo/ /lha min dngos grub lus kyi mchog /grul bum mi 'am yi dags sam/ /sha za 'phrul gyi mi bu mo/ /'di ni snying gar bzhag pa yis/ /

rdo rje 'dzin du bdag nyid 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas yang na nyi ma dang / /pad mo dra ba sna tshogs blo/ /lha dang lha min mi dag dang / /gzhan yang gnod sbyin srin po dang / /bdud dang bdud kyi tshogs rnams kyi/ /gzhan gyis 'phrog

par yong mi nus/ /lha dang lha min gyis mchod cing / /dngos grub khams gsum 'gro bar byed/ /lha dang lha min bsten byed cing / /skad cig nyid du 'gro bar byed/ /sangs rgyas rnams gyi mkhyen pa'i yul/ /sangs rgyas

rnams kyi zhing kun tu/ /rig pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang / /de ni rtsen zhing 'gro bar byed/ /'jigs med yan lag kun spangs pa/ /thog ma tha ma med 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen sbyor bas/ /dgyes

pa'i rmad mchog gcig tu 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i nang na rdo rjer 'gyur/ /rin chen nang na rin chen 'gyur/ /pad ma'i nang na pad mar 'gyur/ /sna tshogs nang na sna tshogs mchog /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /mnyam dang

mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs pas/ /dam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur/ /gzugs mi sdug pa gzugs mchog 'gyur/ /mig med pa yang mig ldan 'gyur/ /rna 'on pa yang sgra thos te/ /

glan pa yang ni yid rnor 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa dpag med pa/ /mig gi phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur/ /de yis lus la yon tan ni/ /yon tan dam pa mdangs cher 'gyur/ /ji tsam de ni nam mkha'i mthongs/ /'phur zhing 'og tu

'bab par byed/ /de ni ri yang phug nas 'gro/ /sa dang sa yi 'og tu ni/ /sna tshogs rdzu 'phrul rnams byed pas/ /de ni skad cig 'gro bar byed/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /sngags mkhan 'gying ba gar byed pa/ /bde

ba chen po bskyed pa yis/ /sems can de ni 'jug par byed/ /mi g.yeng blta ba'i bsgyur ba yis/ /las rnams thams cad de yis byed/ /'deg pa dang ni lta ba yis/ /gar dang rnam par bskor ba dang / /'gro ba thams cad 'bab byed de/ /ri

dang sems can thams cad la/ /smra ba dang ni sgra 'byin dang / /ci dga' ba ni mngag par byed/ /gdug pa'i lta bas srog chags rnams/ /brdeg pa dang ni sgrol bar byed/ /gtum dang gdug 'jigs che ba dang / /khro bo'i lta bas sgrol bar byed/ /shin tu

dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje spyan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad 'grub par byed pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ye shes kyi mthu chen po'o// //dang po oM gyis rnam par brgyan/ /tha mar 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa/ /rdo rje

rab tu dgyes pa'i sku/ /bde ba skyed byed bshad pa yin/ /phyag rgya 'di ni phyag rgya che/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo yi/ /gang gis 'di ni bsgoms ma thag /rdo rje gsum gyis byin rlob 'gyur/ /bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung / /

'di yis nyid kyi snying ga ru/ /bsgoms te gnyis med sbyor byas na/ /sangs rgyas sku ni rab tu 'grub/ /bsgrub na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bud med kun dang rtsen byed de/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /sems can

dman pa'ang dngos grub po/ /shin tu skal ldan thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas skal ldan 'thob 'gyur te/ /skal dang ldan pa thams cad kyis/ /chu skyes zhabs la bsnyen par byed/ /lha dang lha min bu mo de'i/ /

rig mas mthong na dga' byed de/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes brgyan pa yi/ /sna tshogs 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur/ /spyod dang mi spyod mi dag dang / /lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / /mi 'am ci dang skyes bu yis/ /

dngos grub pas ni 'phrog mi nus/ /de la sogs pas stod byed de/ /'jigs par 'gyur ba'i sems kyis ni/ /bla ma bzhin du mchod byed cing / /kun gyis bstod mchod bsti stang byed/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /

nam mkha' mtha' klas lha rnams dang / /nyi ma bcu yi 'od zer bzhin/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'grub pa 'gro/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing kun du/ /'od kyis thams cad mnyes byed cing / /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ /zil gyis

mnan te gnas par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid la/ /sras rnams 'dud cing phyag byed de/ /lha dang lha min grul bum dang / /tshangs pa gtogs 'dod lha chen po/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs der/ /'jigs shing skrag

pas 'ong bar byed/ /bcom ldan dngos grub bka' stsal stsol/ /ji ltar thugs la dgongs pa bzhin/ /spyi bos bka' blang gdul dka' rnams/ /de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi/ /mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi po yi/ /dam

pa rnams kyang bskyang bar bgyi/ /zla gsang thig le'i mchog nyid kyi/ /dbang bskur ba yang blang bgyi ste/ /rigs lnga rnams kyi sdom pa nyid/ /rnam pa bzhi po thams cad blang / /chu skyes dngos grub khyod zhabs drung / /'tsho ba'i

bar du bdag cag 'bangs/ /khyed kyi spyan sngar zham ring du/ /ci bgyi zhes ni bka' nod do/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas gdab na/ /spyod bcas mi spyod dga' byed de/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyi mchog /shin du bde dang mdza' ba myong / /

rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i sku chen mo bde ba dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin to// //dang por oM steng thig le ste/ /gzhan gyis mi phyed khros bcas pas/ /gnyis kyi dbus su gzhag pa ni/ /

gsung gi rdo rje shin tu dgyes/ /bde gsung sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /mchog tu ro ni myong byed pa/ /dam chos sgra yis gang byas pa'i/ /gsung gsal rna ba dga' bar byed/ /yi ge'i phyag rgya chen po 'di/ /byang chub
chen por grub byed de/ /yon tan yon tan sdug mtho ba'i/ /tshad med yon tan 'dzin pa'o/ /dpal ldan phyag rgya 'dis btab na/ /dpal kun bdag po de ma thag /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin spangs pa/ /sangs

rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'thob/ /phyag rgya 'di yis bdag gam gzhan/ /rgyas btab 'dod pa spyad byas nas/ /dngos grub rmad du byung ba yi/ /de yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po/ /sgrub

pa po yi bka' nyan te/ /ci ste rmongs pas 'da' byed na/ /de yi srog ni tha ma yin/ /de yi bsrung ba byas na dpal/ /tshe dang lang tsho bde ba'i mchog /rdo rje gsung gis bstan pa bzhin/ /gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur/ /

phyag rgya ye shes rjes bsdus pas/ /sgrub pa mi byed cung zad med/ /bdag nyid thams cad sprul pa ni/ /mchog gi ye shes dngos grub 'gyur/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes byin brlabs la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub mi ldog dang / /chos

dbyings mi mnyam rab klas pa/ /dngos grub bdag nyid gshegs nas kyang / /shin tu 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /sems dpa' chen po de khrid do/ /rang gi ting 'dzin ldang ba'i tshe/ /dam tshig mchog tu bsrung bya ba/ /

ji snyed nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du/ /'dod pa thams cad de spyod de/ /rnal 'byor chen po mi 'da' zhing / /ngan song gsum yang mi 'gro byed/ /de ni cung zad 'og sdug bsngal/ /'gro ba thams cad myong mi 'gyur/ /rdo rje gsum de rmad 'byung bas/ /
sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags byed de/ /bag chags mtshams sbyor rnam grol bas/ /nam mkha'i rim par 'gro 'ong byed/ /lha yi rtag tu mchod byed de/ /mchod par byas pas shin tu mchod/ /sems dpa'

chen po 'gro 'dug kyang / /bde byed kun gyis bdag nyid dge/ /gnas dang zas dang btung ba sogs/ /nam mkha' las ni skad cig rnyed/ /bud med rin chen mchog mkha' las/ /bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /

las kyi dbyings rnams ma lus pa/ /de yis khams gsum 'thob par byed/ /rnal 'byor sbyor ba dngos grub kyi/ /rnal 'byor grub chen 'phrog par 'gyur/ /'di las brtul zhugs drag pa med/ /dka' thub 'di dang 'dra med
de/ /bud med mchog tu bde ba las/ /'dod pa'i longs spyod spyad pas 'grub/ /dge ba'i pad ma'i rigs kun tu/ /sems dpa' chen po ngag dbang 'gyur/ /gzungs ma kun gyis bde chen po/ /rgyal po chen por

de 'gyur ro/ /gsung thams cad kyi rdo rje dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos 'thob par byed pa khams gsum kun tu snang bar grags pa pad ma'i rigs kyi tshogs zhal gyi gsung gis dgongs

pa thams cad 'grub par byed pa'o// //oM bcas mi phyed tha mar te/ /rab tu sems ni bde ba ste/ /rdo rje rab dgyes bde byed che/ /dbus su ming ni sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di yis dngos grub che/ /byang chub

sems ni rab bsgrubs pa/ /'di yis byin gyis brlabs ma thag /bdud rtsi'i mchog ni chud par 'gyur/ /thams cad 'dod pa ldan byas na/ /de ste thams cad sems kyang rung / /bde ba chen pos sems thams cad/ /sngags mkhan reg pa'i

rgyas btab na/ /'di yis rdo rje 'dzin nyid dang / /rdo rje dpa' bo nyid du yang / /lha mo'i phyag rgyas byin brlabs pa/ /skad cig du ni 'thob par 'gyur/ /lha mo rnams dang gar byed cing / /de ni rab dgyes bdag po khrid/ /pho brang dga' byed rab

dgyes che/ /rab tu chen po bde 'thob tu/ /seng ge'i gdan rab 'jog byed do/ /bzhi dang bzhi yi mchog nyid kyi/ /rdo rje pad ma sbyor ba yis/ /de ni khrid nas dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rdzogs sangs tshe dpag med/ /byang chub sems

dpa' brtson 'grus che/ /yod dang med pa'i 'dod spangs pa/ /de la phyag ni byed par 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems mchog 'jog byed de/ /rang gi spyod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ /pha rol phyin pa thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas kun gyis mdun du bskor/ /

sa gsum thams cad kun tu ni/ /sems dpa' chen pos ston byed pa/ /res 'ga' shin tu dga' spyod pa/ /res 'ga' khab nas 'byung ba dang / /res 'ga' byang chub res 'ga' lhums/ /res 'ga' skye dang res 'ga' 'pho/ /res 'ga'

spyod chen rol pa dang / /res 'ga' bdud las rgyal bar mdzad/ /res 'ga' byang chub mngon byang chub/ /res 'ga' 'khor lo skor mdzad de/ /res 'ga' sna tshogs 'jug par mdzad/ /res 'ga' don du shin tu mdzes/ /res 'ga'

bud med skyes pa dang / /res 'ga' lha dang skye dgu'i bdag /res 'ga' 'dod dbang rgyal po ste/ /res 'ga' 'dod la rgyab kyis phyogs/ /res 'ga' zhi la res 'ga' drag /res 'ga' gdon chen bgegs mdzad de/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas

pa/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pa/ /ci dgar dngos grub 'dod pa la/ /bdag gis ngo bor ston par byed/ /mi phyed cho ga sbyor ba yis/ /'dren pa mi phyed nye byas te/ /phan tshun reg pa chen po yis/ /rdo rje can gyis de 'bigs

te/ /gzungs ma mang po tshogs kyi rnams/ /bde byed chen po gzhan ci smos/ /spyod bcas mi spyod bde dam pa/ /'bad pa mi dgos thob par 'gyur/ /brjid pas byang chub snying po ru/ /rtag pa ru ni gnas 'gyur te/ /phyag

rgya 'di yis rnal 'byor pa/ /sbyor ba rjes sdud ldan pas so/ /thams cad cha ni rnams bral ba/ /byang chub sems ni mchog bzhin de/ /yi ge 'dis ni sbyor ba yis/ /bdag nyid chen por de 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje shin

tu dgyes pa chen mo tshim pa'i yid las skyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ las thaM cad grub par byed pa'o// //dang por oM ni sbyor ba ste/ /tha mar gnyis po rdza rnga'i sgra/ /rab

dgyes rdo rje byin brlabs pa'i/ /lha mo dngar byed dbus su gzhag /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rab dgyes thob pa rmongs byed ma/ /rdo rje ye shes thugs gnas pa/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /sngags mkhan

yi ge phyag rgya 'dis/ /bdag gam gzhan la rgyas btab ste/ /rdo rje 'dam skyes bcug byas na/ /de nas de myur dngos grub bo/ /thams cad las byed dpal dang ldan/ /tshe dang lang tsho skal ldan pa'i/ /rdo rje 'dzin dang 'dra 'thob ste/ /

rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang dpa' bo yi/ /sangs rgyas kun dang rtsen byed cing / /sde dbang rnams dang lha rnams kyi/ /'phrul gyi bud med 'phrog byed do/ /rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa chen mo dngar byed kun tu myang

ba me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba las thams cad byed pa chen mo gdon mi za ba'i gzhan gyis mi phyed ma'o// //tshangs pa'i gsung gi nga ror bcas/ /tha

mar dril bu'i nga ro gnyis/ /dbus su ming gi phreng ba ste/ /yi ge 'di ni chu 'dzin mchog /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /yid kyi dngos grub thob byed de/ /'dod pa yi ni thams cad rnams/ /yi ge skad cig 'grub par byed/ /'di

yis rgyas btab bud med rnams/ /bdag nyid rang gi slob ma'ang rung / /de nyid sbyor bas bsten byas na/ /rdo rje 'dzin dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams bdag por ni/ /myur du mkha' la 'gro byed de/ /tshangs pa gtogs 'dod dbang

chen dang / /lha rnams kyis ni mchod par 'gyur/ /lha mo'i tshogs dang rtsen byed cing / /lha mo kun gyi bdag por 'gyur/ /'phrog byed la sogs bdag po che/ /'jigs par byed dang sku byed pa/ /sems can kun gyi mchog dam pa/ /

sems dpa' chen por de 'gyur ro/ /sdug pa'i tshogs kyi dbus su ni/ /brjid la sogs pa'i spyod pas 'gro/ /brjid che pad ma chen mo la/ /thams cad kun tu brjid pa yis/ /bde byed chen po myong byed de/ /rab tu dgyes pas bsgeg

pa bzhin/ /rab tu skal ldan mgrin 'khyud pas/ /rnal 'byor chen por de gnas te/ /'di ni snying la bris pa yis/ /ci 'dod par ni 'dod pa thob/ /phyag rgya chu skyes btab byas te/ /de ltar byas na phyag rgya dgyes/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes

pa chen mo'i dri ma med pa'i mdog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya ste/ thams cad las byed pa dge ba'o// //dang po nyid du oM bya ste/ /thig le'i rgyal pos nye bar brgyan/ /tsheg drag bcas pa 'dren pa gnyis/ /ldan pa

mtha' mar gzhag byas te/ /rdo rje rab dgyes brgyan byas pa/ /rdo rje ston ka dbus su bsam/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /ye shes snang ba rab sgrub pa/ /yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /nyid kyi snying gar rgyas btab na/ /sangs

rgyas ye shes mchog byed pa/ /de yis ston ka ma dngos grub/ /sde dbang lhar bcas lha rnams dang / /gnod sbyin srin por bcas pa dang / /sbrul dang mi 'am ci gnas pa/ /thams cad 'di yi g.yog tu 'gyur/ /'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba yis/ /

sangs rgyas mchog gi thugs ldan de 'gro ste/ /sna tshogs rab 'byung dpal gyis yang dag khyab/ /chos mchog dam pa byed pa gtong byed cing / /spyod bcas mi spyod 'jig rten snang byed de/ /sprin dang bral ba'i zla ba'i 'od mchog byed/ /mkha' dbyings

rnam par bsgyings pas rab dga' bas/ /A li kA li pad ma bde mchog la/ /myong zhing mchog byas bskal par gnas par 'gyur/ /'di yis sdig pa 'phrog byed de/ /'di yis myur du dga' bar 'gyur/ /'dis ni bde ba'i ngo bo de/ /

'di yis dngos grub grub par 'gyur/ /skye ba'i sdug bsngal rgyab phyogs pa/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen mo ste
thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'grub par byed pa'o// // dang po oM dang yang dag ldan/ /tha mar dgyes pa'i yi ge gnyis/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che/ /dbus su gsal ba'i yi ge bsam/ /

'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sna tshogs chen mo'i mdun du 'gro/ /sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni/ /sna tshogs ye shes dngos grub bo/ /sngags mkhan nyid kyis byin brlabs pa/ /sna tshogs bdag po chen por 'gyur/ /

sdig pa'i yan lag kun spangs te/ /bsod nams kun gyi yan lag dge/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i dngos grub ni/ /'di nyid kyis ni rab tu 'grub/ /sna tshogs sgyu ma'i bde chen gyis/ /sna tshogs chen po'i bskal par gnas/ /rdo

rje'i bdag nyid brgyan pa yi/ /bud med kun dang brtsen par 'gyur/ /de nas de yi chos dbyings gnas/ /dbang phyug mchog gi dngos grub bo/ /pad ma'i mdun du thog ma'i lha/ /byas te rdo rje bsgrub par bya/ /mthe bong srin lag de phyung

ste/ /kha yi nang du gzhag par bya/ /chang bzhin myang bar byas na ni/ /mod la 'dod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur/ /A li kA li rab sbyor bas/ /bud med rnams dang rtsen par byed/ /blo ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /'di ni shin tu

dgyes zhes bya/ /bsil ba dga' byed chen mo ste/ /sna tshogs 'di ni 'gro la gnas/ /dang po oM ni gnas pa ste/ /tra ta dang ldan tha mar bya/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes che ho/ /sgeg mo dbus su bskul ba'o/ /'di ni sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi/ /bsgeg par bya ba sprul pa yin/ /'di dag mnyam par sbyor ba yis/ /sgeg mos ye shes skyed par bya/ /rdo rje blo ldan brten po yis/ /bde bar 'dod pa'i pad mar gzugs/ /'dod pas 'dod pa spyad par bya/ /myur

du 'dod pas dngos grub bo/ /de nas rdo rje 'dod dpal te/ /bde byed thams cad nye bar sgrub/ /sems can kun gyis 'dod bskyed pa/ /bde ba chen por de 'gyur ro/ /mthu yis pha rol phyin pa'i mchog /pad ma'i tshul du bsgeg

pa yis/ /rdo rje sbyor thabs la gnas pas/ /rdo rje chen po de dngos grub/ /ci dga' 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis/ /rtag pa'i lam dang yang dag ldan/ /rtag pa'i chos kyis rjes 'thun spyod/ /bsgrubs na brtag pa rtogs par 'gyur/ /'di

yis kun tu bzang zhes bya/ /de ni dngos po kun yin te/ /'dod pa med cing nyon mongs med/ /nga rgyal med cing 'dzin med pa/ /sangs rgyas mchog tu brtag pa yi/ /sangs rgyas chen po de yi dngos/ /dpal ldan thog ma tha ma

med/ /chos rnams kun gyi rjes 'thun pa'i/ /'dis ni dngos po thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas bdag por bdag nyid 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad dang / /'di la khyad par cung zad med/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje

bdag po'i dpal shin tu dgyes pa sgeg mo dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge'i mchog gi sku'o// //dang po oM bcas lha mo yi/ /tha mar tsheg drag mi phyed gnyis/ /de gnyis dbus kyi phyogs nyid du/ /he zhes bya ba

rnam brgyan te/ /shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje che/ /bzhad pa nyid ni rab tu sbyar/ /yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /nyid kyi snying la rgyas btab na/ /phreng ba'i rgyan gyis rnam brgyan par/ /dpal ldan de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /yid kyis ji ltar

bsams pa bzhin/ /de ni sangs rgyas yul du 'gro/ /de ni de phyir sangs rgyas mthong / /chu skyes de dang rtsen par byed/ /de nas 'dus pa dgyes 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas yang dag zhing nyid nas/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis bde ba che/ /dngos grub rnal 'byor

de la sbyin/ /byed pa dang ni bzlog pa dang / /bde ba chen po 'phrog pa yis/ /rnal 'byor gsang ba'i dbang phyug la/ /gsang ba chen pos mgu bar byed/ /thabs bcas shes rab chen po la/ /rgyal ba nyid kyis stobs byed de/ /A li kA li mnyam

sbyor bas/ /bde ba chen po 'gu bar byed/ /bde ba thabs kyi dngos grub rnams/ /sgyu ma'i tshul gyis bsgrub par bya/ /yi ge yi ni phyag rgya 'dis/ /shin tu dngos grub mchog tu brtag /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba'i phreng ba rgyas pa dpe med pa

dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ las thams cad kyi don gyi dngos grub sbyin pa'o// //oM ni dang por gtsug tor bya/ /te te skad snyan tha mar te/ /dbus su he dga' zhes bya ba/ /bde chen dga' ba rdo rje

dbyangs/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes che yi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rab dgyes 'brel/ /bris pa dang ni 'dzin pa dang / /dran pa yis kyang dngos grub ster/ /sdig pa kun las grol byed cing / /bsod nams thams cad nye bar 'gro/ /mi dge thams cad ma lus

spong byed cing / /sems ni phyag rgya'i yi ge brgyan te 'gro/ /'jig rten thams cad kun tu bkur sti byed/ /rig ma stong gis mngon par mchod byed cing / /rig 'dzin mu sman bud med rnams kyis ni/ /g.yag rnga dkar po'i tshogs kyis g.yob byed

pa'i/ /'jig rten dbang po bde mchog 'brel pa 'thob/ /blo ldan nam mkha' ngos ni thams cad du/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyi dgyes pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ /yid du 'ong ba'i spyan ni rgyas pa dang / /rnal 'byor spyod pa'i bde bas 'bigs pa yis/ /mgul

nas 'khyud pa'i rtsen pas rol par byed/ /pi wang gling bu ya mtshan sgra snyan gyis/ /glu blangs dngos grub rgya che thob par byed/ /ji snyed yid du 'ong ba'i glu dag ni/ /'jig rten grags pa'i bde ba'i bde ba dag /bde ba'i sgra yis bskyed par rnams bsgyur

ba'i/ /de dang 'thun pa'i dbyangs 'dis sgrub par byed/ /kha TaM ba da gar dza'i dbyangs/ /glu ru blangs pas pad ma gnas/ /dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed/ /'di yis byin brlabs dag pa dang / /'di yis byin brlabs bde ba'i rnams/ /

sbyor ba 'di yis sbyar ba yis/ /'dod byed thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu dgyes pa chen mo'i dbyangs dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// //de bzhin oM ni dang por

te/ /dbus su he dgyes bde ba che/ /rdo rje gar byed bde ba gnyis/ /'di ni thams cad bde byed de/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab dgyes nyid/ /rnal 'byor yis ni rgyas btab na/ /bde dang ldan par byed cing 'gro/ /'og min gyi ni

gnas chen du/ /sang+yas rnams dang thabs gcig 'grogs/ /bde byed chen po'i dbang chen dang / /chos kyi rgyal po bde chen thob/ /ji snyed gar gyi gtsug lag las/ /sgyur bar byed pa shad pa dang / /ji snyed de snyed phyag rgya'i rnams/ /gnyis

min 'dus pas 'di dngos grub/ /kye ma'o dgyes pa bde byed che/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde chen po/ /kye ma'o 'dod pa 'dod chags che/ /kye ma'o sna tshogs bdag nyid che/ /de la sogs pa tshad med pa/ /'jig rten gyi ni yo byad rnams/ /

pad ma gsal ba gar gyis ni/ /rnal 'byor gar byas dngos grub bo/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya 'di/ /sna tshogs gar ni ston byed pas/ /myur du gar ni mang byas pas/ /gar gyi gtsug lag dngos grub bo/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i

dpal bde ba chen po dga' byed gar zhes bya ba'i yi ge phyag rgya phan tshun bcu pa rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gsum pa'o// //bcu gsum yi ge dang po nyid/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje'i sku ni sna tshogs che/ /tha mar 'bar dang 'dra ba'i dza/ /

nam mkhar zla skar 'dra ba yi/ /phyag rgya'i ye shes rmad byung ba'i/ /'di yis thabs kyis mnyam gzhag ste/ /gzung ba gsal bar gzung ba yi/ /tsha ba'i gser gyis gzi brjid 'dzin/ /ye shes snying gar bsam par bya/ /nam mkha'

nyi ma bum 'dra bar/ /de ni de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /shin tu rmad byung thob par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi bde 'brel pa/ /rdo rje blo mchog dngos grub bo/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin dge yi/ /sna tshogs chen

po thob 'gyur nas/ /'dod pa'i chos kyis mi gos lo/ /'dod pa chen po sten par byed/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i rdo rje ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i rdo rje'i sku dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya

ba'i yi ge chen po'i phyag rgya'o// //de bzhin oM ni gzhag bya ste/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che/ /rdo rje'i sgra ni bde 'brel pa/ /tha mar khro bcas sbyar bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bde mchog ste/ /bar bcad pa yang thos par

'gyur/ /khams gsum ngo bo thams cad ni/ /sgra yi thos pa dngos grub bo/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub ste/ /bud med pad ma ut+pal dang / /ma lus rgyal ba rnams dang rtsen/ /

rdo rje pad mar sbyar bas na/ /dga' byed myur du dngos grub bo/ /rab tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i tshad med pa'i yon tan gyi sgra dpe med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don gyis dpal thams cad grub par byed ma'o// oM ni spyi

gtsug thig ler babs/ /rab dgyes chen mo rdo rje can/ /rdo rje dri bder 'brel pa yi/ /tha mar gnas shes rab sbyar bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /sna tshogs chen mo mdun du 'gro/ /sna tshogs chen mo 'di yis ni/ /

sna tshogs ye shes grub par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid rdo rje brgyan pa yi/ /de ni mtshan ldan kun dang rtsen/ /de nas chos dbyings gnas pa des/ /A li kA li mnyam sbyor bas/ /dga' byed lhan cig rtsen byas na/ /dbang phyug dam

pa dngos grub 'gyur/ /'di ni rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /blo ldan rab tu dgyes zhes bya/ /rdo rje'i dri dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i yi ge'i phyag rgya'o// //oM mchog gtsug tor rnams byas te/ /shin tu dgyes che dbus

nyid du/ /rdo rje ro ni sbyor che ba/ /tha mar ho ste thig le gnyis/ /'di yis rab tu dgyes par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan dpe med bde ba dang / /bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' nyid/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba sna tshogs bdag /sangs rgyas kun

gyi rol pa yis/ /mchod pa mi zad byed par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas thams cad/ /nam mkha' mnyam pa nyid thob bo/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i dbang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba sems

can thams cad kyi don thams cad grub pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag po zla gsang thig le bshad pa'i rgyal po las/ chos kyi 'khor lo ste gnyis pa'o// //

de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' kun tu bzang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las shin tu dgyes pa chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad nas cang mi gsung

bar gyur to/ /de nas nam mkha'i dbyings cad kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad gsang ba'i gzungs dang g.yogs tu bcas pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po dang

bcas pa rnams kyis mdun du byas pa ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa/ phyi nang gi pho nya dang pho nya mo rab tu rgyas pa rnams shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/ dgyes shing

spyan ni rgyas pa yis/ /bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yi/ /brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing / /thal mo sbyar nas gtsug nyid du/ /bzhag pa yis ni 'dun pa byed/ /bskul ba yis ni dbyangs 'di yis/ /de dag gtso la mnyes par byed/ /

kye ma'o chos ni ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma'o spyod pa ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma'o sbas pa ngo mtshar che/ /kye ma'o bde ba yang dag 'byung / /kye ma'o kun tu bzang po'i don/ /kye ma'o rab dgyes yang dag 'grogs/ /kye ma'o bde ba dag pa che/ /

kye ma'o bde ba bde mchog ste/ /kye ma'o sngags kyi yang dag sbyor/ /kye ma'o snying po yang dag bsdus/ /kye ma'o phyag rgya mnyam par bzhugs/ /kye ma'o sgrub pa rmad 'byung ba'o/ /kye ma'o pha rol phyin ma yin/ /kye ma'o ji ltar

mthu rig ma'i/ /kye ma'o sna tshogs dgos pa che/ /kye ma'o dag pa gsum sbyar ba/ /kye ma'o rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba'i/ /kye ma'o pad ma rnam bye bas/ /kye ma'o dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'o/ /kye ma'o mchog dang mnyam pa'o/ /kye ma'o gar

ni dag pa che/ /kye ma'o glu rab dri ma med/ /kye ma'o sil snyan rnam par 'brel/ /kye ma'o brdab dang mun pa sel/ /kye ma'o dag byed me tog phreng / /kye ma'o spos snod dge ba ste/ /kye ma'o mar me mun pa sel/ /kye ma'o dri ni shin tu

bsil/ /kye ma'o rnal 'byor mnyam par sbyor/ /kye ma'o sgyur ba nam mkha' 'dra/ /kye ma'o sangs rgyas rdo rje mchog /kye ma'o rin chen bde mchog skyed/ /kye ma'o sna tshogs pad mchog ldan/ /kye ma'o sna tshogs

sgyu ma mdzad/ /kye ma'o ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang / /kye ma'o ngo mtshar dpa' bo rnams/ /kye ma'o ngo mtshar sems dpa' rnams/ /kye ma'o ngo mtshar lha yi rnams/ /shin tu dgyes che rdo rje la/ /rgyan pa kun gyis bstod byas te/ /rdo rje

sems dpa'i 'gying ba yis/ /dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur/ /de nas pha rol phyin thams cad/ /'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dgyes 'gyur te/ /sems dpa' che la phyag byas nas/ /mchog gi dbyangs kyis bstod par byed/ /chu skyes zhal

ni 'dzum bcas pa/ /yangs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad de/ /phyag dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis/ /rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur/ /yid tsam 'dzum pa'i spyan zur gzigs/ /shas rgyas brla ni nu mar mdud/ /rked pa'i dbyibs

ni rnam par yangs/ /snams kyi ngos kyang che la mdzes/ /chags pa chung zad tshems kyis gnon/ /tshems kyi phreng ba kun da zla/ /mig drag zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing / /a la la la ho/ dam tshig rjes su chags pa'i bdag nyid sdug

bsngal zhi mdzad cing / /rab tu dgyes che dgyes par bstod/ /bde bas bde la longs spyod mchog tu bde ba'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab bsten/ /dgongs pa'i dbang dang ldan pas 'gro ba ya mtshan chen po'i sgo nas 'dul mdzad cing / /gsang

ba'i thig le 'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos grub gtsor bsten te/ 'jig rten gsum po sbyang bar bya ba'i chos de bde gshegs don du mdzad/ /ngo mtshar yon tan ldan pa dam tshig bde las 'byung / /bde mdzod bde spyod dga' la rol pa tshul

bzhin mdzod/ /thams cad dga' ba'i ngang nyid thig le'i dkyil du bskyed mdzad de/ /byang chub snying po 'gro ba'i lam 'di bde bar bskul la bsnyen pa mdzod/ /ngo mtshar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig pa che la dgyes shing bzhugs/ /bdag

cag 'du shes rnams dang bral ba nyid kyang bzhugs spyod 'dzem bcas pas/ /tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang dang ldan pas kyang ni de la rag lus so/ /a la la la ho/ yangs pa'i spyan can drang shing bcug ste rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod/ /

rnam dag ye shes chu des 'gro ba rnams kyi sdig pa khrus/ /byams ma'i gzungs ma bdag nyid che dang rab tu brtson mdzod la/ /thugs rje chen po rang bzhin dag pa'i chu des bdag cag dbang skur cig /mi g.yo mnyam pa nyid

kyi rang bzhin ye shes thob 'dod phyir/ /dam tshig chen po gsum po 'di la gnas nas ni/ /zla gsang thig le'i dbyings su bdag cag dogs med 'gro bar bgyi/ /dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /shin tu srid pas skyo

ba yis/ /sangs rgyas kun kyang 'dod pa bzhin/ /glu blangs myur du bskul bar 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bstod pas shin tu dgyes te de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems par bcas

pa dang / rdo rje dang rin po che dang / pad ma dang las kyi rigs kyi btsun mo de dag thams cad la rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos mnyes par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs

rnams dang / byang chub sems par bcas pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i ma'i tshogs su bcas pa rnams dang / phyi nang gi rdo rje'i rigs las skyes pa rnams la shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i gar dang dbyangs

dang / brdung ba dang zhi ba'i thal mo la sogs pa rnam par mdzad pa chen pos rab tu mdzad nas/ dam tshig chen po rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa 'dod pa'i dbang po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bde bar bcang mi

gsung bar gyur to/ /de nas de dag kun dgyes nas/ /shin tu dgyes pa nyid byas te/ /thal mo sbyar nas sa steng du/ /pus mo'i lha nga btsugs mdzad de/ /chos kyi phyir ni gsol ba 'debs/ /dkyil 'khor dam tshig bdag
nyid la/ /bcom ldan dgyes pas bshad du gsol/ /gang gi sems can bde nyid kyi/ /bde bas dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig 'dod pa nye bar longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dkyil 'khor mdzad do/ /phyag gnyis gar dang bcas pa yis/ /mdun du thal mo bkan par bya/ /sor mo kun gyi rtse mo la/ /pha rol phyin pa'i tshogs rnams bsam/ /de dag

ming gi brda yis ni/ /sor mo thams cad brtag par bya/ /sbom po phan tshun bsnol byas te/ /shes rab mchod rten du ni brtag /rdo rje mchod rten phyir byas te/ /lhag ma 'od bzhin spro bar bya/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams

cad kyi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma dge/ /gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas byang chub byin rlob bo/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /rtag pa'i pho brang 'gro 'ong byed/ /sangs rgyas snang mdzad dpal dang ldan/ /btso

ma'i gser gyi kha dog 'dzin/ /shes rab ldan pas sbyor byas na/ /'di yis myur du dngos grub bo/ /skal ldan 'phrul gyi bu mo la/ /'di yis byin brlabs gar byas te/ /rdo rje pad mar gzhug byas nas/ /sems ni bzhugs pas

bsgrub byas la/ /de nas sems de blang byas te/ /blo ldan de yis btung byas te/ /grub pa gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /yang dag dngos grub 'gro bar byed/ /shes rab dang ni 'phul gyi 'am/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'phrul brtag

'thob/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje blo ldan gyis/ /kun tu 'phrog par yong mi nus/ /shin tu dgyes pa kun tu longs spyod pa'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'o// //thal mo de nyid khro skyes pa/ /sbom po skyil dkrung gzhag byas te/ /

sna tshogs phreng ba 'bar byed pa/ /rnal 'byor gyis ni lhag me spro/ /'di ni rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /shes rab pha rol phyin ma gsal/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /rdo rje ye shes bla na med/ /'di yis myur du 'thob par 'gyur/ /

phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /ring du sdig pa 'jig par byed/ /tshe dang dpal dang ye shes skal/ /rdo rje 'dzin gyis thob par 'gyur 'di ni dbang bskur tsam gyis kyang / /rdo rje 'dzin rjer de 'gyur te/ /

rdo rje dkyil gyis mtshan btab pas/ /sa chen 'ong zhing 'gro bar byed/ /'di ni dga' byed rdo rje rigs/ /rdo rje bud med 'grogs pa dang / /rdo rje gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor du/ /rdo rje sems nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar dngos grub

'dug pa dang / /sangs rgyas rdo rje dpa' bo rnams/ /skad cig gcig gis 'dren par byed/ /bsgral dang mnyes par bya ba dang / /rgyas btab de bzhin rmongs pa dang / /gso bar byed dang za ba dang / /phan tshun du ni bskyed par byed/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbang bskur ba rdo rje'i phreng ba zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa bde ba thob par byed pa dpe med pa'i rdo rjer byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// //rdo rje'i thal mo de nyid las/ /khro mo rgyab ni bskum byas te/ /sor mo lhag ma

snga ma bzhin/ /phyag rgya 'di ni dbang bskur ba'o/ /rims dang gdon dang dug la sogs/ /de ma thag tu 'phrog par byed/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /sangs rgyas kyi ni dgyes pa thob/ /'di nyid kyi ni dbang skur dang / /'di nyid kyis

ni bde dam pa/ /'di nyid kyis ni rgyal po che/ /'di nyid kyis ni dpal dam pa/ /'di yis rtsen pa byas pa yis/ /rab dga' 'gugs pa dngos grub bo/ /mi la 'di yis byin brlabs te/ /nyi ma phyed na spyad byas na/ /'di ni de ma thag tu

yang / /dpal ldan rdo rje gzi brjid 'dzin/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis 'od 'drar 'gyur/ /zhag bdun gyis 'gyur gzhan gyis min/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis 'dul ba dang / /dge ba thams cad dbang du byed/ /grol 'dod rnams kyi

mun pa sel/ /blo ldan phyag rgya mchog tu 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ bde ba chen po gzi brjid dpe med pa dang ldan pa'i phreng ba zhes bya ba ba dan gsum pa'i 'jig rten gsum du bde ba chen po thob par byed pa'i dam tshig gi

phyag rgya chen po'o// //pha rol phyin pa'i phyag rgya nyid/ /dge ba'i khro mo dang bral ba/ /pha rol phyin pa'i chos yin te/ /tshig dang tshig tu rnam bral ba'o/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /chos kyi dbyings nas rje ru 'gyur/ /

sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur bas/ /dbang phyug dam pa de 'gyur te/ /thams cad dag pa mos pa yis/ /pad ma dmar po mchog 'dzin 'gyur/ /pad ma sgyu ma rnam mdzad pas/ /sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur ro/ /sdug

bsngal thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /sems can kun la thams cad sbyin/ /'dod chags chen po nyes spangs te/ /de ni bdud rtsi 'dra bar 'gyur/ /'di ni myur du gar byas pa/ /bsgrub par mi byed cung zad med/ /'di ni pad mo

sbyor ba yis/ /bde mchog rtag pa thob par 'gyur/ /shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i myos par byed pa'i dpal pad ma phreng ba zhes bya ba thams cad kyi don dpal shin tu dgyes par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// //'di nyid gnyis pa'i spyi gtsug tu/ /

bsgyur nas gzhag par byas pa ni/ /ma lus dri ma 'phrog byed pa/ /sna tshogs chen por de 'gyur ro/ /'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag /khams gsum sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /sna tshogs dbang po rgyal po che/ /sna tshogs gzugs

dang sna tshogs bdag /sgrub pa thams cad bde dam pa/ /'dod pa kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /'dod pa'i don kun bsgrub byed pa/ /thams cad 'di yis dngos grub bo/ /bud med 'di yis byin brlabs nas/ /sngo bsangs khur tshos dkar

mo dang / /de dang lhan cig gar byas pas/ /sna tshogs bdag po chen por 'gyur/ /sngo bsangs zhing ma phreng ma dag /byin gyis brlabs nas dus gsum du/ /mtshan gyis mthar ni bsnyen byas nas/ /las kyi dngos grub thob
