par 'gyur/ /rigs ngan can dang sme ma dang / /gar mkhan de bzhin gar byed dag /phyag rgya ye shes byin brlabs te/ /bsnyen dang dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /shin tu dgyes pa sna tshogs bde ba sbyin par byed pa zhes bya ba 'dod par byed

pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// //phyag rgya de dag bsten pa'i rnams/ /gar gyi tshul gyis rang gi gnas/ /dam tshig mchog gi dam tshig gis/ /dngos grub chen po'i mthur 'gyur ro/ /thal mo de nyid

sbyar byas te/ /rdo rje bcing pas bcing bar byed/ /de nas dga' byed dbang bskyed de/ /mnga' yi tshul gyis gzung bar bya/ /'di ni rab dgyes gtso bo yis/ /pha rol phyin mchog sdug pa yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi myos byed pa/ /dpa' ba rnams

kyang rmongs par byed/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /mi shes byed pa 'jigs par byed/ /las kyi don ni bka' bzhin du/ /dga' nas bran bzhin byed par 'gyur/ /'di yis byin gyis brlabs pa yis/ /bde chen rgyal po 'dra

bar 'gyur/ /dga' dang lhan cig gar byed cing / /'dod dbang sar ni 'gro bar byed/ /dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa kun tu bzang po'i dgyes pa chen mo'i bde ba gnyis su med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba sbyor ba'i phyag rgya chen po'o// //

snying gar bzung ba'i sbyor ba yis/ /'di yis las kun byed 'gyur te/ /bdud rnams thams cad 'bigs par byed/ /rgyal ba 'dod chags bral spyod pa/ /bde gshegs mya ngan 'das kun dang / /thams cad 'di yis bslong bar byed/ /

sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas nas/ /myur du las la sbyor bar byed/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen gyi/ /gdug pa thams cad 'joms byed de/ /'jigs byed drag po chen po yis/ /gdug pa thams cad gdung bar byed/ /

rdo rje pad mar bcug pa yis/ /mche bas ma mchu bzung byas te/ /sor mo phan tshun bsnol ba yis/ /dpung pa brkyang ste gar du bya/ /sna tshogs chen po rab rgyas pas/ /bde chen po yi bde 'thob bo/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad

kyi/ /'dod dang thar bar grub byed de/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/ /'dod pa bzhin du 'phur bar byed/ /rab dgyes 'brel pas gar byas shing / /nam mkha' gzung ma'i thab nyid kyis/ /phan tshun gcu ba'i gnon pa yis/ /

bcings na 'di yis dngos grub bo/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /lha dang lha min mchod byed de/ /dbang po nye dbang dbang chen dang / /nyi zla gshin rje chu dbang rnams/ /spyi bo yis ni phyag byas nas/ /rang gi dpal mchog stobs

byed de/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyang / /nyid kyis dpal can stobs pa yis/ /brtan pa de la mgu byed cing / /sangs rgyas dgos pa rab sgrub byed/ /'di yis las kyi tshul gyi rnams/ /las dang rjes su 'thun 'gyur te/ /rnal

'byor dbang phyug rnam mdzad pas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor te/ /gzungs dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /yid la 'dod pa'i las kun byed/ /'dzum dang gnas dang sbas pa dang / /spyod pas gar gyis byas pas so/ /gzhan dag

kyang de dngos grub che/ /pad ma'i 'dab ma rnams phye bas/ /byang chub sems ni rab sgrub pa/ /sgrub pa pos ni pad mo bsgru+ub/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /bde ba gnyis su med pa'i dpal/ /shin tu dgyes pa'i pad ma 'dab ma

zhes bya ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba thob par byed pa'o/ /thal mo de nyid bcings pa yin/ /bcings pa gyen du bzung byas te/ /mthe'u chung gnyis ni bsgreng byas te/ /de bzhin sbom po gnyis kyang bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni chu

srin zhes/ /rgyal mtshan ldan par bshad pa yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sprul pa ste/ /'dod bral chags par bsgrub pa yin/ /phyag rgya 'di yis bde ldan gyi/ /pho brang chen por 'gro bar byed/ /der phyin chos kyi 'khor lo dag /

bla med par ni skor bar byed/ /sangs rgyas pha rol phyin mas bskor/ /sdig spangs rnams ni bkug nas kyang / /spyod pa drag po'i tshul gyis ni/ /bskal pa bye bar bsnyen par byed/ /yang dag byang chub gnas pa yi/ /sangs rgyas 'di yis

mnyes par byed/ /de nas dgyes te sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs ye shes skye ba yi/ /rang gi dam tshig gsungs pa yi/ /sems dpa' chen po sgrub par byed/ /bla med dngos grub thams cad kyang / /'di yis thams cad thub par byed/ /sbyor dang ldan

pas byin brlabs te/ /snying gar nye bar bsam byas na/ /las kyi ngo bo tshul 'di yis/ /thams cad las ni byed du gzhug /gar dang dbyangs kyi ro dga' dang / /sil snyan brdung ba rnams byed dang / /pi bang gling bu rdza rnga yi/ /phyag

rgya 'di yis bsgrub par bya/ /dpal rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i thugs kyi dgyes pa dpe med pa dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// //thal mo de nyid mnyam bzung nas/ /'gying zhing 'gying bas gar byas te/ /bcing ba chen pos bcings

byas nas/ /sbyong ba chen po gnyis su bya/ /khu tshur gnyis po dku nyid du/ /g.yon du 'gying bas brtan par bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni rgyal la sogs/ /bde ba dam pas mchod byas te/ /'gying ba'i sbyor bas gar byas na/ /dngos grub thams cad

grub par byed/ /'gying ba tsam gyi sbyor ba yis/ /'gying ba thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /lha dang lha min rig ma yis/ /'bum phrag brgya yis mchod par byed/ /rab tu dgyes pa bde mchog che/ /kun tu gar byas gnas par 'gyur/ /klu

mo lha dang lha min dang / /de bzhin mi 'am bdag por 'gyur/ /nam mkhar 'gro ma'i khyor 'gyur te/ /rnal 'byor ma kun bde ba che/ /gzungs ma rnams kyi dag pa bdag /gsang ba pha rol phyin pa'i rje/ /las kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /thams cad

las ni byed par bshad/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che/ /gsang chen sbyor bas dngos grub bo/ /dpal shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo sems can thams cad sgrol bar sbas pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa'o// //phyag rgya de nyid mnyam

bzung ste/ /lag pa'i 'dab ma gar dang bcas/ /myur bar steng du dor ba yis/ /mgyogs su 'gro ba dngos grub bo/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /rmad 'byung dam pa mchod byas pa/ /sbyor ba gar gyis mchod byas na/ /thams

cad las byed dngos grub bo/ /gang dag dngos grub med pa dang / /gang dag bde ba med pa'i rnams/ /de dag phyag rgya 'dis btab na/ /nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yis thams cad las rnams ni/ /rmad 'byung dam pa 'grub
par byed/ /btsun mo chen po de bzhin gshegs/ /'di yis de ni 'grub par byed/ /gzhan yang mchog tu rgya che ba/ /mnyam dang mi mnyam chos kyi dbyings/ /btsun mo dam pa de bzhin gshegs/ /phyag rgya'i

sbyor bas dngos grub po/ /dpal bde ba chen po rdo rje rab tu dgyes pa'i me tog gi phreng ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// //de nyid 'og gi ngos su dor/ /steng du cung zad bsgrub par bya/ /'di yis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /bde mchog yang

ni tshim byed pa/ /'dis ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /bdud rnams shin tu ring bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya bcings te bsdigs pa yis/ /skrag nas dngos grub sbyin par byed/ /sangs rgyas dam tshig gsum gnas pa'i/ /'di yis

mchod pa byas par 'gyur/ /de nas gtso bo 'dis mnyes nas/ /mchog gi thab ni stob par byed/ /phyag rgya bcings pa sbyor ba yis/ /'di ni thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /rgyun du byas na rnal 'byor pa/ /dgos pa thams

cad byed par 'gyur/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed de/ /bde ba dam pa 'thob byed cing / /tshe 'di dang ni pha rol tu/ /phyag rgya'i gnas su de 'gro'o/ /dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba tshim par byed pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya

ste/ dri ma thams cad spong ba dpal shin tu dgyes ma'o// //thal mo de nyid sbom po bsgreng / /lhag ma gsal ba'i nyi ma bzhin/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /ye shes mchog tu snang byed pa'o/ /thog ma med nas bskor

ba mas/ /'di yis ti gti mug 'phrog byed de/ /mnyam par gzhag nas bcings ma thag /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis rlob/ /mnyam nyid ye shes dri med dang / /pad mo dra ba dga' ba che/ /sna tshogs dra ba dpal chen po/ /bde

byed chen po 'thob par 'gyur/ /rdo rje dgyes pa chen mo'i dpe med pa'i dpal dang ldan ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// //g.yas dang g.yon pa'i lag pa yis/ /brjid pa'i gar gyis gar bya zhing / /thal mo de nyid mnyams sbyar te/ /g.yon

gyi khu tshur spyi bor gzhag /rgyal ba rnams kyi phyag rgya 'di/ /mchod pa thams cad grub byed do/ /thams cad don rnams grub pa dge/ /bkra shis rgyal ba 'thob par byed/ /gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /mchod

pa'i sprin nyid rgyas pa che/ /mtha' yas dri med gzi brjid dang / /sangs rgyas zhing ni dngos grub po/ /phyag rgya sbyor bas sbyar byas te/ /skad cig gcig gis sbyar byas na/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang sras mchog dang / /'di yis thams

cad 'bab par 'gyur/ /sna tshogs kyi ni sbyor ba yis/ /sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas na/ /dpa' bo thams cad kun tu 'gro/ /phun sum tshogs pa 'dis 'grub po/ /dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i sems 'phel bar byed

ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// //de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dpal kun tu bzang po shin tu dgyes pa chen po bde ba'i bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po bshad pa mthas klas pa

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa/ gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po

bskal pa'i mtha' klas pa zhes bya ba gsum pa rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po gsang ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di bshad nas

slar yang bde bar cang mi gsung bar gnas par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang / pha rol tu phyin ma rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs thams cad dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro

ma'i tshogs thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur nas phyi nang gi rdo rje'i rigs su gtogs pa 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs thams cad la slar dbugs phyung ste/ de las bzhengs nas gar mdzad cing rab tu dgyes pa'i spyan rgyas pas bcom ldan 'das la yang dang

yang du lta zhing dbyangs kyi mchog bde ba 'di glu blangs te dgyes par byed do/ /rnam mang bde ba'i rol pas bdag nyid chen po yis/ /skye dang mi skye'i chos nyid ya mtshan rmad dag dpal bsten pa/ /shin tu bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten 'dir

byung ste/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i gzungs ma'i dkyil nas bskyed par mdzod/ /ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos nyid bde bas rol mdzad cing / /bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin 'dus pa rnams la dbugs 'byin cing / /gsang ba'i thig le'i dngos nyid nam mkha' 'dra

ba rnams spyad de/ /bde ba phun sum tshogs pa'i longs spyod rgyu la dbang mdzad pas/ /byang chub mchog gi lam 'di nyon mongs mtha' dang rnam bral zhing / /bde ba'i 'byung gnas skye shi med pa'i sgo mor pad ma rnam dag pa/ /nyon mongs mi gos sgyu mar

gnas pa chu zla'i dkyil 'khor bzhin/ /e ma'o kun tu bzang po rig pa rgya chen bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /dngos nyid med pas chos la dga' ba'i rol pas gzungs su 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi bde mchog bdud rtsi ra sa yan/ /ji ltar bde la rten cing

kun tu gnang bar mdzad/ /kye ma bde mchog bde bas rol pa tshul bzhin mdzod/ /sdug bsngal 'gro ba'i las can bde bas tshim par mdzod/ /byams pa'i spyan can thugs rje nyi ma shar mdzad nas/ /gti mug thibs po'i mun nag byang chub sems kyis gsal

bar ston/ /de ni 'dus pa'i tshogs la bde sbyin rol pa'i rgyal pos gsungs/ /byang chub mchog gi sems des snying po mchog tu dbang bskur cig /dbyangs kyi phyag rgya 'di yis ni/ /skad cig skad cig bskul byas na/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid kyis/ /

mdun du gnas te dngos grub sbyin/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po rdo rje zla gsang thig le chen po la/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba gsang ba chen po tshad med pa dang / mchog tu pha rol tu phyin pa'i

rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs chen po de rnams kyis bstod cing bskul ba bya ba dang / gsang ba thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po 'di la snyoms par

zhugs nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po gnon mi za ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di rang gi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ /rta babs rnams pa bzhi yis brgyan/ /

dar dang dril bu'i chun po dang / /nyi ma zla bas rnam par brgyan/ /rin chen mu tig 'bras bus spras/ /do shal gdu bu rnams kyis brgyan/ /sna tshogs gdug ni rnam bres pa/ /sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyi brgyan/ /srad bu bzhi dang ldan pa ste/ /

ka ba brgyad mchog yang dag gnas/ /dbus kyi dga' byed stan la ni/ /dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan/ /sna tshogs pad ma dar gyis g.yogs/ /thams cad sten de dag ces bya/ /dbus su rdo rje shin tu dgyes/ /stan de la ni gzhag

par bya/ /tshad med pad ma dmar 'dra ba'i/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /yid bzhin nor bu dbu rgyan ldan/ /rin chen gtsug gis rnam par mdzes/ /tshad med dar ni dpyangs pa yis/ /dbu la chu bos mdzes par bya/ /

sna tshogs sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag /sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas/ /chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam rgyas/ /dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du 'dud/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje che/ /snying gar gsor la shin tu brtson/ /de la sogs

pa'i yon tan ldan/ /thog ma nyid du rnam par gzhag /slob ma'am yang na gzhan yang rung / /mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan pa/ /tshul bzhin byin gyis brlab bya ste/ /dbus kyi dkyil du gzhag par bya/ /bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam gzhag

ste/ /de la sogs pa yon tan gtso/ /dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa na/ /bdag ni rab dgyes zhes su smra/ /des ni slob ma byin brlabs te/ /thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs/ /rdo rje pad ma las byung ba'i/ /gsang ba yis kyang dbang

skur ro/ /rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan/ /yid 'ong bu mo btsal byas te/ /mgrin pa dpral ba snying spyi bor/ /lha la sogs pa'i 'bru bsgoms te/ /mtshan ma phyag rgyar rab 'bar ba/ /rdo rje pad mar mnyams sbyor ba'i/ /rang la 'khyud pa'i

phyag rgya yis/ /tshul bzhin thams cad gzhag par bya/ /mdun du lha mo smyo byed ma/ /ma mchu 'dzin pas ro la dgyes/ /dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yis/ /thams cad rgyan dang yang dag ldan/ /lo ni bcu drug lon pa'i

mchog /shes rab can gyis mdun du gzhag /g.yas su lha mo gsod byed ma/ /mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren par brtson/ /do shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan/ /lo grangs nyi shu lon pa ste/ /gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra/ /chu skyes spyan ni

yid tsam sngo/ /sems dpa' che la dgyes mdzad cing / /'di ni tshul bzhin gzhag par bya/ /rgyab tu lha mo rmongs byed ma/ /pad ma dmar po mdog gi 'od/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan mdzes ma'o/ /sku tshe'i tshad ni nyi shu gcig /dga'

byed 'dod pa'i ro la dgyes/ /sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sna tshogs pad ma sbyor la sogs/ /gar gyi bya ba rab bslabs gzhag /g.yon du sna tshogs chen mo ste/ /sna tshogs dgos

pa'i rjes bslabs pa/ /sku tshe'i tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan/ /rnal 'byor la ni shin tu brtson/ /lha dang lha min mi yi rnams/ /'gro ba thams cad myos 'gyur ma/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ /sna tshogs dar gyi na bza'

gsol/ /grwa rnams kyi ni thams cad du/ /gzugs sgra dri ro reg gi rnams/ /bdug pa me tog bsung ldan pa/ /gzi brjid chen po 'od dang ldan/ /ci rigs par ni gzhag par bya/ /sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /rang

gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan/ /skal ldan dga' la rnam mos pa/ /sgo srungs bzhi ni gzhag par bya/ /gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /pi wang gling bu brdab pa dang / /rdza rnga rnga chen mu ku dang / /mu ra dza dang da ra dang / /gar dang dbyangs

dang bzhad pa che/ /rol mo'i yo byad sna tshogs rnams/ /dga' byed dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya/ /phyi yi dkyil 'khor thams cad do/ /dkyil 'khor 'di yi phyi rol du/ /rdo rje nam mkhar 'gro ma gzhag /yi dags rgyal po yang

dag zhon/ /dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te/ /skal ldan rang gi lag car ldan/ /gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing / /sha khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang / /rkang dang tshil bu za spyod pa/ /dkyil 'khor byas te 'dug pa ni/ /

tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya/ /dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed/ /gsod par byed dang spro bar byed/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams/ /shar gyi phyogs su gzhag par bya/ /gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma/ /

'jigs byed bong bu'i lha ru ste/ /gtsug lag mthong ba'i rgyu yis ni/ /mkhas pas tshul bzhin gzhag par bya/ /chags chen mo dang chags bral dang / /'khor lo ma dang rgyas 'debs mo/ /rab tu sbyor bas sbyor byas te/ /ci rigs

nub tu gzhag par bya/ /sna tshogs lus dang bsrung ba dang / /gnod sbyin ma dang yang dag 'phrog /sngags dang phyag rgyas byin brlabs te/ /sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du gzhag /shar gyi grwa ru gzhag pa ni/ /bya rog

gdong ste mig 'dra zhing / /'jig pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdong / /ji ltar rjes su 'thun byas te/ /yi dags stan la yang dag 'dug /sna tshogs mchog gi mdog 'dzin te/ /lag pa gri dang 'khar gzhong thogs/ /mchog

tu sha dang khrag za ba'o/ /nub dang lho yi mtshams gzhag pa/ /bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdong ring ma/ /khros pa'i khyi dang phag gi gdong / /gsus po che la lto 'phyangs ma/ /nub byang gi ni mtshams dag tu/ /rnga mo bong bu'i gdong 'dzin dang / /

khros pa'i ra dang byi la'i gdong / /rgyu ma'i mgo nas za byed rnams/ /shar dang byang gi mtshams dag tu/ /keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste/ /khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas klubs/ /lto 'phyangs mo la bum pa 'dzin/ /phan tshun

'thab par brtson pa yi/ /lce spyang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams/ /'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba 'byin/ /rnam par 'gyur bas gzugs 'dzin pa'o/ /sgo srung kyi ni phyogs kun du/ /sgo bzhi rnams su gzhag bya ba/ /byang gi phyogs

su 'bod sgrogs te/ /bum pa'i rna ni shar nyid du/ /nub tu rnam par 'jig pa'o/ /lhor ni gshin rje'i rgyal po gzhag /de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog /nam mkha' 'gro bas kun tu bskor/ /bum pa rnam pa sna tshogs te/ /

gser dang dngul las byas pa la/ /sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris/ /me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis brgyan/ /bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas pa/ /sman lnga dang ni yang dag ldan/ /rin chen lnga dang ldan byas pa/ /'bru sna lnga yis brgyan

byas pa'i/ /bum pa bcu drug gzhag byas te/ /bcu gnyis brgyad dam yang na phyed/ /tha na chung ngu gcig tsam yang / /ji ltar rims bzhin gzhag byas te/ /dbus su bum pa ro yi mchog /dam tshig chus ni gang byas pa/ /

gser ram dngul lam zangs kyang rung / /lcags sam sa las byas pa la/ /zla ba nyi ma dri chu dang / /btung ba bsnum por ldan pa yi/ /dbang po kun las 'byung ba rnams/ /sha srang gcig gis rab bsres pa/ /kun las 'phags pa ro yi

mchog /tshogs kyi dbus su bsgrub byas te/ /btung ba bzhin du myangs pa yis/ /rdo rje blo ldan bskal par gnas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs nye ba'i zas/ /bza' ba dang ni bca' bas mchod/ /mchod pa nye ba'i zas lnga dang / /tshad med 'dod pa'i yon tan

lngas/ /tshad med rnal 'byor ma tshogs la/ /skad cig skad cig mchod par bya/ /sngags mkhan tshul bzhin mnyam gzhag ste/ /'byung po rnams la gtor ma sbyin/ /lha rnams kyi ni thams cad la/ /he ru ka yi phyag rgya yis/ /nyid kyi

gtor ma byin brlabs te/ /spyan drangs gtsang sbra byas pa dbul/ /gzungs kyi tshogs ni de rnams la/ /mnyes par byas nas slar gshegs so/ /rnal 'byor ma chen dkyil 'khor du/ /slob ma'i mchog ni gzhug par bya/ /mtshungs par

spyod pa rab mdzes ma/ /sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag dkris lag pa g.yon gyis gzung byas te/ /rab dgyes longs spyod phyag rgya yis/ /bcug nas sgo yi grwa nyid du/ /blo ldan dam tshig bsgrags par bya/ /'di las mi bya cung zad med/ /

thabs dang shes rab sems nyid kyis/ /rtag tu dogs pa med byas te/ /'dod pa lnga yi yon tan spyad/ /gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa dang / /skye bo gang dag dam la gnon/ /brtul zhugs khyod kyi de drangs te/ /khrag chen po ni btung bar bya/ /

gang dag slob dpon smod byed dang / /gang dag bka' rnams mi byed pa/ /de dag bros nas brag chen po/ /blo ldan snying las btung bar bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang / /slob dpon la yang gnod byed pa/ /rdo rje khro bo

bsdus pa yis/ /dam tshig bsgoms te bsgral bar bya/ /de nas dam tshig blud byas te/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi ro yi mchog /dung chen por ni gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu blud do/ /kye ma dmyal ba 'i ni chu 'di ste/ /khyod kyi

snying la kun du gnas/ /dam tshig bsrungs pas dngos grub ster/ /rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'di 'thung / /oM badzra uta ka hU~M tha/ /dam tshig 'di ni brgyar bzlas pa'i/ /byin gyis brlabs te 'thung du gzhug /gzhan du dam tshig mi 'gyur

te/ /dngos grub nyid du'ang 'di 'gyur ro/ /bdag ni dam tshig skal dga' zhes/ /slob ma sngags ni brjod du gzhug /sgo grwar gnas nas dri bya ba/ /kye khyod dga' ba ci la dad/ /'jug pa yis kyang smra bya ba/ /bdag ni skal ldan bde mchog

la/ /rab dgyes 'phrul la bdag dga' ste/ /mchog tu dga' ba bdag dga'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma mchog gi/ /dkyil du me tog bor byas te/ /me tog gang la lhung ba yi/ /lha nyid du ni dngos grub bo/ /dbang bskur ba yi phyag

rgya yis/ /de nas spyi bor dbang bskur bya/ /bum pa rnam pa bzhi yis kyang / /mnyam par bzhag ste lnga po yis/ /pad ma dkyil 'khor zhugs byas te/ /de nas yang ni dbang bskur bya/ /ci rigs par ni gzungs ma rnams/ /bdag

nyid skal ldan zhes su smra/ /gang dag 'gro bar gyur pa yis/ /lha de nyid ni bsten par bya/ /dga' bar byed pa'i gzungs ma 'di'i/ /khyod kyis rtag tu bsgrub par gyis/ /de nas rgyal dbang slob ma de/ /nang gi sbas pa bsdus pa yi/ /

gsang ba mnyam par 'jug pa yis/ /sbyor dang ldan pas dbang bskur bya/ /rdo rje pad ma las drangs pa/ /sbom po dang ni dbang gis blang / /rdo rje bkan du gzhag byas na/ /rtag pa dge ba bde ba che/ /kye ma'o

dam tshig byed brjod cing / /kye ma bde ba blang bar bya/ /'di ni gsang ba zhes bya ste/ /dbang bskur ba yi thabs mchog go/ rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid ches/ /rang gi khar ni rdo rje gzhag /sems dpa' chen po drangs

byas na/ /sems kyis byang chub bde ba 'thob/ /'di ni mchog tu gsang ba ste/ /dbang bskur ba yi bde ba'o/ /slob ma mi shes pa rnams la/ /'di dag thams cad bsgrag mi bya/ /rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ba/ /yang nas yang

du brtag par bya/ /'di yis dbang ni bskur ma thag /slob ma tshogs kyi bdag por 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/ /slob dpon nyid du bde bar 'gyur/ /gzung me rnams kyis dga' ba'i bdag /sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjer bshad

do/ /mkha' la 'gro ba'i khyor 'gyur te/ /ri dang 'gro ba kun gyi bdag /de nas shes rab ye shes dbang / /slob ma mchog la sbyin par bya/ /gzungs me de ni bdag nyid la/ /bla ma nyid kyis byin brlabs te/ /dngos grub 'bras bu myur 'thob

phyir/ /slob ma la ni sbyin par bya/ /dbang bskur shin tu sbas pa yis/ /rdo rje slob dpon tshul ji bzhin/ /blo ldan the tshom med pa'i phyir/ /rnam pa bzhi po 'di sbyin no/ /de tshun cad ni slob ma la/ /rgyud kun las ni gang chung zad/ /yi

ge'i tshul gyis sbas pa rnams/ /gsang ba mchog ni bsten par bya/ /de nas de nyid langs byas te/ /slob dpon rkang par gtugs byas nas/ /rgyal po dbang phyug bde dam pa/ /thams cad yon ni dbul bar bya/ /gzungs de dag ni thams cad la/ /

ci dga' bar ni yon yang 'bul/ /slob dpon cung zad gang 'dod pa/ /yid la bsams pa'i yon yang rung / /dam tshig 'das pas 'jigs pa yis/ /de dag thams cad dbul bar bya/ /slob dpon la ni yon gyi mchog /rigs kyi khyad par

dbul byas te/ /seng ge'i gdan la nyid kyi ma/ /sangs rgyas byin ni yon mchog yin/ /glang po rin chen gser dag dang / /sring mo bla ma'i yon mchog yin/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs yin te/ /yon de mchog gi yon yin

no/ /rin chen pad ma'i chung ma dang / /shing rta rta ni shin tu brgyan/ /sna tshogs rin chen rnam dag pa/ /mu tig phreng bas shin tu mdzes/ /bu mo rin chen dra ba yis/ /brgyan te sna tshogs rdo rje la'o/ /rgyal po yi ni dbang

phyug dang / /chung ma bla ma dbul bar bya/ /'phrul gyi bzhon pa rnam sna tshogs/ /glang po rta ni shin tu brgyan/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi rje/ /nan tan bla ma dbul bar bya/ /bla ma'i yon gyi phyag rgya 'di/ /rdo rje blo ldan

slob ma yis/ /ci ste bde byed kun 'dod na/ /dga' dang mos pa'i sems kyis bya/ /de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rab dgyes gdon mi za ba'i bde/ /gang gis myur du thob 'gyur te/ /slob dpon gtso mchog nyid du 'gyur/ /chos

rnams kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal/ /rdo rje blo ldan mchog tu 'gyur/ /rin chen kun gyi rigs kyi rgyal/ /de bzhin sna tshogs rigs kun tu/ /pad ma'i rigs kun dpal dang ldan/ /rdo rje rigs kun bdag por de/ /sangs rgyas kyi

ni rigs kun dang / /rgyal ba'i gtso bo mchog tu 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lo'i gar/ /nyid dang slob ma'i tshogs gyur pas/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /sems dpa' bdag nyid mchod par bya/ /phan tshun la sogs

tshul gyis ni/ /shes rab mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis/ /rdo rje che yis thabs gnas te/ /mkha' 'gro kun la mchod par 'gyur/ /phyi yi sbas pa gsang la sogs/ /nang gi mchod pa mchog gi rnams/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba tshul gnas

te/ /tshul bzhin rgyas btab dbul bar bya/ /lus dang ngag sems bde byed kyis/ /mchod pa'i bdag nyid mchod par bya/ /'dod pa'i rol pa myong ba yis/ /myang na mchod pa thob par 'gyur/ /mchod pa kun gyi cho ga yis/ /rang

rig khyad par shes byas te/ /sgrub pa thams cad bsgrub byas na/ /dngos grub thams cad myur du 'thob/ /dkyil 'khor 'khor lo 'di mthong bas/ /dga' mgu rangs pa'i yid kyi ni/ /rdo rje sems la phyag byed cing / /

rang gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba 'debs/ /bde byed chen po'i dkyil mo rgya/ /rigs kyi khyad par gyis ni lnga/ /lha rnams kyang ni re re yang / /sems kyi khyad par mchog mtha' yas/ /'das pa'i dus ni ma byung ba/ /mtha'

yas chos ni yangs pa bsten/ /'dod chags rnams kyis dkris pa yi/ /sdug bsngal gzir ba'i mtha' nas 'gro/ /'dod pa'i mchog gi longs spyod rnams/ /mos pa'i rjes su zhugs shing spyod/ /kun tu chags par mi 'gyur

zhing / /bde bas longs pa'i yid dang ldan/ /byang chub snying por bgrod pa ni/ /dam bcas rnams dang sems kyis so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po/ /rab tu bzhad

cing spyan zur gyis gzigs pa'i thugs kyis shin tu dgyes pa/ kun tu longs spyod pa'i skyil mo dkrung gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ /skyil mo dkrung chen po'i dpal zhes bya ba rang gi phyag rgya'i ye shes nyid kyi sku

dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni/ /rkang pa gnyis ka bteg byas te/ /bdag nyid brla ni mi snang bzhin/ /rtsa ba skyil mo bcing bar bya/ /sbyor ba gar mkhan tshul gyis ni/ /gar gyis

sbyor bas gar bya'o/ /rdo rje gdan gyi bde ba che/ /'di yis bdud las rgyal bar 'gyur/ /gdug pa dang ni dgra thams cad/ /skad cig gis kyang smos ci dgos/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i stan 'di yis/ /yang dag byang chub myur du 'thob/ /mi

phyed pa ni thig ler bcas/ /'og gi phyogs su yi ge drug /shes rab can gyis bskyod cing zlas/ /byung ba'i tshe ni phaT ces bshad/ /pad ma mi phyed 'dren pa dang / /thig ler bcas pa'i sbyor ba bya/ /mi phyed oM dang yang dag ldan/ /

tsheg drag bcas pa bde 'byung na'o/ /bud med la ni zhag bdun du/ /'di yis rtsen par byas pa ni/ /nam mkha' thams cad gang ba yi/ /sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po mthong / /rab dgyes longs spyod gnas pa yi/ /sems

dpa' che la slong mdzad de/ /gzungs kyi pad ma las byung ba/ /bde byed mchog gi dbang bskur ro/ /de nas rab dga' bde thob pa/ /sems dpa' de ni dngos grub bo/ /thog ma dang ni mtha' med par/ /'dod pa thams cad de longs spyod/ /

tshe dang dpal dang phun sum ldan/ /gdon dang dug dang tsha ba'i nad/ /mkha' 'gros nye bar gtses pa dang / /sdig can 'khor ba las grol te/ /sa rnams kun la rnam par rgyu/ /gzi brjid nyi ma shar dang 'dra/ /sna tshogs 'dra ba 'bar byed pas/ /

sna tshogs thams cad snang byed cing / /de yis sems can thams cad kyi/ /nad dang mya ngan 'jigs chen 'phrog /phyag rgya 'di yis sbyor ba yis/ /ye shes lnga ni bstan par bya/ /rtse ba'i skyil mo dkrung zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i las

kyi don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o/ /bdag gi rkang pa dbus su bsdu/ /de yis rkang pas bcings byas te/ /sems dpa'i skyil mo bzhin du 'brel/ /'di ni bcings pa tsams gyis kyang / /khams gsum sgrub par bzhed pa

yin/ /yi ge rnams ni snga ma bzhin/ /rang gi lhar ni sbyor brtson pas/ /sgoms sam yang na bskyod kyang rung / /sngags pa 'di yis dngos grub ste/ /sngags kyi sems 'dzin gtsang ma yi/ /zhag bdun sgom pa bsgom byas nas/ /yang dag dngos

grub nyid du 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste/ /sbyor ba shin tu bstan byas na/ /gdon mi za bar rgyal po 'thob/ /yid bzhin dgos pa thams cad byed/ /rdo rje'i skyil mo dkrung ngo / /gzungs ma gzung ste bcing ba na/ /rin po che ltar sbyar

byas te/ /rang gi rkang pa mi snang bya/ /rin chen kun gyi skyil mo dkrung / /'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi/ /dbul zhing 'phongs pa 'joms byed de/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog byed ma/ /gnod pa'i dug kun 'phrog par byed/ /gdug pa thams cad rmongs

byed do/ /dgra rnams thams cad 'joms par byed/ /khro bo thams cad 'dzum byed de/ /gdug pa rnams kyi rgyas 'debs na/ /mi g.yeng zla ba gcig gis ni/ /'di yis rgyal po dngos grub bo/ /yid bzhin las rnams thams cad

byed/ /ci ste bdag nyid rgyal po ru/ /mchog tu rmad 'byung bsgrub 'dod na/ /rin chen sems kyi rin chen mtshan/ /gsang ba'i phyag rgya tshul gnon pa/ /rgyal po khams gsum rgyal byed pa/ /zla phyed tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur/ /

rin po che yi skyil mo'o/ /de bzhin rkang pa gnyis bzhag pa/ /pad ma 'dra ba sbyar byas te/ /bdag gam de bzhin gzhan yang rung / /blo ldan pad ma bde bsgrub bya/ /'di yis sems can thams cad dang / /mdor na sangs rgyas

rnam dag dang / /rdo rje nyi ma ma lus kyang / /dbang du 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /bde ldan pho brang chen po yi/ /bde byed 'di yis thob par byed/ /sems can khams rnams thams cad du/ /sems dpa' chen po 'gro 'ong byed/ /pad ma'i

skyil mo'o/ /de bzhin skyil mo rgyas byas te/ /sna tshogs tshul gyis sbyor ba bya/ /sngags mkhan chen po'i sbyor ba yi/ /sngags mkhan yi ge shin tu brtson/ /zlos pa byed cing rnams sgoms na/ /dngos grub rtag pa thob par 'gyur/ /

mi g.yeng sngon gyi bdug pa yi/ /las rnams thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /sna tshogs dkyil du gnas pa yis/ /bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /sna tshogs kyi ni skyil mo'o/ /de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i skyil mo rgyas/ /thams cad

khrag ni 'phrog byas te/ /gzungs ma yi ni rkang pa gnyis/ /nyid kyis gnya' bar rkang pa bteg /rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i sbyor ba yi/ /bsnyen pas khrag rnams 'phrog par byed/ /mnyam par bzhag nas gzungs ma yi/ /rkang

pa gcig ni mgul nyid du/ /sbyor dang ldan pas gteg byas na/ /zas rnams thams cad 'phrog byed de/ /btung ba bza' ba bca' ba dang / /gos kyi rgyan gyis klubs pa yis/ /de bzhin zhag bdun nyid kyis kyang / /thams cad

las byed gdon mi za/ /tshangs pa rtogs 'dod dbang po yi/ /dpal chen mchog ni 'phrog par byed/ /lag pa bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis ni/ /khams gsum rim par brgal bar byed/ /mig ni btsums par byed 'gyur ba/ /'gro ba gsum

po rnam par 'jig /ru sbal bzhin du mnyam gzhag ste/ /mi g.yeng skad cig bcing byas na/ /gdug pa'i srog chags thams cad dang / /dgra dang spyod bcas mi spyod phrog /sbal pa bzhin du mnyam bzhag ste/ /dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bskor bar

bya'o/ /ma lus rnams kyang rmong byed de/ /khams gsum rnams kyang brgal bar byed/ /gtogs 'dod kyis ni mnyam gzhag ste/ /sa gsum rnams kyi rgyas gdab bya/ /gar dbang gis ni mnyam bzhag ste/ /sa gsum rnams ni

gar byed gzhug /dril bu yis ni mnyam bzhag ste/ /sa gsum rnams ni gdab par bya/ /gzhon nu'i skyil mo bcings pa yis/ /sangs rgyas bde chen 'thob par byed/ /skyil mo phyed ni mnyam gzhag nas/ /gnyis pa yis ni mnan byas

na/ /khams gsum thams cad gnon 'gyur zhing / /'dod byed thams cad dngos grub bo/ /dga' byed ma yi mnyam gzhag pas/ /skyil mo rab tu dga' thob ste/ /dga' byed ma yi yid 'ong ma/ /khams gsum thams cad dngos grub
bo/ /rig 'dzin rnam par gzhag byas te/ /khams gsum skad cig mnan par bya/ /khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /mdor bsdus gzungs ma'i bcings pa yi/ /'jig rten gsum ni rnam rgyal te/ /skad cig khams

gsum bdag por 'gyur/ /rtag par phan tshun 'brel ba yis/ /dpung pa gnyis ni bskum byas te/ /thams cad sgo ni 'gegs pa yis/ /mche ba sbom po rab tu sbyar/ /g.yas kyi brkyang bskum tshul gyis ni/ /gnon pa'i mnan pas

bsdigs byas te/ /mi phyed sbyor bas bskul bya ba/ /khros pa'i sems kyis myang bar bya/ /g.yon pa'i brkyang bskum sbyar bar bya/ /myur du gnon pas bteg bya zhing / /mthe'u chung bde ba'i lcags kyu yis/ /mdzum mo lce la reg byas te/ /

sa bon tsheg drag hri ldan pa'i/ /thig le'i spyi bor brgyan byas pas/ /bdud rtsi'am rig ma drang bar bya/ /lce yi thog mar spro byas te/ /'dren pa'i tshul gyis drang bar bya/ /rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam bzhag ste/ /kha yi phyogs

su mche ba yi/ /sbom po lce dang 'dra byas te/ /khros pa mche ba sbyor ba yis/ /sor mo thod pa bzhin byas na/ /khrag mang po ni btung bar bya/ /yi ge dang po o~M` dang ldan/ /spyi bor thig le ldan byas te/ /'og gi phyogs su ra yi gdags/ /

u 'dren nga ros brgyan par bya/ /'di ni khro bo'i snying po ste/ /mchog tu thams cad las byed pa'o/ /gsod pa dang ni 'dren pa kun/ /dbang dang dbang rnams byed la sogs/ /de la sogs pa'i las gzhan yang / /tshul bzhin sbyar bas byed par

'gyur/ /shi ba bzhin du mig btsum nas/ /rang gi lus ni bskum byas te/ /bum pa lnga mtha'i sbyor ba yis/ /dgra rnams thams cad bsad par bya/ /nga ro dang po yang dag ldan/ /bdag nyid ngo bo thams cad bya/ /sangs rgyas

chen po bsgom byas te/ /zhi ba'i 'od zer sprin phung spro/ /de yis lus ni zhi bar 'gyur/ /de yis sems can thams cad kyi/ /tsha ba gdon dang dug la sogs/ /sdug bsngal mkha' 'gro'i mche ba dang / /'jigs pa thams cad bral

bar byed/ /shes rab pha rol phyin mnyam gzhag /bdag nyid kyis ni tshul bzhin du/ /'di yis thams cad nang gi rnams/ /sdug bsngal dogs pa 'phrog par byed/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /nam mkha' sa steng las kyi rnams/ /

snying gar rdo rje sems dpa' gzhag /yid bzhin thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /myur du rdo rje slob dpon la/ /sngags kyi dngos grub don 'dod pas/ /gus la zhes sar bcas pa yis/ /shin tu lhag par phyogs par bya/ /nam yang rdo rje slob

dpon gyi/ /sems ni dkrug par mi bya ste/ /ci ste shes rab 'chal pas byed/ /myur du na rag ltung bar 'gyur/ /nad dang 'tshe ba dgra dag dang / /gdon dang tsha ba dug nyid kyis/ /slob dpon zhabs la dmod byed pa/ /gti mug chen por de 'chi'o/ /

bla ma las ni dngos grub thob/ /bla ma mtho ris bla ma bde/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /bla ma'i bka' las 'da' mi bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen

po dpal shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba gdon mi za ba'i rdo rje dam tshig gi dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang /

thugs rdo rje mchog gsang ba sbas pa chen po zla gsang thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i rdo rje rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor te bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i 'khor lo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor pha dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs dang / /rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs kyi g.yog

rnams mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ ca co 'byin cing dbyangs chen po brjod par gyur te/ kye ma'o rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa che/ /sna tshogs thabs ni bde byed che/ /sna tshogs ye dges bde ba che/ /kye ma kun tu

bzang po yi/ /dge ba'i ye shes bde ba che/ /gang bde phyir ni rig ma yi/ /pad mo las ni gnas pa mdzad/ /kye ma'o rig pa shin tu zab/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa bde/ /sems can kun la shes rab kyis/ /mun pa'i thibs po

sel bar mdzad/ /kye ma'o thams cad ngo mtshar che/ /mkha' 'gro'i dra bas gar mdzad cing / /rnam par mdzad dang myang ba dang / /mnye ba dang ni 'phrog pa'i mchog /e ma'o shin tu rab tu dgyes/ /skal ldan skal la sprod

pa dang / /sna tshogs skal ba bde byed che/ /sna tshogs rdo rje shin tu mdzes/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po shin tu dgyes pa chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i 'dod pa'i lha shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po la gnas pa la rnal

'byor ma thams cad dang / mchog gi pha rol phyin ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo thams cad rang gi gdan las bzhengs te/ shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po'i 'gying ba'i 'dud bcing pas phyag byas te/ shin tu

dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba 'thob par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag rgya chen po 'dis mnyes par byed do/ /sgyu ma'i bde bas nam mkha' kun tu gang ba yi/ /sprul pa'i rang bzhin skye ba mchog gi bde ston te/ /rjes su chags pa'i pad ma dga' bas

kun khyab cing / /chos kyi bde ba nyid kyang kun tu btang snyoms mdzad/ /e ma'o 'di lta'i gzungs ma bde mchog dpal dang rnam ldan ma/ /byams ma'i phyogs su mi gtong ye shes nyid kyis 'jug /'dod pa'i yon tan 'di rnams chos nyid

rnam par dag /dug gsum dbang du mdzod cing mos pa rnams mi skyod/ /ngo mtshar phyogs dang ma bral byang chub snying por bgrod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan rgyas pas 'khor de dag thams cad la

yud tsam yud tsam kun tu gzigs te/ rdo rje pad ma dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i dpal chen mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ cang mi gsung bar mnyam par bzhugs te/ dbugs mi rngub dbugs mi 'byin/
dbugs rab tu gtong bar mi mdzad/ kun tu mi gzigs/ kun tu rnam par mi gzigs/ bzheng par mi mdzad/ bzhugs par mi mdzad/ /gshegs par mi mdzad/ gsung bar yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rtog par yang

mi mdzad/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das shin tu bde ba chen pos nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du shin tu khyab par shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba las btsal te rgyas par mdzad pa na/ der de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad drangs bcug

bcing dbang du byas te/ 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan gyis mnyes par byas te bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du ba mdzad nas/ yang nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gzigs te/

bde ba chen po shin tu dgyes pa dang gnyis su med par longs spyod pa dpal chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bskul nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs khar zhugs te/ byang chub kyi sems chen po la

yang thim par gyur pa na/ khams gsum 'dir dam pa'i chos ston pa dang / 'jug par byed pa dang / bstan pa la gnas par byed pa 'ga' yang med/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun 'jug par byed pa yang med/

khros pa dang gtum po chen po dang / rngam pa dang / rab tu gdug pa chen por sems pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mun pas sgribs pa dang / gtum 'khrugs chen po dang / gzhan gyi srog phrog pa dang / gzhan gyi sem phrog pa dang /

bud med kyis 'chums pa dang / tshig rtsub mo la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pas gzhan la gtses pa dang / gcig gi sha gcig gis za ba dang / thabs med pa'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyis/ kye ma'o 'jig

rten gsum po 'di brlag go zhes sngon gyi smon lam las kyi stob la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gzigs so/ /thabs dang shes rab kyi thugs rje'i smon lam chen po nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu 'jug pa'i yang dag

par gnas pa 'di lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu brlag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba yang dag par zhugs pa kun tu bzang po chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'

la dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'dis bskul ba mdzad do/ /ho rang bzhin dag pa pad ma bde ba'i mchog mnga' ba/ /thugs kyi yid bzhin rin chen gzhan la dgongs nas bzhengs mdzad de/ /bskal pa'i mtha' nas bsgrubs pa'i byams pas gzugs
kyis brjid pa dang / /byang chub snying po'i chu las 'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin khrus/ /a la la la ho/ /pad ma'i 'byung gnas bder gshegs kun gyi skal ba mchog dang ldan/ /

sdug bsngal nad kun sel ba'i thugs rje'i 'jig rten gsum la gzigs/ / dga' ba'i rol pas gar dang bcas te bzhengs shing dbang du mdzod/ /a la la la ho/ /sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis ma bsgrags gsang ba yi/ /

'gro ba kun gyi yid dang 'thad pa'i gsang chen 'di phyung ste/ /rnam dag spyod yul gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs nam mkha' la/ /dngos med rol mo'i gzhan las 'phags pa bzhengs shing mdzad du gsol/ /a la la la ho/ /skad cig ma yi spyod

yul 'dis/ /mun pa thams cad sel ba'i phyir/ /gzhan la thugs rjes dgongs nas su/ /lha rnams byin gyis brlabs tu gsol/ /dbyangs kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /dgyes mchog dam pa bskul byas na/ /pad ma dra ba rdo rje dang / /
bde bar sbyor bar bzhengs su gsol/ /bde ba chen po bde gnas pa/ /gtso la 'di yis bskul ba yis/ /sems can kun don bzhengs 'gyur te/ /rgyal ba thams cad gdon par mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba

chen po kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje 'dzin yang dag pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba chen pos brgyan pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bzhengs nas phyogs bcu mtha' yas rab 'byam mthas klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun

gzigs nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ /kye ma'o khams gsum 'di stongs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnams dang bral bas gdug pa thams cad kyis 'di dag nye bar gtses/ gnod sbyin dang srin po thams

cad dang / nad dang 'tshe ba dang / gdon chen po dang / nyon mongs pa dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par zos shes dgongs pa na bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gtong ba'i rdo rje ye shes kyi bde

ba chen po dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes bde ba chen po'i rang gi rdo rje dang pad ma las byang chub kyi sems nye bar bsdu bar bya ste/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje

las phyung ngo / /thog mar yo ni thig ler bsam byas pa'i/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bcas pa 'brug gi sgra 'byin pa/ /mi 'phyed 'dren pa yang dag gnyis dang ldan pa ste/ /'di ni ston pa'i mchog ste rdo rje'i rigs nyid do/ /phyung nas nam mkha'i dbyings

thams cad du gang ba'i spros ba'i/ /snang bar byas te/ slar yang mdus nas rdo rje lta bur gnas so/ /yang spro ba dang bsdu bar byas nas slar 'dus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje sems dpa' lta bur gyur nas

shar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhugs par gyur pa na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M zhes bzhad pa chen por bzhad cing a zhes brjod nas bzhugs te/ rang gi sems dpa'i skyil mo'i g.yon du yid tsam 'gying bas 'dud pa/ g.yas kyi rdo rje gsor zhing 'dzum pa dang

bcas shing spyan rgyas pa/ /che ba'i chen po dbu lnga pa/ /phyag ni bcu drug rnam dang ldan/ /sna tshogs sku ni mchog 'dzin pa/ /dpa' bo thams cad las byed pa/ /kha dog rnam lnga gzi brjid che/ /mtshon cha rnams pa sna tshogs 'dzin/ /rdo rje rgyu mar

rab tu gnas/ /mkhas pa gang gis snying ga nyid/ /mnyam par bzhag ste 'dzin byas na/ /rdo rje pad ma bde chen yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde myur 'thob/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' 'gro ma kun longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la

snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las mchog tu gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zla gsang thig le las/ nam mkha' shin tu dgyes pa 'thob par byed pa'i bde ba chen po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying

po 'di phyung ngo // //\u0f00 yi gtsug tu thig le ste/ /mi phyed thig ler bcas pa yi/ /'og tu gzi brjid yang dag bcas/ /mthar ni dral te tsheg drag bcas/ /'di ni rin chen thams cad kyi/ /snying po mchog tu rmad 'byung ba'o/ /phyung ba yis ni nam

mkha' dang / /sangs rgyas kyi ni zhing kun dang / /'od zer sprin phung rgyas byas te/ /slar yang de nyid bzhugs par 'gyur/ /de yi thugs kar zhugs nas kyang / /brda yi tshul gyis bzhugs par 'gyur/ /rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur nas/ /
sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul pa ni/ /kha dog rnam lnga yangs pa'i spyan/ /chu skyes bzhad pa 'dzum dang bcas/ /nyi ma'i gzi brjid mdzes pa che/ /phyag rgya la sogs sna tshogs brgyan/ /skyil mo

'gying ba g.yon du mdud/ /g.yas kyi snying gar rin chen 'dzin/ /brgyad gnyis phyag rgya ngo bo yis/ /dri ma gsum spang brgyan pa ste/ /rang gi dkyil 'khor gang byas nas/ /sna tshogs lho ru gnas par 'gyur/ /
rnam pa kun mkhyen mngon rigs pa'i/ /nad kyis glong pa 'jig par 'gyur/ /'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /gzi brjid chen mo mdangs che ba/ /dbul dang nad dang gdon chen po/ /

sems can kun gyi 'phrogs par byed/ /nyi ma 'char pa'i dus nyid dang / /nyi ma phyed pa'i dus nyid du/ /nyid kyi snying gar 'di byas te/ /nor bu rin chen bsgom byas na/ /zhag bdun gyis ni nges par yang / /dngos grub nor

mang sbyin mdzad de/ /dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis/ /kye ma'o bde bas dbang skur bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po mchog tu bde ba chen po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa'i 'dod pa'i dbang

gi dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad ma chen po kun tu gzigs pa'i longs spyod pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i snying po chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le las

'di phyung ngo / /dang por oM dang ldan byas te/ /mi phyed rab btags 'dren par bcas/ /tsheg drag pa ni sngags yin te/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskor/ /sngags mkhan gang gis mnyam bzhag ste/ /snying gar 'di ni sbyar

byas nas/ /bdag ni 'dod chags zhen sems shing / /pad ma sbyar bas bsgoms par bya/ /mtshams kyi mtha' ma dus dag tu/ /dam tshig 'di ni spyad byas na/ /zla ba phyed kyi nang logs su/ /dbang phyug mo ni dngos grub

'thob/ /pad ma che las byung nas kyang / /thams cad du ni rgyas 'gyur te/ /'di nyid du ni slar zhugs nas/ /pad ma'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur/ /kun tu snang bas khyab byas na/ /sems dpa'i tshul gyis sprul

pa ni/ /de nas 'dod chags babs nas kyang / /pad ma'i dbus su zhugs par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor du ni gang ba yis/ /rgyab nas rjes su mnyes mdzad cing / /'dzum bcas pad ma phye ba yis/ /thugs kyi dbus su yid tsam 'dud/ /

dpal dang ldan pa zhal lnga 'dzin/ /phyag ni nyi shur bzhis ma gtam/ /mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs 'dzin/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis klubs pa yis/ /zla ba bzhin du rnam grol ba/ /brjid pa'i gar ni mdzad cing bzhugs/ /

'di yis pad ma'i gnas nyid du/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /dpal ldan gar dbang 'thob 'gyur te/ /'dod chags kun gyis thabs gnas pas/ /'jam pa'i phyag ni stong rnams kyi/ /gar du mdzad cing 'gro ba 'dul/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen po kun tu bzang pos yang sna tshogs chen po kun tu longs spyod pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs

rdo rje'i ye shes mchog tu gsang ba zla gsang thig le chen po las phyung ngo / /sna tshogs chen po o chen po/ /steng du thig ler yang dag ldan/ /'di ni dbus te lta 'og khro/ /sngags kyi mchog ni gzhag par bya/ /sna tshogs
'di ni thugs gar grags/ /sna tshogs phyung nas kun gnang bas/ /sangs rgyas tshul bzhin kun mnyes byas/ /de nyid slar 'khor rab bzhugs te/ /sna tshogs rdo rje gzugs mchog gnas/ /skad cig sems dpa' sku

gnas pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs bzhad pas brgyan/ /'gying bcas thugs kar sna tshogs 'dzin/ /sna tshogs gzi brjid 'bar ba gtong / /phyag ni brgyad gnyis gnyis kyis phyogs/ /sa 'byed sna tshogs mtshon cha gtong / /zhal lnga sna tshogs
yangs che ba/ /bgegs spong thams cad dngos grub mdzad/ /dkyil 'khor gang bar gzhag nas byang du gnas/ /sna tshogs rdo rje bdag mor rdo rje yang dag gis/ /thugs kar mdzad nas bde bar yang dag gnas/ /

sngags mkhan zhag bdun du ni bsgom byas na/ /sna tshogs gyur te sna tshogs de la bab/ /sna tshogs las ni sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbyangs

chen po len cing dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus kyi bcom ldan 'das la mnyes pa mdzad do/ /gtso bo byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ /ye shes lnga yi ngo bo dag /rgyal ba nyid kyis bshad par mdzod/ /sangs rgyas sku la bstod phyag
'tshal/ /sngags rig phyag rgya yan lag bcas/ /lha yi de nyid pha rol phyin/ /bdag ni de nyid sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal/ /gzungs kyi pad ma yang dag ldan/ /'dod byed thugs

kyi mchog yin te/ /shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i ye shes bstod phyag 'tshal/ /chos kyis don ni gnyis med tshul/ /stong pa nyid kyi lam rig pa/ /yangs pa'i spyan ni so sor gzigs/ /me long ye shes
yang dag 'byung / /bya ba nan tan sems can don/ /rang gi yon tan mi mnyam shod/ /de nyid rig pa'i sems can kun/ /rdo rje gsum gyis byin brlabs pa/ /gang gis byin gyis brlabs ma thag /sangs rgyas

gsum ni dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje ye shes zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis

brlabs pa'i 'bru 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM b+h+rU~M/ stong pa chen po'i snying po yi/ /oM badzra tsit+ta hU~M/ oM badzra kA ya hU~M/ oM badzra bAka AH/ oM badzra a b+hi shiny+tsa trA~M/
oM badzra sa ma ya hU~MH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shin tu mgu/ rab tu dgyes pa'i yid kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyang rang rang gi snying po bcom ldan 'das la 'bul lo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la dge'o zhes bde ba chen po'i tshul gyis rab tu spro bar mdzad do/ /dge'o

dge'o rgyal ba kun/ /dge'o dge'o rgyal ba mchog /dge'o dge'o legs pa'i las/ /dge'o dge'o sngon 'gro ba/ /dge'o dge'o sna tshogs che/ /nyid kyi snying gar drangs byas te/ /rang gi gsang ba bshad par mdzod/ /

gang gis ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rnams/ /bde ba'i yid ni chud par 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje chen po de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /

oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das me long gi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba

ta thA ga ta A daR+Sha dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa so sor kun tu gzigs pas ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sa

sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA pra t+ya pra bek+Sha dz+nyA Tan badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /

oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa man+ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa Am t+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas rang gi snying po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /

oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kr-id t+ye a nuSh+ThA na dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko\u0f85ha~M/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos yang dge ba'i tshul sbyin par mdzad de/ /oM dge'o dge'o stong pa che/ /
oM dge'o dge'o thugs chen po/ /oM dge'o dge'o sku chen po/ /oM dge'o dge'o gsung chen po/ /oM dge'o dge'o rin po che'o/ /oM dge'o dge'o sna tshogs che/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la rang gi dkyil 'khor bshad par gsol ba 'debs te/ dkyil 'khor sangs rgyas rdo rje yi/ /dga' byed bcom ldan nyid kyis shod/ /gang gis sems can

bde nyid kyis/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu 'thob par 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi ba/ /rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsang ba gsungs/ /gang gis dkyil 'khor myur bris nas/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyan du 'gyur/ /
dkyil 'khor bde ba'i gzhi nyid ni/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor brgyan pa'i bdag nyid de/ /gsang ba bcom ldan nyid kyis gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor mnyam pa'i ye shes ni/ /

dkyil 'khor snying po zhes bgyi ba/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni ci rigs par/ /gtso bo chen po nyid kyis shod/ /dkyil 'khor mi mnyam ye shes ni/ /dkyil 'khor gsang ba pad ma ste/ /dkyil 'khor rab dgyes 'thob byed pa'i/ /

tshad med dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /gzugs dang lang tshos brgyan pa yi/ /bu mo mig yangs gzungs bya ste/ /shes rab can gyis byin brlabs 'brus/ /
mnyam par bzhag ste byin brlabs nas/ /shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i bdag /de bzhin gshegs kyi btsun mo gzhag /gnyis po mdun du gzhag byas pa/ /brtson 'grus pha rol phyin pa'i gnas/ /rdo rje
sems dpa'i btsun mo ste/ /thugs ni dgyes par byed pa yin/ /gsum pa lho ru bsam bya ba/ /dge ba sbyin pa'i bdag nyid gzhag /rin chen 'byung ldan btsun mo che/ /dbang
bskur yon tan 'thob byed pa'o/ /bzhi pa tshul khrims chen mo ste/ /de nyid chos don yang dag gnas/ /rdo rje chos kyi btsun mo ste/ /de sbyin dga' byed ma yin no/ /bzod
pa chen mo byang du ste/ /gsod pa'i bdag nyid zad pa sbyin/ /btsun mo rdo rje gdon mi za/ /dam tshig gnas ni skyong byed ma'i/ /grwa dag tu ni thams cad du/ /snga ma
bzhin du mchod la sogs/ /sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/ /sgo bsrung rnams ni rnam pa bzhi/ /ci 'dod par ni mchod bya ste/ /slob ma mchog ni gzhug par bya/ /phyag
rgyas lag pa brgyan byas te/ /mdzum dang bcas pa'i 'dod chags mig /rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par klubs/ /spro ba che bas gar bya zhing / /lha yi 'gying ba'i 'dun pa yis/ /dga'
byed dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya/ /mig ni dar gyi gos nyid kyis/ /g.yogs te lag pas gzung nas kyang / /sgo yi grwar yang gzhag bya ste/ /smon lam mchog ni smra ru gzhug /rdo rje
chen mo bdag ces bgyi/ /rang gi lha rnams phyag bgyi ste/ /rang dgyes gnas las byung ba yi/ /bde byed chen mos mnyes par bgyi/ /ji lta bzhin du mnyam nyid 'thob/ /
me tog phreng ba dor byas te/ /lha mo chen mo bzhengs su gsol/ /khyod kyi dkyil 'khor bdag 'tshal lo/ /lha mo gang la lhung ba yi/ /de yi lag nas bskor ba bya/ /lha mo 'di ni khyod dang mthun/ /

sems che khyod kyis 'dod par gyis/ /de nas slob ma de yis ni/ /bdag gi rab dgyes smra bya zhing / /de la 'dod pa spyad par mdzod/ /khro bo rnams kyi mi phyed phaT/ /mtha' ni haHzhes sbyar bar bya/ /'byung ba'i dus su bya ba ni/ /a ho su kha bde zhes smra/ /

de nas rdo rje phyung ba yi/ /mkhas pas de ni blang byas te/ /bde ba chen po dngos grub rdzas/ /bla ma la ni dang por dbul/ /de nas de nyid kun la yang / /ci bde bar ni dbul bar bya/ /spyi bo zhabs la
gtugs byas te/ /bla ma la ni dbang bslang bya/ /shin tu sbas pa 'phags pa'i dbang / /bcom ldan bdag la stsal bar mdzod/ /de nas sbyor ba chen po yi/ /snyoms par zhugs te de'i bde ba/ /

slob dpon rdo rje phyung byas te/ /spyi bor rab tu gzhag par bya/ /lag pa yis ni ma reg par/ /kha la rab tu sbyin par bya/ /khyad par du ni drang byas te/ /ci bde bar ni btung bar bya/ /gzungs ma de dag

thams cad la/ /rdo rje yis ni sbyin par bya/ /de nas slob ma mchog nyid kyis/ /bla ma la ni yon dbul ba/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /chung ma dang ni rang gi bu/ /bdag nyid dang ni rgyal srid dang / /

de bzhin longs spyod dbang phyug dang / /rdzas dang nor dang gter rnams dang / /glang po rta dang shing rta dag /bla ma la ni yon mchog ste/ /dga' ba'i yid 'gyur dbul bar bya/ /phyi yi sbas pa gsang ba dang / /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / /rdo rje dang ni gzungs ma rnams/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub dri bar bya/ /snying po yang dag shes gyur nas/ /dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyi/ /gsang ba yis ni dkyil 'khor 'di/ /ci ste rmongs pas smra byas na/ /slob dpon gyi ni dam tshig nyams/ /myur du zla phyed tshun chad du/ /bstan pas rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/ /dang por dam tshig gzhag

byas te/ /phyi nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya/ /gzhan du byas na dpa' bo'i rnams/ /dmyal bar bskal par grangs med smin/ /de bas blo ldan rdo rje yis/ /nan tan dam tshig bsgrags mi bya/ /sngags kyi dngos

grub don 'dod pas/ /dam tshig bsrung la brtson par bya/ /gzhan du byas na sngags mkhan gyi/ /sngags la sogs pa'i don mi 'grub/ /lha rnams kyang ni dam tshig gi/ /gsol yang bzhes su mi gnang ste/ /'jig rten 'di ru

sdug bsngal che/ /'jig rten pha rol dmyal ba'i rnams/ /dam tshig spyod pa 'das pas so/ /rmongs pa'i bdag nyid des 'thob bo/ /slob ma de yang de bzhin du/ /blo zhan sdug bsngal 'thob gyur te/ /des na sngags kyi don mi smin/ /

lha rnams kyi ni mchog tu bde/ /dam tshig med pa slob ma la/ /nams kyang sbyin par mi 'gyur ro/ /de bas dam tshig gtso yin te/ /thog mar dam tshig sbyin par bya/ /sngags rnams dang ni phyag rgya yang / /de bzhin thabs

dang shes rab rnams/ /dam tshig de rnams thams cad kyang / /sngags pas gsang ba sbyor ba yis/ /dmyal ba ngan song zlog pa'i phyir/ /bu dang slob ma sbyin par bya/ /sngags kyi dngos grub bsod nams byed/ /

gtsang sbra dogs pa med pa 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis dam/ /dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin bri byas te/ /gzhon nu'i tshad ni bcu drug lon/ /dam tshig slob ma'i dkyil 'khor du/ /gzhag nas cho ga 'dis

gzhug bya/ /dam tshig rnams ni 'di yin te/ /sbrang rtsi sha dang dri chen po/ /nyi ma zla ba'i blo chen dang / /rdo rje las byung chu bsgrubs rnams/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs tshul bzhin gzhag /dam tshig yi ge gzhag pa yis/ /
myur du dam tshig bsgrub byas na/ /dga' byed dam tshig dngos grub ste/ /dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur/ /dam tshig 'di ni sna tshogs te/ /'dzin pa yis ni mthu ru 'gyur/ /ma 'ongs sangs
rgyas chen po dang / /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po che/ /blo ldan dbang bskur blangs pa yis/ /dbang bskur phun sum tshogs pa kun/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis 'thob 'gyur te/ /dbang bskur ba yi yid du 'gyur/ /
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig rdo rje ye shes chen po zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor te lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog
tu dgyes pa chen po yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so/ /gdug pa thams cad rnams 'dul ba/ /'jigs par byed pa chen po 'di/ /rdo rje khro bo chen po yi/ /dkyil 'khor chen
po rnam bshad phyir/ /'jigs byed chen po rnams 'dul ba/ /dkyil 'khor rdo rje thams cad kyi/ /khro bo dam tshig ded dpon gyis/ /gsang ba chen po nyid kyis shod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen

po dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren pa'i khro bo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje ye shes las 'di phyung

ngo / /oM badzra ma hA tsaN+Ta sar+b+ba du ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ 'di phyung ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad khro bo chen po'i mthus rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ kun tu g.yos

lha dang / klu dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad 'khrug pa chen por gyur to/ /de nas 'jigs pa chen pos nyen pas

de dag brgya byin gyi thad du lhags nas brgya byin bdag nyid kyang bskyabs med par mthong nas tshangs pa'i thad du phyin/ tshangs pa yang gtogs 'dod kyi gan du phyin/ gtogs 'dod kyang dbang phyug chen po'i thad du phyin te/
de nas dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid kyi mthu 'jigs byed chen po'i gzugs su byas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis kun tu snang bar byas te/ lha rnams la ma 'jigs
shig /klu rnams la ma 'jigs shig /gnod sbyin rnams la ma 'jigs shig /lha ma yin rnams ma 'jigs shig /dri za rnams la ma 'jigs shig /lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rnams ma 'jigs
shig /nga'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyad par 'di lta bu gzhan 'gas kyang rab tu brdzi nus sam/ khyed rnams ci dgar spyod pas gnos shig ces dbugs phyung ngo / /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i khro gnyer chen po zhes bya ba/ khro bo chen po'i snying po nyid kyi

sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje ye shes las phyung ngo / /oM badzra b+h+ri ku Ti/ ma hA kro d+ha ha na ha na/ gr-ih+na gr-ih+na/ mA ra mA ra/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa hU~M/ b+h+r-i b+h+r-i/ b+h+ra b+h+ra ya/ b+h+r-i kuT+Ta sar+b+ba mA rA na sar+b+ba du ma Ta ma Ta/

mo Ta mo Ta/ hU~M b+h+r-i/ hU~M trA~M/ tra Ta tra Ta/ b+h+r-i hU~M hr-i hU~M tra~M tra Ta/ 'di brjod ma thag tu de dag snga ma bzhin du skrag nas dbang phyug chen po'i thad du nye bar lhags so/ /de nas dbang phyug snga ma bzhin du bdag gi che ba nye bar ston cing

gtogs 'dod la smras pa/ khyed kyang mthu chen po'i chen po ste gdug pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi bdag po yin na/ rang gi mthu rgya chen po'i rdzu 'phrul nye bar ston pas gdug pa de rnams dbugs dbyung bar mdzod cig /de nas gtogs 'dod de ma

thag tu rang gi mthu 'jigs byed kyi gzugs 'khor lo'i nag po chen por bsgyur nas rdo rje'i skad drag po chen po'i brgad pa'i gdangs 'byin pas 'jig rten thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas par gyur to/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang khro bo chen po'i pad ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu pad ma'i dra ba 'char ba'i khro bo thams cad slar ldog ste/

bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar zhugs so/ /zhugs nas khro bo chen po'i snying por bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM pad+ma dz+wA la ma hA

kro d+ha ba da ba mu kha kha kha/ sar+b+ba duSh+Tan/ khA hi khA hI/ sar+b+ba du/ pra duSh+Ta na~M/ da ma da ma/ badzra da~M Sh+Tod ka Ta ma hA ma Ta ma Ta/ k+Sho Ta k+Sho Ta/ badzra kha ra/ tsa pa la dur ga be ga /tra sa tra sa/ ma hA badzra ba Da ba mu kha/

pra ma tha pra ma tha hU~M phaT/ hrI ha ha hi hi/ tsa turmu kha/ be sha prA Na sha na/ hU~M hriM hU~M hU~M d+hA~M`Hha/ de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu tshangs ris chen po 'dar yer yer zhing khas bub tu 'gyel te/ brdab 'chos so/ /

de nas tshangs pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur te/ dbang phyug chen po la dris pa/ lha 'di ni shin tu ngo mtshar du snang ngo / /de nas dbang phyug chen pos tshangs pa la bskul ba/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi gtso bo/

lha'i tshogs thams cad kyi bdag po/ khyod ni 'jig rten gsum na gtong ba dang byed pa'o/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa de'i phyir khyod kyis gdug pa'i sems can dang / gdug pa'i lus can thams cad brlag par gyis

shig /de nas tshangs pas rang nyid kyi mthu dang / tshangs pa chen po'i srin po'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ 'jigs byed chen po lta bur gdong bzhi pa/ me lce stong gi gzi brjid can gyi lus 'gul ba dang bcas pas brgad

pa chen po 'byin pas lha'i tshogs kyi gdug pa thams cad la nye bar ston cing gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang lha thams cad rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba khro bo chen po'i ting nge 'dzin

la yang dag par snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje chen po'i 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i khro bo chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i ye shes kyi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / /oM badzra b+hai ra ba/ ma hA kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba

du Sh+TAn/ sa~M b+hak+Sha ya hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ badzra yak+Sha ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ de nas 'di phyung ma thag tu brgya byin gyi khang pa 'di thams cad dum bu brgyar rnam par bshig ste/ ri rab kyi rtse mo yang 'gul zhing kun tu 'khor nas

gnas par gyur/ brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa yang khas bub tsam du 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur to/ /de nas langs te dbang phyug chen po la bltas pa dang / /dbang phyug chen pos kyang bskul ba/ khyod ni lha'i tshogs

thams cad kyi bdag po ste/ mthu che ba yin la sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyang khyod la mnyes par byed pa yin na de ltar bdag nyid kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu nye bar ston cig /de nas lha'i rgyal po

chen po brgya byin de rang nyid kyi mthu gnod sbyin dang / srin po chen po'i gzugs nye bar ston cing gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad la gdug pa dag ma 'jigs shig /nga'i rdzu 'phrul 'di lta bu dag mthong na sus kyang
zil gyis gnon mi nus so zhes dbugs 'byin par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po yang sngags kyi lha thams cad 'dren pa'i/ /rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs ste lha de dag thams cad nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i/ /ye shes las 'jug par mdzad de/ bcug nas kyang khro bo chen po thams cad phyag rgya chen por mngon par bsgyur

nas bdag nyid kyang khro bo thams cad 'byin pa'i khro bo chen po'i gzugs su dmigs te mche ba chen po 'byin pa/ zhal mi sdug pa/ spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gi gzi brjid can rab tu mi bzad par byed pa'i me rlung gis bdas

pas mdog sngon po'i sku/ dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyi phyag rgya mi'i keng rus dang / khrag dang sha dang / klad pa dang / rkang dang tshil rnams zas su gsol pa/ mi'i lpags pas snom logs rgyab la g.yogs te bsdams pa/ mi'i mgo

bo'i phreng ba dbu la 'dzin pa/ seng ge dang / glang po che dang / bong bu dang / rnga mo dang / ma he dang / phag dang / lce spyang dang / ra dang / khyi dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang / bzhad dang / byi la dang / gzig dang / stag la sogs pa'i khro bo byol

song gi gdong brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bu ga nas phyung ste/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar phyogs na 'jigs byed chen po 'dul ba rnam par bsnyed ba'i 'jigs pa lta bu'i spyan dang / zhal rdo rje'i mche ba chen po gtsigs

pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgya stong gi g.yog dang / shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so/ /lho'i dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rje khro gnyer can khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang / 'khyil bar

gyur te gnas so/ /nub kyi dkyil 'khor du yang pad ma chen po rta gdong khro bo brgya stong mang po'i g.yog dang / nub kyi dkyil 'khor du 'khyil par gyur te gnas so/ /byang gi dkyil 'khor du yang rdo rje 'ur 'ur chen po'i khro bo brgya

stong mang po'i g.yog dang 'khyil par 'gyur te gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po yang khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos bskor nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs te/ khro bo

chen po'i tshogs de dag dang shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos kun tu spyod cing khro bo chen po'i rnam pa brgya stong mang po'i ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa snyed phyung nas/ nam mkha'i dbyings rab 'byam thams cad du

gang bar byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad kyang gang bar byas so/ /de nas gdug pa'i tshogs thams cad kyis de dag mthong nas 'jigs dngangs skyabs ma mthong nas/ rang rang gi

bdag po'i thad du song ste/ rje cig rje cig nyid kyis bdag la skyobs shig /de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha'i bdag po de dag bdag nyid kyi mthu sprul nas kha cig du ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig ces pa nas/

g.yog dang bcas pa kha sbubs su 'gyel te brgyal bar gyur dang bcas pa 'og nas 'byung bar 'dod mod slar yang bslang ste 'jig rten gsum po yongs su bskor du bcug nas 'jigs byed gdung pa nga la skyabs su song zhes bsgo yang skyabs su

'gro ba mi len cing / slar yang rang gi rgyud kyi nga rgyal bskyed de/ 'jigs byed chen po brgyad pa zhes bya ba phyung nas ri rab kyi bdag nyid chen po nye bar ston cing / brgod pa chen po'i nga ro 'byin par gyur to/ /oM ma hA b+hai ra ba

be Sh+TiM Sh+TiM/ T+ra T+ra T+ra ta T+ra ta/ ha ha i i/ 'on kyang ba spu'i bu ga'i rtse'u chung tshad tsam yang ma 'gul to/ /de nas yang 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bor mnan nas bsnun te

he ru kas bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin cing rgyu ma'i sbub gu drangs nas khrag dang rus pa dang rkang rnams za zhing chem chem mdzad pas/ de'i 'khor la rab tu ston par mdzad de/ u ma dang ga~M gA
yang rnam par bcom mo/ /ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te dma' phab nas/ khro bo bdag nyid kyi/ /mthu nye bar spel cing 'khor thams cad kyang btul/ skyabs len du yang bcug /
dam tshig la yang gnas par byas te yang dag par zhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i/ /khro bo chen po drag po bzhed pas bzhad

cing rdo rje'i khro gnyer khro bo chen po'i zhal nas ma 'jigs shig /ma 'jigs shig ces dbugs 'byin par byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen pos khro bo'i tshogs kun la bka'

stsal pa/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ ma hA tsaN+Da badzra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se nA pa tA ye/ tat+ya thA/ oM bo ta bo ta/ ma hA b+hai ra ba da ra ba pa hA ri ha ra ha ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ mA ra mA ra/ bany+dza bany+dza/ shI g+h+ra~M ma hA badzra/ tsan+ta sar+b+ba duSh+TAn/ ta ka ha na ha na/

da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha hU~M phaT/ 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jigs byed chen po'i 'dul bar byed pas rang gi sku nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad du bskyed do/ /khro bo brgya stong mang po rnam par bsnyer ba'i zhal mche ba gtsigs

te/ 'khyil zhing bsgyur ba/ phyag brgya stong mang po la mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa zhal sna tshogs mang po brgya stong me lce bzhin du rab tu 'bar ba'i sku brgya stong rnams 'jigs byed chen po ga na ba der song ste/ rdo rje drag po'i gad mo

cher 'byin pas bzhad cing mdun na gnas so/ /oM ma hA badzra he ru ka badzra aT+Ta hA sa hA sa ra ha ha ha ha hU~M ha i ti/ de nas dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje drag pos bzhad pa chen po thos nas g.yog dang bcas par khas bub tu 'gyel

te brgyal bar gyur nas/ mgo la zhabs kyis bsnun te gtong bar mdzad do/ /oM badzra b+h+r-i ku Ti/ ha na ha na/ grih+Na grih+Na hU~M/ ma ta ma ta kiny+tsi rA ya si/ s+'ur+ya sa ha sra ha sti/ re ka ba su rA dza la la rtsi pra dz+wA li ta/ ma hA m+'urti A kaD+D+h+ya

A kaD+D+h+ya a bya wa ma bya wa ma/ kri Na pa tsakra b+hai ra ba hr-i da ya~M hU~M b+h+r-i/ de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po'i khro bo chen pos bzhad pas bzhad cing 'gro ba thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas 'khor lo can gyi

mdun du ston to/ /de nas 'khor lo can gyi 'khor 'jigs pa chen pos nyen te/ khas sbub du 'gyel te rab tu brgyal zhing rje cig bdag cag la skyobs shig ces smra zhing / skyabs med par bdag nyid kyis mthong nas

'khor lo can la skyabs su song ngo / /de nas biSh+Nus kyang bdag nyid kyi mthu mang po rab tu nye bar ston cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i mdun du gnas te rgyab la zhugs so/ /kwa ye kwa ye gdug pa nye ba'i khro gnyer gyis

snying dral te ji srid ma 'thungs kyi bar du de srid rang gi gnas su song shig /de nas rdo rje khro gnyer chen po de rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ de drangs te bsdams nas snying dral te/ de'i khrag la nyi ma khro gnyer chen po

gnod sbyin chen po'i gdon gyi bdag nyid yang dag par tshim par mdzad do/ /oM badzra s+'ur+ya b+h+r-i ku Ti kro d+ha ma hA gra ha ta ra pa ta ra pa/ s+ya su d+he/ ra mA~M sa me da mad+dze na/ oM b+h+ra b+h+ra b+h+r-i b+h+ru~M b+h+ra/ de nas 'khor lo can de sems rab tu
brlag par gyur te gnas so/ /de'i chung ma rug mi ni dang / ma hA shri dang / la yang g.yog dang bcas par rnam par bcom ste/ sna tshogs rnams rnam par btul nas bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis

rta gdong chen po khro bo chen po'i rgyab tu gcig bsnun nas gtong bar mdzad do/ /oM badzra ba Da ba mu kha kha kha khA hi khA hi/ tsa tu rmu khA/ pi ba pi ba/ as+yaM ru te ra ma/ A kaD+D+h+ya/ A kaD+D+h+ya/ hr-i da ya~M trAn/ da ma he/ badzra

ba Da ba mu kha/ hi hi Sha ma hA shwa shwe shwe ra hI hI/ de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po rta skad chen po mdzad cing tshangs pa'i mdun du gnas par gyur to/ /de nas tshangs pa tshangs pa'i srin po bdag nyid kyis nam mkha' bkang nas brgyu

bar byed de/ de nas tshangs pa chen po'i 'khor khas sbub tu 'gyel nas/ rje cig skyobs shig /rje cig skyobs shig ces smras so/ /kwa ye kwa ye gdug pa'i gdong myur du song song / khyod kyi rgyab tu zhon te ma btul

re zhes smras so/ /de nas rdo rje rta gdong chen po rab tu 'khrugs gtum por gyur nas/ tshangs pa chen po de'i mgor brdzis te/ snying drangs nas khrag btung ba la zhugs te/ sha dang glad pa dang / tshil bu dang / rus pa rnams

myangs nas phyogs bcur gtor to/ /de'i chung ma shi ri ma dang / swa ra swa sti dang / shAn ti rnams kyang rnam par bcom/ de'i tshogs rnams kyang btul nas/ dam tshig gi sdom pa la gnas par byas te bzhugs so/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas gzigs te gtong bar mdzad do/ /oM gu lu gu lu badzra ma hA kro d+ha/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya sha kra hr-i da ya~M/ ma hA badzra

da~MSh+T+rA ya/ hU~M b+hak+Sha ya b+hak+Sha ya hU~M/ de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po'i sku chen pos nam mkha'i ngos kun bkang ste/ brgya byin gyi mdun du bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas brgya byin 'gying ba chen pos 'gyings te/ mi bzad par

khros pas gnod sbyin chen po khyod su'i bran yin zhes de la smras so/ /de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin chen po khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te/ snying nas gtsug gi nor bu phyung snying yang dral te/ de'i sha dang / khrag dang / glad pa dang / tshil bu dang /

rus pa dang / bza' ba rnams bza' bar zhugs so/ /de nas de'i 'khor rnams 'jigs shing dngangs pa'i yid du gyur te/ skyabs su nye bar gyur to/ /de'i lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyang bcom nas de'i gnas na gnas par gyur to/ /

de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen po rdo rje'i rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / rol cing shin tu dgyes pa'i kun tu longs spyod pa'i khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po na bzhugs so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'du bar mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das la bskul bar mdzad do/ /oM ma hA su ra ta badzra ma hA kro d+ha sa~M ha ro pa sa~M ha ra/ sar+b+ba kro d+ha ma/ sha ma sha ma/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/ sar+b+ba kro d+ha/ ut+ti ma kro d+ha/

swa sa ma ya ma hA maN+Da le/ s+thA pa ya s+thA pa ya/ sar+b+ba kro d+ha ma duSh+Ta pra duSh+Ta bi ba ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya sha kra brah+ma biSh+Nur ma he shwa ra ma ho b+ha ga wAn/ su ra Ta/ sau khya kro d+ha/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sat+t+ya na sa ma yeny+tsa ho/ su ra ta sa ma ya i te/ de nas

bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po khro bo chen pos khro bo thams cad 'dren pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ Tak+ki hU~M dzaH

Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ hU~M Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ hU~M Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ A kaR+Sha ya/ A kaR+Sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya/ ba sha~M ku ru/ sar+b+ba kro d+ha/ sa ma ya~M/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH/ Tak+ki hUM dzaH/ hU~M Tak+ki hU~M/ de nas khro bo chen po'i dam tshig de dag thams cad 'ongs nas/ rang gi dkyil

'khor chen po'i 'khor lor 'khyil bar gyur te/ kye bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bka' stsal du gsol zhes smra zhing gnas par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo'i rdo rje dam tshig ces bya

ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khro bo thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo chen po phyung ngo / /oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ma hA kro d+ha sha hU~M phaT/ de nas de dag la khyod kyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gdug pa'i sems can chen po
rnams gsos shig ces bka' stsal to/ /de dag gis bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rab tu gdug pa'i rnams gsos zhes gsol nas/ de nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu

dgyes pas khro bos phyag bsnol te btsir nas rdo rje bdud rtsi khro bo'i dbang mo chen mo phyung ngo / /oM badzra a mr-i ta/ ma hA kro d+he shwa ri/ uta shrI dza uta shrI dza/ badzra a mri ta hU~M AH/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud
rtsi chen mo de dag kun tu khros te smyin ma bsgyur ba'i gzigs pa'i zhal bzhad pa/ ru lu ru lu/ zhes pa'i sgra 'byin cing rang gi pad ma la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug nas bdud rtsi yang dag par

bsgrub pa'i rig pa 'di phyung ngo / /oM a mr-i ta sany+dzi ba ni ma hA mr-i ta mu she/ pra be sha ya pra be sha ya/ sar+b+bAn badzra pad+ma sang+yo ge / ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta pi Tha pi Tha/ mUR+te A/ de nas dbang phyug
chen mo la sogs pa gdug pa de dag thams cad snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid kyi lus sos par gyur te/ sems dran pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo thams cad mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur to/ /

bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo la skyabs su dong nas/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du khro bo'i 'khor lo rnams gnas par gyur to/ /de nas de dag rab tu mgu ba'i yid kyis/ bcom ldan 'das
la bstod par byed de/ khyod ni sems can kun gyi yab/ /phan byed de bzhin yum yin te/ /gtso bo 'dus pas bdag cag rnams/ /'jigs pa che las skyob pa ste/ /rje bo sdug bsngal thams cad sel/ /khyod ni

'gro ba'i dbang po rje/ /khams gsum 'di ni byed dang gtong / /che ba che khyod skye bo skyong / /thog ma med khyod nga ro thigs/ /nga ro'i steng ni cha yang med/ /gtso bo yig med bdud mi yi/ /rab dgyes bde byed
gtong ba yi/ /'gro ba kun la phan bya'i phyir/ /de ni sangs rgyas thams cad rnams/ /rab dgyes 'gro la bde ba'i phyir/ /mgon po khyod kyis gtong bar mdzod/ /sems can 'dam gyis mi gos shing / /bla na
med pa byang chub lam/ /sna tshogs sdug bsngal zhi mdzad pa/ /sems can skom pa ngoms mdzad cing / /'khor ba rba klong grol mdzad de/ /myur du bdag la dgongs pa mdzad/ /dngos po kun gyis thams
cad du/ /rgyal ba kun gyis mi dpogs te/ /zhi ba'i rnam pas zhir gyur pa/ /rdul dang bral bas 'dzums pa spangs/ /nam mkha' sgom las rnam 'das pa/ /rnam rtog dri mas ma gos te/ /sgyu ma

kun las yang dag 'das/ /'dod pa kun la rgyab phyogs pa/ /gtso bo khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/ /dregs pa med pa 'jigs byed la/ /byang chub mchog ni thob kyi bar/ /bdag cag skyabs su rab tu mchi/ /ji srid

'tsho ba mchis pa dang / /dmyal ba rtsub mo'i 'jig rten du/ /ltung bar gyur pa ji srid pa/ /khyod kyi dam tshig bskyang bar bgyi/ /byang chub mchog tu bdag cag kyang / /dri med skal bar gyur pa yi/ /gtso bo bdag cag dbang bskur ba/ /

bde ba chen pos stsal du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi gsol ba'i tshig nye bar gsan nas mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba'i gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ zhugs ma thag tu

bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba dang yid bde ba bsgrub pa'i thabs mang po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ste/ bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'phrul chen pos lha'i 'khor thams cad dbang bskur te/ de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs

pa'i lha chen po de dag bde ba chen po'i spro ba'i cho 'phrul gyis dbang bskur bas yid bde bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang dang yang du gtugs nas bskor ba byas te/ ji lta ba bzhin du kun tu yongs su bskor nas

gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pas yang rdo rje gzungs ma shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen mo'i dam tshig dang sbyor ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/

cang mi gsung bar zhugs nas/ de ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i khro mo dbang mo chen mo zhes bya ba nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA badzra kro d+he shwa ri sar+b+ba duSh+TA ni

mu drA Ni/ ma hA pra la yA na lash+ma shA na b+hI Sha Ne/ badzra ma hA kro d+ha daM ka rA lo gra ta ba ta ne/ sar+b+ba sha trU~M/ pra sha ma ni/ hU~M hU~M ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hU~M phaT phaT/ 'dis ji lta ba bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas/
dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du gzhag ste/ dpung pa bcu drug la phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal gsum pa mdog in dra nI la'i 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba/ rdo rje dang / thod pa'i 'khar ba dang / thod

pa dang / mdung dang sta re dang / zhags pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / be con dang / mu su ru dang / 'khor lo dang / ka na ya dang / to ma ya dang / gzhu dang / mda' dang / shag ti dang / gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng

bas dbu rgyan byas pa/ nyi ma brgya dang me'i 'od 'dra ba'o/ /de'i mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung chen mo de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rig pa 'dis gzhag par bya'o/ /oM ma hA badzra d+ha ra ma hA

kro d+he shwa ri ma hA sh+ma shA na b+hI Sha ni nI la dz+wA la sa ha sra pra dz+wa li ta mUrti d+ha re ka pA la mA lA b+hU Shi ta ma gu te/ na ra dU tir ra tra/ pa ri pu ri/ ta ka pA la/ a ste kha T+wA~M ga /badzra tri shU la g+han+d+ha ma hA kro d+he na/ hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M/

he he run+ta mun+ta pri ye hU~M phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa khro bo chen po'i gzi brjid chen po'i mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nyi ma

khro mo'i dbang mo chen mo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM hU~M trA~M ma hA s+'ur+ya badzra kro d+he shwa ri bi da ma/ ma tha ma tha/ grA sa grA sa/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta/ pra du Sh+TAn/ hU~M phaT oM hU~M tra~M tra~M/ tra tra tra/ khro mo chen

mo 'dis lho phyogs kyi rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor du gzhag par bya ste/ gzi brjid chen por rab gtong zhing / /shin tu 'jigs pa me bzhin 'bar/ /dpung pa bcu drug rno ba ste/ /dpung rgyan thod
pas brtsegs par bya/ /spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog /mtshon cha'i tshogs ni bsnams par brtson/ /gdug pa thams cad 'cha' byed cing / /yid dgas chen po'i stan la zhon/ /rang gi g.yog gis mdun

du bskor/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das pad ma 'byung nas bkod pa'i 'od kyi phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad ma'i dra ba khro mo'i dbang mo chen mo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las

phyung ngo / /oM hrIHbadzra pad+ma ma hA ban+d+ha mu khe/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma hA ma ho/ d+ha ra bi ko pe hU~M he hU~M hU~M ha ha/ hU~M hU~M hrIH hi sha hi sha / ma hA badzra ba da ba mu la mi ho t+yo t+ye/ hU~M hU~M/ hi hi hU~M hrIHhUM/ dkyil 'khor nang gi dbus nyid du/ /'di ni rgyab

tu gzhag par bya/ /rno ba chen po zhal gsum pa/ /rta gdong gyen du ston pa ste/ /khro mo chen mo dpung bcu drug /rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi sdug gdong / /mi ro'i rta la yang dag zhon/ /khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa/ /mtshon cha sna tshogs

'dzin pa ste/ /khros pa'i dbu rgyan thod pas brtsegs/ /'od zer rnon po gtong byed cing / /g.yog bcas dkyil 'khor brgyan te gnas/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das yang gdon mi za ba'i ye shes khro mo gnyis su med par 'du

ba'i thabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ gdon mi za ba'i drag po dang ldan ma chen mo zhes bya ba'i khros pa'i dbang mo chen mo 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba a mo g+ha ma

hA bi shwe shwa ri hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ha~M ha~M ha~M/ ma hA kro d+he gra mu khe/ ma hA bi shwe ba da ri Ni/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta/ pra sha ma ni hU~M hU~M phaT/ /'di nyid kyis ni ci rigs par/ /rdo rje gdon mi za ba yi/ /dkyil 'khor g.yog bcas rnam pa bzhi/ /sna
