tshogs dam tshig gzhag byas te/ /sna tshogs gzugs dang khyad par ldan/ /kun tu yongs su bskor nas gnas/ /bsnyer ba dang ni btsums pa'i gdong / /rab tu drag la ro myong zhing / /gdong bsnyer thod pa'i rtse mor byas/ /dpung

pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i/ /khro mo chen mo gdong gsum pa/ /za byed mi bzhin lta ba yi/ /de yi ngo bo thams cad kyi/ /g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis/ /bskor bar shes rab can gyis gzhag /rang gi phyag

rgya mtshan mar ldan/ /dpung pa brgyad dang ldan pa yi/ /de nas cho ga ji bzhin du/ /'byung mo'i phyag rgya yang dag zhon/ /dur khrod bzhin du 'jigs byed pa/ /phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams/ /de dag kun tu yongs su

bskor/ /gzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung / /de ni de lta'i stan la gnas/ /bzhin mi sdug pa dpung bzhi mo/ /gdug pa'i khro mo rnam bsgyur bcas/ /de la sogs pa'i rim par ldan/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/

de nas rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ yang dang yang rang rang gis mngon par gar byas pas mngon par mchod nas gsol ba 'debs so/ /rnal 'byor ma yi sngags tshogs dang / /

phyag rgya ma ni ci rigs par/ /gsang ba'i gar ni bde chen mo/ /bcom ldan de nyid nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor ma thams cad rnam par spro ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi sngags dang phyag rgya dang sbas pa dang / de kho na nyid dang / gsang ba rnams nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra s+t+wa A nu rA ga Ni ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hU~M hU~M/

dzA dzA hU~M hU~M/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ku la a nu rA gi Ni ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hU~M he he hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ro gra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hU~M swa swa hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA te dza a b+hi She ke hU~M ta~M hU~M/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA s+'ur+ya b+h+ri ku Te ka ro ke tra ta Ta

ta hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA ke tu kro d+he shwa ri/ ma hA bi dza yot+t+ra ye hU~M hU~M tra~M tra~M phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra kro d+ha aN+t+ra A si hU~M hU~M triM triM tro Ta ya tro Ta ya hri da ya hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha b+ha k+Shi Ni/ hU~M hU~M

b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hU~M hrIH/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA tIk+Sh+Na kro d+he shwa ri tshin+da tshin+da/ hU~M hU~M badzra tIk+Sh+Na ha ste ts+tshe da ya hU~M hU~M ma Ta ma Ta/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra tsakra d+ha ri Ni mA ho gra du pi ni hU~M hU~M/ pa ta ya pa ta ya/ ma hA badzra tsakre Na/ tsur+Na ya tsur+Na ya/

hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA shwa ga pra b+ha ni hU~M hU~M ma ta ma ta phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA bi shwa mu khi hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra pA Ni hU~M hU~M ha~M ha~M phaT phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra yak+Shi Ni hU~M hU~M kha kha khA hi khA hi

A bi b+ha A bi b+ha hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA badzra b+ha ni d+ha ni ma hA ke d+he/ b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ma hA badzra pA sh+ya pra be sha ni hU~M` hU~M`/ bi ta ya bi ta ya hU~M phaT/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ha la da ni ma hA kro d+he

shwa ri hU~M hU~M/ sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha mA li ni hU~M` hU~M` g+h+'u~M` g+hu~M`/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he gan+d+ha ba hi hU~M ga gri/ oM sarba badzra d+ha rI ma hA kro d+he shwa ri ma hA lo ka d+ha ri Ni/ dI pa ya~M` dI pa ya~M` hU~M hU~M/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri ma hA lA s+ya hU~M/

oM sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he mA le d+ha ri Ni hU~M/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA gI te ni hU~M he he/ oM sar+b+ba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha nI rti ke hU~M hU~M/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha A kaR+Sha ya dza dza hU~M hU~M dza/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha hU~M ba~M/

oM sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he ma hA badzra ba shi na hU~M hU~M/ oM sarba badzra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he sh+ya sh+ye hU~M ho/ oM hU~M trA~M hrIHAH/ de nas rnal 'byor ma de dag mgu rangs dga' bar gyur te/ yang dbyangs 'dis gsol ba 'debs so/ /bde ba mchog gi

rgya chen dgongs su gsol/ /bsam gyis mi khyab bde mchog dbyings dang ldan/ /mi g.yo gsung dang bral ba'i dbyangs snyan pas/ /gzungs la rol pa'i bde ba bzhes su gsol/ /ngo mtshar chen po cho 'phrul snang

mdzad cing / /snying po byang chub bgrod pa rnams kyi lam ston te/ /rgyud rnams yang dag gang la'ang mi rten par/ /bde ba mchog gi gzungs kyis grol bar mdzod/ /ra mu ma hA su hU dzo hi ni dzo la su h+'u pU mU/ ma hA su

dzo i ni/ dz+wa la su hU ba b+h+rU~M` dzU ma hA su h+'u/ i ni dz+wa la su h+'u u dzi/ u ma hA su h+'u dzo/ dza i ni dz+wa su hU~M a la la la ho/ ma hA su hu ra ma ra ma ma hA su hU/ a la la la ho/ ma hA su tre Na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje

nam mkha' la 'gro ma chen mo dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta ma hA

badzra d+ha ra hU~M phaT/ oM badzra kro d+ha gi ni hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA he ma ba ti hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ku mA ra pri ye hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI tr-i sh+ye mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra muSh+Ti ta na/

b+hI ta ya b+hI ta ya/ sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha ni hU~M` phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra kro d+ha ya d+ha ra la li hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA kro d+ha tsakre ni/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA a mr-i tod pa ta ki hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI

ma hA sau mA kro d+ha~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra tan+ti hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA mA ra Ni hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA a mr-i te ka pA la hA se hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA sau mya kro d+he shwa ri hU~M phaT/ oM badzra

DA ki nI ma hA a mr-i te pu dan+d+ha da ri hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI badzra ping+ga li hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI pi ba pi ba ru d+hi ra~M/ ma hA badzra ba li hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra sha ni b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra sha ni

hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra pA she hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA a nA ya a nA ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra be b+hi ni gu gu mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra dz+wa la ya b+ha smi ku ru hU~M phaT/ oM badzra

DA ki nI ma hA badzra pi ga ta hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra da~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA badzra ki li pra bi sha pra bi sha hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA puSh+Ti mA~M sA sha ni hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA ka ra ra badzra

ra ni hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI A kaR+ShA Ni ma hA piM ga rA li mu ku hU~M dz+dzaHdz+dzaHhUM phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI bi sha ne hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA ban+d+ha hU~M hU~M ba~M ba~M hU~M/ oM badzra DA ki nI ma hA to Sha Ni

sa ma ye hU~M hU~M A A/ oM badzra ma hA rak+Sha sa mA~M` sa ru d+hi ra me da pri ya/ ma hA kum+b+ha kar+Na hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M k+ShaH/ oM badzra ma hA rAk+Sha sa A kaD+D+h+ya pra be sha ya/ sar+b+ba badzra kA la shi na ban+d+he hU~M hU~M hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ oM badzra rAk+Sha sa ban+d+ha ya

ban+d+ha ya/ bi Sha ya bi bi Sha na/ sar+b+bA na hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra ma sA rak+Sha sa/ b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ sar+b+ba ma hA bi kr-i tA na na/ ha ya grI ba hU~M` phaT/ de nas rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen mo de dag thams cad rab tu

mgu nas/ yid dga' bar gyur te/ dbyangs chen mo 'di 'byin par gyur to/ /kye ma rdo rje sems dpa' yi/ /rdo rje sbyor ba rab bstan pas/ /mkha' la 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid/ /ci bde bas ni sgrub par byed/ /de nas bcom

ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos yang rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma de dag kun mgu dga' bar bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /oM DA ki nI A kaR+Sha ya pra be sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya to Sha ya

sar+b+bA na badzra DA ki nI hr-i da ya~M hU~M dz+dza/ dzaHhU~M ba~M hoH Tak+ki hU~M dzaH/ oM he ru ka ma hA badzra/ A kaD+D+ha ya/ A kaD+D+ha ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya b+han+d+ha ya/ to Sha ya to Sha ya/ hU~M hU~M phaT/ oM badzra pad+ma ma hA pa Da ba mu kha/

A ka D+D+ha ya A ka d+d+h+ya ya/ pra be sha ya/ b+han+d+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ to Sha ya/ ha ha hi/ khro bo'i sngags kyi tshogs 'dis rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang / mkha' la 'gro ma dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed ma de dag la sogs

pa de dag dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba la sogs pa'i las bya ste/ gtor mas mchod pa la sogs pa'i dam tshig he ru ka'i phyag rgya dang / ta ki rgyal po'i phyag rgya dang / rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya sbyin te/ las thams cad la sbyor

ro/ /rdo rje'i thal mo ji lta ba bzhin bcings te/ khro bo gnyis lcags kyu ltar bya/ sbom po gnyis phan tshun rtse sbyar zhing / zhi ba gnyis kyang rab tu bsgreng / lhag ma gnyis brkyang ste 'od zer ltar gtang ba 'di ni phyag

rgya'i mchog yin no/ /phyag rgya 'di ni gzi brjid che/ /lha dang lha min phyag byas pa/ /sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin la sogs/ /bsngags shing mchod pa byas pa yin/ /bcings pa de nyid 'bebs pa dang / /thams cad
tshogs ni 'dzud par byed/ /gdug pa thams cad gsod byed ma/ /srin mo thams cad za bar byed/ /rnal 'byor dam pa gnas pa yis/ /'di yis las rnams thams byed/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub

pa po/ /mi ldan dngos grub mi 'gyur te/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /bsnyen pas dngos grub myur du 'thob/ /rdo rje bcings pa gnyis su byas te/ rgyab gnyis rgyab sbyar te/ mthe'u chung gnyis brkyang ste/

phan tshun bsnol khros pa gnyis gyen du sgreng ste snying gar bstan nas/ brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas pa 'di las thams cad byed pa'o/ /'di yis thams cad las kyi rnams/ /ji tsam yid 'dod byed par 'gyur/ /tshe 'dir

sdig pa gang byas pa/ /'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /de dag thams cad myur 'gyur te/ /dngos grub yid bzhin rin chen no/ /ji snyed nam mkha'i lam dag tu/ /rnal 'byor 'di yis 'phur bar byed/ /rig 'dzin

mchog ni mtshon par yang / /cho ga grub pa slar yang 'ong / /thal mo mnyam par sbyar te/ sbom po gnyis dbus sbyar/ lhag ma 'dab ma kha bye ba ltar byas pa ni pad ma'i gdan no/ /sbom po gnyis rtse mo mthur du bstan pa

ni rta gdong gi'o/ /gang gis sbyor byas skad cig tu/ /de yis dngos grub chen por 'gyur/ /bcings ma thag tu 'phur 'gyur ba/ /'dod pa bzhin du nye bar 'gro/ /sa 'og dngos grub 'dod pa bzhin/ /myur du slar yang

ldog par 'gyur/ /de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa/ /phyag rgya 'di ni sbyor ba dge/ /nga ni bstan te rgyal ba'i rnams/ /rnal 'byor pa yis drang bar bya/ /rnal 'byor ma rnams thams cad kyang / /phyag rgya'i yan lag

mchog des sbyar/ /de nas nam mkha' la 'gro ba chen mo de dag sogs 'dod pas gzir ba'i rnams rangs te/ rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur ba yis/ /bzhengs te gar ni rab mdzad cing / /dur khrod kyi ni sa chen du/ /mgu ba chen pos

brtags par byed/ /phyag na thod pa gri dag dang / /rdo rje kha T+wA~M rnam par 'dzin/ /skal ldan rang gi phyag rgyas mtshan/ /dbu smug rnam par bsnyer ba'i zhal/ /bde ba'i cha lugs sbyar ba yis/ /bde ba dam pa longs spyod myong / /

rab tu rmongs pas bsnyen byed cing / /rab dgyes khro la gsol ba 'debs/ /zla ba dri med stong rab rdzogs pa'i spyan/ /thugs rje'i dbyings rum nyid du bdag cag bskyed/ /'gro ba'i sdug bsngal tsha bas gdungs pa yi/ /byang

chub des ni kun tu tshim par mdzod/ /a la la la ho/ /mchog gi rol pas yang dag sgo 'byed cing / /byang chub mchog lam snying po nyid 'di ston/ /gsang ba'i bdag nyid bde bas zil gnon te/ /rmongs shing bying ba'i rnams

la thugs rjes sgrol/ /a la la la ho/ /che ba'i ye shes lhun gyis mngar ldan pa/ /phyogs kyi thugs rjes ma zin snyoms par dgongs/ /bde ba mchog gis gsang ba'i gnas nyid du/ /mya ngan 'da' ba'ang longs spyod

bstan pas 'grub/ /'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni dngos bstan kyang / /rmugs pa'i 'gro bas bdud rtsi'i dngos ma mthong / /kye ma'o ma skyes chos te snying po las byung ba/ /bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i mtha' dang

mnyam/ /rab tu dgyes pa'i bde mchog 'bar ba'i gtso/ /rin chen sna tshogs kun 'dus 'di la gzigs/ /sngon med rol mo 'di la rol mdzad cing / /dur khrod chen po'i dngos grub stsal bar mdzod/ /'dul ba'i dbang

gi gub pa'i cha lugs mi zad ma/ /rnal 'byor mkha' 'gros gzi brjid 'bar ba 'dis/ /sdug bsngal gsum pos 'thoms shing rmongs pa la/ /bde ba'i spyod pas gnas nas spyod mdzad de/ /thugs rjes pad ma'i dbyings

las bskyed par mdzod/ /a la la la ho/ /ji ltar pad ma 'di la chags med bzhin/ /sdug pa'i bcings pas ma zin rnam grol te/ /rol pas chub pa'i sa la gnas shing rnam mdzad pa/ /'jig rten gsum po 'di gzigs

rol mo mdzod/ / bdag cag dam tshig 'di la 'dus shing snang ba'i rnams/ /mnyes mdzod shin tu bde ba bzhengs su gsol/ /'gal ba'i yid dang ma chags rdo rje la/ /nam mkha' ji bzhin mi 'gyur tshul bzhin gnas/ /

khams kyi rang bzhin banabs shing rnam khro yang / /byams pa'i thugs rjes kun du gnas khyab mdzad/ /e ma'o bde bas bde sbyin phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang bzhin grub pa'i bde ba dngos grub gsol/ /chags med chags

dang ldan pa'i longs spyod kyis/ /dam tshig skyon med bdag cag rol pa mdzod/ /thugs rje gsal ba'i byang chub sems chen des/ /'gro ba kun gyi bag chags rnam par sbyongs/ /rgyu dang rkyen la ma rten rang bzhin grub/ /
ma chags dri med yongs gsal zla ba bzhin/ /'jig rten gsum po 'dir ni mnga' mdzad de/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kun du bde bas rtsen/ /'di yis gtso la bskul byas na/ /dkyil 'khor nyid du dngos

grub bo/ /yid gdung mnyen pa'i nga ro yis/ /dpyid kyi rgyal po glu blangs te/ /mkha' 'gro dra ba'i dri med pa'i/ /dgongs pa thams cad bstan byas te/ /rdo rje pad ma yid 'ong ba'i/ /dngos grub thams cad sbyar bar bya/ /

bde byed chen po 'di yis ni/ /bskul bas dgyes pa sbyin par byed/ /rdo rje can gyi yi ger ldan/ /dus gsum rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi shin tu dgyes pa'i

longs spyod dpal gyi bde ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de dag thams cad la rjes su mgu bar mdzad do/ /g.yon gyi lag pas gzung byas te/ /gsang skyes pad ma phye ba las/ /rdo rje chen po g.yas nyid

kyis/ /bcug na mchod pa 'thob 'gyur te/ /mkha' la 'gro ba dra ba 'dis/ /mnyes pas 'di nas dngos grub 'thob/ /oM dang oM dang mi phyed rdo rje bde/ /mtha' ru phaT kyis stobs rab sbyor ba yis/ /kye ma'o bde ba

mkha' 'gro dra ba che/ /rab dgyes dbang mo bde byed bde stabs mdzod/ /bde ma'i skyil mo bcing bar bya/ /'di yis brtsen par byas na ni/ /bud med mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /bde ba chen pos gar byed cing / /rab dgyes

bde byed gnod byed dang / /kun tu 'khyud dang sprod byed dang / / rnal 'byor ma tshogs gsal rnams la/ /'di yis brtsen pa rnam byas na/ /bde chen bde ba dgyes pa yi/ /rab dgyes dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor ma'i che ba

rjes su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ye shes so// //mgo la thal mo phyed sbyin te/ /chu skyes la ni yongs su rdzogs/ /rdo rje bcing ba yang dag ldan/ /sna tshogs gar gyis gar byas te/ /thams cad

zas dang ros dngos 'grub/ /mchog gi bde bas dngos grub 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i phyag rgya bcing byas te/ /sangs rgyas sbyor ba bde chen po/ /myur ba'i thal mos bsgrub par bya/ /gsum gyis mtshams su rab bya zhing / /

mkhur tsos so yis btab byas te/ /ma mchu yang nas yang du gzung / /'o ma 'dzin pa phyir zhing mnye/ /g.ya' byed pad ma rnam bzhi bya/ /pad mo phyi phyir rab mnye zhing / /ze ba mtshan pas rab tu sbyar/ /
sen mos mchan khung sum mdo dang / /rna ba gnyis su rab tu gzugs/ /dal nas rdo rje gzhug bya zhing / /khro bo'i rgyal pos bskyod par bya/ /g.yas kyis shin du bskyod byas nas/ /g.yon pa yis ni gtang

bar bya/ /sbyor ba 'di yis brtsen pa yis/ /mkha' 'gro'i 'khor lo mchod par bya/ /kye ma'o bde zhes rab brjod de/ /bde ba chen po dbyangs kyis bskul/ /yang dang yang du 'dzin pa na/ /blo ldan sgrub pas bsgrub

par bya/ /rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i spro ba ye shes so/ /de dag thams cad mgu nas ni/ /rdo rje 'dzin la gsol ba 'debs/ /nye ba'i zas ni thams cad dang / /de bzhin nye ba'i yo byad rnams/ /
bde ba bsgrubs pas sgrub pa po/ /sna tshogs chen po bsgo bar gsol/ /bsgrub pa thams cad sgrub byed pas/ /gdon mi za dka' rtag bgyid pas/ /gang gis myur du mnyam sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor

rab tu rnam bsgyur bgyi/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nye ba'i yo byad kha zas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa/ yo byad phyi yi thams cad dang / /gos dang rgyan la sogs pa'o/ /nye ba'i kha zas rnams la ni/ /sha dang

khrag las yang dag bsgrub/ /'bras bu rtsa ba tshad med do/ /mchog tu bde ba yid tshim pa/ /'di yis mchod pa byas pa na/ /mkha' 'gro ma ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /bus pa'i sha las rab bsgrub pa'i/ /'o ma dam

pas thod pa dgang / /mkha' 'gro ma kun dbul byas na/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni dngos grub 'gyur/ /gtor ma'i mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ye shes so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin thams

cad bzhengs te phyag 'tshal nas yang gcig tu stug por 'du ba mdzad de bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba 'debs so/ /rnal 'byor kun gyi ye shes mtshan/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi/ /thams cad brda rnams dran gyur

pa/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin du dgyes pa chen po'i ro myong ba dang 'brel ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /

mkha' la 'gro ma thams cad kyi brda'i phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ /ka ni 'dod pa byed 'dod phyir/ /bdag ni 'dod can smras yin te/ /gti mug ldongs pas ma byin na/ /myur du dam tshig de nyams so/ /dam tshig dam tshig

can mthong na/ /lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te/ /des kyang g.yon pa brkyang ba yis/ /rang gi nu ma rab bsdams na/ /mgo bos g.yon du 'dud byas nas/ /phyag byed bde ba dris pa yin/ /lag pa g.yon pa dkur brten na/ /

de yis phyag ni byas par 'gyur/ /g.yon pa mgo ru gzhag pa yi/ /g.yon du 'dud pas phyag lan no/ /g.yon gyi smin ma bskyod pa yis/ /myur du phyag ni byas par 'gyur/ /sbyor ba shin du brtson pa yis/ /g.yas kyi

smin mas phyag lan bya/ /g.yas kyi lag pas snying ga ru/ /sbyor dang ldan pas mnye byas na/ /'di ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog /de yi mtshan mar shes par bya/ /g.yon gyi khro mo bsgreng ba yi/ /nam zhig de ltar bstan

byas na/ /lus che de ni khros gyur zhes/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rtags zhes bya/ /g.yon du 'gying ba bsgyings pa yi/ /lag pa snying gar brkyang bya ste/ /dbang mo gyen du rnam bstan na/ /de tshe mdza' bar rab tu brtag /chung ngu rtse

mor byas pa yi/ /nam zhig bskyod pa mthong ba na/ /de tshe rig ma rnal 'byor dbang / /rdo rje pad mo brtsen par 'dod/ /sbom po nam zhig mthong 'gyur na/ /de la ston mo sbyin par bya/ /gang tshe shin du mthor ston na/ /mngon

pa'i nga rgyal rab tu brtag /khro mo lcags kyu 'dra byas te/ /gang tshe sngags mkhan gyis bstan na/ /de tshe nges par 'os byas te/ /gzhan du na ni dmyal bar ltung / /de nyid rnam par bzlog pa ltar/ /sngags mkhan gyis ni ma bstan na/ /

de tshe myur du 'gro byas te/ /gzhan du byas na dam tshig nyams/ /gzhan rnams kyi ni phyag rgya yis/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rnams bskul na/ /las kyi sbyor ba shes pa yis/ /las de dag ni brtsam par bya/ /brda yi phyag rgya'i

ye shes so/ /'dren pa med pa'i yi ge kun/ /rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu brtag /rtag tu tsheg drag rnams bral ba/ /'dren tshul rnal 'byor ma yi'o/ /oM ni thig ler bcas pa'i brda/ /sbyor ba sngags 'dzin rnal 'byor

brtag /de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog /sbyor ba'i dkyil du brtag par bya/ /rdo rje pad ma mnyam par sbyor bas rjes su mnyes par byed pa dpal dam tshig ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /de nas bcom ldan

'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po yang kun tu rgyas 'debs pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba rnal 'byor ma

chen mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag ste/ /sbom po skyil mo bcing bar bya/ /khro mo gnyis ni sbyar bya ste/ /lhag ma 'od bzhin gtang bar bya/ /

snying gar phyag rgya 'di bzhag nas/ /thams cad las ni rab sbyar te/ /sna tshogs mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du/ /gdon mi za ba'i dngos grub byed/ /thal mo de gnyis mnyam sbyar te/ /mchog dang rdo rje mnyam du sbyar/ /chung

ngu gnyis kyang gdong sprad de/ /snying gar de bzhin sbom po sbyar/ /'di yis rdo rje thams cad rnams/ /dam tshig 'jigs byed rab mdzad cing / /sems can thams cad phan mdzad ma/ /de ni dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur/ /de

nyid las ni rdo rje dang / /mchog nyid bsgreng ba'i tshul byas te/ /rdo rje thal mo gnas pa yis/ /drang ba'i tshul gyis drangs byas na/ /mi g.yeng de nas dngos grub bo/ /gnod byed yang dag ldan pa 'dis/ /rgyal ba mchog kyang 'dren

'gyur na/ /lha dang mi yi bu mo dag /lha min la sogs smos ci dgos/ /ji ltar yid la 'dod pa bzhin/ /'di nyid kyis ni dngos grub ste/ /sngags kyi bzlas pa mnyam sbyor bas/ /mchog tu myur du 'dren par 'gyur/ /thal

mo de nyid las byung khro/ /rtse mo yid tsam bkug byas te/ /lhag ma 'od zer rtse mo bzhin/ /des ni myos byed thob pa yin/ /'di ni bcings ma thag tu yang / /bde bar gshegs kyang dbang bsgyur na/ /yid las skyes pa 'dod

chags can/ /gti mug chos gnas smos ci dgos/ /ci dgar 'dod chags sbyor ba yis/ /de yis las rnams byed 'gyur te/ /yang dag sbyor ba thams cad 'grub/ /sbyor dang mi ldan dngos grub med/ /snying gar 'di nyid kyis

byas te/ /mgu ba'i sbyor ba bde chen pos/ /rgyal ba mchog ni mnyes par 'gyur/ /mchog gi bcing ba 'di kun dang / /'di yis las rnams thams cad dang / /yid la bsam pa byed pa 'thob/ /phan tshun du ni mgu byed cing / /

mgu bas dngos grub myur du 'thob/ /rdo rje thal mo mnyam sbyar te/ /rdo rje bkug nas sbom por sbyar/ /lhag ma 'od kyi tshul du gtang / /dga' byed mchog ni phyag rgya 'di/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu dngos grub 'thob/ /rgyal srid nor

dang 'bru yi rnams/ /de bzhin nor bu 'di dngos grub/ /de ni de ma thag tu yang / /lha dang lha min mchod par 'gyur/ /bdag nyid kyis ni 'di bcings te/ /mkhas pa yis ni dus mtshams phyir/ /gnas lngar rab tu sbyor ba

yis/ /spyi bor dbang ni bskur byas na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi dbang / /de nas de ni nges par 'gyur/ /lo gcig tsam du mnyam sbyor bas/ /phan tshun du ni dbang bskur bas/ /khams gsum rab dgyes bdag po ru/ /blo ldan rdo rje

mi g.yeng 'gyur/ /de nyid 'khor lo bskor byas te/ /snying gar 'khor lo bzhin du bskor/ /zla ba gcig tsam mnyam sbyor bas/ /'khor lo bskor ba rab tu bsgrub/ /de nyid g.yon par rab sbyar te/ /rgyal mtshan tshul du yang dag spro/ /

zhag bdun du ni mnyam gzhag pas/ /'jig rten du ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ /de nyid kha nas brgad par sbyar/ /mnyam gzhag zla ba gcig tsam gyis/ /las rnams thams cad rab grub pa/ /brgod pa tsam gyis byed par 'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid

mnyam gzhag ste/ /rtse mo kha phyed rnam bsgyur bas/ /sbom po ze bar rnam byas te/ /lo ma lhag ma rgyas par bya/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /sdig pa kun las rab tu grol/ /bsod nams chen pos byin rlob ste/ /bde byed thams

cad grub par 'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid snying gar sbyar/ /mchog dang khro mo gnyis sbyar te/ /de gnyis tshigs gsum rab tu dgug /sbom po dkyil mo tsam du bya/ /rnal 'byor dag tu sbyor ba yis/ /'di yis zla ba gcig byas na/ /'jig

rten gsum las rnam rgyal rjer/ /dpa' bo chen por de 'gyur ro/ /thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te/ /rang gi snying gar bskor bar bya/ /de nas sngags mkhan chos ston par/ /mi g.yeng sems kyis de 'gyur ro/ /sbom po

lce yi tshul gzhag pas/ /de nyid khar ni rnam bzhag na/ /'jig rten kun gyi thams cad dag /mdor na zhag bdun tsam gyis kyang / /dbyig dang gser dang gos la sogs/ /bdud rtsi btung ba mchog gi rnams/ /'di yis thams cad

'phrog byed de/ /'grub par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te/ /mchog rab gnyis ni 'og tu gzhug /chung ngu gnyis dang sbom po gnyis/ /sbyar te snying gar rab tu gzhug /yid la dga' ba'i las rnams

thams cad byed/ /sgyu ma'i mthu dang srid pa mthar byed pa/ /rtag tu blo ldan lo ni phyed gnyis kyis/ /khams gsum rgyal srid mthu chen thob par 'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid mnyam sbyar te/ /rang gi ma mchu dbus nyid nas/ /sbom

po ro 'thob tshul gyis ni/ /khro mo 'khor lo yang dag spro/ /zhag bdun du ni bsgrims pa yis/ /'di yis khrag 'dren dngos grub ste/ /sha zas bza' ba las kun byed/ /thal mo nyid ni bcings byas nas/ /rdo rje gnyis ni pad

mar sbyor/ /sbom po'i zur ni sbrel nas kyang / /chung ngu gnyis kyang de bzhin te/ /mgrin pa nas ni rtse mo brkyang / /thams cad las ni sbyar byas te/ /'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag /rab tu sbyar bas 'jigs par

'gyur/ /thal mo de nyid mnyam gzhag nas/ /bcing ba dam pos bcing bar bya/ /sbom po gnyis ni nang du gzhug /khro mo gnyis kyang bskul bar bya/ /'di yis gdug pa thams cad dag /'dzums par rab tu byas par 'gyur/ /

skad cig tu ni gnod byed de/ /de bzhin bsdus dang btsir bar 'gyur/ /phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /de ni dngos grub thams cad kyi/ /dngos grub chen po bdag po dang / /thams cad las don 'grub par 'gyur/ /phyag

rgya 'di yis rgyas btab pas/ /rim par myur du 'gro 'ong byed/ /lo gcig gi ni sbyor ba yis/ /las rnams thams cad sgrub par byed/ /rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kun gyi las thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya'o/ /de nas rnal

'byor ma de dag thams cad rab tu mgu nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ rnam par 'gyur bas gar mdzad cing / /hi hi zhes pas glu ru len/ /ha ha zhes pas rab tu mgu/ /ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed/ /he he zhes pas

'bod par byed/ /hU~M hU~M zhes pas gad par byed/ /hA hA zhes pas skyod par byed/ /phaT phaT zhes pas gsod par byed/ /hU~M hU~M zhes pas phur bus 'debs/ /dzA dzA zhes pas 'dren par byed/ /sa sa zhes pas dam par

byed/ /dge ba dbang phyug nga ro mchog /hU~M b+h+ru~M zhes pas gsod par byed/ /hU~M b+h+rU~M hU~M b+h+rU~M/ hU~M hU~M zhes pas 'bar bar byed/ /tru~M tru~M zhes pas gzi brjid byed/ / triM triM zhes pas 'dren par byed/ /tra~M tra~M zhes pas mchod par byed/ /dngos

grub thams cad 'bras bu smin/ /tra~M tra~M zhes pas rmongs par byed/ /d+d+h+ri~M` d+d+h+ri~M` zhes pas 'dzums par byed/ /hriM hriM zhes pas 'dren par byed/ /hU~M hU~M` zhes pas 'phyan par byed/ /hra~M hra~M zhes pas rmongs par byed/ /hra hra zhes pas gnon

par byed/ /ho ho zhes pas mnyes par byed/ /ha~M ha~M zhes pas bsrung bar byed/ /hU~M hU~M zhes pas gsod par byed/ /hu hu zhes pas mgu bar byed/ /tra~M tra~M zhes pas bdug par byed/ /g+hu~M g+hu~M zhes pas phreng bar byed/ /ga~M ga~M zhes pas dri ru

byed/ /ra~M ra~M zhes pas brgyal bar byed/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams ngo mtshar cher gyur/ rmad du byung ba chen por gyur te/ rang gi sems mgu bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge

'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag po kun tu bzang po chen po la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba 'debs so/ /gnyis med mchog tu rmad byung ba/ /

bcom ldan de nyid bshad du gsol/ /gang gis sems can grub pa 'di/ /gsang ba sbas pa grub par 'gyur/ /gar dang glu dang bzhad pa che/ /sgeg mo rol pa bde ba mchog /sil snyan gling bu rnam sna tshogs/ /brdab dang

rgyud rnams rab 'byor pa/ /gsang rgyud cho ga'i rim pa rnams/ /rdzu 'phrul blo yi che ba che/ /dngos grub thams cad grub pa yis/ /sngags rgyal khyod kyis bshad du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan sangs rgyas rnams/ /thams cad bdag po rgyal po che/ /

thog ma med nas spyod rmad byung / /sna tshogs chen po rnam mi rtog /sna tshogs ye shes yon tan che/ /bla med chos kun dbang po ste/ rig dang sngags kyi bdag po che/ /de nyid chen po snying po mchog /blo rmongs phyag rgya rgyas 'debs te/ /rgyas 'debs

rmongs byed za ba po/ /gtong dang byed pa khyab pa che/ /bskyod pa sdig pa 'phrog par byed/ /sdig pa'i chos rnams sel bar byed/ /dus ngan 'dod byed khros pa po/ /gti mug chos rjes 'debs par byed/ /sa dang bar snang de bzhin bde/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor

pa la sbyin/ /tshangs dang gtogs 'dod dbang chen pos/ /de la phyag dang mchod par byed/ /de nyid skyong byed skyob pa po/ /gsang ba'i gsang ba bde ba che/ /zla gsang thig le las byung ba'i/ /sbas pa chen po gsang ba ston/ /nyid kyi sku gsung

thugs rdo rje/ /bde ba chen po 'byin mdzad do/ /skal ldan nye bar longs spyod kun/ /bud med thams cad dbang du byed/ /rang 'byung mtshan du thig le ste/ /bcu gsum dra ba dbu ru ldan/ /'di yis bud med bskyed byas te/ /sa bon gyis ni rgyal po

'du/ /'od zer gzi brjid 'bar ba can/ /rang las myu gur 'dra ba yis/ /'og gi phyogs su gzhag pa ni/ /ha~M byas myur du drang bar bya/ /dang po drang ba gnyis drang pas/ /tsheg drag des ni lcags kyu byas/ /lha dang lha min mchog

gi bdag /khams gsum thams cad drang bar byed/ /'di yi tshul gyis sbyor ba yis/ /phan tshun du ni bsgrub byas nas/ /rmad byung rnam pa sna tshogs kyi/ /dngos grub byed pa sbyin par byed/ /bdag nyid rang bzhin mthong bar bya/ /

sbyor ldan zla ba'i gzugs nyid du/ /de ste sa bon gzhag par bya/ /de nyid de nyid thabs kyis gnas/ /sngags kyi sbyor ba rab sbyor bas/ /de nas sngags mkhan der 'grub bo/ /de nyid sngags dang snying po dang / /phyag rgya rig dang mi ldan pas/ /sangs

rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' yang / /'grub pa nyid du yong mi 'gyur/ /de nyid nang du sbyar byas na/ /snying po snying gar sbyor ba yis/ /phyag rgya phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya/ /sngags dang sngags kyi 'bru bsgoms te/ /rig ma rig ma nyid du sbyar/ /

'di yis myur du dngos grub ste/ /mgyogs par 'gro ba rab tu 'grub/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi sa chen por/ /'byung dang 'byung las 'gyur ba nye/ /rnal 'byor 'byor don sgrub pa po/ /dpa' bo chen po 'gro 'ong byed/ /de nas de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad rab tu mgu rangs par gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbyangs 'di bsgrags so/ /kye ma'o kun tu bzang po yi/ /rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med/ /bshad pa gsang ba zhes bgyi ba/ /de nyid don du bsgrub pa ste/ /snying po phyag rgya dam tshig

ni/ /sngags rig rang gi lha nyid de/ /bdag gi de nyid ji bzhin pa/ /gsang ba rgyal ba mchog gis gsungs/ /dkyil 'khor dang ni dam tshig dang / /gsang ba sbas pa de nyid de/ /'jig rten gsum gyis 'dud pa'i rim/ /dpa' bo chen

pos rab tu bsgrags/ /rdo rje pad ma rnam mdzad pas/ /rig ma dang ni lhan cig brtsen/ /gdug pa thams cad mnye bya dang / /dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang / /slob dpon smod la bsgral ba dang / /gzungs ma'i bdag por bsgrub po dang / /

sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed bya dang / /rab dgyes bdag nyid bskul ba dang / /sdig pa thams cad sbyang ba dang / /bud med thams cad 'dod bya dang / /bdud rnams thams cad drang bya dang / /rdo rje kun du gzhug bya dang / /pad ma'i gnas

ni dgang bya dang / /bsgrub dang nye bar bsgrub pa dang / /shin du sbyor dang sbyor che ba/ /sbyor ba rab sbyor sbyor skye ba/ /de rnams de nyid mkhyen pa po/ /bde ba chen po nyid kyis gsungs/ /bsgrub pa yi ni sbyor che ba/ /sbyor dang sbyor

mar yang dag sbyor/ /de nyid gsal bar sems dpa' che/ /phan par dgongs pa nyid kyis gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba'i mdo rjes su dris pa/ rang gi thugs la bzhag ste/

nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ba/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig ni/ /kun du sbyor ba mnyam par ldan/ /de nyid phyag rgya chen po ste/ /ye shes lnga yis rjes su bskyed/ /dkyil 'khor phyag rgya bzhi pa ste/ /phyag rgya chen pos rjes su

bsgrubs/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed mdzad de/ /kye ma'o bde ba rnam par 'byung / /snying po ye shes shes bya ste/ /ye shes bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya ye shes phyag rgya che/ /dam tshig mchog ni rig ma'o/ /sngags kyi yi ge

tshul 'dra ba/ /yi ge'i phyag rgya don chen sbyin/ /'di yis bsgrub pa byas pa'i gzungs/ /bdag gi de nyid lha de nyid/ /de dag de nyid ci bzhin par/ /nga yis gsang ba rab tu bsgrags/ /dam tshig ma yin mi shes la/ /sngags rig pas ni bstan

mi bya/ /phyag rgya thams cad gsang bya ste/ /dam tshig rgyas 'debs gsang ba yin/ /de nyid lha yi sbyor ba ni/ /gsang ba gsang ba rab tu bsgrub/ /rdo rje pad ma rnam mdzad pas/ /rol pa phyi nang sbyor ba yis/ /rig dang lhan cig brtsen bya

ba/ /sprod pa dang ni 'khyud pa dang / /de bzhin mchu ni so yis gzung / /rdo rje bstan pa gzhug par bya/ /g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis ni/ /bskyod cing rnam par gar bya'o/ /gdug pa thams cad mnye bya ste/ /nu ma mchan khung khur tshos

gnyis/ /'gram pa dang ni brla gnyis rgyab/ /rkang pa lag pa 'jam po gnyis/ /mnye ba'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /mdza' ba chen po de 'grub bo/ /'dod pa'i don gyi bar gcod dang / /dam la zhe sdang bza' ba dang / /zhe sdang

can gyis zos 'gyur ba/ /khyad par gzhan dang gzhan yang bza'/ /rtag par mi phyogs smra ba dang / /bla ma smod rnams bsgral bar bya/ /sha dang khrag dang glad pa rnams/ /drangs te tshogs kyi mchod par bya/ /'di ni gsang ba drag

po ste/ /rdo rje slob dpon smod pa dang / /bla ma smod byed brtson pa la/ /dam tshig phyir ni bsgrub par bya/ /gti mug de ni 'grub mi 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal ba yang 'thob 'gyur te/ /thams cad nad dang khros chen dang / /

'jigs byed nye bar 'tshe ba yis/ /bskal pa grangs med bye ba ru/ /sdug bsngal chen po bsten byed cing / /'o dod 'bod par sbrul gyi bdag /stir med chen po brlag par 'gro/ /lus ngag sems ni bde dam pa/ /rig ma

kun la bskyod byas te/ /byang chub chen po bde ba yis/ /tshul bzhin du ni bsngags par bya/ /bskul ba'i snying po 'di smras te/ /dzaHzhes skad cig skad cig du/ /rang gi gnas nas gnas pa yis/ /de nyid lha ni bskyod par bya/ /bcu

drug cha dang yang dag ldan/ /zla ba gsang ba'i thig le la/ /me tog dang ni 'dra ba nyid/ /rlung gis phul ba bskyod par bya/ /de ni bskyod pas 'grub pa ste/ /de bzhin du yang bskul bar bya/ /rgyun gyi phreng ni 'od gsal

bzhin/ /blo ldan rtag tu bsgrub par bya/ /bdud rnams thams cad 'dren pa ni/ /lha mo rnams ni snying por bshad/ /zhags pa'i tshul gyis gzhug pa dang / /de bzhin dgang ba bcing ba'o/ /bsgrub pa lha yi sbyor ba ste/ /

rjes su bsgrub pa lha mo'i don/ /bsgrub pa chen po gnyi ga'i rgya/ /mnyam par sbyor ba rdo rje'i mchog /nye bar sgrub pa gnyi ka gnas/ /shin du bsgrub pa bde dam pa/ /so yi rtse mos mchu bzung ste/ /ma mchu mchog

ni bsdam par bya/ /sbyor ba rab sbyor skal ldan pa'i/ /rab dgyes ro myang bde dam pa/ /lha dang lha nyid yang dag sbyor/ /'di ni gnyis su med ces bya/ /snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis/ /nyid kyi gzugs ni bsgrub bya ste/ /bdag ni

sems dpa'o zhes bsams na/ /'di ni gnyis med myur du 'gyur/ /gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i lha'i/ /dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /sbyor dang rab sbyor sbyor che ba/ /rgyal ba kun gyi mchog gis gsungs/ /bcom ldan rdo rje sbyor ba

ste/ /rab tu sbyor ba mkha' la 'gro/ /phyag rgya de dang rab sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba chen po bsgrags pa yin/ /'di yis dpa' bo thams cad dang / /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /sbyor ba'i dbang po bde ba che/ /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur/ /

phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab na/ /rdo rje'i bdag po chen por 'gyur/ /mnyam par sbyor ba sbyar ba yis/ /'jig rten gsum po myur du rgyal/ /yang dag sbyor ba sbyar tshul gyis/ /drangs te rab tu bcug nas kyang / /rdo rje brtan pos bskul byas te/ /shin

du 'dod pas 'dod pa bskyed/ /mkha' 'gro thams cad thabs mkhas ldan/ /rgyas dang de bzhin zag par bya/ /'di ni yang dag sbyor ba sbas/ /sbas pa rnal byor ma dkyil lo/ /'di yis yang dag dngos grub blang / /rdzu 'phrul chen po 'bras bu 'thob/ /

sangs rgyas byang chub bde che dang / /byang chub mchog rab yang dag 'thob/ /gsang ba chen po rmad 'byung ba/ /de dag de nyid sbas pa che/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis dris pa'i rgya/ /nga yis yang dag rab tu bstan/ /gang gis yang dag ldan mthong

dang / /bdag po chen po mchod byed na/ /de yis ston pa kun mthong ste/ /rgyal ba mchog la mchod par 'gyur/ /srid pa gcod pa por 'gyur te/ /'gro ba'i ston pa mchog tu 'gyur/ /de la lha kun mchod byed cing / /skad cig skad cig

phyag kyang byed/ /ji ltar ston pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /phan byed 'jig rten skyes gyur pa/ /sna tshogs ye shes rjes bsdus pas/ /rnal 'byor chen por de bzhin 'gyur/ /rang gis dam tshig bsrungs pa yis/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde skye ba/ /

rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ldan pas/ /dngos grub chen po des 'thob bo/ /rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan btab la/ /cung zad mi 'grub yod med de/ /phyag rgya kun gyi bde ba che/ /bdag nyid so sor rjes su 'grub/ /rab dgyes mtshan dang mdza'

chen mo/ /ro dang reg pa'i che ba'i che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' sbyor ba yis/ /dpyad mi dgos par 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas de dag mgu 'gyur te/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde che ba/ /sbyor ba 'dod pa'i gzir ba yis/ /sbyor ba chen pos mnyes

par mdzad/ /ra ma ra ma sa ma ho ma hA sa twa/ /rab dgyes gdon mi za la bzhugs/ /sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /zla gsang thig ler yang dag ldan/ /bdag cag kun kyang dam tshig ste/ /skal ldan dri med rab dgyes

kyi/ /rnal 'byor ma snying mchog nyid du/ /sbyor ba nyid kyis rol pa mdzod/ /theg pa chen po bde che yi/ /pad ma rdo rje rin chen gyis/ /rnal 'byor ma kun dkyil 'khor du/ /rab dgyes longs spyod nyid bsten mdzod/ /

bdag cag thams cad nyes bral te/ /gnod med de ni gser dang 'dra/ /de nyid thams cad grub chen po/ /rab dgyes bdag nyid nyid bsten mdzod/ /sprod pa 'khyud pa sbas pa dang / /gzhug pa dang ni gtong ba'i mchog /

'di ni sgyu ma'i brtan pa yis/ /ded dpon rab tu brtag pa mdzod/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun du bzang pos 'dod pa thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal zhes bya ba'i chos thams cad mnyam pa

nyid kyi sbas pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i kun du 'khyud pa dang / sprod pa dang / gzhug pa dang / 'dren pa dang / rab tu bskul ba dang / mnye

ba dang / thigs pa dang / tshor bar bya ba dang / bskyod pa dang / kun tu bskyod pa dang / bcing ba'i rdo rje dang / pad ma chen mo mnyam du sbyor ba la yang dag par zhugs te/ shin tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos/
bde bas kun tu rgyas par mdzad cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gzungs ma'i tshogs thams cad la/ bskyod pa dang / rab tu dgyes pa dang / rab tu rnam par
'byin cing shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i/ /bde ba'i mnyam pa nyid kyi tshogs kyis nam

mkha'i dbyings thams cad kun du rgyas par byas te gnas so/ /de nas rnal 'byor ma chen po shin tu dgyes pa'i bdag nyid chen po de dag nyid mgu zhing bde bar gyur te/ kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che/ /rdzogs sangs

rgyas ni mgu ba che/ /bde ba chen po rangs par 'gyur/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che/ /bde ba nyid kyis phyag byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po/ /mgu ba chen po'i bde dang ldan/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde ba
che/ /'jigs shing skrag pas sdug par byed/ /khros pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma/ /rab tu mi bzad dug dang 'dra/ /bde byed chen po'i rol pa yis/ /bde byed che la mchod par byed/ /skal ba chen po srin mo

dang / /bde byed bde bas rab rmongs pa/ /mchod pa'i sprin phung bde ldan pa'i/ /rgya chen mchog gis mchod par byed/ /drag mo chen mo ma lta bu/ /rab tu gtum pa me 'dra ba/ /'ongs nas bde byed chen mo yis/ /

gtso bo mchog la mchod par byed/ /lha dang lha mo thams cad kyang / /klu mo dang ni rta gdong yang / /'ongs nas bde ba sbyor ba yis/ /yid du 'ong bas mchod par byed/ /de nas dbang po lha chen po/ /bdag nyid chen po lha yi lha/ /

kye ma'o bde ba sna tshogs nyid/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba bde ba che/ /mgu zhing rab tu rangs pa yis/ /lha yi lha ni sngon du 'gro/ /dpa' bo bde la phyag byas te/ /kye ma'o bde ba bde ba che/ /rang gi bde bas mngon mchod cing / /

'jigs shing skrag pas mnyes par byed/ /tshad med rangs pa bzhad pa che/ /glu gar mchog tu ldan pa dang / /bza' dang bca' ba sha chen dang / /sil snyan phreng ba ro chen dang / /gling bu rgyud mangs rdza rnga dang / /pi bang pal kig

ha la le/ /stag dang dpa' bo 'jigs pa dang / /zhi dang rmad 'byung 'jigs byed dang / /bdag dang khros dang spyan rgyas pas/ /skad cig skad cig mchod byed cing / /byed pa dang ni bzlog pa dang / /'phrog pa dang ni gzhug pa dang / /sid ces dang hU~M hU~M

dang / /ha ha zhes pas mnyes byed cing / /rab dgyes bdag nyid bde ba yi/ /rang gi chung mas mnyes par byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rab tu dgyes pa bde ba chen pos/ nam mkha' dang nam mkha'i skabs thams

cad la gnas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang rgyal dang nyan thos dang / rang bzhin gyis 'gag pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes/ la gnas pa rnams shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i

bde ba'i thabs dang / shes rab kyi bde bas bskug ste dbang bskur nas/ shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par 'jog pa dang / shin du dgyes pa chen po'i bde ba'i chos nyid kyi rgyal po rjes su skyong zhing

mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams chen po ma lus pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams su rab tu gzigs pas gzigs nas/ 'jig rten dang / lhar bcas pa rnams la bde ba chen pos

khyab par mdzad do/ /sems can dang rigs thams cad dang / gnas thams cad dang / spyod pa dang mi spyod par bcas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa dang / sa'i 'og dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang /

bsags pa'i dbang po lnga dang / rnam par shes pa dang / shes bya dang / bdag dang / bdag gi dang / sna tshogs dang / sna tshogs ma yin pa dang / bus pa dang / rgan po dang / gzhon nu dang / bud med dang / skyes

pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang / srog dang / rab tu zad pa dang / 'jigs pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / shes pa dang / mi shes pa dang /

shes rab dang / thabs dang / khyab pa dang / khyab byed dang / zla ba dang / dbang chen dang / nyi ma dang / me dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / lus srul po dang / tshangs pa dang / gtogs 'dod dang dbang phyugs

chen po dang / lha mo dang / skal ba dang ldan pa dang / skal ba dang mi ldan pa dang / dngos po dang / dngos po med pa dang / mtshan dang / rdo rje dang / pad ma dang / rin po che dang / ral gri dang / tho ba dang /

dbyig pa dang / rtse gsum pa dang / 'khor lo dang / sbyor ba dang / rab tu sbyor ba dang / stong pa dang / stong pa chen po dang / mchog tu stong pa dang / shin tu stong pa dang / stong pa rab tu stong pa dang / byang chub dang /

byang chub kyi sems dang / yi ge dang / yi ge med pa dang / dra ba dang / lcug ma dang / cha dang / cha med pa dang / thig le dang / ro dang / ro chen po dang / yid la byed pa med pa dang / rtag pa dang / zhi ba dang / mi zad pa dang /

thar pa dang / thar byed dang / grol ba dang / rigs pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / nam mkha' dang / skabs dang / skabs med pa rnams la gcig tu stug por gyur te/ rnam par phye nas mi snang ba'i tshul du

gnas so/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi btsun mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin ma dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin ma
rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po shin du dgyes pa rdo rje gdon mi za ba chen po gsang ba chen po'i dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa chen po la phyag mdzad de/ mngon

sum du yang dag par bskul nas dris pa/ su ra ta s+t+wa~M ma si ho/ /gang phyir 'dod pa bde ba che/ /gang gis 'dod las byang chub 'gyur/ /'dod chags bral ba ji ltar bde/ /gang gis zhe sdang rdo rje che/ /gang
gis gti mug rgyal ba che/ /gang gis 'dod chags pad mar 'gyur/ /gang gis nga rgyal nam mkha'i bdag /gang gis phrag dog gdon mi za/ /byang chub sems ni ji ltar bde/ /gang gis bde byed mchod par
'gyur/ /mchod pa yis ni ji ltar 'grub/ /ji ltar gzungs dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /yi ge mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga/ /bsnyan pa yis ni myur du 'grub/ /ji ltar gsang ba mnyam
sbyor bas/ /rmad du byung ba'i dbang bskur 'gyur/ /ji ltar pad ma mnyam sbyor bas/ /dkyil 'khor rab tu zhugs par 'gyur/ /ji ltar dri chu byang chub dang / /khrag dang snang mdzad chen po yis/ /dam

tshig nyid du ji ltar 'gyur/ /ji ltar btung ba rab tu brtag /de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bdag po kun du bzang po chen pos/ rdo rje pha rol tu phyin ma'i gsang ba chen mo de dag thams cad la

rang gi bde bas mnyes par byas te/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbas pa chen po shin du sbas pa/ mchog tu gsang ba'i dris lan chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / /ngan song gsum gyi 'jig

byed du/ /sems can nyon mongs sdang byas pas/ /de phyir nga ni rdo rje che/ /zhe sdang zhes ni bsgrags pa yin/ /ngan song 'jigs pa chen po ru/ /sems can thams cad rmongs byed pas/ /de phyir 'di ni gti mug

ste/ /rtag pa thub pa mchog yin no/ /thabs dang shes rab tshul nyid kyis/ /'gro ba thams cad dga' byed cing / /pad ma'i tshul du rab rtogs phyir/ /de phyir 'dod chags zhes bya'o/ /bde chen sbyin pa'i sprin
gyis ni/ /sems can thams cad nga rgyal bskyed/ /nam mkha'i bde ba bsdus pa'i phyir/ /de phyir mkha' chen nga rgyal yin/ /ro la sogs pas mnyam sbyor bas/ /phrag dog rdo rje gdon mi za/ /sna tshogs
pad ma rab 'jug phyir/ /de yi phyir ni sna tshogs che/ /'dod chags bral ba dga' med phyir/ /bdag ni rab dgyes sbas pa che/ /'dod pa ma gtogs bde byed med/ /bde che 'dod pa nga yin no/ /'dod chags
med par byang chub med/ /byang chub med na'ang 'dod chags med/ /sdig pa'i nang na chags bral te/ /sangs rgyas bde mchog mnyes byed pas/ /'dod chags 'dod las bde byed kyi/ /bde ba mchog

tu rmad 'byung 'gyur/ /byang chub sems med bde byed gzhan/ /'jig rten gsum po 'dir med do/ /thams cad byang chub sems ngo bo/ /bde ba kun gyis tshim par 'gyur/ /bo zhes pa ni rdo rjer bshad/ /d+hi zhes pa ni gzungs
ma'i mchog /tsi ta zhes pa ni zag par bshad/ /ta zhes pa ni bde ba che/ /mchod pa med pas bde byed med/ /bde ba med pas mgu ba med/ /mgu bas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /grub na bde byed rtag pa yi/ /

phyag na rdo rje bde ba che/ /'dod pa'i bde bas mchod byed cing / /tshe 'di nyid la 'thob par 'gyur/ /bde ba kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings ni rnam par 'dzin/ /rdo rje 'dzin phyir gzungs ma ste/ /

hri zhes pa ni pad ma 'dzin/ /'di dang mnyam par sbyor ba yin/ /yi ge myur du 'grub par 'gyur/ /'dod pa lnga yi yon tan kun/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin/ /

mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i longs spyod de/ /de phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga/ /de yis bsnyen na grub par 'gyur/ /sngags kyi sku 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /dbang phyug mchog gis sngags rgyal lo/ /rdo rje sems kyi thugs

las skyes/ /mtshan can mchog tu sbas par bshad/ /de dang mnyam du spyod pa yis/ /mchog gi dbang ni bskur bar 'gyur/ /pad ma'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya bas/ /dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub par byed/ /blo ldan

de ru zhugs gyur na'o/ /dam tshig sbas pa tshogs kyi rnams/ /dri chu byang chub dmar po mchog /sha chen sbrang rtsi mar nyid kyis/ /lus la kun tu khyab gnas te/ /de yi phyir ni dam tshig che/ /dam tshig 'di yis
dngos grub ste/ /dam tshig yi ger ldan pa yis/ /sbyor ces sbyang dang bskyed byas na/ /bza' ba dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /de nas pha rol phyin ma kun/ /pad ma'i gzigs pa rgyas pa yi/ /'dzum bcas
g.yon nas gar mdzad cing / /rtag pa la ni yang gsol pa/ /rigs de rnam pa du ru bstan/ /ji ltar sbas pa gsum zhes bgyi/ /sna tshogs chen po de dag kun/ /bde la gnas pas bshad du gsol/ /de nas

bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis su med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba pha rol tu phyin ma'i de kho na nyid rab tu phyung ngo / /nga nyid sbyor ba bcom ldan 'das/ /rdo rje sems dpa' don chen sbyin/ /rigs kyi khyad par lnga rnams kyis/ /spyod
bcas mi spyod rnams la rol/ /rtag pa mi bskyod rin chen mchog /'jig dbang gdon mi za grub rnams/ /rigs ni rnam pa brgyad bstan te/ /mdo ru bsdus na rnam pa lnga/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/ /
khyad par theg pa rnam pa gsum/ /de nyid gsum po rdo rje mnga'/ /bde ba'i gnas la rol pa mdzad/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/ /

rang gi sdom pa gsol ba 'debs so/ /sdom pa dngos grub kun sbyin pa/ /brtul zhugs dka' thub sngags mkhan gyi/ /dam tshig mchog tu bsrung ba rnams/ /bcom ldan gsang ba nyid kyi gsungs/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

kun tu bzang po chen po mchog tu shin du dgyes pa'i bde ba la mngon par chags pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pas mkhyen te/ zhal rab tu bzhad pas rgyas nas nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs

rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo / /sku dang gsung dang thugs sbas pas/ /nan tan du ni bsrung bar bya/ /bsrungs pa yid ni bsod nams che/ /dngos grub shin du skye bar 'gyur/ /de ni 'di yis rgya che ba'i/ /yid kyis kha

dog dbyibs chen gyi/ /phyag rgya bcings la sogs pas btab/ /sbas pa'i sku ni rab bsgrub bya/ /rdo rje gsung du rab sbyor bar/ /chos kyi ngo bo phyag rgyas brjod/ /ngag sbas gsang bar brjod pa ni/ /nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung / /rang

sems rab tu 'bigs pa yis/ /zla ba rdo rje rnam par bsgom/ /rang bzhin gsum po gcig tu bsgom/ /'di ni yid sbas chen po yin/ /'di ni de nyid rgya chen mchog /rgyun du bsgom pa rnams byas te/ /gsum bsgoms pas

ni 'grub par 'gyur/ /gzhan min rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs/ /sbas gsum la sogs cho ga yis/ /phyag rgya thams cad rgyas btab ste/ /de bas nan tan thams cad kyis/ /sbas gsum rnam par sba bar bya/ /rdo rje mchog

'dzin chen po dang / /gtso bo chen pos byin gyis rlob/ /blun po gang gis 'das byas na/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa'ang skad cig 'jig /sems dpa' che dang bral gyur na/ /ngan song gsum du yang dang yang / /ji tsam nam mkha'i

dkyil 'khor ba/ /shin du mi bzad smin par 'gyur/ /de nas dam tshig de dag kun/ /rdo rje 'dzin la mgu gyur te/ /'jam po'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing / /g.yon gyis phyag byas slar gsol pa/ /gar dbang rnam gnon
gar mdzad cing / /mtha' yas phyag ni bcu pa'i bsgyings pa yis/ /pad ma'i lo ma 'jam po brgyad byed nas/ /gnyis min bde bar rdo rje 'jog mdzad de/ /sbas pa de nyid mi mnyam sad par 'gyur/ /

rdo rje 'daskam skyes zla ba yang dag 'du/ /thabs dang shes dgyes pa bde byed sogs/ /bde gshegs rnams kyi sbas pa nyid kyis shod/ /sbyor dang sbyor min yang dag sbyor/ /zhi ba'i thal mo mchog tu bde/ /'dod pa lnga yi yon
tan 'grub/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan dam tshig rgyal/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che/ /de nyid sbas pa bskul ba yis/ /sbas pa ma lus 'chad par mdzod/ /rdo rje pad ma
mnyam sbyor bas/ /cho gar ldan pas gang dbang bskur/ /bde bar 'dod pa'i slob dpon gyis/ /de nyid 'di ni de la bstan/ /'di la khrus med nyes pa med/ /dka' thub med de dka' ba'ang med/ /
sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam sbyor ba/ /nga nyid sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag sems rdo rje yi/ /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbab pa skyes gyur
na/ /ji tsam 'dod pa nam mkhar 'phur/ /snying gar rdo rje khu tshur bcings/ /rdo rje lta bas rnam bltas te/ /dgyes pa'i tshul gyis bsnyen byas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
skad cig 'gyur/ /rnam sgeg dgyes pa'i rnam gnon pas/ /rab dgyes sar ni 'gro byed de/ /sangs rgyas bde ba chen po dang / /grub pa yis kyang mchod byed cing / /rdo rje sems dpa'i rgya che mchog /
'gying ba'i longs pas gar byed pas/ /bde byed zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing / /las kyi khyad par las sogs gnon/ /sbas pa'i khur gyis gar byas pas/ /sbas pa sbyor ba'i bdag nyid 'grub/ /sna tshogs

dkyil 'khor gar byed cing / /lag pa mang po rnam bsgyur dang / /phyir brkyang dbyings su ldan pa dang / /khro bar dri med lta ba yis/ /gdul dka' gnon pa 'jigs byed pa'i/ /'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur/ /

me 'bar nyi ma'i dbus nyid du/ /khro bo hU~M mdzad bsgom byas na/ /myur du 'jig rten don bsgrub phyir/ /'jig rten gsum po rnam rgyal 'gyur/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor bas/ /su ra ta s+t+wa~M zhes smra zhing / /
ha ra thig le tshul sbyar na/ /rab dgyes de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /rab dgyes mchog tu brtag pa yis/ /sa chen rnal 'byor 'gro 'gyur te/ /lha mo bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis/ /sems can rnams kyi don kun byed/ /

de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bde ba chen po la phyag bzhes nas gsol pa/ thal mo yang dag sbyar byas te/ /phyag rgya de nyid nyid kyis shod/ /rdo rje mchog la gsol ba 'debs/ /bde ba'i bdag nyid

mchod pa shod/ /gzugs dang sgra dang dri che dang / /ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba/ /thugs rje chen pos bsgrubs pa yis/ /dpa' bo chen po nyid kyis shod/ /de nas bcom ldan bde byed che/ /rdo rje sems dpa' bdag po che/ /

phyag rgya bcings pa bde ba che/ /de nyid mchog ni bshad par mdzad/ /dang po chos kyi phyag rgya ste/ /gnyis pa dam tshig phyag rgya yin/ /gsum pa phyag rgya chen po ste/ /bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgyar bshad/ /de nas

sku gsung thugs rdo rje/ /ji ltar 'gying bzhin bsgom bya ba/ /sna tshogs ye shes rjes su dag /sna tshogs chen pos 'chad par mdzad/ /rtag pa'i sku ni ser po ste/ /mi bskyod rdo rje dkar po yin/ /nam mkha'i snying

po mthing ga che/ /tshe dpag med pa pad ma dmar/ /sna tshogs kha dog rgya che mchog /'od zer phreng ba rmad byung ba'i/ /gdon mi za ba rdo rje che/ /don chen byed pa bsam par bya/ /rang rang rigs kyi gnas nyid du/ /myur du

nam mkha' 'gro byed cing / /rigs kyi lha mo bzhi rnams kyis/ /rol pa dang ni mchod par byed/ /sna tshogs sbyor ba bde che ba'i/ /lha mo bzhi dang mnyam sbyor ba/ /rdo rje sbyor bdag bsgom byas na/ /rdo rje sems dpa'
bdag nyid 'gyur/ /rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' mchog /rdo rje la sogs gdan zhugs par/ /rang gi 'khor lo mchog gis brgyan/ /rang gi phyag rgyar gnas par bsam/ /pad ma'i gdan gyi tshul

gyis ni/ /brtse dang ldan pa'i bsgom byas te/ /snying po sbas don gar byas pas/ /sbas pa che la bde byed na/ /'gying ba'i bde bar ldan pa yi/ /rdo rje chen po de 'grub ste/ /sna tshogs dkyil 'khor rab nye bar/ /sna tshogs

chen po 'gro bar 'gyur/ /bde ba chen po thams cad 'grub pa'i sbyor ba chen po'i bde ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya rab tu rgyas pa'o// //de nas phyag rgya bcing bshad de/ /rtag la sogs pa'i de kho na/ /gang gis myur du bcings
pa yis/ /sangs rgyas dngos grub bde cher 'gro/ /thabs ni g.yas kyi logs su bya/ /de bzhin shes rab g.yon par te/ /zhi ba'i thal mo gsum nyid kyis/ /sbyor ba'i tshul gyis bsdu bar bya/ /sor mo

thams cad bar bar du/ /mnyam du sbyor bas khyad par sbyin/ /rdo rje yi ni thal mo 'dis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad nyid du bsgrub/ /'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang / /nam mkha'i snying po'i gnas su 'gro/ /
'di nyid shin du bcings pa yis/ /gsum du sbyor bas mchod par bya/ /de nyid las ni sor mo kun/ /kun du bskums te bcing bar bya/ /rdo rje'i bcing ba bsdus pas ni/ /bcing bar ldan par rnam bsgyur te/ /

de nyid sbom po rab bcug nas/ /khro mo'i rtse mo rab tu dgug /'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bcing / /rdo rje sems dpa' nyid 'grub byed/ /de bzhin bcings pa rnam bzhag ste/ /sbom po khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar/ /'di ni bcing ba

bcing ba che/ /nam mkhar 'gro ba nye bar bsgrub/ /de nyid bcing ba bcing byas te/ /khro mo gnyis po mtshan bzhin du/ /rtse mo sprad de dgug bya ba/ /bcing ba 'di yis pad ma bsgrub / bcing ba de nyid rab tu sbom/ /bde bar

bcug nas bsdam byas te/ /las kyi bcing ba sbyor ba yis/ /don yod mchog gi rigs su 'gro/ /bcing ba de nyid bcing byas te/ /sbom dang khro mo'i rtse mo sbyar/ /g.yas pa'i sbom po rdo rje yis/ /de yi dbus
su bcug bya ba/ /de 'di bcing ba chen po ste/ /rab dgyes ro ni sgrub byed pa/ /gang gis bcings pa tsam gyis ni/ /rab tu dgyes pa nyid thob bo/ /dngos grub thams cad bde ba che/ /de yis
'di tshe 'thob gyur te/ /phyag rgya bcing ba'i cho ga yis/ /sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu gnas/ /phyag rgya bcing ba'i ye shes rnam par rgyas pa'o// //bcing ba lnga yi cho ga yis/ /gcig gis rnal 'byor

bsgrub mi bya/ /drug ni sbyor bas sbyor byas na/ /de ma thag tu rab dgyes 'gyur/ /bcing ba lnga yi phyag rgya'o/ /de bzhin bcing ba gnyis byas te/ /g.yon gyi snying gar bcing bar bya/ /g.yas kyi rtse mo bsgreng byas

te/ /rdo rje'i tshul gyis gzung bar bya/ /phyag rgya 'di ni byang chub bde/ /sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tu bsgrub/ /gdon mi za bar tshe 'di la/ /rtag pa 'dra ba thob par byed/ /g.yon pa de nyid snying gar gzhag /
g.yas pa sa la regs byas pas/ /sa la bde ba rol pa yis/ /'di yis mi zad thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin snying gar g.yon pa bzhag /lag pa g.yas pa rab sbyin bya/ /'di yis rin chen skal ldan sogs/ /

nam mkha' nye bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /de bzhin g.yon pa snying gar gzhag /g.yas kyang gzhag ste ting 'dzin gnas/ /'di yis tshe dpag med pa nyid/ /tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur/ /de bzhin g.yon pa snying gar sbyar/ /lag pa g.yas pa mi

'jigs sbyin/ /'jigs pa ma lus rab sgrol ba/ /sdig pa gdug pa 'jigs pa che/ /'di yis thams cad 'phrog par byed/ /gdon mi za ba'i nges par yi/ /de ni chen po'i chen por 'gyur/ /de nyid bcing ba gnyis byas te/ /g.yon pa
g.yon du sbyar bar bya/ /g.yas ni snying gar gzung byas te/ /brjid pas rab tu bzhad cing gnas/ /bde ba chen po thabs gnas pas/ /'di yis rab dgyes nyid 'gyur te/ /bde mchog nyid du sgrub pa po/ /

tshe 'di nyid la the tsom med/ /de bzhin bcing ba bcing byas te/ /sbyor dang ldan pas brtan par bya/ /sbom po'i rtse mo pad ma'i gnas/ /g.yon gyi khro mo'i rtse mor sbyar/ /g.yas pa yi ni sbom po yis/ /mngon sum

rdo rjer byas pa yis/ /bcug nas bde ba spyod bya zhing / /skad cig skad cig bsdam par bya/ /de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ /dgyes pa dgyes mchog sgrub pa po/ /'di ni bcing pa tsam gyis kyang / /yang dag

rdo rje dgyes pa 'thob/ /rab dgyes bde mchog longs spyod kyi/ /btsun mo dngos grub nyid du 'gyur/ /g.yas ni mtshan mas bgrang byas te/ /lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag par bya/ /rdo rje 'dod ma lcags kyu ste/ /rdo rje

'dod byed btsun mo yi/ /dang por 'dren pa de nyid bzhag /tha mar ha ra thig ler bya/ /rdo rje dgyes pa bde 'thob byed/ /ming ni dbus su bri bar bya/ /'di yis snying gar byas pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa

bde mchog 'gro/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis/ /lus 'dis tshe 'di 'grub par 'gyur/ /rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag ldan/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing / /rdo rje 'gying la sogs sprod pas/ /

rnal 'byor 'di ni bcings pa yis/ /rab dgyes la sogs ma lus pa/ /rab dgyes ro la bsgyings ma yis/ /skad cig nyid du 'dren par 'gyur/ /de bzhin sbom mo'i rtse mor sbyar/ /snying rje chen po der gzhag pa/ /

skal ba chen po rdo rje spyan/ /de nyid don kun ston byed ma/ /'di ni yang dag bcings pa yis/ /rdo rje rtag pa'i spyan du 'gyur/ /yod dang med pa rnams spangs pa/ /dngos po thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /

rdo rje'i thal mo brtan bya ste/ /khro mo rtse mo bzlum po yi/ /mthon por mtshan dang 'dra byas te/ /sbom por rdo rje brtan pa che/ /de 'di bcom ldan 'das ma mchog /rdo rje pad ma'i bde 'thob byed/ /rnal 'byor 'di ni
bcings pa yis/ /sbas pa chen po'i dgyes pa 'thob/ /de nas lha mo chen mo dag /spro ba che bas gar mdzad cing / /rdo rje bde byed bdag nyid la/ /bdud dang bcas pas phyag byas te/ /chos
kyis yi ge thabs gnas nas/ /de nas chos kyi gsol ba 'debs/ /chos kyi phyag rgya bde ba che/ /rdo rje bcom ldan bshad du gsol/ /bsgrub pa pos ni rab bsgrims na/ /gang gis lha ni 'grub par
'gyur/ /gang gis myur du byin brlabs pas/ /sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrub ste/ /bde byed gnyis kyis spro che ba/ /de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'jug 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo thams cad

kyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sbas pa las chos kyi phyag rgya chen po'i tshig 'di phyung ngo / /bcu gsum bdag nyid 'dren pa ste/ /thig le lhar ni yang dag ldan/ /tha mar

ha ra thig les gnas/ /rab tu dgyes pa rdo rje dgyes/ /snying gar phyag rgya 'di byas nas/ /dga' byed lhan cig brtsen byed cing / /spyod dang mi spyod 'grub 'gyur ste/ /rnal 'byor bde ba chen por 'gro/ /de bzhin 'dren pa thog

mar bya/ /rdo rje 'dod pa skyo ba mchog /ha ra thig le yang dag ldan/ /cha gnyis gsum pa sbyor byas pa/ /'di ni snying gar gzhag byas na/ /bde bar nam mkha' 'gro 'gyur te/ /bde ba shin tu rtag pa yi/ /'di

yis mchog tu dngos grub bo/ /'dren pa de nyid thog mar gzhag /ltos ltos zhes pa hU~M dang ldan/ /skal ba chen po rdo rje spyan/ /dbus su bskul bas 'grub par 'gyur/ /'phrul gyi spyan lnga nor che ba/ /
'di yis rnal 'byor 'grub 'gyur te/ /rdo rje byang chub dgyes pa che/ /sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ /dang por 'dren pa de nyid gzhag /tha mar ha ra thig ler bya/ /rdo rje dgyes pa bde
'thob byed/ /ming ni dbus su bri bar bya/ /'di yis snying gar byas pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa bde mchog 'gro/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang 'grogs pa yis/ /lus 'dis 'di tshe 'grub par 'gyur/ /
rab dgyes sbyor bar yang dag zhon/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang mnyam 'grogs shing / /rdo rje 'gying la sogs sprod pas/ /bcom ldan 'dod ma 'grub par 'gyur/ /chos kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi ye shes kyi
phyag rgya'o// //de nas bcom ldan sbyor ba che/ /thog ma tha ma med pa mchog /gdug pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje khro bor de 'gyur ro/ /mdun du
thog ma'i lha nyid du/ /rdo rje hU~M mdzad nyi ma 'bar/ /nyi ma bcu gnyis gzi brjid che/ /me 'bar rab tu 'bar bar ldan/ /'khor gyi 'khor lo de dag kun/ /dur khrod
kyi ni rgyan mchog gis/ /brgyan te gdug pa'i tshogs rnams la/ /de ni yang dag rol pa mdzad/ /khro chen mchog 'dul phyag rgya 'di/ /sngags ni rang gi snying gar bsgom/ /khro mo'i
bu mo'i mdun du bskor/ /khro mo chen mo de 'grub bo/ /'di yis gdug pa thams cad rnams/ /hU~M byas myur du brgyab par 'gyur/ /de dag gdug pa gdug pa che/ /'jigs
shing 'khrugs te rab tu 'jig /skyobs shig skyobs shig ces smra zhing / /rdo rje gtso la dran par byed/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mnyam par gzhag /'gro ba thams cad dbab bya ste/ /las
mchog thams cad sgrub pa pos/ /dgra yi rnams ni gzhig par bya/ /sbyor dang ldan pas 'bum bzlas te/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa na/ /gdon mi za bar kun 'gyur te/ /rdo rje
sems dpa' 'ang bsgrub par nus/ /zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ /khro bo'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so/ /
de nas sangs rgyas che de dag /sangs rgyas nyid skyes thams cad mchog /gzungs ma rnal 'byor ma thams cad/ /rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs/ /
phan tshun bde ba ldan pa yi/ /dga' bas 'khor rnams 'phags 'gyur te/ /rang gi bde byed skyes par 'brel/ /skal ba chen mo rtsen par byed/ /
de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje shin tu dgyes pa chen pos/ rang gi 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i tshogs rnams la/ yang dang yang du gzigs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
'dren pa'i rig ma'i snying po 'dis sdud pa mdzad do/ /oM badzra a~M ku sha du ru du ru/ e h+ye hi kaT+T+d+h+ya bi kad+d+h+ya/ /sarbAn baR+Sha da tsa kra sany+tsa ya/ badzra a~M ku sha hU~M
phaT/ 'di yis phyag rgya rdo rje yi/ /bcing ba gnyis ni dam byas te/ /rdo rje khro mo dgrol bar bya/ /rdo rje khro ba rab sbyar ba/ /rdo rje kyo ba zhes bya
'o/ /'gro dang ri bo sems can rnams/ /phyag rgya 'di yis kun bkug ste/ /'dod pas 'gying ba'i yid rtag rnams/ /mi'i
bu mo smos ci dgos/ /rdo rje bcings pa mnyam gzhag ste/ /g.yon gyi steng du de bzhin gzhag /dbus su sbom mo gzhag par bya/ /
rdo rje 'dren pa gzi brjid che/ /rdo rje bcing ba bsdam byas te/ /rdo rje sbom mo rtse mo sprad/ /bdag ni rdo rje zhes bsgom zhing / /bcing ba de ni dgrol
bar bya/ /de nyid bcing ba dam byas te/ /dbang dang chung ngu'i rtsa ba'i mtshams/ /rdo rje sbom po nus byas te/ /rab dgyes bdag nyid bskyod par
bya/ /de las rdo rje mchog gnyis bskyed/ /mdud pa'i tshul du sbyar bar bya/ /gzhug pa dang ni 'dren pa'i mchog /'di yis thams cad
dngos grub pas/ /rnal 'byor phyag rgya 'di nyid kyis/ /drangs te bcug nas bcing byas te/ /dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya/ /de nas de
dag thams cad drangs bcug bcings dga' bar bskyed nas/ rang gi rab tu dgyes pa'i bde ba chen pos/ /rang gi rgyal srid rjes su skyong zhing rdo rje chos la bka'
stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi tshul chen po/ /dga' byed zla gsang thig le yi/ /rab dgyes bdag nyid gsang ba 'di/ /
sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis zung / /de nas gdan las myur bzhengs te/ /thal mo sbyar te phyag bzhes nas/ /chos kyi ngo bor tshig
smras pa/ /bde ba chen po bdag gis blangs/ /rang bde longs spyod gar byas te/ /rdo rje tshe yis 'di skad smras/ /
rdo rje chos ni sna tshogs che/ /sna tshogs pad ma gar rab byed/ /de nas pha rol phyin de kun/ /rab dgyes
longs spyod gar byed cing / /bde byed chen pos bdag nyid rjes/ /legs pa zhes pa sbyin byed de/ /legs so legs
so bde ba che/ /legs so legs so ye shes che/ /legs so legs so sna tshogs che/ /
legs so legs so dgyes pa che/ /bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa'i thugs kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ pha rol tu
phyin ma'i 'khor chen mo de dag mngon par dga' bar gyur to/ /zla gsang thig le zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs
s+ho// //zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ gsung
rab don togs bslob dpon gyis/ /lhag par bkrol te bstan pa la/ /ci rigs bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis/ /
sems can sems bde thob par smon/ /zhus shig //
